. cágalp nedarid cautabircs natenuh urubil caocniaI irah aztuard neriuqehctare , éceidab iuqehctare yeuah açuag crohen nidlaB , iraicug neutid netuçne caztih neraitehporp ocatenuh urubil tacuard neztatsetorp necE
. ciniahod citerv ocezticiv , açeb rah caneud ihan ate : rohteb , aned irrage atE . rohtA , açeb narre , caneud netuçne atE . rohtA , étud netiarre casopS ate cautiripS atE

. oniaro ideb acifitcnas aned udnias ate : oniaro ideb acifitsui aned otsui ate : oniaro zib ustas aned ustas ate : oniaro otsuini zib aned otsuinI

. caçe aroda aocniaI : nénetzutid neztariugeb caztih ocatenuh urubil ate , nétehporP eyana erih ate , erih cuan ediuqiraztibrec nece : náiugatze cuariugeB , nadaçeic narre atE
: táçnaçen aroda areniztia nénio neräureugniA nadiuqzuarec netsucare cuah açuag äurub eruen naçen ztoge naodno issuki ate nuçne atE . anadutid issuki ate nuçne cuah açuag sennaoI zian in atE
. aneutid neztariugeb caztih oczaitehporp ocatenuh urubil ad ustahod : irras zian udleh , ánuH
. cáçuag nedarid raheb niuge irras táçnezteid stucare yeiraztibrec ereb , äureugniA ereb cid nakv irrogi canuaI ocniaI néudnias atehporP ate : caoczaiuge ate cutid cáledif cuah ztiH , nadaçeic narre oreuG
. ztocaluces aluces étud nerutanger ate : ceh utid neztiugra canuaI ocniaI nece : étutze cirraheb neriugra iuqzugi ze , neriugra alednac ate , nenaçi atze nah ciuag atE
. ad nenaçi naterraleb néyah aneci nerah ate , aetrahtiugeb nerah étud nerissuki atE

. ztocatenussasso nélitneG caotsoh neraerobra ate , autcurf ereb aleuç netiame zoro ehtebelih , utcurf ibamah aleutic netrake aerobra ocezticiv nec cirateib edla neraoiuulf ate naidre neraçalp nerah atE

. ztocatetabitug arobmed nidad ahcal ad raheb oreug ate : oneuqzetiad ilpmoc caehtrv allim , táçnaztitze icudes cirogaiheug caedneg , naeniag nerah naçec aliugic ate , aruh naçec stre ate , aremsyba aruh naçec noiri atE

. ANVAI NENVAI ATE , AEVGER NEVGER , ruah neci zubircs naerrethci ate náruditzev ereb neuç atE

. autiripS oczaitehporp cud aegainomitset nesuseI nece : caçe aroda aocniaI . aegainomitset nesuseI etutiab céniec , néyana erih ate , cuan ediuq iraztibrec erih : náiugatze cuariugeB , nadaçeic narre ate : táçnaçen aroda aruh areniztia nénio nerah äurub eruen naçen ztoge atE

. acogad iranuaI ocniaI erug açnassiup ate , eroho ate , airolg ate , enoitaulas : aiulellaH , aleoic , näurec tabidnah zov neztihna leport naçen nuçne naodno neuah açuaG

. nenedire cirogaiheug atze ate , aidnah etatiuic enolybaB ad neriztiari zerradni ocalenuH , aleoic , arossasti naçec ztiari ate , cirocalaçeb tabidnah irrah atorre , tabirrah cetabztihtrob ureugniA naçec rah oreuG

: ciroczerbram ate , ciroczanidrub ate , ciroczerboc ate , ciroczutaicerp ruç oczicug icnv ate , cirocaticug icnv oczeriouy ate , cirocaticug atom ruç ocateno niassv ate , ciroczatalracse ate , ciroczatec ate , ciroczerpruop ate , ciroczapserc ate , ciroczalrep ate , ciroczutaicerp irrah ate , ciroczerrahlic ate , ciroczehrrv açidnahcraM
: cirogaiheug netsore citaçidnahcram néyah utiapze crohen nerec , naeniag nerah erohtied ate étud neniuge ragin ere-céiratakrem ocerruL
! ned naçi irrohte zetab nero aenoitanmednoc erih alon áztihtrob etatiuic , áidnah etatiuic nolybaB , sale , salE , aletioid , zerrudleb neratnemrot nerah aleduad nurrV
: aek oceztarre nerah naenetieuqsucad , cénedarid naçi iciv iuqsoiciled ate cénetud utadralliap niuqerah , céuger ocerrul naeniag nerah erohtied ate zaçrah étud neniuge ragin atE
. aruh utiab nerutaegui ceniec , ad ztihtrob anuaI ocniaI nece : ad nererre zus ate : etessog ate aireuhtrv ate oireh , cágalp nerah edarid nerirrohte zetab nuge ztocalaH
. teuqsucatze ciraireuhtrv ate , nugrahla zianze ate , aniuger ogan airraI , ud netiarre naeztohib ereb nece : ragin ate atnemrot tabmah euçome , atiab naçi natoiciled ate , utiab nakv utacifirolg äurub ereb tabmeC
. aelbod euçoçei name nápoc neuçuard nakv istuare crah : aruara nérbo ereb aelbod euçoçei agap ate : alaçeb neuçuard nakv niuge crah euçoçei adneR
. zétatiuqini nerah aocniaI ad naçi tiohro ate , onarurec acziaç naçi iuqierrai irrakle cautakeb nerah necE
. táçneuçaçetze ibecer cirateugalp nerah ate , táçneterazte tnapicitrap nateutakeb nerah , áulupop ene ciratrah etzetiaç iklI , aleoic , citurec tabzov ecreb naçen nuçne atE
. edarid naçi utsarba citenussatsarba ocateiciled nerah cairatakrem ocerrul ate : etud nakv utadralliap niuqerah céuger ocerrul ate , céicug edneg etud nakv nade citonrastaham oczarih neraçidralliap nerah necE
: enugariter neroro elbarcexe ate ustas anitzageh ate neroro ustas utirips ate , enoitatibah néurbaed ad naçi niuge ate , aruh idnah nolybaB ad irore , ad irorE , aleoic , zidnah zov iuqusterehtob nidec rai zuhio atE
: záirolg nerah arrul nidec iugra ate : aleuç aidnah erehtob , citurec alec netsuai tabureugniA ecreb naçen suki naodno neuah açuag atE
. naeniag néuger ocerrul ámuser ereb utiab ceniec aruh idnah etatiuiC cud aetzame näud nakv issuki atE
. oneuqzetiad ilpmoc caztih neraocniaI iraitseb ámuser ereb netoçeid name ate , necetid itnesnoc ate , aneud recalp crah netaçed niuge , nateztohib néyah cid irraçe caocniaI necE
. éid nererre naus , areb ate nenai aiugarah nerah ate éid nerutalosed aruh ate , canetacuard neriztire ztiag iradralliap cutid carrada ramah náutid issuki náitseb atE
. caihim ate , caedneg ate , caleport ate , caulupop cutid , atiab airrai ádralliap non , carv náutid issukI , nadaçeic narre oreuG
. caledif ate cautigele ate cauhtied cutid canedarid niuqerah ate : eugeR néuger ate , cud nuaI nénuai nece : ceyaic neruhtiarag astodliB ate , cutid nerutitabmoc artnoc nerastodlib cuaH
. éocoraid nename iraitseb aetatirohtua ate áçnassiup ereb ate , éid tabreb ulliesnoc cuaH
. niuqeraitseb éid nerutrah zetab nero alaçeb euger erehtob aniab , utrah oniaro etutiapze ámuser céniec cutid euger ramah , canáutid issuki rada ramah atE
. aod areztlag ate , ad cirateipzaç ate , ad aeuger nerragiztroç aruh , atiapze ate , néztiab niec áitseb atE
. noge tabruppa arobmed crah ud raheb naenerrohtad ate : irrohte oniaro atze aecreb , adab tab ate , edarid irore cazrob : edarid ipzaç caeuger atE
. atiab airrai aetzame naeniag néniec edarid caidnem ipzaç , cäurub ipzaÇ . aneud aitneipas udnemida ad nemeH
. atiab aniabala ate , atiapze ate , néztiab niec , áitseb naenetassucad ) cinadnaestah neraudnum näurubil ocezticiv cautabircs edaritiapze caneci néniec ( cétnatibah ocerrul éid neristerim ate : ocetiaoi aratenoitidrep ate , citemsyba cud ocetiagi ate : cirogaiheug cutze ate , cud naçi , áitseb náud nakv issukI
. aoiretsym neraocaterrada ramah ate neraocaturub ipzaç aitseb neud netrake aruh ate , neraetzame tauard nenarre cin ? cud netserim citagreC , cäureugniA nadaçeic narre atE
. naçen sterim zidnah etserim , cirissuki aruh ate , autidroh zalodo néorytram nesuseI ate , zalodo néudnias aetzame naçen suki atE
. áma nénoitanimoba ate nécidralliap ocerrul , aidnah nolybaB , oiretsyM , cirutabircs tab-neci naerraleb ereb atE
. aleuç naucse ereb aehteb zenussatustas ate zenoitanimoba ocaçidralliap ereb taboczehrrv apoc , zalrep ate zutaicerp irrah audniappa ate , zehrrv autatsehrrv ate , zatalracse ate zarpruop autalliba nec aetzame atE
. airrai naeniag netab neutic rada ramah ate urub ipzaç , ehteb zeneci ocatoimehpsalb , ocateroloc atalracse aitseb , tabetzame naçen suki ate : naçnen namare aratetab utresed zutirips atE
. catnatibah ocerrul edaritiab naçi utidroh zaonrastaham oczaçidralliap nerah ate , céuger ocerrul etutiab utadralliap niuqenieC
: aenoitanmad neraidnah adralliap neogad cirirrai naeniag nerv ztihna tauard neristucare , rohtA , alatsoic , niuqene nidec açnim ate , tab cirateureugniA ipzaç nétzutic cálopma ipzaç nidec rohte naudrO
. ad naçi aidnah oczicug ágalp neuç niuge crah nece : zasuac neragalp oczerrabairrah cénociug aocniaI netacec amehpsalb ate . aratenoçiug citurec nidec stuai cirocalaçeb tabtnelat ciridnah rabairrah atE
. nedire cirogaiheug necetizte caidnem ate , naçec niuge sehi coro alsi atE
. ocetiame nerapoc onrastaham oczenoitangidni nerarih ereb irah , naeniztia neraocniaI aratoiromem nidec rohte áidnah nolybaB ate , necetic rore caetatiuic nélitneG ate , aratetrap rurih aruh idnah etatiuic nidec niuge atE
. ciridnah niah toid cireztaraki rul , citzoreug zanedarid areniag nerarrul canoçiug naçi atiapze cirocalon , nidec niuge aidnah eztaraki rul ate : iricrogi ate stoh ate tsimtsihc nidec niuge naudrO
. ad niugE , aleoic , citedla onorht citelpmet ocurec tabidnah zov nidec ikli ate : areria álopma ereb naçec russi cäureugniA nerragipzaç oreuG
. arukel ned neztied nodeg-amrA zociarbeH , netaztic lib atE
) táçnaçetze suki aodial nerah crohen ate , táçnidatze libe cirirrogzullib , aneutid neztariugeb caudnemalliba ereb ate , aneogad irraztari ad ustahod : alaçeb anioho zian netrohte , ánuH (
. aralliatab ocatrah idnah nuge neraocaticug erehtob ocniaI tácnetaztid lib ceh canedarid netiaoi areteuger ocatoro udnum ate ocerrul ate , canetzutid netiuge caongis , utirips néurbaed edaridab necE
: cirociduri néleugi ustas utirips rurih , citoha néuslaf atehporp ate , citoha neraitseb ate , citoha neraniogard netikli naztin suki atE
. aedib néugeR ocedla etikli iuqzugi táçnidel niappa , arv ocatrah nidec roga ate : aridnah oiuulf ocsetarhpuE álopma ereb naçec russi cäureugniA nerragies oreuG
. ciraterbo ereb adneme nécetizte ate : citagcairuaç ate citagcaerolod ereb aocurec ocniaI netaçec amehpsalb atE
. zidnah neraerolod caihim ereb nétzutic neztacatsam ate : uçebmuhli ámuser nerah nidec niuge ate : areniag onorht neraitseb , álopma ereb naçec russi cäureugniA nerragzrob oreuG
. táçnetoçeil name airolg irah adneme necetizte ate : aneci neraocniaI neud erehtob naeniag néuah agalp , netaçec amehpsalb ate , zidnah oreb canoçiug necetic erre atE
. aeztarre zus nénoçiug nóiuqec name irah ate , ariuqzugi álopma ereb naçec russi cäureugniA nerragrual oreuG
. caudnemegui erih cutid otsui ate oczaiuge , áocaticug erehtob nuaI ocniaI , iuqrugeS , aleoic , citoirautcniaS tabecreb naçen nuçne atE
. cutid engid nece : aretade ceuard nakv name lodo ere-cih , étutiab nakv irussi alodo nétehporP ate néudniaS nereC
: cutitiab utaegui cuah açuag nerec : audniaS ate anecnI ate aneciA , anuaI zia otsuI , aleoic , äureugniA ocaterv naçen nuçne atE
. necetic ahlib lodo ate , arateirruhti rv ate arateoiuulf álopma ereb naçec russi cäureugniA néreh atE
. nidec lih aicug iciv amira ocossasti ate nidec acalaçeb alodo netabiuqsarras ate , arossasti álopma ereb naçec russi cäureugniA nerragib atE
. artnoc nénetuç neztaroda ánigami nerah ate , artnoc nénoçiug netuç ácrem neraitseb cirocatumad ate ciztiag tabagalp nidec niuge ate , arerrul álopma ereb naçec russi ate , äureugniA nehel adab nidec naoI
. cálopma ipzaç nerarih neraocniaI euçaztirussi ate etzaoÇ , yèureugniA ipzaç aletsoic , citelpmet tabidnah zov naçen nuçne naudrO

. oneuqzetil ilpmoc cágalp ipzaç néureugniA ipzaç naelpmet netiec ras nice rohen ate : zaek nec netikli citaçnassiup nerah ate : citetatseiam neraocniaI aelpmet nidec ehteb atE
. caehteb zarih neraiciv ztocaluces aluces ocniaI , ciroczehrrv alopma ipzaç yeureugniA ipzaç nézteic name cetab ciratelamina rual atE
. cautacirreug natèurugni rahlub zeocirreug oczehrrv , ziruhc ate zerup ohil cirutitzev , cäureugniA ipzaç netzutic cágalp ipzaç citelpmet necetic ikli atE
. näurec aelpmet neraelcanrebaT ocegainomitset nidec iuqeri , ánuh ate , naçen aheb náurub néuah açuag atE
. edaritiab naçi utatsefinam caudnemegui erih nerec : naeniztia erih éid nerutaroda ate , cutid nerirrohte caicug edneg nece : ih zia aztiokab udnias nece ? aneci erih nerutacifirolg utze cron ate , anuaI , nenaçi rudleb erih atze roN
. áeugeR néudnias , caedib erih cutid oczaiuge ate otsui : aocaticug erehtob nuaI ocniaI , cárbo erih cutid oczulucarim ate idnaH , aletioic , aocitnac nerastodliB ate , aocitnac nesesyoM iraztibrec neraocniaI nétuç neztatnac atE
: cárrattiug neraocniaI aletzutic ate , naiduri oczarieb ossasti aleduec , cinagautnoc neraneci nerah ate , cinagacrem nerah ate , cinaganigami nerah ate , cinagaitseb canetuç nakv namare airotciv ate : autacetsahan zus alaçeb tabossasti oczarieb naçen suki atE
. utilpmoc arih neraocniaI ad zaçeh nece cágalp ipzaç neuqza aletzutic , ureugniA ipzaÇ , ciroczulucarim ate ciridnah näurec tabongis ecreb naçen suki oreuG
. natoidatse nuhe yes ate allim , onaratedirb néiramaç citocal lodo nidec ikli ate : naopmac citetatiuiC nidec iuqzirua aocal atE
. aridnah ocal nerarih neraocniaI naçec rogi ate , aitsaham ocerrul naçec amednem ate , arerrul aztorroç yetiugi ereb cäureugniA naçec raçe atE
. cutid uhtno castaham ognatrah nece : caoklum ocitsaham ocerrul caztiamednem ate , aztorroç yetiugi erue carraçE , aleoic , iraneuç aztorroç yetiugi nóçeic niuge uhio iugneco ate , naeniag neraus erehtob aleuç , citeradla nidec ikli tabureugniA ecreb atE
. tabztorroç yetiugi ere-crah aleuç , citelpmet ocurec nidec ikli tabureugniA ecreb atE
. arrul nidec atieuqerre ate : arerrul ayetiugi ereb , caneogec cirirrai naeniag yedoh naçec raçe naudrO
. cud utihroç átzv ocerrul nece : audro oceztatieuqerre ciaç irrohte nece : caçe atieuqerre átzv ate , ayetiugi erue carraçE , iraneogec cirirrai naeniag yedoh , iugneco aloyaç zuhio , citelpmet nidec ikli tabureugniA ecreb atE
. tabztorroç yetiugi naucse ereb ate , tabaoroc oczehrrv naeniag urub ereb aleuç , cineuç iduri anoçiug cirirrai neogec tiebron naeniag yedoh ate : tabiruhc yedoh ánuh ate , naçen aheb atE
. étziaç netiuqierrai cárbo ereb ate , cirateuqen ereb edarid neztasoper nece : cáutiripS oid , yaB . tarah cidnemeh calih nedarid neztlih naenuaI edarid ustahoD , caçe abircS , alatsoic , citurec tabzov naçen nuçne naudrO
. canetzutid neztariugeb aedef nesuseI ate caudnemanam neraocniaI edarid nemeh : áitneitap néudnias ad nemeH
. ácrem neraneci nerah açedab rah crohen nidlab ate , ánigami nerah ate áitseb cénetud neztaroda uag ze nuge ze cirussuap nenakv etutze ate : ztocaluces aluces ad nerutahctla aek ocatnemrot néyah atE
. naeniztia nerastodliB ate naeniztia néudnias ureugniA zerhpus ate zus ad nerutatnemrot ate : citutsuh arapoc ocarih nerah rup onrastaham , yab , citonrastaham ocarih neraocniaI ud nenade ere-craH
, naucse ereb ode naerraleb ereb áçrem nerah açedab rah ate , ánigami nerah ate áitseb açedab aroda crohen nidlaB , iugneco aleoic , néiuqec iuqierrai äureugniA nereh atE
. utitiab nakv narade caicug enoitan zaonrastaham ocatarih neraçidralliap ereb nerec , aruh idnah etatiuic , nolybaB irore ad irorE , aleoic , nóiuqec iuqierrai tabureugniA ecreb atE
. aneutid niuge cairruhti rv ate aossasti ate arrul ate äurec euçaçe aroda ate : audro neraudnemegui nerah ad irrohte nece : euçome airolg irah ate , neraocniaI rudleb neteraÇ , iugneco aleoiC
: iraicug ulupop ate , ihim ate , uniel ate , enoitan ate , yetnatibah ocerrul taçneceil azilegnaue , aleuç alanrete oilegnauE , alec neztadlageh zaetra neräurec tabureugniA ecreb naçen suki oreuG
. naeniztia onorht neraocniaI edarid ebag alucam nece : ciroinagne nedire atze naoha néyah atE
. cautacifitcnas irastodliB ate iraocniaI aitimirp , caissore citetra nénoçiug edarid cuah : idatiab naoi ere-taron canaztierrad irastodliB edarid cuah : edarid anigriv nece : canedaritze utustas niuqetzame edarid cuaH
: caissore citerrul edaritiab niec , neciab céllim rual ate yeugorreb ate nuhe autnac neeuqaçec saki nice crohen ate : naeniztia néonaicnA ate , nélamina rual ate , naeniztia onorht tabirreb utnac isauq netuç neztatnac atE
: tabunios néirarrattiug netzutic netioi carratiug ereb naçen nuçne ate : alaçeb astoh netab idnah iricrogi ate , alaçeb astoh néidnah rv citurec tabzov naçen nuçne atE
. naterraleb ereb autabircs aneci neratiA nerah aletuç , allim rual ate yeugorreb ate nuhe niuqerah ate , naeniag idnem ognoiS neogec astodliB , ánuh ate , naçen aheb naudrO
. yes ate yeugorurih ate nuhe yes , autnoc nerah ate , ad aneranoçiug autnoc nece : aneci neraitseb açeb atnoc caneud cirudnemida : áitneipas ad nemeH
. autnoc neraneci nerah ode , aneci neraitseb ode , neciab ceneul ácrem las ode naçel sore nice crohen atE
. naterraleb ereb ode , naeniucse ucse ereb tabacrem netuztiab neztrah céobalcs ate cérbil , cérbuap ate céstarba , céidnah ate céippihc , céicug , neuç netiuge atE
. necetil lih , caicug netulze neztaroda ánigami neraitseb , naçel niuge ate , nidel açnim ánigami neraitseb ate , nóçeil name utirips iranigami neraitseb , nóiuqec name irah atE
. ad naçi utziv aniab , néztiab naçi iruaç zatapze niec , irah aitseb tabanigami netoçeil niuge , yetnatibah ocerrul aletsoic : naeniztia neraitseb nóyaztiab naçi name aetiuge néniec , zasuac néongis catnatibah ocerrul neutic nezticudes atE
. naeniztia nénoçiug neuztiab neticare stiare arerrul citurec aus non tabmah , neutic netiuge caidnah ongis atE
. néztiab naçi utadnes airuaç ocaratoireh neniec , aruh aitseb ocenehel netaçel aroda cétnatibah ocatrah ate carrul , neuç netiuge ate : náitneserp nerah neuç nezticrexe aicug erehtob neraitseb nehel crah atE
. nec oçnim alaçeb aniogard aniab : iduri canerastodliB rada ib neutic ate , citerrul alec netiagi tabaitseb ecreb , naçen suki oreuG
. aedef ate áitneitap néudnias ad nemeh : nidad lih zatapze aruh ad raheb , açedab lih zatapze crohen nidlab : areb ad nenamare aretatiuitpac , udab netiamare aretatiuitpac crohen nidlaB
. açeb nuçne , udab cirirraheb crohen nidlaB
näurubil ocezticiv nerastodliB ned naçi lih citenoitadnuf neraudnum , cautabircs edaritiapze caneci néniec , céicug tnatibah ocerrul aruh nétuç neztaroda atE
. naeniag neroro enoitan ate , ihim ate , uniel erehtob nóiuqec name ate : aeztiarag yæh ate , aetiuge alreug ere-artnoc néudnias nóiuqec name atE
. canedarid näurec ate , aelcanrebat nerah ate , aneci nerah táçnaztil amehpsalb , artnoc neraocniaI areztamehpsalb aoha ereb naçec iuqeri atE
. oceztilpmoc nerehtebelih ib ate yeugorreb erehtob nóiuqec name ate , aneutic neztaitnunorp caoimehpsalb ate caidnah açuag oha nóiuqec name atE
? etiad laha itabmoc ron artnoc nerah ? cineud iduri aitseb ad roN , aletioic , áitseb netaçec aroda ate , aniogard nacuarec name erehtob iraitseb , netaçec aroda atE
. iraitseb nóiuqec iuqierrai aicug rul aleogec zulucarim ate : nec naçi utadnes airuaç ocaratoireh nerah aniab , alaçeb airuaç aratoireh tab cirateurub nerah naçen suki atE
. idnah erehtob ate , aonorht ate , áçnassiup ereb caniogard irah noçeic name ate : ocalaçeb aoha neraniohel aoha nerah ate : ocalaçeb caneraztrah nedaric canio nerah ate , neuç iduri atrapoeL cáitseb neun nakv issuki cin atE
. tab-neci ocatoimehpsab nateniag urub ereb ate : amedaid ramah nateniag rada ereb ate , cineutic rada ramah ate urub ipzaç , alec netiagi citossasti tabaitseb naçen suki naudrO

. naeniag elbas ocossasti nidnen idleug atE
. artnoc nénetud aegainomitset netsirhC suseI ate nénetzutid neztariugeb caudnemanam neraocniaI , néocitiog ocicah nerah aretiuge alreug nidec naoi ate , artnoc neraetzame aniogard nidec erressa naudrO
aoiuulf neuç nakv iztiari citoha ereb caniogard naçec apurruh ate , aoha ereb carrul naçec iuqeri ate , aetzame carrul naçec atuia aniaB
. zaoiuulf táçnaçel icare aparrah aruh , alaçeb taboiuulf rv citoha ereb naodno neraetzame caeugus naçec ztiari atE
. ztocatidre nerarobmed ate ztocatérobmed ate ztocatetab arobmed atiab neztah non , arukel ereb , arutresed citeniztia neraeugus táçnidel adlageh , lageh ib cinetab idnah onarra iraetzame nacziaç naçi name aniaB
. aetzame nec naçi idre zarra naçec atucesrep , arerrul alec naçi iztiari nece caniogard adab naeneuç nakv issukI
. aleudab tabruppa arobmed nece iuqatiab alon , cirehteb zidnah arih , arateuç aurbaed ad istuai nece : yetnatibah ocossasti ate ocerrul enoitcidelaM . cáneteraç neztatibah nateh ate cäurec , areugela etzetiaç ztocalaH
. onaroireh nakv adippug etzutitze caiciv ereb ate , zasuac neraztih ocegainomitset ereb ate zasuac neralodo nerastodliB oiuqziaç naçi uhtiarag ceh aniaB
. uag ate nuge naeniztia neraocniaI erug neutiztiab neztasucca ceniec , ad naçi iztiari aelaçasucca néyana erug nece : aerehtob neranerah tsirhC ate , ámuser nerocniaI erug ate , arradni ate , audnemaulas ad niuge niarO , näurec aleoic tabidnah zov naçen nuçne atE
. necetic ztiari niuqerah cäureugniA nerah ate , arerrul adab ad naçi iztiari : utiab nezticudes aicug udnum ceniec , aned neztied nataS ate urbaeD , aruh rahaç eugus , aidnah niogard nidec ztiari atE
. näurec nedire cirogaiheug nidezte aukel néyah ate , naçi caneztihtrob nedarizte aniaB
: cäureugniA nerah ate nec neztitabmoc aniogard ate , artnoc neraniogard nedaric neztalliatab cäureugniA nerah ate elehciM : näurec taballiatab nidec niuge atE
. zenuge yeugorurih ate nuhe-reb ate allim táçnetaçed zah aruh nah , cirudniappa zaocniaI aukel utiab non , aratetab utresed naiugec sehi caetzame atE
. aronorht nerah ate anagaocniaI arruoah nerah nidec aparrah ate : zetab agreb oczanidrub caicug enoitan neutiztiab raheb utanrebog ceniec zetab ra emes nidec dre atE
. táçnaçel steri arruoah nerah , naenetaç idre , naeniztia neraneuç raheb idre etzame aniogard nidec idleug ate : arerrul ceh naztic ztoge ate , aetrap néreh nérraçi ocurec neuç neztarit canatzub nerah atE
. amedaid ipzaç natèurub ereb ate : rada ramah ate cineutic urub ipzaç , tabidnah starahrog niogard , ánuh ate , näurec ere-tabongis ecreb nidec sukI
. táçnidec idre neuç netiagari atnemrot ate , zenim oczerraheb idre neogec zarogayeh zenaçi arroçi atE
. tabaoroc oczerraçi ibamah näurub ate , aiugrahli néztiab naipza nénio neniec , tabutarugni zaiuqzugi etzamE , näurec tabidnah ongis nidec suki atE
. idnah açuçabab ate , eztaraki rul ate stoh ate tsimtsihc nidec niuge ate : naelpmet nerah ákrA oczaçnailla nerah nidec suki ate , näurec aelpmet neraocniaI nidec iuqeri naudrO
. canetud netiugesed arrul táçnaztid niugesed ate : yeidnah ate yeipihc nedarid rudleb neraneci erih ate , yeudnias ate , yetehporP iraztibrec erue airas táçnaeceid name ate , táçnecetid aegui , árobmed nélih ate , árih erih cud naçi irrohte ate , calitneG cutid naçi uterressa atE
: ámuser erue náud issah nerec ate , aidnah áçnassiup erue náud utrah nerec , ziatiab ocetrohtE ate , nécnihiaB ate , ziatiab nieC , áocaticug-erehtob nuaI ocniaI irih ugaiuqzuard carreuqsE , aletioiC
, aocniaI netaçec aroda ate , areniag nétrahtiugeb ereb cäurub ereb netaztic ztoge , céneduec cirirrai nateikla ereb naeniztia neraocniaI onaicnA rual ate yeugoh naudrO
. ztocaluces aluces ud nerutanger ate , amuser neranerah tsirhC ate neranuaI erug , cámuser ocatenuh udnum edarid naçi niugE , aletioic , näurec necetic niuge caidnah zov ate , záttepmort naçec oi cäureugniA nerragipzaç atE
. irras ad nerirrohte aenoitcidelam nerragrurih ánuh ate : ad naçi nagari aenoitcidelam nerragiB
. iraocniaI ocurec airolg éocuarid name ate , cutid naçi utici caecreb ate , noçiug allim ipzaç natrah eztaraki rul cutid naçi lih ate , cud naçi irore aetrap nerragramah neraetatiuiC ate : cud naçi niuge idnah eztaraki rul natrah nero atE
. céyaste ereb éitic issuki ate : natetab yedoh arurec cutid nagi ate : ánuh etzetiaç nagI , aletsoid yæh , citurec tabidnah zov éid nuçne oreuG
. areniag nenetzieuqutid nerissuki ceh cetad nerirore idnah nepaici ate , naeniag nénio ereb cetarid nenoge ate , cetad neruhtras arateh aocinagaocniaI utirips ocezticiv näurub neridre ate nuge rurih aniaB
. canedarid tnatibah naerrul netzieuqutid utatnemrot cuah atehporP ib nerec : irrakle éceuarid nerirrogi catneserp ate : éid nerutrah niugesta ate , naeniag néyah éid nenakv oiraczob cétnatibah ocerrul atE
. natarutlupes necetid raçe caztuprog neyah nerutittemrep eeuqitze ate , zidre ate nuge rurih caztuprog neyah , céocatenoitan ate , céocateihim ate , céocateulupop ate , céocatèuniel éitic nerissuki atE
. atiab naçi utacificurc ere-anuaI erug non , etpygE ate amodoS iuqlautirips atiab neztied niec , natecalp ocidnah etatiuiC cutid nenazte caztuprog neyah atE
: nelih ate citic neruhtiarag ate , artnoc neyah cid neniuge alreug , cáitseb ned netiagi citemsyba aegainomitset ereb naenetieuqud utabaca atE
. etieuqutiab ihan erezion zoro agalp oceztatoça nerarrul ate , oceztitreunoc aratelodo neyah , naeniag nerv erehtob éid ate : natenuge oczaitehporp néyah naiugatze cirirv , ocetsre neräurec erehtob éid cuaH
. cid raheb name aratoireh alenuh crah , euardab ihan niuge ciriuqziag crohen nidlab nece : cayaste néyah citic netseri ate , citoha néyah cud netikli aus , euardab ihan niuge ciriuqziag yæh crohen nidlab atE
. caneduad náitneserp neranuaI ocerrul rélednac ib ate cáuilo ib cutid cuaH
. aledarid cautitzev zucaç , zenuge yeugorurih ate nuhe-reb ate allim étutiab nerutazitehporp , céniec , iroinomitset ib cireruen aruh taeuarid nename aniaB
. zehtebelih ib ate yeugorreb éid nerutacidnoho audnias etatiuiC ate , yelitneG ceyaic naçi name nece : truen aruh aláçetze ate , álas ned citerokel elpmet aropmac caztiari aniaB
. canetud neztaroda natrah ate , aeradla ate aelpmet neraocniaI cazti truen ate , ida iuqiaI , alatsoic , tabureugniA nidec atneserp ate , ciriduri tabagreb tabarebanac nadiuqec name atE
. ireuger ate , irihim ate , iredneg ate , irulupop ztihna zirreb ceuard raheb utazitehporP , nadaçeic narre naudrO
. nidec nimrak alebas ene , naeneun nakv isteri aniab : itze alaçeb aitze naoha ene nec ate : naçen steri ate , citucse neräureugniA aohcturubil adab naçen raH
. alaçeb aitze cud nenaçi itze naoha erih aniab : cid nerudnimrak alebas erih ate : caçe steri ate , caçe raH , nadaçeic narre atE . aohcturubil nadil alastoin anagäureugniA nidnen naoi atE
. aiuqeri ohcturubil ocucse neräureugniA neogad naeniag nerarrul ate naeniag neraossasti caçe rah ate , libaH , naçec narre ate , niuqene nidec açnim zirreb , azov neun nakv nuçne citurec atE
. alaçeb neuard nakv utaralced yetehporP iraztibrec ereb , aoiretsym neraocniaI aletad nerutabaca naened nerissah netioi záttepmort natenuge ocezov neräureugniA nerragipzaç aniaB
: nenaçi aletze cirarobmed ogaiheug nece , cáçuag nedarid natrah ate aossasti ate , cáçuag nedarid natrah ate arrul ate , cáçuag nedarid natrah ate äurec utitiab utaerc ceniec , zaned iciv ztocaluces aluces naçec arui atE
, arurec aucse ereb naçec ahctla , cäureugniA neun nakv issuki aleogec naeniag nerarrul ate naeniag neraossasti atE
. abircs aláztitze ceh ate , cáçuag netzutid utaitnunorp céiricrogi ipzaç caztialangieS , alatsoic citurec tabzov naçen nuçne aniab : utabircs neutin ihan cin , naenetzutic nakv utaitnunorp cazov ereb céiricrogi ipzaç atE
KNALB
. netaztic aitnunorp cazov ereb ciricrogi ipzaç , naeneuç nakv niuge uhio ate : alaçeb naeneud netiuge aorro cetab niohel , iugneco naçec niuge uhio atE
. naeniag rul arreuqze ate , naeniag sasti aniucse nio ereb naçec raçe ate : tabiuqeri ohcturubil naucse ereb neuç atE . alaçeb caebah oczus canio nerah ate , alaçeb aiuqzugi nec aetrahtiugeb nerah ate : arradaçro néztiab naurub neniec autarugni zetabiedoh , alec netsuai citurec tabztihtrob ureugniA ecreb naçen suki naudrO
. cirateireuqnioho ereb ze , ciratecidralliap ereb ze , cirateireuqnioçop ereb ze , cirateuqetiahre-açiug ereb adneme necetizte atE
: euqzetitiab libe nice ate , nuçne ze eteuqaçetiab suki nice céniec , cálodi oczeruç ate oczirrah ate oczerboc ate oczerrahlic ate oczehrrv ate caurbaed táçnetaztilze aroda , adneme necetizte ciraterbo oczeucse ereb canedarizte lih zaçuah agalp noçiug ocitiog atE
. netuztiab netiuge etlac zéniec , cäurub aletzutic , nedaric iduri caeugus canatzub néyah nece : natenatzub néyah ate naoha néyah nec aerehtob néyah necE
. zaerhpus nec netikli citoha néyah ate , zaek ate , zaus , toid , aetrap néreh nénoçiug nec naçi lih zaçuah açuag rurih atE
. erhpus ate ek ate , us nec netikli cirateoha néyah ate : alaçeb cäurub néniohel nedaric cäurub néidlaç ate : catercalah oczerhpus ate oczehtnicayh ate oczus aletzutic , cénedaric cairrai nateniag néyah ate : naenoisiv caidlaç naztin suki alenuh atE
. autnoc néyah naçen nuçne ate : allim ramah natallim yeugoh nec autnoc neradamra oczidlaç atE
. aetrap néreh nénoçiug táçnetaçed lih , ztocehtrv ate ztocehtebelih ate ztocenuge ate ztocenero caudniappa nedariztiab , cäureugniA rual adab necetic ahcaL
. canedarid cautacetse naeniag idnah oiuulf ocetarhpuE ureugniA rual caztiahcaL , iraneuç áttepmort ureugniA nerragies alastoiC
, cinec neztidecorp ciraterrada rual neraoczehrrv eradla ned naeniztia néiugeb neraocniaI tabzov naçen nuçne ate , záttepmort naçec oi caureugniA nerragies naudrO
. oreug enoitcidelam ib oniaro edarid netrohte , ánuh ate , ad nagari tabenoitcidelaM
. aeliugesed atiab ihan narre noyllopA ze-cerG ate , noddabA , zociarbeH neci utiab ceniec , äureugniA ocemsyba tázteuger oceniag ereb netuç atE
. zehtebelih zrob aetiuge etlac yenoçiug nec aerehtob néyah ate : natenatzub ereb canetze nétzutic ate : iduri canenoiprocs canatzub nétzutic atE
. alaçeb astoh aterrac ocenetud netiuge retsal aretabmoc cidlaç , ztihna , astoh nélageh neyah ate : alaçeb catercalah nidrub catercalah netzutic atE
. alaçeb caneniohel nedaric caztroh néyah ate : alaçeb caolib nétzame , caolib netzutic atE
. alaçeb caetrahtiugeb nénoçiug nedaric caetrahtiugeb néyah ate : caocalaçeb caoroc netiduric aehrrv nateniag urub néyah nedaric ate , ociduri néutatserppa aralliatab idlaç nec ámrof neihto atE
. cirateh ud neniuge sehi caoireh ate , areztlih étud nerutarised ate : nenedire étutze ate , étud nerutahlib aoireh cénoçiug nateh nuge atE
. alaçeb aoceneeuqud oi anoçiug átnemrot oczenoiprocs necil átnemrot neyah ate , zehtebelih zrob netaztil atnemrot aniab , netaztil lih ceh ze néiuqec name atE
. yenoçiug netuzte naterraleb ereb aelangies neraocniaI tnemalos aniab : irerobra ereniece ze , iredrehp ereniece ze irarrahleb ocerrul ciretlac netoiugalze néiuqec narre atE
. aerehtob ocalaçeb netud cénoiprocs ocerrul néiuqec name erehtob ate , arerrul caihto necetic ikli citek atE
. citek ocuztup aeria ate aiuqzugi nidec dnuhli ate : alaçeb aek ocatetab idnah ebal , aek ocuztup nidec ahctla ate , auztup ocemsyba naçec iuqeri atE
. aokag nerauztup ocemsyba nóiuqec name ate , airore arerrul citurec tabraçi naçen suki ate , naçec oi záttepmort cäureugniA nerragzrob naudrO
. citagcaunios attepmort netzutid neroi ceureugniA rurih ecreb , yetnatibah ocerrul enoitcidelam , enoitcidelam , enoitcidelaM , iugneco aleoic , zaidre neräurec alec neztadlageh tabureugniA naçen nuçne ate suki naudrO
. rebalah caneräuag ze , netiuge ciriugra neuzte caetrap néreh neranuge ate , nideztiab nuhli aetrap néreh neyah non alah : aetrap néreh nerraçi ate , aetrap néreh neraiugrahli ate , aetrap néreh neraiuqzugi nidec oi ate , záttepmort naçec oi cäureugniA nerragruaL oreuG
. carv nedariztiab naçi udnimrak nerec , ciraterv nidec lih noçiug ztihna ate : nidec ahlib oihtnisbA aetrap néreh nérv ate : oihtnisbA , ad netiarre aneci nerarraçi atE
. araterv ruhti ate , aretrap néreh neoiuuf nidec rore ate , alaçeb tabicuç , tabiuqehcari idnah raçi citurec nidec rore ate , záttepmort naçec oi cäureugniA néreh oreuG
. nidec niugesed aetrap néreh neicnv ate : aetrap néreh nenetuç ezticiv arutaerc nedaric naossasti nidec lih atE
. nidec niuge lodo aetrap nereh neraossasti ate : arossasti nidec ztoge alaçeb tab-nec neztarre zus idnah idnem ate , záttepmort naçec oi cäureugniA nerragib atE
. nidec erre aicug edrehp rahleb ate , nidec erre , aetrap nereh nérobra ate , arerrul necetic ztoge ate , acetsahan lodo us ate açuçabab naçec niuge ate , záttepmort naçec oi cäureugniA nehel atE
. aretioi záttepmort necetic araperp cäureugniA ipzaç netzutic cáttepmort ipzaç atE
. eztaraki rul ate catsimtsihc ate cazov ate cairicrogi necetic niuge ate : arerrul naçec ztoge ate , citus oceradla aruh naçec ehteb ate , aresnecne cäureugniA naçec rah atE
. areniztia neraocniaI citucse neräureugniA , niuqenoitaro néudniaS , aek némufrep nidec nagi atE
. naeniag neraoczehrrv eradla ned naeniztia onorht , táçnaztil adnerffo niuqenoitaro néicug udniaS , mufrep ztihna nóiuqec name ate : aleuç tabresnecne oczehrrv , naeniztia eradla nidec noge ate nidec rohte tabureugniA ecreb atE
. attepmort ipzaç nétziuqec name ate , canetud neztitsissa naeniztia neraocniaI ureugniA ipzaç naztin suki atE
. tabustidre nero näurec nidec niuge oitnelis , aulugic nerragipzaç naeneuç nakv iuqeri atE
. cirateiugeb néiroh aicug rv ragin caocniaI cid nerutacuhci ate : arateiciv irruhti ocaterv nerutadiug ate citic nerutaczab castodliB ned naidre neraonorht necE
. ere-cetab coreb ze , caiuqzugi neroi citze areniag néiroh ze , cirogaiheug nerutirrage ze nerutessog cutitzE
. niuqeiroh cud nerutatibah aned airrai naonorht ate : naelpmet nerah uag ate nuge éid neztaztibrec aruh ate , naeniztia onorht neraocniaI cutid ztocalaH
. naelodo nerastodliB utiruhc ate caecul aporra ereb éitic nakv icuki ate : canedarid naçi irrohte ciratidnah enoitcilffa cutid cuaH , nadaçeic narre atE . ciuqadab cih , anuaI , nóçein narre atE
? edarid irrohte cidnon ate , edarid ron cuah utitzev ziruhc ecul aporrA , alatsoic , cetab cirateonaicnA aztih naçec rah naudrO
. nemA . ztocaluces aluces iraocniaI erug radni ate , açnassiup ate , eroho ate , reuqse ate , aitneipas ate , airolg ate , oirodual : nemA , aletioiC
, aocniaI netaçec aroda ate , areniag nétrahtiugeb ereb areniztia onorht netaztic ztoge cäurub ereb ate : näurugni nélamina rual ate néonaicnA ate , neraonorht netuç neztitsissa céicug ureugniA atE
. cinagastodliB ate cinaganed airrai naeniag onorht ocniaI erug audnemaulaS , aletioic , iugneco neduec zuhio atE
: nateucse ereb cámlap ate , cautitzev ziruhc ecul aporra , aleduec náitneserp nerastodliB ate naeniztia onorht , cirateicug ihim ate ulupop ate uniel ate edneg , tab-neeuqaçec nice atnoc crohen idnah aleport , ánuh ate , naçen aheb naodno néuah açuaG
: cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel nenimaineB : cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel ne-hpesoI : cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel ne-nolubaZ
: cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel nerahcasI : cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel neriueL : cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel nenoemiS
: cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel neressanaM : cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel nerilahthpeN : cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel ne-resA
: cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel ne-daG : cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel nenebuR : cirutalangies allim ibamah , cituniel neraduI
: cirateicug uniel nérruoah ocelearsI cirutalangies allim rual ate yeugorreb nuhe , autnoc nénedaric naçi utalangies naçen nuçne atE
. onugeuqaztid alangies naterraleb ereb cairaztibrec neraocniaI erug , yérobra ze , iraossasti ze , irarrul ciretlac aleuçeiugatzE , aleoiC
, yeneyaç naçi name aetiuge etlac iraossasti ate irarrul ureugniA rual iugneco néceic niuge uhio ate : aleuç aulugic neraiciv ocniaI citetiuglai iuqzugi alec netiagi tabureugniA ecreb naçen suki oreuG
. naeniag ere-netab erobra ze , naeniag neraossasti ze , naeniag nerarrul táçnaiugalze cireciah , caeciah rual ocerrul aletaztudaç , naterenroc rual nerarrul aleduec ureugniA rual naztin suki naodno néuah açuag atE
? aneud laha neriuqirugi ad ron ate : aidnah nuge nerarih nerah ad irrohte necE
. citarih nerastodliB ate , citetrahtiugeb neraned airrai naeniag onorht euçaztiag latse ate areniag erug etzetiaç rorE , yeirrah ate yeidnem neceuarec netiarre atE
: natéuqotrah ocateidnem ate natécel necetic edrog caicug erbil ate , caicug obalcs ate , catnetop ate , caniatipac ate , castarba ate , caecnirp ate , caeuger ocerrul atE
. necetic adla cirateukel ereb caicug alsi ate idnem ate : alaçeb tabmed neztluzti urubil nidec ariter äurec atE
. naened netlibare zidnah eciah alaçeb neutid netziari calamihc ocif ereb caeztocif , arerrul necetic rore citurec carraçi atE
. nidec acalaçeb alodo aicug iugrahli ate , alaçeb tabucaç oczolib nidec ztleb aiuqzugi ate , nidec niuge tabidnah eztaraki rul , ánuh ate , aulugic nerragies naeneuç nakv iuqeri naçen aheb oreuG
. oneuqzetil ilpmoc canedaric raheb name aratoireh alaçeb ere-ceh eyana néyah ate , caediuq iraztibrec néyah , tabruppa arobmed oniaro necetil asoper néiuqec narre ate , cairuhc aporra iraredebtab nétziuqec name atE
? ciratenedarid neztatibah naerrul alodo erug neztacednem ate neztaegui cutze , áitaiuge ate áudnias nuaI , naetra zioN , aletioic , iugneco zuhio neduec atE
: cámira nénedaric naçi name aratoireh citagaegainomitset netuç neztinetniam ate citagaztih neraocniaI , naipza eradla naztin suki , aulugic nerragzrob naeneuç nakv iuqeri atE
. zéitseb assab ocerrul ate , zeztoireh ate , zetessog ate , zatapze oceztlih , naeniag neranedrual nerarrul erehtob néiuqec name yæh ate , irah nóyarraç aunreffI ate : aoireH nec aneci neraneogec cirirrai naeniag nerah ate , tabstadrehp idlaç , ánuh ate , naçen aheb atE
. cassuki ate rohtA , aleoic , azov neralamina nerragrual naçen nuçne , aulugic nerragrual naeneuç nakv iuqeri atE
. niuge ciretlac aláeceitze iraoilo ate iraonrastaham ate : natetab orenid ragarag acinehc rurih ate , natetab orenid ihib iugo tabacinehC , aleoic , naetra nélamina rual tabzov naçen nuçne atE
. naucse ereb tabaçnelab neuç , caneogec cirirrai naeniag nerah ate : tabztleb idlaç , ánuh ate , naçen aheb atE . cassuki ate rohtA , aleoic , alamina nerragrurih naçen nuçne , aulugic nerragrurih naeneuç nakv iuqeri atE
. tabidnah atapze irah nóiuqec name ate : netaçel lih rakle ate , naçel laha nek aeuqab citerrul nóiuqec name iranec airrai naeniag nerah ate , tabstahrrog idlaç ecreb nidec ikli atE
. cassuki ate rohtA , aleoic , alamina nerragib naçen nuçne , aulugic nerragib naeneuç nakv iuqeri atE
. táçneul atiarag ate , aleuç neztiarag nidec ikli ate , tabaoroc irah nóiuqec name ate , tabahctelf neuç caneogec cirirrai naeniag nerah ate : tabiruhc idlaç , ánuh ate , naçen aheb atE
. cassuki ate rohtA , oçna zov iricrogi , aleoic , tab ciratelamina rual naçen nuçne ate , anehel cirateulugic castodliB naeneuç nakv iuqeri , naçen aheb oreuG
. ztocaluces aluces aned iciv netaçec aroda ate , areniag nétrahtiugeb ereb cäurub ereb netaztic ztoge céonaicnA rual ate yeugoh ate : nemA , netuç netiarre célamina rual atE
. ztocaluces aluces , açnassiup ate , airolg ate , eroho ate , oirodual irastodliB ate iraned airrai naonorhT , aletuç netiarre , naztin nuçne caicug açuag nedarid nateh ate , naossasti ate , naipza nerarrul ate , naeniag nerarrul ate , aicug arutaerc ned näurec atE
. oirodual ate , airolg ate , eroho ate , radni ate , aitneipas ate , nussatsarba ate , açnassiup naçed rah astodliB ned naçi utacifircas ad engiD , iugneco aletioiC
: allim natallim ate , allim ramah natallim ramah autnoc néyah nec ate , azov nerureugniA ztihna , näurugni néonaicnA ate nélamina ate neraonorht naçen nuçne ate , naçen suki naudrO
. naeniag nerarrul ugaid nerutanger ate : erodacifircas ate euger iraocniaI erug caczuareug niuge atE
. ciratoro enoitan ate , ulupop ate , ihim ate , uniel , zalodo erue iraocniaI caczuarag utimeder ate , zia naçi utacifircas nece : ocetiuqeri néulugic nerah ate , oceztrah neräurubil zia engiD , aletioic , tabirreb utnac nétuç neztatnac atE
: caenoitaro néudnias edaritiab niec , caehteb zemufrep cálopma oczehrrv ate cárrattiug ereb ceniec aletzutic , areniztia nerastodliB netaztic ztoge cäurub ereb céonaicnA rual ate yeugoh ate célamina rual , naeneuç utrah äurubil atE
. citeniucse ucse neraneogec cirirrai naonorht äurubil naçec rah ate nidec rohte atE
. cairrogi aricug rul utirips ipzaç neraocniaI edaritiab niec : iugeb ipzaç ate rada ipzaç aleutic , alaçeb alih crohen aleogec tab-stodliB naetra néonaicnA ate , naetra nelámina rual ate neraonorht ánuh ate , naçen aheb atE
. oceztahcal néulugic ipzaç nerah ate , ocetiuqeri neräurubil , caniaç ne-diuaD , canioheL ocituniel neraduI cid atiarag , ánuh : cirragin aláiugatzE , nadaçeic narre cetab cirateonaicnA atE
oceztaheb aratrah ze , oceztrucari ze , ocetiuqeri neräurubil naçi nedire cirengid rohen néztiapze nerec , neun netiuge ragin ztihna cin atE
. aheb aratrah ateze , äurubil neeuqaçec iuqeri nice naipza nerarrul ze , naerrul ze , näurec ze , crohen atE
? caulugic nerah naztid ahcal ate , äurubil naçed iuqeri engid ad roN , iugneco aleuç neztaciderp tabztihtrob ureugniA naçen suki atE
. autaliugic zulugic ipzaç , tabutabircs citopmac ate citenrab urubil naeniucse ucse neraneogec cirirrai naonorht naçen suki oreuG
. cutid naçi utaerc ate , cutid citagaetadnorov erih ate , cáicug açuag cutid utaerc cih nece : açnassiup ate eroho ate airolg náced ibecer anuaI zia engiD
, aletuç netiarre , naeniztia onorht cáoroc ereb netzutic netraçe ate , ztocaluces aluces aned iciv nétuç neztaroda ate , areniztia neranec airrai naonorht céonaicnA rual ate yeugoh cäurub ereb netzutic netziogE
: iraned iciv ztocaluces aluces , iranec airrai naonorht udnemaicremer ate eroho ate airolg naenetacuarec netiame ceh lamina atE
. aned ocetrohtE ate , aneD ate , aneC , aocaticugerehtob nuaI ocniaI , udnias , udnias , udniaS , aletioic , uag ze nuge cirussuap netuzte ate nedaric caehteb ziugeb naenrab ate , näurugni lageh áries edla ereb ceniec caredebtab nétuç célamina rual atE
. nec ocalaçeb aonarra nalibad zadlageh alamina nerragrual ate , aetrahtiugeb ocalaçeb canoçiug neuç , calamtna nerragrurih ate , neuç iduri aeztera calamina nerragib ate , neuç iduri aniohel calamina nehel atE
. naelebiug ate naeniztia caehteb ziugeb lamina rual näurugni neraonorht ate , naidre neraonorht ate : tab-neuç iduri alatsyrc ossasti oczarieb naeniztia onorht nec atE
. cautirips ipzaç neraocniaI edaritiab niec , naeniztia onorht cinetehcaç zus apmal ipzaç nedaric ate : catsimtsihc nedaric netikli citonorht atE
. cáoroc oczehrrv nateniag urub ereb aletzutic ate : cautitzev ziruhc udnemalliba cirirrai onaicnA rual ate yeugoh naztin suki nateniag ikla ate : ikla rual ate yeugoh nedaric näurugni neraonorht atE
. aleiduric aduarams arradaçro näurugni neraonorht nec ate : neiduric airrah niodras ate epsai zeztraki-hteb caneogeç cirirrai atE
. cirirrai naeniag onorht tiebron ate : näurec airraçe nec tabonorht , ánuh ate : natutirips nécnin natreb atE
: tárah cidnemeh nedarid raheb niuge açuag rec tauard neristucare ate , anuh ida nagI , aleoic , ocalaçeb anetab attepmort netaçil oçnim niuqene nec , azov neun nakv nuçne nehel ate : näurec aiuqeri tabahtrob , ánuh ate , naçen aheb näurub neuah açuaG
. yecilE neuard netiarre cautiripS rec açeb nuçne caneud cirirraheB
. naonorht nerah niuqeratiA oganiab airrai ate tutiab nakv utiarag ere-cin alon : naonorht eruen , niuqeruen taid nericare rai aneud nenakv atiaraG
. niuqene aruh ate niuqerah cuan nerudlaffa ate anagnerah cuan neruhtras , taçeidab iuqeri áhtrob ate , azov ene açedab nuçne cetiebmec nidlab : táid neztaklub ate , cogain nahtrob , ánuH
. ciuqeb ulod ate , olez zareb caçe rah : táitic neztagitzag ate neztidneherper caicug nadutid etiam ciN
. táçnaçed suki , caiugeb erue naztid atcnv zoirylloc ate : aodial neranussatirrogzullib erih taçnetze ireugga , táçnida itzev , cirirruhc udnemalliba ate : táçnida starba , citutagorohp zus ehrrv cinagene náçed sore tua neztalliesnoC
. alecia irrogzullib ate usti ate erbuap ate ohciag ate ebacahod nece neztugaçe cutze ate : cirraheb nesued tutze ate , zian utsarba ate , zian starbA , coidab necE
. citoha eruen tua nerutimov , niuqare ze ztoh ziatiapze ate , ziatiab leppe nerec aniaB
. niuqare ode ztoh znihia : niuqare ze ztoh ze aleciaze nece , cárbo erih taiuqziuqaecaB
: caestah nerarutaerc neraocniaI , caitaiuge ate caledif oinomitset , cenemA citic netiarre cuah açuaG , cóçei abircs ere-iräureugniA ocaçilE ned naecidoaL
. yecilE neuard netiarre cautiripS rec açeb nuçne caneud cirirraheB
. airreb neci eruen ate , aistuai citurec cinagaocniaI ene , airreb emelasureI , atiab niec , aneci neraetatiuic neraocniaI eruen ate , aneci neraocniaI eruen naeniag nerah táid nerutabircs ate , nerikli taropmac cirogaiheug cutze ate , táid neniuge ebah naelpmet neraocniaI eruen , aneud nenakv atiaraG
. áoroc erih táçnaçetze rah crohen , anáud cacude : irras ceuqrotainab , ánuH
. areztagorohp netnatibah ocerrul , citened ocetrohte areniag neraicug udnum nero ocenoitatnet tua nerutariugeb ih ere-cin , aztih oczaitneitap ene cutiab nakv utariugeb cih nereC
: aladua etiam cin nece , netaçed tugaçe ate , naeniztia nénio erih netaçed aroda ate , necetid rohte táid neniuge , adab anuh : éoic arruçeug citiztia , edaritiapze ate étzutitiab netiuge uduI cäurub ereb , canedarid citagoganys nenataS táitic nerirraçe , anuH
. aneci ene utaitnuner cutiapze ate , aztih ene cutiab utariugeb ate , cih cutiab tabitug radni nerec : aruh ceuqaçec stre nice crohen ate , aiuqeri ahtrob areniztia erue táuard nakv name , ánuh : cárbo erih taiuqziuqaecaB
: citic netiarre cuah açuag , netiuqeri ze crohen ate , utiab netsre ate : netsre ze crohen ate , utiab netiuqeri ceniec , aokag ne-diuaD utiab ceniec , caitaiugE ate caudniaS , cóçei abircs iräureugniA ocaçilE ned naihpledalihP atE
cautiripS rec açeb nuçne caneud cirirraheB
. naeniztia néureugniA nerah ate , naeniztia neratiA eruen aneci nerah táid nerutrohtia ate , citurubil ocezticiv neriugnuari aneci nerah táitze ate , ziruhc udnemalliba cetad nerutitzev alah aneud nenakv atiaraG
. cutid engid nece : natiruhc udnemalliba niuqene edaritiab nerilibe ate , cinetzutitze utustas caudnemalliba ereb nedraS cih cutidab ere-anosrep tiebmeC
. anagerih nécian nerirrohte zenero rec neniuqai cutze ate , alaçeb anioho anagerih cuan nerirrohte caçedapze alliev nidlab adaB . ciuqeb ulod ate , cáçeriugeb ate : náud nakv nuçne ate utibecer alon tiohro adab néciA
. naeniztia neraocniaI nedire tcefrep táititze cárbo erih nece : canecaod areztlih ocitiog caztiamrifnoc ate irraztari néciA
. ziatiab alih ate , alecia iciv cud aneci nece , cárbo erih taiuqziuqaecaB . citic netiarre cuah acuag caneutid carraçi ipzaç ate cautirips ipzaç neraocniaI , cóçei abircs ere-iraureugniA ocaçilE ned nedraS
. yecilE neuard netiarre cautiripS rec açeb nuçne , caneud cirirraheB
. arraçitra irah tacuard nename atE
: alaçeb nadud nakv utibecer cinagatiA ere-cin , alaçeb caicnv oczerrul edarid nerutacehehc ate : zerrohic oczanidrub euqutid nerutanrebog atE
. naeniag nélitneG erehtob tacuard nename , iraneeuqutid utariugeb onarenif cárbo ene ate , iraneeuqud nakv airotciv necE
. onidan rohte euçacude , aneuçud aniaB
. nerirraçe ciragrac ecreb areniag neuç tutze : alaçeb netioid , canetzutitze utugaçe canussatanrab nenataS ate , canetutze ruah anirtcod edaritiab ere-roN , teuçuard netiarre yoneteraç neritayhT ocitiog yeuç aniaB
. aruara nérbo ereb tacoraid nename iraredebtab cirateuç ate : anadutid neztanimaxe caztohib ate canurruçleug alecian in nece céicug açilE éid neniuqai ate , táitic nelih zoireh carruoah nerah atE
. zetidapze adneme ciraterbo ereb nidlab , natidnah enoitalubirt oczicug canetud neztaretluda niuqerah ate : naeho netraçe aruh táid cin , ánuH
. utadneme cutze ate : táçnidel adneme citaçidralliap ereb , arobmed tacoraid name atE
. aretai ciratenedarid neztacifircas yelodi ate , areztadralliap , naztid icudes cairaztibrec ene ate , naçed stacari ) assetehporp äurub ereb utiab netiuge ceniec ( caetzame lebazeI cutiab neztittemrep nerec : artnoc erih táidab ruppa açuag tiabrec aniaB
. cutid ogaiheug oniab canehel cárbo neuqza erih ate : cárbo erih ate áitneitap erih ate aedef ate auztibrec ate aetatirahc erih ate carbo erih taiuqziuqaecaB
, citic netiarre cuah açuag , étutiab iduri anif erboc cénio neniec ate , alaçeb arrag neraus caiugeb utitiab ceniec , caemeS neraocniaI , cóçei abircs ere-iräureugniA ocaçilE ned neritayhT
: neciab caneud neztibecer , neztugaçe utiapze crohen niec , cirutabircs tabirreb neci nairrah ate : tabiruhc irrah tacuard nename ate , citannaM neogad aedrog aretai tacuard nename iraosoirotciV , yecilE neuard netiarre cautiripS rec açeb nuçne caneud cirirraheB
. zátapze ocoha eruen artnoc néyah cuan nerutalliatab ate , irras artnoc erih cuan nerirrohte , erepze : ciuqeb uloD
. áçuag nadaztirad ztiag cin atiab niec , ere-ciratenetacudad ánirtcod nétialociN cih cudab rebalaH
. areztadralliap ate , aretai ciratecuag netziaç neztacifircas yelodi , aretraçe oladnacs naeniztia nérruoah ocelearsI calaB neuztiab netsacari ceniec , ciratenetud netiuqude ánirtcod nemaalaB roh aláudab nece , artnoc erih taidab ruppa açuag tiabrec aniaB
. nataS atiab neztatibah non , naetra neuç ere-naenuge ned naçi name aratoireh aledif rytram ene sapitnA erA : aedef ene nakv utaitnuner cutze , cacudadab aneci ene ate : naukel ned aonorht nenataS , nécia neztatibah non ate , cárbo erih taiuqziuqaecaB
, citic netiarre cuah açuag , caneud aztorroç atapze ocatoha iB , cóçei abircs ere-iräureugniA ocaçilE ned nemagreP
. zaoireh nerragib neniuge ciretlac oyazte iraosoirotciV , yécilE neuard netiarre cautiripS rec açeb nuçne caneud cirirraheB
. aoroc ocezticiv táuard nename ate , onaroireh ledif nécia : zenuge ramah enoitalubirt euçud nenakv ate , táçnetzetiaç agorohp citic ocetraçe naenioserp uztab cirateuç caurbaed , ánuh : rudleb necuag náutid oceztirffus aleciazE
. agoganys nenataS cutid aniab , edaritiapze ate , aoimehpsalb nénetzutid netiuge uduI cäurub ereb ate ) zia starba aniab ( áicerbuap ate , aenoitalubirt ate , cárbo erih taiuqziuqaecaB
: citic netiarre cuah açuag , caned naçi utziv ate caned naçi lih , caneuqza ate caneheL , cóçei abircs ere-iräureugniA ocaçilE ned nenrymS
. naidre neraosidarap neraocniaI atiab niec citerobra ocezticiv aretai tacuard nename iraosoirotciV , yecilE neuard netiarre cautiripS rec açeb nuçne caneud cirirraheB
. taetziraid ztiag ere-cin yæh , cetziratiab ztiag yerbo netialociN , cudab ruah aniaB
. ciuqadapze ulod nidlab , citukel ereb arelednac erih táid nerudnek ate , irras artnoc erih cuan nerirrohte erepze : cazti niuge cárbo ocenehel ate , ciuqeb ulod ate , nécia irore cidnon ida tiohro adaB
. cutiab nakv iztv aetatirahc ocenehel erue nerec , artnoc erih tiabrec táidab aniaB
. naçi utayone ziaze ate , citaganeci ene zia naçi utalliabart ate , cud aitneitap ate , cud nakv utirffus atE
. itruçeug aledarid ceh cud nedire ate : edaritiapze ate canedarid netiarre ulotsopA náutid utatnemirepxe ate , náeuqaztid irffus nice caothciag alon ate áitneitap erih ate , aulliabart erih ate , cárbo erih taiuqziuqaecaB
: citic netiarre cuah açuag , canalibad naetra néoczehrrv relednac ipzaç , canaztudad naeniucse ucse ereb carraçi ipzaÇ , cóçei abircs iräureugniA ocaçilE ned nesehpE
. cutid cáçilE ipzaç , carelednac ipzaç náutid issuki ate cutid cäureugniA ocatecilE ipzaç , carraçi ipzaÇ . caoczehrrv rélednac ipzaç ate , aoiretsym nérraçi ipzaç náutid nakv issuki naeniucse ucse enE
: canedarid raheb niuge naodno néuah ate canedarid ate , cáçuag nautid nakv issuki caztiabircS
. caokag neraoireh ate neraunreffi táitic ate : nemA , ztocaluces aluces cuan iciv , ánuh ate , cuan naçi lih aniaB
: anecian iciv ate , aneuqza ate anehel cuan in : cirrudleb aláutzE , alatsoic , naeniag ene aniucse ucse ereb naçec raçe ate : alaçeb alih aratenio nerah nidnen rore , naeneun nakv issuki aruh atE
. alaçeb neud netiuge iugra naerradni ereb caiuqzugi iugra nec aetrahtiugeb nerah ate : nec netikli tabztorroç atapze ocatoha ib citoha nerah ate , raçi ipzaç naeniucse ucse ereb neutic atE
. alaçeb astoh néidnah rv azov nerah ate : alétehcaç alaçeb naebal , ocalaçeb anif erboc canio nerah atE
: alaçeb arrag neraus caiugeb nerah ate : alaçeb arruhle ate , alaçeb airuhc elli , iruhc nedaric caolib ate äurub nerah atE
. autacirreug naedla néztagv zetab ocirreug oczehrrv ate , autitzev zetab ecul aporra , tabmeuç iduri aemeS neranoçiug naetra nérelednac oczehrrv ipzaç atE
: ciroczehrrv rélednac ipzaç naztin suki ciriluzti ate : aretsuki nerazov nec naçi utaçnim niuqene nidnen luzti naudrO
. naecidoaL ate naihpledalihP ate , nedraS ate , neritayhT ate , nemagreP ate , nenrymS ate nesehpE , edaritiab niec , aratecilE ipzaç nedarid naisA caçe rogi ate , natetab urubil caçebircs anáud netsukI ate , aneuqza ate anehel , w ate a cuan iN
, aleoic , alaçeb anetab attepmort tabidnah zov naelebiug eruen naçen nuçne ate , zetab nuge ednagI natutiripS nécniN
: citagaegainomitset netsirhC suseI ate , citagaztih neraocniaI , nécnin nálsI ned neztied somtaP , anugal ate aeyana neuç náitneitap ate námuser ate naenoitcilffa netsirhC suseI ate , sennaoI iN
. caocaticug erehtoB , toid , caned ocetrohtE ate , caneC ate , caneD , canuaI oid , anif ate aestah , atiab ihan narre , w ate a zian iN
. nemA , yab : caicug uniel ocerrul naeniztia nerah edarid nerutingalp ate : ere-cénetud nakv utahluç aruh , coro iugeb aruh ud nerissuki ate niuqéyedoh ad netrohte , ánuH
. nemA . ztocaluces aluces radni ate airolg aled adab irah : iratiA ereb ocniaI erodacifircaS ate eugeR óiuqzuarciab niuge ate : zalodo ereb cirateutakeb erug icuki ate utiauqiab istehno cenieC
, aecnirP néuger ocerrul ate , aoyai nehel ociratelih , aledif oinomitset atiab niec , zetrap netsirhC suseI atE
, zetrap néutirips ipzaç nedarid naeniztia onorht nerah ate : zetrap neraocetrohtE ate netaneC ate neraneD niuqeuç aeuqab ate aled aitarG , yecilE ipzaç nedarid naisA cesennaoI
. ad irras árobmed nece : canetzutid neztariugeb cáçuag nedarid cautabircs natrah ate , netuçne caztih ocatenuh aitehporp edarid ustahod ate , aneud neztrucari ad ustahoD
. zéicug açuag neutid nakv issuki ate zaegainomitset netsirhC suseI ate zaztih neraocniaI utiab nakv utacifitset cenieC
. aztuard nakv utacifingis irairaztibrec ereb sennaoI cirirrogi niuqeräureugniA ereb crah ate : cáçuag nedarid raheb niuge irras yeiraztibrec ereb táçnezteid aralced , caocniaI irah acuartiab nakv name niec , aespylacopA NETSIRHC SVSEI

























KNALB
. nemA . ztocateicug aluces ate niaro ate , açnassiup ate radni ate aitnecifingam ate airolg aled , iraerodaulaS erug ate , iraztiokab ruhuç ocniaI neteuqziaztiaç laha namare areniztia airolg ereb elbisneherperri niuqeroiraczob ate , ariugeb ebag utacubert , zaocareniaG
. aleuçoztirad ztiag ere-iraporra utalucam zaiugarah , aleuçutid neztaparra citus , euçaztiaulas zarudici caecreb atE
. aleuçud neztasv zenoitercsid , etateip zéuztab euçua atE
. taztocelanrete ezticiv aleteduaç ariugeb neraidrociresim neranuaI erug tsirhC suseI , euçaçe auresnoc naetatirahc neraocniaI raklE
, aleuçud netiuge ztiohto zaudnias utiripS ate , aleuçutid neztacifide cäurub neuç areniag neraudnias oczicug edef neuç cáetiam , ceuç aniaB
. canetutze autiripS , calamina edneg , canetzutid neztarapes cäurub ereb edarid cuaH
. canedarid nerilibe aruara néicihtug ocateireuqathciag ereb , cairasuba nedarid nenaçi naterobmed neuqza alon , aleuçuard nakv narre necE
: zéztih nedarid naçi narre citeniztia zéulotsopA neranuaI erug tsirhC suseI tiohro neteraç , cáetiam , ceuç aniaB
. citagauhcteborp ereb aletzutid natenoitarimda canosrep , ad oçnim zutnah oczicug soporp aoha néyah ate , canaztlibad nateicihtug ereb , iratlouer , elaçarumrum edarid cuaH
. zéicug rogog ztih netzutid narre artnoc nerah céothciag erotakeb ate , zéicug netzutid niuge iuqothciag othciag arbo areztuçnev néicug othciag ocetra néyah ate , aretiame udnemegui artnoc néicug , niuqeudnias oczenoillim ereb anuaI ad naçi irrohte , ánuH
, aleoic , ce-hconE , canoçiug nerragipzaç ocodno nemadA ere-zaçuah ud nakv utazitehporp atE
. iuqlanrete aehmuhli ocaterbenet eyatiab autatserppa yéniec , cautaleberre raçi , aletud netiuge nugah zéineliv ereb , caeprod agab ocossastI
: caikli cirateorre , calih nateugib , caebag utcurf lemuç erobra : cailibare anuh arah zéciah ebag rv yedoh : aletzutid neztaczab cäurub ereb ebag rudleb nerohen , zutateuqnab niuqeuç , cálucam ocatecnerohto oczetatirahc neuç edarid cuaH
edarid naçi niugesed aruara neraenoitcidartnoc nére-eroC ate , edarid naçi utannodnaba zoinagne nerauriacola ned naçi utanagne maalaB ate , oiuqziaç naçi iuqierrai iraedib neniaC nece : naeniag néyah enoitcidelaM
. edarid neztipmurroc nateicug açuag netzutid neztugaçe alaçeb celaturb erba iuqlarutan ate , edarid ira netiarre iuqziag zéicug açuag netzutitze neztida , cuah aniaB
. alaçahctahem canuaI , naçec narre aniab , aretiame neraitnetnes oczenoitcidelam arutnev nidezte , zaztuprog nesesyoM alec neztatupsid naenacudrahic artnoc neraurbaed , aulegnahcrA lehciM ere-citagaicuG
. étud netiarre iuqziag zétatingid ate neztaicerpsonem áirongies ate étud neztustas aiugarah ereb cirutrakol ere-cuah aedro rebalaH
. aletud neztirffus ánep ocelanrete us , alaçeb nedarid naçi utasoporp natulpmexe , canedaric naoi naodno neraiugarah ecreb ate , canetuç utadralliap aredlom néyah irih ocateiridla néyah ate , ahrromoG ate amodoS
. aleutid nakv utaureser onaroicidui ocidnah nuge naterudacetse ocaluces naipza ebmuhli , canetuç nakv iztv anussatlapicnirp ereb aniab , canetuzte nakv utariugeb aestah ereb ureugniA atE
. aleutic nakv niugesed oreug canetuzte nakv istehnis , naeneuç utaruiled citetpygE aulupop canuaI nece , aleuçiuqadab niheb ruah nece cirissuki , teuçiuqzuard ihan utappia cuah açuag adaB
. aletzutid neztaitnuner anuaI erug tsirhC suseI ate , aztiokab ebaI ocniaI ate , aratenoitulossid aletud neztaibmac aitarg neraocniaI erug , caebag rudleb neraocniaI edneg , cautalorne ztocatenuh enoitanmad naidlapsa ai nehel , uztab noçiug edarid naçi uhtras cilihci necE
. citagaedef neyaç naçi name yeudnias niheb areztrah ztohib táçnadetaztiaç atrohxe , areztabircs yeuç tiaç naçi oirassecen , zanummoc udnemaulas areztabircs yeuç ciraladud idnah ahtra , cáetiaM
. aleuçiuqad acilpitlum etatirahc ate euqab ate aidrociresiM
, yeuhtied nedarid utauresnoc zetsirhC suseI ate , utacifitcnas zatiA ocniaI , caeyana neseuqcaI ate iraztibrec netsirhC suseI ADVI
























































. iuqutaliugneci caediuqsida caztiatulaS . cédiuqsida étua neztatulaS . niuqerih aled aeuqaB
. alerag nerutaçnim oha zoha ate , aladua nerissuki irras táid açnareps aniaB
. ihan utabircs zestageh ate zatnit táuartze aniab , ciroceztabircs açuag ztihna náinaB
. aled oczaiuge aenoitacifitset erug nece euçud nakv utugaçe ate , ugaid neztacifitset ere-cug aniab : ere-careb caiuge ate , éid neztacifitset céicug zoirtemeD
. aocniaI issuki citze caneud netiuge iuqziag aniab : cud cinagaocniaI , aneud netiuge iugnv : ano aniab , aztiag atimi aláçetze , áetiaM
. netzioge citaçilE ate citic neztahctapme canetzutid ihan utibecer ate , neztibecer caeyana careb cititze , zetnetnoc ze zaçuah ate : artnoc erug alassadad zothciag ehle , cárbo neutid netiuge crah taitic nerutappia idanab rohte nidlab , ztocalaH
. neztibecer citiaiugze cesehpertoiD , caned rehia naçi nehel naetra néyah aniab : iraçilE tácoraid utabircS
. táçnugaçed atuia áiuge , caocalah utibecer ugaitic raheb zareb cuG
. ciratelitneG aletuzte neztrah sued , cutid naçi utitrap citaganeci nerah necE
. ceuqidiad iugnv , alaçeb nacogad iraocniaI caztidab adiug nidlab ceh : náitneserp neraçilE zaetatirahc erih étutiab nakv utacifitset cénieC
. arateregnartse ate arateyana cutiab netiuge ere-rec cud netiuge iuqledif , áetiaM
. alaztlibad iuqorgetni carruoah ene naenadud netuçne , atiab niec , táitze cirogaidnah oiraczob oniab ruaH
. ziatiab netlibe iuqorgetni alon , zaetatirgetni erih naenetud nakv utacifitset ate caeyana naenedarid naçi irrohte ztiugah cuan naçi utareugela necE
. alaçeb ned orepsorp ámira erih , nécia odnes ate , náçed arepsorp nateicug açuag taid neztarised , áetiaM
. iranadaztirad no iuqzaiuge cin etiam oyaG CAONAICNA










































. étua neztatulas cérruoah nerautigele apziha eriH
. táçned autilpmoc aoiraczob erug , nerutaçnim oha zoha ate arateuç alecian nerirrohte tud açnareps aniab , nakv ihan utabircs zatnit ate zerepap tutitze , ciroceztabircs yeuç ere-neunab açuag ztihnA
. niuqeothciag arbo nerah ud neztacinummoc caneud neztatulas aruh necE
. atulas ateze , arehcte ibecer aleuçaçetze aruh , netrake utiapze ruah anirtcod ate , arateuç adab netrohte tiebmec nidlaB
. utidab aemeS ate atiA caned netioge nánirtcod netsirhC : utze aocniaI , nánirtcod netsirhC netioge atiapze ate , utiab netiagari ere-croN
. táçnugaçed ibecer aehteb iras aniab , cáçuag nugutid niuge tácnugaztitze lag , aratèurub neuç euçuaogoG
. tsirhcetnA ate ad irasuba aocalah : aled naçi irrohte natiugarah tsirhC suseI neztassefnoc etutiapze céniec , arudnum ad naçi uhtras irasuba ztihna necE
. netzetiaç libe natrah , alaçeb neuçud nakv nuçne cinadnaestah audnemanam ad ruah : aruara néudnemanam nerah necetiag libe , aetatirahc ad ruah atE
. nugoztirad no irrakle , anugud nakv cinadnaestah aniab , alaçeb nuaranab neztabircs cirirreb udnemanam ze , áerdna , tanuard netiuge ztiohto niaro atE
. cinagatiA alaçeb nugud nakv utibecer udnemanam , alaztlibad náiuge ciraterruoah erih nadud nedire nerec , ztiugah nuan naçi utareugelA
. niuqeretatirahc ate niuqeraiuge , cinaganuaI tsirhC suseI emeS neratiA ate , cinagatiA ocniaI niuqeuç aled aeuqab , aidrociresim , aitarG
: zasuac neraiuge ned nenaçi niuqerug ztocaluces ate neogad natuG
: ere-céicug netud nakv utugaçe áiuge aniab , tnemalos cerroruen cin ze ate , tutitiab etiam zaiuge cin niec , yerruoah nerah ate , irautigele erdna CAONAICNA














. nemA . ciratelodi etzetiaç ariugeb , cáotruoaH
. alanrete ezticiv ate , aocniaI oczaiuge ad ruah : naemeS nerah tsirhC suseI , naitaiuge arag ate : oceztugaçe neraned itaiuge udnemida alucuard name ate , aled naçi irrohte aemeS neraocniaI nece ugiuqadab aniaB
. alaztad naothciag aicug udnum ate : alerag cinagaocniaI nece ugiuqadaB
. aruh neztiuqnuh utze caothciaG ate , äurub ereb ud neztariugeb , caned naçi utardnegne cinagaocniaI aniab : netiuge cirutakeb aleutze crah , atiab oyai cinagaocniaI ere-ron nece ugiuqadaB
. cinetze aroireh utakeb adab aniab : ad utakeb aicug etatiuqinI
. náiugad ztiohto citagnerah netiarre taitze , aroireh naened autakeB . aroireh ze toid yenetud netiuge utakeb : ezticiv irah acuard nename ate , iraocniaI óyaç nerutacse , zutakeb netze aroireh aleud netiuge utakeb eyana ereb udab netsuki cetiebmec nidlaB
. caeuqse nugoiuqzuard netiugedlag alugutidab nece ugiuqadab : zetiagab acse ere-rec , aleutiag netuçne crah nece ugiuqadab nidlab atE
. aleutiag netuçne , aruara neraetadnorov nerah zetiagab acse tiabrec nidlab nece , áçnadifnoc nugud nahtiab aocniaI ad ruah atE
. nahtiab aneci neraemeS neraocniaI táçneuçaçed stehnis ate , alanrete ezticiv aleuçudab nece táçneuçiuqad : yoneuçud netsehnis nahtiab aneci neraemeS neraocniaI , yeuç teuçiuqzuard nakv utabircs cuah açuaG
. aezticiv utze , caneutze aemeS neraocniaI : aezticiv udab , caneud aemeS
. ad naemeS nerah ruah ezticiv ate : caocniaI alucuard name alanrete ezticiv nece , aenoitacifitset ad ruah atE
. aenoitacifitset neud nakv utacifitset zaemeS ereb caocniaI . nakv istehnis utze nece : aruh ud netiuge itruçeug , caneutze netsehnis aocniaI : nahtiab ereb aenoitacifitset neraocniaI udab , caneud netsehnis nahtiab aemeS neraocniaI
. zaemeS ereb utiab nakv utacifitset niec , aenoitacifitset neraocniaI ad ruah nece : ad ogaidnah aenoitacifitset neraocniaI ugudab neztibecer aenoitacifitset nénoçiug nidlaB
. edarid natetab cuah rurih ate : alodo ate arv ate autiripS , naerrul canetud neztacifitset edarid rurih atE
. edarid tab carurih cuah ate : audnias utiripS ate , aztiH , atiA , näurec canetud neztacifitset edarid rurih necE
. aled aiuge autiripS nece aneud neztacifitset ad autiripS ate : zelodo ate zerv aniab , tnenlalos zerv ze : aned naçi irrohte zelodo ate zerv tsirhC suseI ad ruaH
? neciab aneud netsehnis aemeS neraocniaI aled suseI , anoyaç neztiarag iraudnum ad roN
. aedef erug , anoyaç uhtiarag iraudnum airotciv ad ruah ate : iraudnum oyaç neztiarag , atiab oyai cinagaocniaI ere-rec necE
. edaritze caztiag caudnemanam nerah ate , nugaztid ariugeb caudnemanam nerah , aetatirahc neraocniaI ad ruah necE
. naenugutid neztariugeb caudnemanam nerah ate , naenugaztirad no iraocniaI , yerruoah neraocniaI alugetzirad no nece ugud neztugaçe natenuH
. ere-iraned naçi utardnegne cinagnerah áztirad no , iraneud utardnegne áztiratiab no ere-cron ate : ad aoyai cinagaocniaI aruh tsirhC aled suseI nece utiab netsehnis ere-croN
. ere-aeyana ereb neud etiam , caneud etiam aocniaI , cinagnerah ugud ruah udnemanam atE
? euqud laha etiam alon aocniaI neutze netsuki , caneutze etiam anassucad eyana ereb nece : ad itruçeug : aztiradab ztiag iraeyana ereb ate : aocniaI tud etiaM , açedab narre crohen nidlaB
. ug utiauqiab istehno cinehel crah nerec , ugaztirad no irah cuG
. naetatirahc autilpmoc atze aned rudleb ate : ud atnemrot carrudleb nece : arrudleb ud netzioge aropmac caotcefrep etatirahc citiztia : naetatirahc atze cirrudleB
. natenuh udnum ere-ug araciab ocalaçeb ned aruh nerec , táçnugud açnaruges naenuge ocoicidui , anagerug aetatirahc ad naçi utilpmoc zaçenuH
. nahtiab aruh aocniaI ate , ad netioge nahtiab ocniaI , aned netioge naetatirahc ate : ad etatirahc aocniaI . aetatirahc neud anagerug caocniaI ugud istehnis ate utugaçe cug atE
. nahtiab aocniaI aruh ate , ogad nahtiab aruh aocniaI , aemeS neraocniaI aled suseI nece utiab nerutassefnoc ere-croN
. ocetaçi erodaulaS neraudnum aemeS aleud nakv irrogi cátiA nece ugud neztacifitset ate , ugud nakv issuki cug atE
. ucuartiab name citutiripS ereb nerec , natug aruh ate , alerag netioge natrah nece ugud neztugaçe natenuH
. natug ad utilpmoc aetatirahc nerah ate , ogad natug aocniaI ugudab etiam rakle nidlab : onadnuge issuki crohen utze aocniaI
. istehno rakle ugud raheb ere-cug , utiauqiab istehno caocniaI alenuh nidlab , caetiaM
. táçnecil udnematcnioppa citagcautakeb erug aemeS ereb utiab nakv irrogi ate , ug utiauqiab istehno crah nerec aniab , aocniaI nugud istehno cug nerec ze , aetatirahc ad natenuH
. táçnerag iciv zaçrah , arudnum caocniaI utiab nakv irrogi aztiokab emeS ereb nerec , aetatirahc ocanagerug neraocniaI ad naçi utatsefinam natenuH
. ad etatirahc aocniaI nece : aocniaI neztugaçe utze , caneutze netsehnO
. aocniaI ud neztugaçe ate , ad oyai cioagaocniaI aruh , utiab netsehno ere-cron ate : ad cinagaocniaI aetatirahc nece : nugoçeid iztire no irrakle , cáetiaM
. autirips oczerorre ate , autiripS oczaiuge ugud neztugaçe natenuh : neztaheb uciazte irug anetze cinagaocniaI : uciaç neztaheb irug , aneud neztugaçe aocniaI : arag cinagaocniaI uG
. eyaç neztaheb yæh audnum ate , edarid oçnim zaudnum ztocalah , edarid citudnum ceH
. aned naudnum ze nece , aned nateuç ad ogaidnah nece : yæh etziaç uhtiarag ate , eteraç cinagaocniaI ceuç , cáotruoaH
. ad naudnum niaro ai ate , aled ocetrohte nece , euçutiab nakv nuçne neztaçnim zeniec , ad anetsirhcetnA autirips ocalah ate : cinagaocniaI atze aruh aled naçi irrohte aratiugarah tsirhC suseI neztassefnoc utiapze cutirips ere-niec atE
. ad cinagaocniaI , aicug utirips neud neztassefnoc aled irrohte aratiugarah tsirhC suseI . autiripS neraocniaI euçaçe tugaçe natenuH
. arudnum edarid naçi irrohte uslaf atehporp ztihna nece : zenedarid cinagaocniaI aye cautirips euçaztiagorohp aniab , stehnis aleuçaçetze aicug utirips , cáetiaM
. zautiripS nucuard nakv name , ocetiuqai ad , natug aled netioge aruh nece ugud neztugaçe zaçenuh ate : nahtiab aniah aruh ate , ad netioge nahtiab aruh , aneutid neztariugeb caudnemanam nerah atE
. alaçeb nucard name udnemanam , nugoztirad no irrakle ate , naeneci neraemeS nerah tsirhC suseI nugaçed stehniS , audnemanam nerah ad ruah atE
. ugutid netiuge cáçuag nedarid tnécalp naeniztia nerah ate , ugutid neztariugeb caudnemanam nerah nece : cinagnerah ugud neztibecer , zetiagab acse ere-nerec atE
. nahtiab aocniaI ugud açnaruges , utiagapze neztanmednoc caztohib erug nidlab , cáetiaM
. caicug açuag utid neztugaçe ate , oniab aztohib erug aocniaI ad ogaidnah , caztohib erug aztiugab anmednoc nidlab necE
. caztohib erug ugutid nerutaruges naeniztia nerah ate , alerag citaiuge nece ugud neztugaçe natenuh atE
: zaiuge ate zarbo aniab , zihim ateze zeztih iztire no alugaçetze , cáotruoah enE
? nahtiab aruh ad netioge aetatirahc neraocniaI natalon , carraslah ereb aztuartiab neristre ate aleeuqud etatissecen caeyana nerah euqutiab nerissuki ate , cirateno ocudnum euqutiab nenakv cron adaB
. ugutid raheb irraçe citagcaeyana caiciv erug zareb ere-cug , utiab nakv irraçe citagerug aiciv ereb crah nerec , aetatirahc ugud nakv utugaçe natenuH
. aneogad nahtiab ereb lanrete ezticiv aleutze ere-cetab celiahreciug euçiuqadab ate : ad eliahreciug aruh ireyana ereb aztiratiab ztiag ere-croN
. ogad naoireh , anaztiratze no iraeyana : yeyana ugetzirad no nece , arezticiv citoireh alerag nagari nece ugiuqadab cuG
. caudnum euztiradab ztiag yeuç nidlab sterim aleuçaçetze , cáeyana enE
. otsui caneraeyana nerah ate , nedariztiab othciag cárbo nerah nerec ? neuç nakv lih citagrec atE . aeyana ereb neuztiab lih ceniec ate , cinagaothciaG néztiab niec , alaçeb ceniaC zE
. nugoçeid iztire no irraklE , áoglatadnam neuçud nakv nuçne cinadnaestah ad ruah necE
. cinagaocniaI atze aruh netsehno aeyana ereb utiapze ate , netiuge utiapze aititsui ere-cron : carruoah neraurbaed ate carruoah neraocniaI edarid ireuga natenuH
. atiab naçi oyai cinagaocniaI nerec , cirutakeb idiad nice ate , ogad nahtiab aniah aicah nerah nece : netiuge utze cirutakeb crah , cinagaocniaI atiab naçi oyai ere-roN
. cárbo neraurbaed táçnaztil niugesed , aemeS neraocniaI ad naçi utreuga ztocatenuh : ud netiuge utakeb caurbaed cinadnaestah nece : ad cinagaurbaed , aneud netiuge utakeB
. alaçeb ned otsui aruh , ad otsui , aneud netiuge aititsui : aletaztiazte icudes crohen , cáotruoaH
. aruh utugaçe utze ate , aruh issuki utze , utiab netiuge utakeb ere-cron : netiuge cirutakeb utze cened netioge nahtiab aruH
. aletze nahtiab aruh cirutakeb ate , táçnaztil nek cautakeb erug aled naçi utreuga aruh nece euçiuqadab atE
. aned artnoc neraeugeL ad autakeb ate : ud netiuge ere-artnoc neraeugeL , utiab netiuge utakeb ere-croN
. alaçeb ned rup ere-aruh , äurub ereb ud neztacifirup , nahtiab aruh utiab ruah açnareps ere-cron atE
. aruh ugeuqud nerissuki alaçeb ned nece : alugud ociduri aruh , naenidad reuga aruh nece aedro ugiuqadab : anerag nenaçi utreuga atze oniaro aniab , arag ruoah neraocniaI niaro , cáetiaM
. neztugaçe aruh utiapze nerec , neztugaçe utiagze caudnum ztocalah : necetiag ahtied ruah neraocniaI , atiab , catiA nucuard name irug aetatirahc ocalon euçassukI
. aled oyai cinagnerah aruh , utiab netiuge aititsui ere-cron nece euçiuqai , aled otsui aruh nece euçiuqadab nidlaB
. naudnemineuda nerah táçneragze sufnoc naeniztia nerah ate , táçnugud açnarugessa naenidad reuga : natrah eteduaç , cáotruoah ene , adab niarO
. eteraç nenoge natrah , alaçeb netzutiaç istacari caenoitcnv ate : itruçeug atze ate , ad itaiuge ate , alaçeb netzutiaç netsacari zéicug açuag careb enoitcnv aniab : netaztiaç stacari crohen ciraognem euçutze ate , nateuç ogad aenoitcnv neuçud nakv utibecer cinagnerah aniaB
. zénetzutiaç nezticudes ceuç , teuçiuqzuard neztabircs cuah açuaG
. alanrete ezticiv , atiab , assemorp nucuard utattemorp irug careb ad ruah atE
. eteraç nenoge nahtiab atiA ate nahtiab aemeS ere-ceuç , aneuçud nakv nuçne cinadnaestah ogadab nateuç nidlab nece : ogeh nateuç aneuçud nakv nuçne cinad-naestah zareB
. udab ere-atiA crah , aemeS utiab neztrohtia ere-cron : utze ere-atiA crah , aemeS utiab neztakv ere-croN
. utitiab neztakv aemeS ate atiA ceniec , tsirhcetnA ad aruh ? neciab aneud neztakv tsirhC aled suseI , itruçeug ad roN
. citaiuge atiapze ertab cirruçeug ate , neuçud neztugaçe aruh nerec citiztia : ztocaleuçutze neztugaçe áiuge , nakv utabircs teuçuartzE
. caicug açuag euçutid neztugaçe ate , cinagaudniaS aenoitcnv euçudab ceuç aniaB
. ciratug aledaritze caicug nece táçnidel atsefinam ad naçi niuge ruah aniab : neeuqetaric noge niuqerug , edarilab naçi ciratug nidlab nece : ciratug nedarizte aniab edarid naçi ikli citetra eruG
. aled árobmed neuqza nece ugiuqatiab cidnon : edarid ztihna catsirhcetnA ere-cinadniaro , aled ocetrohte tsirhcetnA nece euçutiab nakv nuçne alon ate : ad arobmed neuqza , cáotruoaH
. ztocaluces ogad aneud netiuge aetadnorov neraocniaI aniab , áicihtug nerah ate , ad netiagari audnum atE
. cinagaudnum ad aniab cinagatiA atze ) áitnagorra neraezticiv ate , áicihtug neiugeb ate , áicihtug neraiugarah , alon alah ( aicug açuag ned naudnum necE
. nahtiab aruh aoiroma neratiA atze , audnum udab etiam cetiebmec nidlab : cáçuag ocudnum ze , audnum etiam aleuçutzE
. etoiuqziaztiab uhtiarag iraothciag ate , atiab netioge nateuç aztih neraocniaI ate , eteraztiab ztihtrob nerec , cáetzag , teuçuard utabircS . aned cinad-naestah euçutiab utugaçe nerec , cátia , teuçuard nakv utabircS
. atiA euçutiab nakv utugaçe nerec , cáipihc ruoah , teuçuard neztabircS . etoiuqziaztiab uhtiarag iraothciag nerec , cáetzag , teuçuard neztabircS . aned cinad-naestah euçutiab utugaçe nerec , cátia , teuçuard neztabircS
. citaganeci nerah euçiuqziaztiab utakrab cautakeb neuç nerec , cáotruoah , teuçuard neztabircS
. utid nakv utusti caiugeb nerah caebmuhli nece : ned netiaoi táron iuqatze ate , alibad naebmuhli ate , ad naebmuhli , anaztirad ztiag ireyana ereb aniaB
. nahtiab aruh atze ciroladnacs ate , ogad naiugra anaztirad no ireyana ereB
. onardniaro ad naebmuhli aruh áztiratiab ztiag ireyana ereb ate , aled naiugra nece utiab netiarre croN
. iugra utiab netiuge ai caiugra oczaiuge ate , atiab nagari aebmuhli nerec : nateuç ate natrah oczaiuge atiab niec , teuçuard neztabircs tabirreb udnemanam edlaçreB
. ad aztih neuçud nakv nuçne cinadnaestah arrahaç udnemanam : aneuçud nakv cinadnaestah rahaç udnemanam aniab , neztabircs tabirreb udnemanam teuçuartze , cáeyanA
ilibe ere-caniah alah , atiab ilibe aruh alon , ud raheb , aleogad nahtiab aruh utiab netiarre croN
. alerag nahtiab aruh nece ugiuqad zaçenuh : ad utilpmoc aoiroma neraocniaI nahtiab aruh iuqzaiuge aztih nerah utiab neztariugeb cron aniaB
: nahtiab aruh atze áiuge ate , ad itruçeug , neztariugeb utitiapze caudnemanam nerah ate : aruh tud utugaçE , utiab netiarre croN
. ugaztidab ariugeb caudnemanam nerah nidlab , alugud utugaçe aruh nece ugiuqad natenuh atE
ere-citagcaneraicug udnum aniab , tnemalos citagcaerug ze ate , citagcautakeb erug audnematcnioppa ad aruh atE
. aotsui tsirhC suseI , arahtiab atiA tabtacouda ugudab , cirutakeb udab niuge cetiebmec nidlab ate : táçneuçiugatze cirutakeb , teuçiuqzuard neztabircs cuah açuag , cáotruoah enE















. natug atze aztih nerah ate , aruh ugud netiuge itruçeug : niuge cirutakeb alugutze nece ugaçedab narre nidlaB
. oceztagrup erug ciratoro etatiuqini ate , oceztakrab néutakeb erug irug , otsui ate ad ledif , cautakeb erug ugaztidab assefnoc nidlaB
. atze natug áiuge ate , ugutid nezticudes cäurub erug , alugutze cirutakeb nece ugaçedab narre nidlaB
. ciratoro utakeb utiag neztagrup calodo neraemeS nerah tsirhC suseI ate , naetab niuqerah niuqerrakle ugud enoinummoc , alaçeb ned naiugra aruh , aztlibagab naiugra nidlab aniaB
. áiuge netiuge ugutze ate , ugud netiarre arruçeug , aztlibagab naebmuhli ate , niuqerah alugud enoinummoc nece ugaçedab narre nidlaB
. aletze nahtiab aruh ertab cirebmuhli ate , aiugra aled aocniaI necE , anugeuçuard neztáitnuned ate aoglatadnam nugud nakv nuçne cinagnerah adab ad ruaH
. táçnidad ilpmoc aoiraczob neuç ugeuçiuqzuard neztabircs cuah açuag atE
. niuqeraemeS nerah tsirhC suseI ate niuqeratiA ad aenoinummoc erug ate , niuqerug táçneuçud enoinummoc ere-ceuc , alugeuçuard neztaitnuned , toid , anugud nakv nuçne ate issuki atE
) . uciaztiab naçi utreuga ate , nahtiab atiA néztiab niec , alanrete ezticiv ugeuçuard neztaitnuned ate ugud neztacifitset ate , ugud nakv issuki ate , ad naçi utatsefinam aezticiv necE (
. zaztiH ocezticiv anetud nakv iuqnuh céucse erug ate , anugud nakv utalpmetnoc , anugud nakv issuki zéiugeb erug , anugud nakv nuçne , anec CINAD-NAESTAH

. nemA . onarenuge ocetatinrete ate niaro airolg aled iniec : naeztugaçe ate náitarg neraerodaulaS ate neranuaI erug tsirhC suseI etzetiaç açnaua aniaB
. netzetiazte rore citetatemref neuç , cinaçi namare niuqécreb zoinagne nélbanimoba euçuariugeb , citzoreug zaneteraç cautitreuda citiogne , cáetiam , zareb ceuÇ
. natenoitcurtsed néurub ereb , alaçeb ere-carutpircS ecreb , cinetzutid neztrukam cébag etatemref ate cétnarongi , ciztiag oceztida uztab edaritiab naténiec : atiab oçnim zaçuah utcnup alon nateicug alotsipe ereb isauQ
: alaçeb neuçuard nakv utabircs aruara neraitneipas nóyaç naçi name irah ere-caetiam eyana erug luaP : euçaçe amitse udnemaulas áitneitap neranuaI erug atE
. niuqereuqab netzetiaç nedire zaçrah ebag uhctorper ate ebag alucam euçraçe aitnegilid , aleteduaç ariugeb néuah açuag , cáetiam , ztocalaH
. atiab neztatibah aititsui naténiec eduag ariugeb nerairreb rul ate néirreb urec aruara nerassemorp aniaB
? neruhtrv zoreb catnemele ate , edaritiab neniugesed ciriuqehcari cäurec nateniec , arudnemineuda neranuge neraocniaI aleteraç neztaihel ate , aleteduaç ariugeB
? natarbo oczetateip ate natudnias enoitasreunoc naçi euçud raheb ocalon , naeniag neranedarid raheb niugesed caicug cuah açuag zareB
. edarid nererre liohc caicug arbo ocatrah ate , arrul ate , edarid neniugesed zoreb catnemele ate : edaritiab nenagari niuqestorrabah cäurec nateniec , alaçeb zauag anioho , anuge neranuaI ad nerirrohte aniaB
. necotad aratudnemadneme caicug aniab , nidad lag rohen zihan ze , anagerug ad tneitap aniab ) alaçeb netud neztamitse ecnareb cuztab ( canuaI neud utattemorp necnareb utzE
. aledarid alaçeb tab-nuge ehtrv allim ate , alaçeb ehtrv allim nahtieb anuaI tab-nuge nece , cáetiam , tnarongi aleterazte zenuh aniaB
. ocenuge neraenoitcurtsed néothciag noçiug ate neraoicidui edarid neztariugeb ocus cirutaureser zareb ztih arrul ate cäurec nedarid niaro aniaB
. ad naçi udlag cinaçi ilatse zetab oibulid rv audnum ocudro ztocalaH
. zaztih neraocniaI , naetra rv ate naenrab rv ciralec neztitsisnoc carrul ate , nétud nakv aetaçi ereb cinadoganehel cèurec alon , étud neztarongi zihan ereb ruah necE
. cinadnaestah neraenoitaerc étud neztaunitnoc alenuh céicug açuag , citzoreug zanedarid naçi utrakol cátiA nece ? assemorp ocudnemineuda nerah ad noN , aletioid atE
. aledarid netlibe aruara néirporp aicihtug ereb , cairaffurt natenuge oceneuqza aledarid nerirrohte nece : ciraleuçiuqad cinehel ruaH
. ulotsopA neraerodaulaS ate néranuaI araciab niec , zaudnemanam erug ate , zéztih , nedarid naçi narre citeniztia zéudnias atehporP tácneterac tiohrO
. auhahc udnemida neuç zudnemitreuda tutiab neztraztari zeniec , teuçuard neztabircs ruah alotsipe nerragib ai , cáetiaM

. areztaczluari arelitsi ad naçi iluztiaicuki idrahA , ate : arirporp eztrussi ereb ad naçi iluzti arO , aned iho netiarre zoczaiuge oibreuorp eyaç naçi udleh yæh aniaB
: aeztarelebiug citudnias udnemanam neyaç naçi name , aruh cirutugaçe ze nece , utugaçe nétul ze aedib oczaititsui netieuquç nakv eboh necE
. ad naçi niuge ogaothciag oniab anehel aenoitidnoc neuqza néyah , zétidab tuçnev cirissahan nateh zirreb ere-citagaicug , zaeztugaçe neraerodaulaS ate neranuaI tsirhC suseI naodno nedarid utariter ciratenussatustas ocudnum nidlab necE
. ad naçi niuge obalcs nerah aruh , atiab naçi utuçnev rohen zaçron nece , ciraledarid obalcs neraenoitpurroc careb zutattemorp yæh etatrebiL
: canetuç niuge sehi iuqzaiuge ciratenetud neztasreunoc naterorre , zéitnelosni ate zéicihtug neraiugarah étzutid neztaczab aletzutid neztaitnunorp catnagorra zicug soporp oczetatinav necE
. eyaç neztariugeb ztocaluces aohnal oczebmuhli ate , cailibare zabmuhub eciah yedoh , caebag rv irruhti edarid cuaH
. áisenerf neratehporP naçec imirper cirutaçnim zonamuh zov cetab ocirratzv eme otsa necE
: nec naçi utuçnev zaetatiuqini ereb ate : nacuaraztiab iztire no irairas oczetatiuqini ceniec , cinaçi iuqierrai iraedib neraemesnerosoB maalaB , edarid naçi utaleberre ciriztv anecuç ediB
: aledarid ruoah oczenoitcidelam , aletud autaticrexe arataitiraua aztohib , aletzutid neztaczab catnatsnocni amira , aletiuqatze neztidleug citetiuge utakeb ate , aletzutid caehteb zoiretluda caiugeB
. zutateuqnab niuqeuç nateoinagne ereb aledarid neztatsod , cálucam ate cáhctaht , caoiciled oczoro nuge aletzutid neztamitse natetatpulov , airas oczaititsuini aletud neztibeceR
: edarid neniugesed zareb enoitpurroc ereb , aletzutid neztareputiv cáçuag netzutitze neztida , edarid caniuge ocetiugesed ate ocetiamaztah , alaçeb canaztierrad iraetatilausnes ereb laturb lamina , cuah aniaB
. netiame ciraitnetnes oczetiarreztiag naeniztia neranuaI artnoc néyah etutze , ere-edaridab ogaidnah zaçnassiup ate zerradni , céureugniA
