. nézteil aralced yæh cuah ztih naohtabbaS ocenerruh célitneG netaztic iohto , citagoganys néuduI naenedaric ikli oreuG
. euçaçeidab atnoc crohen nidlab neristehnis euçutiapze niec toid tabarbo , natenuge neuç cin tud netiuge tabarbo nece , etzetiaç trv ate , euçaçe sterim ate , cáelaztaçerpsonem euçassukI
. neuçiuqatze ahtreug aned naçi narre natetehporP adab euçuaogoG
. aled neztacifitsui aicug neud netsehnis , zaçenuh , cirateicug açuag neteraç naçi nice utacifitsui zaeugeL nesesyoM atE
: aleuçiaç neztaralced audnemakrab néutakeb zaçenuh nece , cáeyana noçiug adab euçiuqaI
. cirenoitpurroc nakv issuki utze caneud utaticsuser caocniaI aniaB
. enoitpurroc ud nakv issuki ate , ad naçi irraçe niuqetia ereb ate , ad naçi utrakol , cirutaztibrec aulliesnoc neraocniaI nárobmed ereb diuaD ruges necE
. naçed suki cirenoitpurroc caudniaS erih nerutittemrep cutzE , ud netiarre ere-natetab ukel ecreb ztocalah atE
. caruges nussatudnias ne-diuaD yeuç teuçiuqzuard nenamE , ud nakv narre alenuh , natoceztluzti ze arerhclupes cirogaiheug ciratelih aruh aleud utaticsuser ocetsucare atE
. ih tua utardnegne nuge cin , ih zia aemeS enE , alaçeb ned autabircs ere-naumlasP nerragib , cirutaticsuser suseI , ug araciab niec , yerruoah neyah aleuard utilpmoc caocniaI aruh necE
: naetabmeceb ned zassemorp neyaç naçi niuge yétiA erug yeuç ugeuçuard neztaitnuned ere-cuG
. arahtiab aulupop oinomitset nerah edarid ate , zénedaric naçi nagi aremelasureI ciraelilaG naetab niuqerah , zenuge ztihna ad naçi issuki atE
. ciratelih aruh ud nakv utaticsuser caocniaI aniaB
. natetab tnemunom netaçec raçe , cirudnek citeruç , caicug açuag nedaric utabircs zaçrah naenetzutic utilpmoc atE
. naçel lih aruh étud nakv utireuqer etaliP ebag nedire natrah cirasuac ocatoireh ereniece atE
. étzutid nakv utilpmoc canedarid neztrucari zaicug htabbaS ztih nétehporP , cirutanmednoc ciraletuzte neztugaçe aruh cérodanrebog néyah ate cétnatibah ocemelasureI necE
. euçiaç naçi irrogi aztih ocatenuh udnemaulas yeuç , cánetud arrudleb neraocniaI naetra neuç ate , cáemes ocaçarra nemaharbA , cáeyana noçiuG
. nadaçed ahcal engid zianiapze átapaç ocatenio neniec , naodno ene ad netrohte , ánuh aniab , in aruh zian ze ? euçud etsv alecian roN , naçec narre , ausruc ereb cesennaoI naeneuç neztabaca atE
. naocaretrohte nerah naenacuarec nakv utaciderp ilearsI aomsitpaB ocatudnemadneme cesennaoI citeniztiA
: suseI , atiab , aerodaulaS ilearsI acuard nakv utaticsus aruara nerassemorp ereb caocniaI citicah nenuH
. caicug ihan ene utitiab neniuge ceniec , anoçiug ocaragog eruen , aemes neresseI diuaD tud nedirE , naçec narre , ciname egainomitset ere-irah : nateuger diuaD néceic name , cirudnek aruh atE
. zehtrv yeugorreb , anoçiug ocuniel nimai-neB , aemes ne-siC luaS caocniaI néceic name ate , netab euger necetic acse oreuG
. onanagatehporp leumaS caegui nézteic name zehtrv ramah ate yeugorreb ate nuhe rual areheb itug , arog itug oreug atE
. arrul néyah néceic itrap zehtroç , naerrul ognaanahC enoitan ipzaç cineugesed oreuG
. nautresed utid nakv utirffus caenoitidnoc néyah näurugni nerarobmed nerehtrv yeugorreb atE
. ciratrah ceh naztic iuqodi zetab arog osseb ate , naeneduec naerrul ocetpygE , ud nakv utarog ruah ulupop ate , cátia erug utid nakv utigele caocniaI nenuh ulupop ocelearsI
: euçuçne , cáneuçud arrudleb neraocniaI ate , cánoçiug ratlearsI , oid , ciniuge uniek necetil lihci zaucse ate , celuaP adab ciriuqiaI
. euçarre , cirocatenoitatrohxe neraulupop ztih tiebmec adab nateuç nidlab , cáeyana noçiuG , aletioic , arateh célapicnirp ocagoganys netaçec rogi , naodno neraeztrucari nétehporP ate neraeugeL naudrO
. necetic rai , naenuge htabbaS nágoganys ciruhtras ate , arocaidisiP ehcoitnA necetic rohte cirutitrap citegreP ceh atE
. aremelasureI nidec luzti , cirutitrap cirateh sennaoI naudro : aririh ocailihpmaP aregreP necetic rohte , canedaric niuqerah ate luaP naenedaric utitrap citohpaP atE
. zánirtcod neranuaI cirirrai zarim , naçec stehnis , nec naçi niuge rec cirissuki calusnocorP naudrO
. ahlib neeuqaçel adiug citucse cron nalibaç urugni ate : ebmuhli ate ohnal areniag nerah nidec rore natreb atE , onaratetab arobmed aiuqzugi alautze netsuki , usti zia nenaçi ate , naeniag erih aucse neranuaI , ánuh adab niarO
? nerutidleug citeztrukam nénehcuhc edib neranuaI zia ze , áyaste neraicug aititsui , áemes neraurbaed , áehteb zaicug aicenif ate oinagne O , naçec narrE
, cirudnehcuhc caiugeb anagnerah , zaudnias utiripS cirehteb ) caned neztied ere-luaP ( celuaS aniaB
. zihan icuare citedef alusnocorP ) caneci nerah ud ihan narre alah nece ( , caelaçatnacne samylE neuarec neztitsiser aniaB
. neuç arised ocetuçne neraztih neraocniaI , luaS ate sabanraB ciruhtied cenuH . niuqerarruhuç noçiug . niuqeralusnocorp luaP oigreS néztiab nieC
, cinec neztied useiraB , tabelaçatnacne uslaf atehporp uduI netaçec nedire , naenetuç utassebert onarohpaP álsI oreuG
. nugal ere-sennaoI nétuçab ate : nateugoganys néuduI aztih neraocniaI netaçec aitnuned aranimalaS naenedaric irrohte atE
. arerpyC necetic acrabme cidnah ate : araicueleS necetic stuai , zaudnias utiripS cirirrogi adab ceH
. netaztic rogi , cirirraçe naeniag néyah caucse ate , ciniuge etziohto ate rurab naudrO
. taztocarbo nadutid uhtied luaS ate sabanraB euçadaztei arapeS , caudnias utiripS naçec narre , aledaric rurab ate aletuç neztaztibrec naoiretsinim anuaI adab ceH
. luaS ate , anec naçi icah niuqerahcrartet sedoreH , nehanaM ate , aonaeneryC oicuL ate , anec neztied regiN nomiS ate , sabanraB , uztab rotcod ate atehporP náçilE nec nehcoitnA , nedaric atE
. anec neztied craM zocitiog neci ere-sennaoI cirutrah niuqereb , cirutilpmoc äugrac , citemelasureI necetic luzti luaS ate ere-sabanraB
. neztacilpitlum ate nec neztaçnaua aztih neraocniaI aniaB
. nidec lih cirutrabarah ate : name airolg iraocniaI nacuareztiapze nerec , cäureugniA neraocniaI aruh naçec oi natreb atE
! aneranoçiug ze ate , azov neraocniaI , nidec rai zuhio aulupop atE
. néceic niuge tabagnerah , cirirrai naukel rai ocoicidui , cirutitzev zaporra euger cesedoreH , zetab utangissa nuge atE
. neztiab neztinetertne citenereuger ácramoc néyah nerec : neduec zeuqse euqab , néiheug ocarebmag nereuger néztiab niec , otsalB ciricabari ate , anagnerah necetic rohte zetab ogog ceh aniab : artnoc néonainodiS ate néonairyT ogog ocetiuge alreug neuç cesedoreH atE
. nidec noge nah , araeraseC citaeduI ciristuai ate : necetil namare areztinup naçec anam , ciniuge enoitamrofni zedraog , naeneuzte nedire ciniugedlag aruh cesedoreH atE
. nec niuge rec sirreiP aye naetra nésemradneg nec aidnah udug naenec utiugra aniaB
. aratetab ukel ecreb nidec naoi cirikli atE . yeyana ate iseuqcaI cuah açuag euçeztei atnoC , néceic narre ate : citiugednioserp neuç iuqodi canuaI alon néceic atnoc , necetil lihci zaucse ciniuge uniek yæh atE
. necetic atnaps ate , aruh netaçec suki , ciriuqeri ate : neuç neztareuesrep zeztaklub cesirreiP aniaB
. nud äureugniA neraH , netioic ceh ate : alec alah neuç neztaruges crah aniaB . zia aohrE , netoçeic narre ceh atE
. aleogec naeniztiahtrob sirreiP , néceic aralced ciniuge retsal arenrab aniab , áhtrob oceniztia ehcte iuqeri naçezte zoiraczob , azov nesirreiP cirutugaçe atE
. cinec neztied edohR , areztaheb tabotacsen nidec ikli , áhtrob oceniztia ehcte cesirreiP naeneuç utaklub atE
. aleduec netiuge eztiohto ate caudlib ztihna nedariztiab non , arehcte nerama neranec neztied craM zocitiog neci , nesennaoI airaM nidec rohte cirutaredisnoc áçuag atE
. ciraticug iracetsv neraulupop néuduI ate , citucse nesedoreH aleuan iuqodi ate , äureugniA ereb aleud nakv irrogi canuaI nece iuqzaiuge tiuqad niarO , naçec narre cirutadrocca cesirreiP naudrO
. cinagnerah äureugniA nidec itrap natreb ate , tabacirrak netaçec nagari cirikli ate , néiuqeztiab iuqeri zurub ereb niec , arenamarad aretatiuic , arahtrob oczanidrub necetic rohte , anerragib ate aidraog nehel cinagari atE
. aleuç netsuki enoisiv tiebmec neuç etsv aniab : anec netiuge zäureugniA zenec aiuge naiuqazte ate , nóiuqec iuqierrai sirreiP cirikli atE
. irin tierra ate , áporra erue caçe raH , nóçeic narre oreuG . alah naçec niuge atE . caeladnas erue cazti znuai ate , idacirreuG , cäureugniA nóçeic narre atE
. cirateucse cánedac nóiuqziuqec rore ate , ztetif ida iuqiaI , aleoic , naçec raztari , astehies nesirreiP ciroi ate , naiugednioserp naçec iugra cetabiugra ate , nidec rohte tabureugniA neranuaI , ánuh atE
. aiugednioserp nétuç neztariugeb naeniztiahtrob cédraog ate , autacetse zanedac ib , naetra nesemradneg ib sirreiP naztec ol natrah uag , naeneuç oceztatneserp aruh cesedoreH atE
. nacuarec netiuge ztiohto iraocniaI arudra citagnerah cáçilE aniab : naiugednioserp nétuç neztariugeb adab sirreiP
. zihan utatneserp iraulupop aruh naodno oczab : areztariugeb isemradneg oczanrual rual néceic name ate , naiugednioserp naçec raçe cinamaztah atE
) canuge néiugo ocirebag irragahctla nedaric ate ( : aretiamaztah ere-nesirreiP nidec açnaua , yeuduI aleyaç tekal iroh cirissuki atE
. zatapze , aeyana nesennaoI seuqcaI naçec lih atE
. neztigilffa néuztab ocaçilE sedoreH euger nidec rai naereb arobmed atE
. zucse neluaS ate nesabanraB zirrogi yeonaicnA , netaçec niuge alah atE
. yeyana nedaric neztatibah naeduI aretrogi netiabrec natatuia netaçec arebiled , zeuara neralaha ereb caredebtab cirateulupicsid atE
. nárobmed neraseC oidualC nidec ahtreug alah ruah ate : natoro udnum alec nenaçi aidnah etessog , zautiripS naçec aralced ciriuqiai cetab nec neztied subagA cirateh atE
. arehcoitnA uztab atehporP citemelasureI necetic stuai nateh nuge atE
. necetiztiab ied onitsirhC nehcoitnA cinehel caulupicsid ate , netaçeztiab stacari idnah ulupop ate , netaçeztiab asreunoc niuqeraçilE naicug ehtrv nidec ahtreug ate : arehcoitnA naçec namare cinedire aruh atE
: ahlib neluaS , aresraT sabanraB nidec naoi oreuG
. iranuaI noiuqec atnemgua aidnah eztedneg ate : aehteb zedef ate zaudnias utiripS ate nec ano noçiug necE
. niuqeranuaI areztareuesrep zetab nussatumref oceztohib , caicug neutic neztatrohxe ate , nidec areugela áitarg neraocniaI naeneuç issuki ate , naenec utauirra atE
: onarehcoitnA nidel naoi sabanraB netaçec rogi ate : arateirraheb neraçilE nec nemelasureI ámaf nidec leh atE
. anaganuaI nidec itreunoc ciristehnis tabidnah edlara edneg ate : niuqeh nec aucse neranuaI atE
. anuaI suseI aletuç neztaitnuned netziaztiab oçnim yeocerG ciruhtras nehcoitnA niec , onaineryC ate , onairpyC nedaric uztab cirateh aniaB
. neciab yereb yeuduI , aztih neraocniaI ciraletacuarezte neztaralced irohen , onarehcoitnA ate onarerpyC ate onarecinehP necetic naoi ere-canedaric utayerrab citagaenoitalubirt nec naçi irrohte zasuac nenebetsE adaB
. ocetiakv ezticiv audnemadneme euard name caocniaI ere-yelitneG zareB , aletuç netiarre , aocniaI netaçec acifirolg ate , necetic agitama cinuçne cuah açuag naudrO
? aocniaI naçen ahctapme nécnin ron in : ugutiab nakv istehnis nahtiab anuaI tsirhC suseI cug , zoreug zaneuard name caocniaI areb niahod yab irug adaB
. zaudnias utiripS eteraç nerutayehtab ceuç aniab zerv ud nakv utayehtab cesennaoI , neoic alon , zanarre neranuaI nidnen tiohro naudrO
. alaçeb nec istuai ere-areniag erug naestah , areniag néyah audnias utiripS nidec stuai , naenidnen sah neztaçnim atE
. aicug ehcte erih ate ih ate , ziatiab nerutaulas zéniec , caztih ciuqzuard nenarre craH
. aned neztied sirreiP zocitiog neci nomiS carrakere ate , areppoI edneg tieberetabmec carrogI , alastoic ate aloyaç neztatneserp , naehcte ereb tabureugniA neuç issuki alon nugaçeic atnoc atE
: naehcte neranoçiug necetneug ras ate , ere-cuah eyana yes niuqene necetic rohte atE . ebag niuge ciradud , nidnen naoi niuqeh cautiripS nadaçeic narre atE
. cairrogi anagene citaeraseC , arehcte necnin in necetic atneserp noçiug rurih naereb tnemom , ánuh oreuG
. tárurec caicug cuah açuag necetic ariter araçrah ate : naterurih nidec niuge ruah atE
. ustas aláçetze cih , aneud utacifirup caocniaI , citurec zirreb cazov nadaçeic stedrahi atE
. naoha ene uhtras onadnuge cutze cirustas ode cinummoc açuag nece : anuaI zE , naçen narre atE
. caçe nai ate caçe lih , sirreiP ida iuqiaI , alatuarec netiarre irin tabzov naçen nuçne atE
: cirateirohc ocurec ate , ciratenaztlibad zetserreh ate , cirateitseb assab ate , ciratenudnio rual lamina ocerrul naçen suki ate aogog cirirraçe caiugeb aratraH
. onanagene nidec rohte ate , citurec alec , neztitieheb , auhtol nateniotnac rual , cirocalaçeb tabidnah essihim tabicnv nec netsuai , neztiab , tabenoisiv naçen suki cirutatropsnart zudnemida ate : aleognen netiuge ztiohto naetatiuic oceppoI nécnin iN
, aleoic , naodno neraecreb atab caicug açuag nezteic aralced cesirreiP cirissah naudrO
. cud nakv nai niuqeh ate , zia naçi uhtras aratenoçiug nedaritze utidicnocriC aletioiC
, céocenoisicnocric artnoc nerah netaçec iuqudrahi aremelasureI sirreiP naenec nagi atE
. aztih neraocniaI aletuç utibecer ere-celitneG nece céyana nedaric naeduI ate céulotsopA adab netaçec nuçnE

. nidel noge ztocatenuge tiebmec netoçeic niuge ztiohto naudrO . naeneci neranuaI necetil ayehtab naçec anam atE
? cuah netud utibecer audnias utirips alaçeb cug necetitze ayehtab euqaçed laha ahctapme arv crohen alA , cesirreiP naçec stedrahi naudrO
. neztadual neraocniaI ate neztaçnim zegaognel ceh netzutic netuçne necE
. neztiab naçi istuare aniahod neraudnias utiripS ere-areniag nélitneG nerec , céirrohte niuqesirreiP ledif ocenoisicnocriC netaçec sterim atE
. areniag néicug netuç netuçne ruah ztih audnias utiripS nidec stuai , aleutic netiuqude cuah soporp cesirreiP oniarO
. céicug netud neristehnis nahtiab aruh aletud nerutibecer audnemakrab néutakeb naeneci nerah nece , etacuard netrake egainomitset ere-ceicug atehporP inuH
. autanedro zaocniaI ocetaçi egui nélih ate néiciv aled aruh nece areztacifitset ate iraulupop areztaciderp utiag utanam atE
. naodno ned naçi utaticsuser ciratelih aruh niuqerah ugutiab nade ate nai céniec toid irug , yeoinomitset nedaric utanedro zaocniaI cinadnehel aniab , iraicug ulupop zE
, ocetaçi utatsefinam name ate , naenuge ocenereh ud nakv utaticsuser caocniaI aruh ate , cirutakrv naeruç etutiab nakv lih nieC
. zéicug açuag neutid niuge nácramoc neremelasureI ate néuduI oinomitset arag ug atE
niuqerah nec aocniaI nece : aleutic neztadnes caicug nedaric utatnemrot zaurbaed ate aleuç netiuge iugnv atiab naçi ilibe niec , zetuhtrev ate zaudnias utiripS caocniaI neud utatcnv onerazaN suseI aloN
: naodno neraomsitpaB neud nakv utaciderp cesennaoI , naelilaG cirissah , naicug aeduI ned naçi niuge rec euçiuqadab ceuÇ
. anuaI néicug atiab niec , zetsirhC suseI aeuqab ciraleuç neztaitnuned , yerruoah ocelearsI caocniaI euard nakv irrogi ruah açuaG
. ocaragog nerah aled , aneud netiuge aititsui ate , anoyaç rudleb irah nateicug enoitan aniaB
. aheb araitnerappa nénosrep aleogatze aocniaI nece tud netiedire zaiugE , naçec narre , aoha ereb cesirreiP ciriuqeri naudrO
. táçnugaztid nuçne caicug açuag náiuqziaç naçi utanam zaocniaI naeniztia neraocniaI nemeh cutiag coicug ug adab niarO . nécia irrohte nerec cud niuge iugnv cih ate , taid irrogi anagerih natreb ztocalaH
irih ciaç nerutaçnim naenerrohtad aruh : naedla sasti naehcte neraelaçniappa urral nomiS zutatso cud aruh : aned neztied sirreiP zocitiog neci nomiS caçe icare ied ate , areppoI adab carrogI
. naeniztia neraocniaI cutid natoiromem cánysomele erih ate , aenoitaro erih cud naçi nuçne , oilenroC , náçeic narre atE
: nataruditzev neuç neztiugra , naeniztia ene náideic atneserp tabmoçiug , ánuh ate : naehcte eruen netiuge etziohto , náognain natenero iztardeb ate , rurab necniniab onaratenuh udro cid nuge ruaL , oid coilenroC naudrO
. neuçuan irrakere in zasuac rec adab euçuan zedlaG . ciruhtied zian naçi irrohte ebag adud ztocalah atE
. narre nadaçetze ustas ode nummoc ertab cinoçiug caocniaI tuard istucare irin aniab : itab regnartse nóiuqad libruh ode atcnui tabuduI noçiug neztittemrep aletze euçiuqadab ceuÇ , néceic narre atE
: cirudlib arah edneg ztihna naçec nedire ate , nidec ras alec oçnim niuqerah atE
. cuan noçiug ere-roruen ida iuqiaI , aleoic , aruh naçec itiog cesirreiP aniaB
. naçec aroda , ciriztoge aratenio nerah äurub ereb ate , nóiuqeztiab ikli areniztia oilenroC , alaçeb nec neztras sirreiP nidec ahtreug atE
. ciruhtied carailimaf ediuqsida ate caediha ereb , neogec ariugeb néyah oilenroC atE . naeraseC necetic ras naenumarahib atE
. netoçeic niuge ainiapmoc cuztab cirateyana oceppoI ate , niuqeh nidec naoi sirreiP naenumarahib ate zutatso ceh naztic ibecer adab ciruhtied arenraB
. naçne nuçne neztaçnim ate , arehcte ereb ih naçne rakere cud naçi utitreuda zetab udnias ureugniA iuqoniuid , aneud egainomitset zaicug enoitan néuduI ate , aneud arrudleb neraocniaI ate aotsui noçiug , arenetnec oilenroC , netaçec narre ceh atE
? eteraztiab nemeh citaganiec ásuac ad rec : aneteduaç zedlag ceuç zian in , ánuH , naçec narre , aratenoçiug nedaric naçi irrogi anagnerah zoilenroC ciristuai adab cesirreiP
. táitic irrogi cin nece : ebag utadud sued niuqeh libah ate ida istuai adab ciriuqiaI
. ceduaid zedlag erih noçiug rurih , ánuH , cautiripS nóçeic narre , zaenoisiv aleogec ateugog sirreiP atE
, zutatso zenec nah anec neztied sirreiP zocitiog neci nomiS aye netaçec niuge edlag , ciruhtied tiebmec atE
. arahtrob necetic rohte ciniuge edlag aehcte nenomiS , canoçiug nedaric naçi irrogi zoilenroC , ánuh , aenoisiv neuç issuki nécil cirec alaçeb neuç neztadud nahtiab ereb cesirreiP atE
. tárurec aicnv nidec ariter araçrah oreug : zidla rurih nidec niuge ruah atE
. iuqude natenummoc aláçetze cih aneud utacifirup caocniaI , noçeic narre naidla nerragib irah zirreb cazov atE
. cirustas ode cinummoc açuag nai táitze onadnuge nece : anuaI zE , cesirreiP oid naudrO
. caçe nai ate caçe lih , sirreiP ida iuqiaI , tabzov anagnerah nidec rohte atE
. cirateirohc ocurec ate , ciratenaztlibad zetserreh ate cirateitseb assab ate , cirateicug nudnio rual lamina ocerrul néztiab natenieC
. alec netsuai arerrul , auhtol nateniotnac rual , alaçeb tabidnah essihim , tabicnv anagereb aloyaç netsuai ate , aiuqeri äurec naçec suki atE
. tabudnematropsnart oczutirips areniag nerah nidec rore aletacuarec necniappa ate , neuztiab nakv ihan utrah aenoitcefer , naenec utessog , nidec ahtreug atE
. näurugni nénero yes aretiuge ztiohto areniag ehcte sirreiP nidec nagi , aledaric neztlibruh aririh ate , alecaoic naedib ceh naenumarahiB
. areppoI naztic rogi , naeneuarec utatnoc aicug yæh atE
. tabtoued semrademmoh ciratenedaric arudra niuqerah ate , agib cirateiraztibrec ereb naztic ied , äureugniA nóyaç oçnim iroilenroC naenec utitrap atE
. náud raheb niuge cih rec cuard nenarre ciah : naedla sasti aehcte utiab ceniec , nahtiab tabelaçniappa urral nomiS zutatso cud aruH
. aned neztied sirreiP zocitiog neci nomiS caçe rakere ate , areppoI uztab cazti rogi adab niarO
. areniztia neraocniaI natoiromem cutid nagi cánysomele ate caenoitaro eriH , nóçeic narre atE ? anuaI ad reC , naçec narre cirutici ate cirudnehcuhc tanagnerah caiugeb crah atE
oilenroC . alastoic ate , alec netrohte anagnerah tabureugniA neraocniaI , näurugni nénero iztardeb neranuge iuqoralc zenoisiv naçec suki craH
. iuqoiranidro anacuarec netiuge ztiohto iraocniaI ate , iraulupop anacuarec netiuge ztihna anysomele ate . niuqeraicug ehcte ereb aneuç arrudleb neraocniaI ate , atoueD
, renetnec ocadnab nec neztied onailatI , cinec neztied oilenroC , naeraseC nec tab-noçiug atE

. naenetab elaçniappa urral nec neztied nomiS neppoI nuge ztihna nideztiab noge , nidec ahtreug atE
. nahtiab anuaI ceztihna netaçec stehnis ate naicug eppoI nidec tugaçe ruah atE
. ciriciv aruh néceic atneserp canugrahla etzame ate caudnias ciruhtied oreug : naçec iuqiare . ciname irah aucse cesirreiP naudrO
. nidec irrai cirissuki sirreiP ate , caiugeb ereb naztic iuqeri crah ate , ida iuqiai ahtibaT , naçec narre , táreztuprog ciriluzti ate , naçec niuge ztiohto cirirrai ociruahleb ate cesirreiP ciriuqodi aropmac caicug aniaB
. caruditzev ate , cáporra neutic netiuge naenec niuqeh cesacroD aletaztuarec netsucare ate , aleduec zerragin caicug nugrahla etzame nóiuqziuqec atneserp ate : ararog arebmag netaçec namare , naenec utabirra ate : niuqeh nidec rohte sirreiP ciriuqiai atE
. aretrohte onarateh tnáreb naçel ze aletuç netziohto , anagnerah noçiug ib netaztic rogi , alec nah sirreiP nece cinuçne ceulupicsid , naedla nereppoI neztiab addyL nerec atE
. natetab arog arebmag netaçec raçe , naenetuç icuki ate : nideztiab lih cirutire nateh nuge nidec ahtreug atE
. zéneutic netiuge anysomele ate zeno arbo aehteb nec ruah : sacroD atiab ihan narre , tabmec neztied ahtibaT assulupicsid nécab ere-neppoI
. anaganuaI necetic itreunoc ate , céicug nedaric neztatibah nanoraS ate naddyL aruh netaçec suki atE
. nidec iuqiai natreb atE . nerrorue caçe artocca aeho erue ate , ida iuqiai : cetsirhC suseI ua neztadnes , sáenE , cesirreiP astoid atE
: ocitylarap néztiab niec , cinaztec naeho zehtrv iztroç ai tab-noçiug nec neztied sáenE nah naçec nedire atE
. ere-arateudnias nedaric neztatibah naddyL nideztiab rohte , alec netiagari tarateicug sirreiP , nidec ahtreuG
. nedaric neztacilpitlum zenoitalosnoc neraudnias utiripS ate , zilibe naérrudleb neraocniaI , nedaric neztacifide ate , nétuç euqab nairamaS ate naelilaG ate naicug aeduI adab cécilE
. aresraT netaçec rogi ate , araeraseC aruh netaçec namare céyana cirutugaçe iroH
. naztlibaç zihan lih aruh ceh aniab : artnoc néocerG nec neztatupsid ate neztaçnim naeneci neranuaI suseI iuqognarf atE
. nemelasureI alec netrohte ate netiaoi niuqeh nec atE
. naeneci nesuseI nec naçi utaçnim iuqognarf necsamaD alon ate , nóyaç naçi utaçnim irah ate , anuaI neuç issuki naedib alon néceic atnoc ate , arateulotsopA naçec namare aruh cirutrah cesabanraB aniaB
. alec ulupicsid aruh zistehnis ze , nedaric rudleb nerah caicug aniab : nalibaç zihan udnugal niuqeulupicsid , aremelasureI naenec irrohte luaS atE
. cirirraçe naiuqsas zadroc netaçec stuare citalliarrum zauag ceulupicsid aruh cirutrah aniaB
. táçnetaçel lih aruh , uag ate nuge cáhtrob netzutic neztariugeb ate : cátalec neyah necetic rohte areztugaçe neluaS aniaB
, oceztlih nerah ulliesnoc naetra nerrakle céuduI netaçec iuqude näurub nerecul arobmed atE
. tsirhC alec ruah nece zutamrifnoc , cauduI nedaric neztatibah necsamaD neutic neztidnufnoc ate , nec oganeztacifitrof ogaoreug luaS aniaB
? aratelapicnirp erodacifircaS taçnaztil namare cirutacetse ceh , atiab irrohte anuh aratrah ate , canetuç neztacouni ruah neci nemelasureI aneutid niugesed ruah atzE , nétuç netiarre ate , caicug nétuç netuçne aruh nedaric neztici atE
. aemeS neraocniaI alec aruh nece tsirhC naçec aciderp nateugoganys natreb atE
. nuge tiebmec niuqeulupicsid nedaric necsamaD luaS nidec noge atE . naçec rah radni naeneuç nai atE
. nidec ayehtab ciriuqiai oreug : natreb naçec ibecer aetsuki ate , caocalaçeb cátacze isauq cirateiugeb nerah necetic rore natreb atE
. taçnida ehteb zaudnias utiripS ate , taçnaçed ibecer aetsuki ) anayaç utreuga naedib necnia netrohte irih suseI atiab niec ( cuain irrogi canuaI , éyana luaS , naçec narre , cirirraçe naeniag nerah caucse ate : natrah ehcte nidec ras ate sainanA adab nidec naoI
. utirffus citaganeci ene neud raheb tabmec tacoraid neristucare cin necE
. areniztia nérruoah ocelearsI ate , néuger ate , nelitneG aneci ene táçnaçed rake aruh cud taboczenoitcele icnv ene nece : libaH , canuaI noçeic narre atE
. oceztacetse néicug netud neztacouni aneci erih , ciratelapicnirp erodacifircaS etatirohtua cidab nemeh eratE
. nemelasureI yeudnias erih neuard niuge ztiag tabmec , zenuh noçiug cirateztihna taid nuçne , anuaI , cesainanA naçec stedrahi atE
) taçnaçel ibecer aetsuki , aleuç netraçe aucse naeniag nerah ate alec neztras tab-noçiug nec neztied sainanA zenoisiv naçec suki atE (
. cogaid nateztiohto , árah nece : tabonaisrahT ned neztied luaS naehcte neraduI caçe ahlib ate , aracirrak ned neztied anecuÇ aho ciriuqiaI , noçeic narre irah canuaI naudrO
. anuaI , in ánuH , crah oid atE . sainanA , zenoisiv canuaI irah noçeic narre ate , tabulupicsid nec neztied sainanA necsamaD nec atE
. nade ze nai naçezte ate : aleuzte netsuki nuge rurih nideztiab noge noN
. arecsamaD netaçec namare , aletuç neztadiug citucse ate : netsuki neuzte rohen ciriuqeri caiugeb ereb ate , citerrul luaS nidec iuqiai atE
. aletuzte netsuki rohen aniab , netuçne yab azov nerah , cirutici necetic idleug , canoçiug nedaric netiaoi niuqerah atE
. náud raheb niuge rec ciaç nenarre ate , nairih ida ras ate ida iuqiaI , irah canuaI naudrO ? nadiugad cud ihan rec , anuaI , naçec narre cirutici ate cirutaraki crah atE
. aetiuge ocitso artnoc néoluka ocaterih cud rogog : anaud neztatucesrep cih suseI cuan iN , naçec narre canuaI atE ? anuaI zia roN , naçec narre atE
? cuan neztatucesrep in citagrec luaS , luaS , alastoic tabzov naçec nuçne cirirore arerrul atE
. citurec aroçna netab tsimtsihc nidec iugra näurugni nerah iuqotibus ate : arecsamaD nideztiab libruh nidec ahtreug , alec netiaoi atE
. aremelasureI taçnaztil namare cirutacetse caetzame ate canoçiug , cirocatenuh atces ulab netiedire rohen nidlab : ocetiaoi arateugoganys arecsamaD nóiuqec acse artel atE
. anagaonaribus erodacifircaS nidec rohte , artnoc néulupicsid neranuaI zaceztlih ate zuhctahem oniaro cirutabmalfne luaS atE
. onetiel leh araeraseC nateicug irih aoilegnauE naçec aciderp naetiagari ate : ne-tozA nidec nedire eppilihP aniaB
. cirareugela nec netiaoi zaedib ereb ate : caohcunuE aruh suki naçezte cirogaiheug ate , eppilihP naçec aparrah cautiripS neranuaI , citerv naenedaric nagi atE
. aruh naçec ayehtab ate : aohcunuE ate eppilihP , arerv caib necetic stuai ate : nidel nidleug atoirrac naçec anam atE
. tsirhC suseI aled aemeS neraocniaI taid netsehniS , naçec narre crah aleuç netsedrahi atE . etia laha , zaicug ztohib erue cudab netsehnis nidlaB , ceppilihP naçec narre atE
? citetaçi utayehtab uan neztahctapme crec : arv anuH , caohcunuE oid naudro : aratetab rv necetic rohte , aledaric netiaoi naedib atE
. suseI noçeic aitnuned ciratenuh arutpircS cirissah ate aoha ereb ceppilihP ciriuqeri naudrO
? zecreb tiebmec ala , zäurub ereb ? ruah ud netiarre cátehporP zaçron , tauard netiuge ztiohtO , naçec narre , ireppilihP caohcunuE alacuarec netsedrahi atE
. aiciv nerah citerrul ad neztahctla nece ? ud nerutatnoc cron aetuari nerah aniab : ad naçi utarog audnemegui nerah naeztareheb neraH
aoha ereb nakv iuqeri utze alah , atiab utum naeniztia neraneud neztom tab-stodlib alon ate : ad naçi namare areztoireh alaçeb tabidrA , nec ruah , aneuç neztrucari egassap ocarutpircS atE
. niuqerah nidel rai cinagi ireppilihP noçeic niuge ztiohto atE ? açenapze adiug cetiebron nidlab , euqaçen laha alon atE , oid crah atE
? anaud neztrucari cud neztida aniaB , nóçeic narre ate : átehporp saiasE aleuç neztrucari , aruh naçec nuçne ciniuge retsal ceppilihP atE
. irroh toirrac oiuqa sreh ate , ida libruH , ireppilihP cautiripS nóçeic narre naudrO
. átehporp saiasE neuç neztrucari ate , naeniag toirrac ereb aleogec cirirrai nec neztluzti atE
: aremelasureI areztaroda nec naçi irrohte ate : oceniag neraicug nussahno nerah néztiab niec , cineuç aicug udnemanam naipza nerecadnaC aniuger néonaipoihtE , tabohcunuE onaipoihtE noçiug , ánuh ate , nidec naoi ciriuqiai atE
: tresed cud aruh : aredib ned netsuai arazaG citemelasureI , táredla idre-ugE libah ate , ida iuqiaI , aleoic , ireppilihP nóiuqec açnim äureugniA neranuaI oreuG
. netaçec aciderp aoilegnauE natugrub néonatiramaS ztihna ate , aremelasureI necetic luzti , aztih neranuaI cirutaitnuned ate cirutacifitset adab ceH
, táçnadiuqatze ahtreug ertab ciratecuag neuçutid narre , iranuaI citagene ceuç euçoiuge ztiohtO , naçec narre cenomiS aleuç netsedrahi naudrO
. tássucaidab alecia naulliacetse oczetatiuqini ate , naenimrak oczicug nuçaheb necE
. audnemasnep oceztohib erue zenaidiuqel akrab naiuga , aye , cóiuge ztiohto iraocniaI ate , ciraterroh aitilam erue adab idadnemE
. naeniztia neraocniaI nehcuhc cutze aztohib erih nece : natenuh ocetiuge ciregatereh ze ciretrap cih cutzE
. aled neztatseuqnoc naturid aniahod neraocniaI cutiab utamitse nerec , alidad lag niuqerih äurid eriH , nóçeic narre cesirreiP aniaB
. audnias utiripS naçed ibecer , taztuartiab nerutassuap naeniag caucse ere-iron , iroh erehtob ere-irin euçadnI , aleuç netiarrE
. néceic atneserp urid , audnias utiripS alec netiame zeztassuap neucse neulotsopA nece cenomiS cirissuki naudrO
. audnias utiripS netaçec ibecer ate , naeniag néyah caucse netaztic assuap oreuG
) naeneci neranuaI suseI nedaric cautayehtab tnemalos aniab , naçi istuai nézte ere-aratetab cirateh oniaro necE (
. audnias utiripS táçnetaçel ibecer , citagceh netaçec niuge ztiohto naenedaric naçi istuai arah cuaH
. sennaoI ate sirreiP arateh netaztic rogi , aztih neraocniaI neuç utibecer cairamaS alon , céulotsopA nedaric nemelasureI naenetuç nuçne atE
. nec neztatnaps , naeneutic netsuki caetuhtrev ate caongis nedaric netiuge ate : neztiugih nézte citedla nereppilihP citzoreug zutayehtab ate , naçec stehnis ere-careb cenomiS atE
. caetzame yab canoçiug yab nedaric neztayehtab , cáçuag nacziaç neztinetreppa iraneci netsirhC suseI ate iramuser neraocniaI neutiztiab neztaitnuned ceniec , naenetuç istehnis eppilihP aniaB
. neutiztiab icuare ciratudnemida zudnematnacne zecul arobmed nerec nacziaç aheb irah atE
. aruh idnah etuhtrev neraocniaI ad ruaH , aletioic , caicug oconareneidnah citeneipihc nóiuqziaztiab neztaheb inieC
. alec idnah eganosrep tiebmec zäurub ereb aleoic , cineuç utatnacne aulupop ocairamaS ate , cineuç neztasv zudnematnacne nairih cinadnehel , nec tabmoçiug nec neztied nomiS atE
. natrah irih nidec niuge idnah açnargela atE
. nidec adnes ugniam ate ocitylarap ztihna ate : aleduec zuhio iugneco , nedaric netikli cirateztihna ciratenedaric netiuqude zaçeh , cáustas utirips necE
. caongis neutic netiuge aletzutic netsuki ate netuçne , iraneuç netiarre ceppilihP noyaç neztaheb zetab ogog aulupop atE
. tsirhC néceic aciderp , aratetab irih ocairamaS ciristuai ceppilihP atE
. aletuç neztaicnuned aztih neraocniaI , anuh arah naztlibaçab canedaric naçi utayerrab adaB
. neutic netraçe naiugednioserp caetzame ate canoçiug zahctrob zutarit ate : alec neztras ehcte zehcte , áçilE neuç netiugesed celuaS atE
. naeniag nerah netaçec niuge idnah ragin ate , cuztab noçiug netuç arrudleb neraocniaI aretzroho nebetsE netaçec namare atE
. caulotsopA ublas , tárateuqramoc ocairamaS ate ocaeduI necetic ayerrab caicug ate : artnoc neraçilE nec nemelasureI idnah enoitucesrep natrah arobmed nidec niuge atE . naeztlih nerah nec tnesnoc luaS atE



. nidec rakol naeneuç narre ruah atE , ruah utakeb atupmi alaeceitze , anuaI iugneco naçec niuge uhio cirirrai ociruahleb atE
. autirips ene caçe ibecer , ánuaI suseI , aleuç netiarre ate neztacouni , nebetsE nétuç neztadipal atE
. aratenio netab etzag noçiug nec neztied luaS caudnemalliba ereb netaztic raçe ceoinomitset ate : netuç neztadipal ciriztiari aropmac citirih atE
. artnoc nerah necetic radlo zetab ogog ate , netaztic açob cairraheb ereb cirirrai zidnah uhio ceh naudrO
. aleogad naeniucse neraocniaI aemeS neranoçiug ate . caiuqeri cäurec tutid netsuki , ánuH , oid atE
. aleogec naeniucse neraocniaI suseI ate , airolg neraocniaI naçec suki cirutahctla caiugeb tárurec , aehteb zaudnias utiripS néztiab alon aniaB
. artnoc nerah neduec zestocsarrag ztroh ate nateztohib ereb netuç netiuge rehel , naetuçne néuah açuag atE
. utariugeb euçutiapze ate , zoiretsinim néureugniA aeugeL euçutiab utibecer cénieC
. eteraztiab naçi ceuç niaro eliahre ate elaçidart neniec , canetud narre citeniztia audnemineuda neraotsuI etzutidab ere-lih ? cétia neuç utatucesrep etutze niec ciratetehporP
. ere-ceuç , alaçeb cátia neuç , etoiuqziaç neztatsartnoc iraudnias utiripS ihteb ceuç , cáebag utidicnocric irraheb ate ztohib ate , cárrogog odnohrag edneG
? caicug cairoh açuag niuge caucse ene utitze alA
? aukel oceztasuaper ene ad niec ode : canuaI oid ? irin euçatuard nerutacifide ehcte reC . állebacs nénio ene arrul ate , aonorht ene ad äureC
, utiab netiarre cátehporP alon neztatibah natelpmet niuge zucse atze aonaribuS aniaB
. tabehcte nóçeic acifide cenomolaS atE
. ocadneraocniaI ne-bocaI tabelcanrebat naçel nedire nidec acse ate , naeniztia neraocniaI aitarg naçeztiab nedire cenieC
. onaratenuge ne-diuaD citeniztia nétiA erug caocniaI utitiab nakv iztiari niec , arenoissessop nélitneG niuqereusoI netaçec namare cirutibecer cétiA erug ere-aruh elcanrebaT
. aroçna neramrof neuç issuki naçel niuge aruh , canacuarec narre isesyoM neuztiab utanedro alon , nautresed ad naçi niuqetia erug aelcanrebat ocegainomitseT
. aratrah edla zenolybaB tetzutiaç nenoiri citagenuh : euçutid niuge oceztaroda ceh arugif ate , arraçi nemahpmeR ocniaI neuç ate , aelcanrebat ne-hcoloM euçud nakv utrah citiztiA
? nautresed zehtrv yeugorreb caoicifircas ate caenoitalbo irin euçadiuqzuard utadnerffo ala , áehcte ocelearsI , alaçeb ned autabircs näurubil nétehporP : areztaztibrec nerairemradneg ocurec naztic annodnaba ate , aocniaI néiuqec luzti zalebiug naudrO
. nateniuge arbo oczeucse ereb nedaric neztatceled ate : iralodi oicifircas netoçeic adnerffo ate , nateh nuge netaçec niuge tabeztera atE .
. nóyaç naçi udleh rec ugaiuqaezte , utiauqiab namare aropmac citerrul ocetpygE ceniec , isesyoM nece : caocniaI neuqzahod naeniztia erug cugaztei niugE , inoraA aletastoiC
: táretpygE zeztohib ereb edarid naçi iluzti ate , étud nakv utasufer aniab , cátiA erug naçi ihan utaheb acziaztiapze inieC
. ocetiame irug caiciv ztih utitiab utibecer ceniec , anaçi niuqetiA erug ate , naidnem ocaniS nóyaztiab neztaçnim niec , niuqeräureugniA , anec naçi nautresed naenoitagergnoc ad ruaH
. etoiuqziuqaç aheb irah : cirocalaçeb in cirateyana neuç canuaI ocniaI neuç euçuard nerutaticsus tabatehporP , yerruoah ocelearsI aneuarec narre ad ruah sesyoM
. zehtrv yeugorreb , nautresed ate , nairrog ossasti ate , netpygE zeniuge caongis ate caulucarim , ceh naztic iuqodi aropmac cenuH
. zucse neranoyaç naçi utreuga naorreb ureugniA , naçeç rogi elaçarebil ate ecnirp caocniaI adab ruah ? egui ate ecnirp ua utanedro ih croN , aletioic , ruah nétuç utagenra sesyoM
. aretpygE tua nerirrogi , rohta adab niaro , aretiuqodi néyah cuan naçi istuai ate , taid nuçne aoiripsus néyah ate , aenoitcilffa neraned netpygE ulupop eruen taid issuki , taid issukI
. cud audnias rul aukel necia ih nece : cátapaç ocatenio erue ciuqznuarE , canuaI noçeic narre naudrO
. neztarutnev areztaredisnoc nézte alalibaç araki sesyoM atE . aocniaI ne-bocaI ate , aocniaI ne-caasI ate , . aocniaI nemaharbA , aocniaI nétia erih cuan iN , aleoiC
, azov neranuaI anagnerah nidec niuge alec neztlibruh areztaredisnoc ate : zaenoisiv nidec rai zarim cirissuki iroh sesyoM atE
. naerrag-us ocatetab orreb , äureugniA neranuaI nautresed ocidnem ocaniS nóiuqec reuga naeneutic utilpmoc ehtrv yeugorreb atE
. emes ib naztiztiab ardnegne non , naerrul ognaidaM nidec niuge ztorra ate , citagenuh ztih cesesyoM naçec niuge sehi naudrO
? alaçeb neua lih aonaitpygE ozta , lih cuan ihan cih in alA
? egui ate ecnirp oceniag erug ua utanedro croN , aleoic , aruh naçec aklub canacuarec netiuge iuqziag iraocruh aniaB
? euçacuard netiuge iuqziag iraecreb catab citagrec : ceuç eteraç eyana , cánoçiuG , aleoic , nezteuqab néyah nidec ayesne ate , naetra néyah nidec nedire , aledaric neztacudug ceh naenumarahib atE
. ida netaçezte ceh aniab : aleuarec raheb name açnaruiled zucse nerah caocniaI nece céyana nerah aletuç neztida neuç etsv atE
. ciroi aonaitpygE , aneuç neztrah ebagedib acednem ate naçec adnefed , tabmeuç neztrah airuini cirissuki atE
: nidel naoi areztatisiv , némes ocelearsI néyana ereb areztohib nóiuqec nagi , árobmed nerehtrv yeugorreb naenoyaç ehteb aniaB
. nateniuge ate natenarre usterehtob nec ate , naicug aitneipas neocetpygE sesyoM nec naçi utiurtsni atE
. natemes ocatereb naçec zah ate , cábala neroarahP naçec nam-are , naenec naçi utannodnaba aruh oreuG
. naehcte neratia ereb néztiab naçi icah zehtebelih rurih niec : ocaragog neraocniaI nec ate , sesyoM nidec ros natrah arobmeD
. táçnidel atlaf áçarra , onareticare annodnaba aratoireh nérruoah ereb , cátia erug naztic atcart iuqziag , aleuç neztasv zaicenif artnoc neraenoitan erug eraH
. onidec ahctla cineuzte utugaçe hpesoI tabeuger ecreB
: netpygE acilpitlum ate aulupop nidec atnemgua , alec neztlibruh arobmed nerassemorp nacuarec utarui imaharbA caocniaI aniaB
. ciratemes neraemes ocemehciS romE natoicerp nerurid cemaharbA neuztiab issore niec , naerhclupes nedaric naçi irraçe ate , aremehciS nedaric naçi namare atE
. cátiA erug ate , aruh nidec lih ate , aretpygE bocaI adab nidec stuaI
. anosrep zrobamah ate yeugorurih nedariztiab , aicug aocaha ereb ate , bocaI atia ereb naçec rakere cehpesoI cirirrogi cairatadnam naudrO
. auniel nehpesoI iroarahP noiuqec aralced ate , zéyana ereb hpesoI nidec tugaçe naidla nerragib atE
. cinehel cátiA erug naztic rogi , netpygE iugo alecab ce-bocaI naenaçec nuçne aniaB
. cétiA erug cirocetai netiedire nétuzte ate : aidnah arutsreh ate , are-naanahC ate , aricug irreh ocetpygE tabetessog nidec rohte atE
. erodanrebog ocicug ehcte ereb ate ocetpygE aruh naçeztiab anedro ceniec , naeniztia neroarahP euger ocetpygE aitneipas ate aitarg nóçeic name ate , cirateicug enoitalubirt ereb aruh naçec iuqodi atE
: niuqerah nec aocniaI aniab : taçnidel namare táretpygE hpesoI netaçec las , cirutiuom zaidiuni céhcrairtaP atE
. cáhcrairtaP ibamah ce-bocaI ate , bocaI naçec ardnegne ce-caasI ate : naenuge ocenerragiztroç aruh naçec idicnocric ate , caasI naçec ardnegne cemaharbA alenuh ate : áçnailla oczenoisicnocriC nóçeic name atE
. natenuh ukel éin nerutaztibrec ate , cutid nerikli oreug ate : caocniaI oid , cin taid nerutinup aedneg netieuqud utaztibrec ceh aniaB
. zehtrv nuhe rual nerutatcart iuqziag ate , éid neniuge ocatenoitceius aruh nah ate : naerrul nerecreb aicah erih cud nerutatibaH , caocniaI naçec narre alenuh aniaB
. ere-neuçapze cirruoah , naodno nerah iraicah nerah ate , ere-nacuarecab utattemorp alacuarec nename aruh natenoissessop : ere-aehteb neranio era ze , natrah name ciregatereh nóçeizte atE
. aratenuh rul neteraç neztatibah ceuç aruh naçec namare caocniaI naenec lih atia nerah , cidnah atE . nenarrahC nidec atibah citirreh néoedlahC cirikli naudrO
. arerrul nadäuard neristucare cin rohta ate , ciratediaha erue ate , citirreh erue ida iklI , nóçeic narre atE
: nehel oniab nidec atibah nenarrahC , naenec naimatoposeM imaharbA atia erug nóiuqec reuga aocniaI oczairolG , euçuçne , cátia ate cáeyana noçiuG , naçec narre crah atE
? edarid ehto alerroh cairoh açuaG , caonaribus erodacifircaS naçec narre naudrO
. ocalaçeb aetrahtiugeb netab ureugniA isauq aetrahtiugeb nerah netaçec suki céicug neduec cirirrai naulliesnoc , ciriztoge tanagnerah caiugeb atE
. cáçnanedro nugiuqzuard name cesesyoM aleutid nerutahtum ate , ruah ukel aleud neniugesed cerroh onerazaN suseI nece , netiarre ruah ugud nakv nuçne necE
. artnoc neraeugeL ate , nenuh udnias ukel citetiarre ztih ocatoimehpsalb neztlihci atze ruah noçiuG , cinetuç netiarre causlaf oinomitset netaztic atneserp atE
. arulliesnoc netaçec namare ate , aruh netaçec aparrah cirutradlo ate : cábircS ate caonaicnA ate aulupop netaztic iuom atE
. artnoc neraocniaI ate nesesyoM cirocatoimehpsalb ztih netiarre iroh ugud nuçnE , cinetuç netiarre uztab noçiug netaztic anrobus naudrO
. irautiripS neuç neticare açnim aruh ate iraitneipas netoeuqaçec itsiser nice atE
. niuqenebetsE aledaric neztatupsid , citagoganys ned neztied nénedarid ocaisA ate ocaiciliC ate , néonairdnaxelA ate néonaeneryC ate , nénitrebiL , uztab necetic ahctla atE
. naulupop ciridnah ongis ate ulucarim neuç netiuge , zerehtob ate zedef cirehteb cenebetsE atE
. neuç neztidebo aedef caidnah leport ere-ciraterodacifircaS : nemelasureI autnoc néulupicsid nec neztacilpitlum ztiugah ate , nec neztaraniztia aztih neraocniaI atE
. nézteic assuap naeniag caucse ciniuge eztiohto ceh ate , areniztia néulotsopA netaztic atneserp cuaH
: aonaehcoitnA otylesorp salociN ate , sanemraP ate , nomiT ate , ronaciN ate , orohcorP ate , eppilihP ate , aehteb zaudnias utiripS ate zedef noçiug , nebetsE netaztic igele ate : nec naçi ocaragog neraicug ainiapmoc ruah soporp atE
. óiuqziaing neriuqierrai iraenoitartsinimda neraztih ate iraenoitaro naetabmeceb ned zaçug atE
. ugèuartiab nename ruah ugrac ate , caehteb zaitneipas ate zaudnias utiripS , cirocateno egainomitset noçiug ipzaç cirateuç , cáeyana , zareb euçaztiatuaH
. nugaztid aztibrec caniaham ciriztv aztih neraocniaI cug nioçar atzE , netaçec narre , ciruhtied áiniapmoc oczulupicsid céibamah ztocalaH
. canugrahla etzame néyah naoiranidro uztibrec nedariztiab neztaicerpsonem nerec artnoc néociarbeH tabeztarumrum néocerG nidec niuge , nedariztiab neztacilpitlum caulupicsid alon nateh nuge atE
. citeztaciderp netsirhC suseI ate citetsacari neztidleug nedarizte naehcte ate naelpmet zaicug nuge atE
. neyaztiab naçi niuge aruh eroho oceztirffus airuini naeneci nesuseI nerec , citeniztia neraulliesnoc cirareugela necetic naoi adab ceH
. aretiaoi netaztic iztv ate , naeneci nesuseI açnim necetilze netaztic anam naodno utatoça , caulotsopA ciruhtied naudrO
. nedaric naçi ocenoinipo nerah atE . nedire tnairartnoc anagaocniaI netzetiazte euçuariugeb , niugesed euçeuqaçetze , adab cinagaocniaI nidlab aniaB
: ad neniugesed , iroh arbo ode ulliesnoc adab ciratenoçiug nidlab nece : euçaztiztv ate , yeiroh noçiug zetziuqaç itrap , teustoid niaro atE
. necetic niugesed caicug nacziaç naçi utaheb irah ate , ere-aruh nidec lag : naodno ereb idnah ulupop naçec zuare ate , naterobmed ocenoitpircsed aonaelilaG saduI nidec ahctla naodno neraH
. utahlib suedze ate edarid naçi istuah caicug nacziaç naçi , utaheb irah ate , netaçeztiab lih niec : onaratenuhe rual , tabedlara noçiug nóiuqeztiab dnugal iniec , alec tiabrec zäurub ereit aleoic , saduehT nidec ahctla nehel oniab cuah arobmed necE
. neuçud neniuge rec zaçuah noçiug , aratoruec euçuaogog , cánoçiug ratlearsI , néceic narre oreuG
: caulotsopA necetil ariter tabruppa tarerokel naçec anam , neuztiab neztaroho caicug ulupop niec , cetab rotcod oceugeL nec neztied leilamaG uesirahP naulliesnoc ciriuqiai naudrO
. areztlih néyah netuç neztatlusnoc ate , neduec ocetiuge rehel zetipsed cinuçne ruah ceh atE
. yenetud neztidebo aruh caocniaI euartiab name niec , caudnias utiripS ate yab : zaçuah açuag nugutid netiarre egainomitset ugacuard netrake cug atE
. audnemakrab néutakeb ate ilearsI audnemadneme taçnoçeil name , zaniucse ereb ud nakv utarog erodaulas ate ecnirp caocniaI ruaH
. euçutiab nakv lih cirutakrv naeruç ceuç niec , suseI ud nakv utaticsuser caocniaI nétiA eruG
. canoçiug ze nece aocniaI ad raheb utidebo neheL , netaçec narre céulotsopA ecreb ate cesirreiP aleuç netsedrahi naudrO
. alodo nerroh noçiug irrakere areniag erug euçud ihan ate , zánirtcod neuç emelasureI euçud ehteb , ánuh ate ? naterroh neci stacari netaçenizte utadnefed zesserpxe udnemanam ugeuçuartzE , aleoiC
, caonaribus erodacifircaS naztic agorretni ate : naulliesnoc netaztic atneserp ceh cirirrake atE
) necetilze adipal nedaric rudleb neraulup-op nece ( : ebag ahctrob naztic rake niuqereiciffo cinaoi caniatipaC ocelpmet naudrO
. aulupop etud netsacari ate , edarid naelpmet canoçig netzutnic irraçe naiugednioserp , áraH , néceic narre cetiebmec cirirrohte aniaB
. nec nenaçi rec zaçeh neduec nádud , calapicnirp erodacifircaS ate , aniatipaC ocelpmet ate aonaribus erodacifircaS , ate nuçne cuah ztiH
. nedire naenrab ugutze rohen , naenugud iuqeri aniab : aleduec naeniztia néhtrob citopmac cádraog ate , niuqericug aitnegilid aistre ugud nedire táçniheb aiugednioserP , aletioiC
, netaçec atnoc ciriluzti ate , naiugednioserp nedire netaztizte céreiciffo cirirrohte aniaB
. táçnecetil rakere ariugednioserp netaçec rogi ate : caicug onaicnA nérruoah ocelearsI ate aulliesnoc netaçec lib cénedaric niuqerah ate , caonaribus erodacifircaS cirirrohte atE . nedaric ira netsacari ate , naelpmet naestahtra necetic raf cinuçne ruah ceh atE
. caicug ztih ocatenuh ezticiv iraulupop euçoztei arialced aleteduaç naelpmet ate , etzaoÇ
, naçec narre , ciriuqodi aropmac ceh ate : cáhtrob ociugednioserp naztic iuqeri zauag cäureugniA neranuaI aniaB
. naocilbup iugednioserp netaztic raçe ate , areniag néulotsopA caucse netaztic ztoge atE
. necetic ehteb zaidiuni ) átces neuec-uddaS atiab niec ( caicug nedaric niuqerah ate , aonaribus erodacifircaS ciriuqiai naudrO
. nedaric neztadnes caicug ate : cautatnemrot zeustas utirips ate caire aletzutic netrake , aremelasureI ere-anummoc ocatelibruh irih nec neztlib atE
. táçnidel nagari citeniag netiebmec cirateh erereb alazti nerah naenidel rohte sirreiP , nateretcil ate netraçe nateho ate , caire . nétzutiztiab netrake arateuqirrak non tabmaH
) zetzame alon zenoçiug tabmah , áiniapmoc nenetuç netsehnis naenuaI nec oganeztadneme atE
. caulupop ceh neutic neztacifingam aniab : areztacetsahan niuqeh neztarutnev nézte ertab ciratecreb atE
. náirelag nenomolaS ocatetab ogog caicug nedaric ate ( : naulupop ulucarim ate ongis ztihna nec netiuge zucse néulotsopA atE
. naeniag néicug netzutic netuçne cuah açuag ate , naeniag neraicug açilE nidec niuge aidnah nussatrudleb atE
. naedla nerarrahnes ereb netaçec ztroho cinamare taropmac ate , alih aruh netaçec nedire cétzag nugal ciruhtras atE . autirips naçec adner ate aratenio nerah nidec rore natreb atE
. ih etua nenamare ate , náhtrob canio nénetud eztroho arrahnes erih , árroh ? areztatnet nerautirips neranuaI naetra neuç eteraztiab naçi utatcnui ad reC , astoid cesirreiP naudrO
. natetabmah , yaB , naçec narre crah atE ? euçud udlas ádnal natetabmah nadaçei narrE , cesirreiP nóçeic narre atE
: nideztiab ras , ciralaiuqazte nec niuge rec , ere-aetzame nerah , näurub nenero rurih isauq nidec ahtreug atE
. netaçec ztroho cinamare taropmac ate , aruh netaçec rah cuztab etzag nugal ciriuqiai atE
. naeniag néicug netzutic netuçne cuah açuag nidec rai aidnah nussatrudleb ate : autirips naçec adner ate , nidec rore , cinuçne cuah ztih sainanA atE
. iraocniaI aniab , narre ruçeug yenoçiug ceuartze ? neua raheb irraçe naogog iroh açuag citagrec nec rec ? anezte naerehtob erih cirudlas ate ? neztidleug erih anezte uahab utariugeb nidlaB
? areztatrappa citoicerp neradnal ate , aretiarre ruçeug iraudnias utiripS aztohib erih cenataS ud ehteb citagrec , sainanA , cesirreiP naçec narre atE
. naçec raçe aratenio néulotsopA , cirirrake etrap tiebmec ate : ciralaiuqaç ere-caetzame nerah , tabetrap citoicerp naçec atrappa atE
: tabenoissessop naçec las niuqeraetzame ereb arihppaS , cetab noçiug nec neztied sainanA aniaB

. aratenio néulotsopA naçec raçe äurid cirirrake ate , aruh naçec las neuztiab alon tabenoissessoP
, caonairpyC zenoitan , cátiueL ) aemes oczenoitalosnoc atiab ihan narre ( sabanraB zéulotsopA nideztiab ied zocitiog neci niec , adab cesesoI
. aruara neraneuç arraheb , iraredebtab nóyaç neztitrap ate : aratenio néulotsopA netraçe atE
nétuztiab netrake aoicerp nécuag nedaric naçi udlas ate , nétzutiztiab neztlas céicug netuç cirehcte ode ciradnal nerec : naetra néyah neuzte cirraheb nesued crohen necE
. naeniag néicug neyab nec aidnah aitarg ate , zaenoitcerruser neranuaI suseI nétuç neztacifitset natidnah etuhtrev ere-ceulotsopA
. nummoc nétzutic caicug açuag aniab , aleuç cirereb sued netiarre neuzte ciratecuag neutic neztidessop crohen ate : tab nec ámira ate aztohib nénetuç nakv istehnis edlara atE
. niuqeraçeidrah zaztih neraocniaI nedaric neztaçnim ate , zaudnias utiripS caicug necetic ehteb ate : nedariztiab caudlib nateniec aukel nidec araki , naenetuç niuge ztiohto atE
. naeneci neraudniaS emeS erih suseI necetid niuge caulucarim ate caongis , aretiame nussasso cirutadeh aucse eruE
: necetid açnim zaztih erih niuqericug etatrebil yeiraztibrec erue cécei name ate , arateuhctahem néyah caçe aheb , anuaI adab niarO
. neuztiab utanimreted aretiuge citenehel caulliesnoc erih ate caucse erih ere-rec táçnetaçel niugE
. niuqeraulupop ocelearsI ate niuqelitneG etaliP ecnoP ate sedoreH , cutiab utatcnv niec , artnoc nesuseI udnias emes erih zaiuge cutid naçi udlib necE
. artnoc netsirhC nerah ate neranuaI edarid naçi uhtab niuqerrakle caecnirp ate , caeuger ocerrul edarid naçi udliB
? caonav açuag étzutid nakv utasnep céulupop ate , caedneg edarid naçi utanitum citagreC , anaud narre zoha nerairaztibrec erue diuaD
, aocniaI náutid niuge caicug açuag nedarid nateh ate aossasti , arrul ate äurec zia ih , anuaI , netaçec narre ate , anagaocniaI azov netaçec ahctla zetab ogog naenetzutic nuçne ceh atE
. nécèuareztiab narre céonaicnA ate célapicnirp erodacifircaS ere-rec néceic atnoc ate , aratedneg ereb necetic rohte naenetzutic iztv aretiaoi atE
. néztiab naçi niuge ruah ongis oceztadnes naeniag neniec , canoçiug neutic ogaiheug oniab ehtrv yeugorreb necE
. zanec naçi niuge nétuztiab neztacifirolg aocniaI céicug nerec , zasuac neraulupop , netzieuqaztil laha inup natalon zenedire ze , aretiaoi netaztic iztv niuqeruhctahem ceh naudrO
. nugaztitze narre cáçuag nugutid issuki ate nuçne ugeuqidiad nice , ruges necE
. euçaçe aegui , iraocniaI ze nece aeztidebo yeuç nehel zened aotsui açuag naeniztia neraocniaI ayE , néceic narre aletuç netsedrahi cesennaoI ate cesirreiP aniaB
. naeneci nesuseI stacari netaçelze ate , açnim necetilze ere-natelohen netaztic anam ciruhtied ceh adaB
. ere-irohen naterroh neci açnim cirogaiheug nóiuqziuqatze , zuhctahem nugeceid adnefed , naetra neraulupop nidatze acilbup cirogaiheug aniaB
. ugeuqaçed akv nice ate , yeicug tnatibah ocemelasureI ad tsefinam , aled naçi niuge zaçuah taboralc ongis nece ? yeoh noçiug ugèuard neniuge reC , aletioiC
, naetra nerrakle nétuç neztitrapmoc : cirutanam aretikli aropmac citulliesnoc ceh naudrO
. neeuqatic laha atsartnoc natesued nice , alec tneserp niuqeh anoçiug nec naçi utadnes naenetassucaç atE
. aledaric canaçi niuqesuseI ceh nétuç neztugaçe ate , nétuç netserim , aledaric catoidi ate caebag-artel noçiug nece cirutugaçe ate , anesennaoI ate áçeidrah oceztaçnim nesirreiP cirissuki naudrO
. nérag raheb utaulas zeniec , cineyaç name yenoçiug naipza neräurec atze cineci ecreb nece : cirudnemaulas ere-natetab natecreb atze atE
. urub niotnac atiab naçi niuge niec , aruh ned naçi utayubra zoelaçacifide zaçeuç irrah ad ruaH
. naeniztia neuç cirodnes aleogad ruah noçiug zaçrah , ciratelih utiab utaticsuser caocniaI niec , euçutiab utacificurc ceuç niec naeneci neronerazaN tsirhC suseI nece , caicug ulupop ocelearsI ate coicug ceuç euçiuqaI
: ned naçi utadnes ruah zeneiom rec , zoreug zanerag neztanimaxe zaiugnv nóyaç naçi niuge itab tnetopmi noçiug naenuge ognugE
, cáonaicnA ocelearsI ate cáerodanreboG neraulupoP , neceic narre , cirehteh zaudnias utiripS cesirreiP naudrO
? ceuç euçud niuge ruah açuag naeneci neron ode zerehtob reC , netaztic agorretni , naenetzutic irraçe naetra atE
. caicug nedaric citaçarra nérodacifircaS ate , rednaxelA ate , sennaoI ate sahpiaC ate , aonaribus erodacifircaS sannA atE
: aremelasureI cábircS ate caonaicnA ate caerodanreboG néyah necetiztiab lib naenumarahib nidec ahtreug atE
. onaratallim zrob nidec niuge autnoc nénoçiug ate : netaçec stehnis ceztihna ciratenetuç nuçne aztih atE
. nec astarra ai necE . onarenumarahib naiugednioserp netaztic raçe ate , areniag néyah netaztic ztoge caucse atE
. aenoitcerruser ociratelih naeneci nesuseI nétuztiab neztaciderp ate , aulupop nétuztiab netsacari nerec cirutiztiaG
, cauecuddaS ate , aniatipaC ocelpmet ate caerodacifircaS nétziuqec rohte , alacziaç oçnim iraulupop ceh aniaB
. zutitreunoc cirateireuqathciag neuç aredebtab cirateuç , taçnetaçnic acideneb crah , euçuard nakv irrogi aemeS ereb suseI cirutaticsus caocniaI cinehel yeuÇ
. caicug ailimaf ocerrul cutid nenaçi cautacideneb naicah erih atE , imaharbA alastoic , emes neraçnaila neuard utanedro yetia erug caocniaI ate , nétehporP eteraç ceuÇ
. cuah nuge etzutidab ere-narre citeniztia céicug netud utazitehporp zoreug ate , céicug atehporP oczoreug zeleumaS eratE
. citetra neraulupop atiab neniugesed , oyaztiapze nerutaheb irah atehporP ere-ron , ad naenaçi atE
. nateicug açuag neuçeuqiaç nerutaçnim aruh euçud nenuçne : cirocalaçeb in cirateyana neuç canuaI ocniaI neuç euçuard nerutaticsus tabatehporP , euard nakv narre yetia cesesyoM necE
. onaraterobmed ocenoitaruatser néicug açuag neutid narre zoha néicug udnias atehporP cinadnaestah neraudnum , caocniaI , utiab raheb iuqude cäurec nieC
: tsirhC suseI , aneuçiaç naçi narre citeniztia yeuç naeneeuqud irrogi ate , citaitneserp neranuaI naenetarid irrohte cárobmed ocatudnemaregirfeR
. cautakeb neuç táçnecetid nek , etzetiaç itreunoc ate , adab etzetiaç adnemE
. utid nakv utilpmoc alah , aleuç nerutirffus cetsirhC , cáçuag neutic narre zoha néicug atehporP ereb citeniztia caocniaI aniaB
. alaçeb ere-cerodanreboG neuç , aleuçud nakv niuge zaitnarongi nece tiuqadab , cáeyana , niaro atE
. náitneserp nóicug neuç acuard name inuh ruah enoitisopsid ocateicug orbmem ereb caedef ned zaçrah ate : caneci nerah ud nakv utacifitrof , ruah neuçud neztugaçe ate netsuki , zaedef ognahtiab aneci nerah atE
. ug arag oinomitset zenuh açuag ate : utiab utaticsuser ciratelih caocniaI niec , euçud nakv lih aecnirp neraezticiv atE
: neuçiuqel name tabeliahreciug euçud utireuqer ate , euçud utakv aotsui ate audnias ceuç aniaB
. ere-neuçab utaegui alec oceztagral crah , naeniztia netaliP aneuçud utakv ate utaruil ceuç , aemeS ereb suseI ud utacifirolg caocniaI netia erug , caocniaI ne-bocaI ate ne-caasI ate nemaharbA
? alaçeb udniugab icare libe ruah zenussatudnias ode zetuhtrev erug , eteduaç cirutzorroç caiugeb anagerug citagrec ode ? zaçenuh eteduaç zulucarim citagrec , cánoçiug ratlearsI , iraulupop nóçeic stedrahi cesirreiP cirissuki iroH
. cirutatnaps , arairelag ned neztied nenomolaS caicug ulupop arateh naçec niuge retsal , alaztudaç sennaoI ate sirreiP canaçi utadnes ugniam atE
. naeniag neraçuag nóyaç naçi udleh irah zudnematnaps ate zenepaici necetic ehteb ate : anec netrai naerredE ahtrob ocelpmet zeuqse anysomele alec aruh nece aruh , netaçec tugaçe atE
. aocniaI aleuç neztadual ate , alalibaç caicug ulupop aruh naçec suki atE
. aocniaI aleuç neztadual ate alec netzuai ate netlibe , naelpmet niuqeh nidec ras ate : nalibaçab ate , cituç nidec idleug ciricuai atE
. calatza ate cáloç nio nerah necetic tnocsre natreb ate , naçec itiog , cirutrah citeniucse ucse aruh atE
. ida libe ate ida iuqiai naeneci neronerazaN tfirhC suseI : tauard netiame aruh tutiab rec aniab : táitze cirehrrv ze cirrahliC , naçec narre cesirreiP naudrO
. zetsv utibecer tiabrec cirateh , iuqzorroç neyaç ariugeb aruh atE
. tanagerug caçeheB , naçec narre niuqesennaoI cesirreiP cirutzorroç caiugeb tanagnerah aniaB
. táçneul tabanysomele neceic niuge ztiohto , alecaoic areztras naelpmet sennaoI ate sirreiP naenaztic suki craH
. yenedaric neztras naelpmet táçneiuqel acse anysomele , naened neztied arredE ahtrob ocelpmet zoro nuge nétuztiab netraçe niec : nec netrake tabmec ugniam cinadnaelebas nerama ereb noçiug atE
. natenero iztardeb néztiab , natudro ztiohto arelpmet nedaric netiagi niuqerrakle sennaoI ate sirreiP adaB
. iraçilE zoro nuge cirocetaçi utaulas edneg nacuarec netiuqehctare canuaI atE . nahtiab aicug ulupop aletuç aitarg ate , aocniaI aletuç neztaduaL
: niuqeretaticilpmis oczeztohib ate niuqeraçnargela áçnarohto ereb netuç neztrah , ehcte zehcte aiugo aletuç netsuah ate , naelpmet zetab ogog nétuç neztareuesrep zoro nuge atE
. aruara neraneuç arraheb caredebtab yeicug netzerec neztitrap ate , netzutic neztlas canussahno ate caenoissessoP
. nétzutic nummoc caicug açuag ate , nedaric niuqerrakle ere-caicug netuç netsehnis atE
. nec netiuge zeulotsopA ongis ate oczulucarim açuag ztihna ate , noiuqec tol nussatrudleb iraicug amira atE
. naténoitaro ate , naetsuah neraiugo ate , naenoitacinummoc ate , nánirtcod néulotsopA netuç neztareuesrep atE
. zäurugni neramira allim rurih natrah nuge necetic atnemgua ate , necetic ayehtab , canetuç utibecer aztih nerah citogog adaB
. ciratenuh othciag enoitan etzetiaç aulaS , aleoic , neutic neztatrohxe ate , neuç neztacifitset zeztih ecreb ztihna atE
. canuaI ocniaI erug utitiab neruhtied ere-tabmec , yeicug nedarid nurrv ate , yerruoah neuç ate assemorp euçiaç niuge yeuç necE
. aniahod neraudnias utiripS euçud nerutibecer ate : natudnemakrab néutakeb naeneci netsirhC suseI aredebtab cirateuç ideb ayehtab ate etzetiaç adnemE , etsoid cesirreiP atE
? cáeyana noçiug ugud neniuge reC , yeulotsopA ecreb ate isirreiP netoçeic narre ate , netaçec rah ocimihc-ztohib cinuçne cuah açuag atE
. toid ruah neuçud utacificurc ceuç suseI : caocniaI aleud niuge tsirhC ate nuaI aruh nece , caicug ehcte ocelearsI adab açeb niuqai rugeS
. allebacs nénio erih cayaste erih onadeuçaztid raçE
, naeniucse ene ida raI , iranuaI ene canuaI acuard narrE , careb oid aniab : aratèurec nagi atze diuaD necE
. ruah neuçuçnad ate neuçassucad niaro ceuç ud nakv istuare , naeneud utibecer cinagatiA assemorp neraudnias utiripS ate naened naçi utahctla zaniucse neraocniaI adaB
. oinomitset arag coicug ug zenuh açuag ate , caocniaI ud nakv utaticsuser ruah suseI
. cirenoitpurroc issuki aleutze caiugarah nerah ate , naerhclupes amira nerah naçi iztv aletze nece , zaenoitcerruser netsirhC ad naçi utaçnim cirissuki citeniztiA
. oceticare rai naeniag onorht nerah , aleuç nerutaticsus tsirhC , zeuara neraiugarah , citutcurf ocecnurreug nerah nece caocniaI alacuarec utarui zudnemarui nece naiuqaztiab ate , néztiab alon atehporP adaB
. onarenuge ognuge aled naetra erug aerhclupes nerah ate , aled naçi eztroho ate aled naçi lih aruh nece , záhcrairtap diuaD teuçeuqaçed laha narre iuqognarf , cáeyana noçiuG
. naeniztia etrahtiugeb erue zoiraczob cuan nerehteb , caedib neraezticiv cadiuqzuard icare tugaçE
. naçed idnes cirenoitpurroc caudniaS erih nerutittemrep cutze ate , naerhclupes ámira ene neriztv cutze necE
. nataçnareps ad nerutassuap aiugarah ene ogaiheug era ate , aihim ene ad utzob ate , aztohib ene ad utareugela ztocalaH
nidanze iugih tuad naedla oceniucse eruen nece : ereihteb naeniztia eruen anuaI neun neztalpmetnoC , zaçrah ud netiarre ce-diuaD necE
. nidel iuqude , zaçrah aruh elbissop néztiapze nerec , cirutahcal caerolod neraoireh , utiab utaticsuser caocniaI nieC
. euçud nakv lih cirutacificurc zucse néothciag , naenetudnic utrah aname zaitnediuorp ate zutatsarra ulliefnoc neraocniaI , ruaH
: alaçeb neuçiuqad ere-coruec , naetra neuç zaçrah caocniaI utitiab niuge niec , zongis ate zulucarim ate zetnellecxe arbo nahtiab ceuç autaborppa zaocniaI noçiug , aonerazaN suseI : cuah ztih euçazti nuçne , cánoçiug ratlearsI
. aniah atiab nerutaulas , aneci neranuaI utiab nerutacouni ere-cron ad nenaçi atE
. nehel oniab nerrohtad aelbaton ate aidnah nuge neranuaI , aratelodo aiugrahli ate , aratebmuhli etad nerutaibmac aiuqzugI
. eropav oczek ate us ate lodo , naereheb naerrul caongis ate , nayarag näurec caoczulucarim açuag tutid neniuge atE
. étud nerutazitehporp ate , citutiripS eruen tud neristuare nateh nuge areniag neotacsen eruen ate nélihtum eruen ruges atE
. étud neniuge stema zestema cérrahaç neuç ate , etzutid nerissuki caenoisiv cétzag neuç ate , cébala neuç ate cémes neuç etud nerutazitehporp ate : areniag nericug iugarah citutiripS eruen tutiab neristuare ) caoc-niaI oid ( natenuge neuqza , ad nenaçi atE
. aned naçi narre zátehporp leoI ad ruah aniaB
aled anero nereh neranuge nece cirissuki , idroh cuah alaçeb neuçud etsv ceuç , edaritze necE
. caztih ene euçazti rah zeirraheb ate , euçiuqai ruah , cáicug neteraç neztatibah nemelasureI ate cáuduI noçiuG , aleoic , néiuqec açnim ate , azov ereb naçec ahctla , niuqeuqemah cesirreiP aleogec cituç aniaB
. cuah edarid caehteb zitze onrastahaM , netioic , aledaric neztaffurt cécreb atE
? ruah ad ihan narre reC , aletastoic irrakle , asnep rec nétiuqazte ate , caicug neduec cautatnaps atE
. zeocifingam açuag neraocniaI aledarid oçnim zegaognel erug cuah ugutid netuçnE
: céonaibarA ate céonaiterC , céotylesorP ate céuduI ate , céneduad namoR ate , nákrua oceneryC atiab , naterretzab aibyL ate , netpygE , nailyhpmaP ate naigyrhP
, naisA ate , netnoP , naicodappaC ate , naeduI ate , cénedarid netioge naimatoposeM ate , cétimalE ate céonaideM ate céonaihtraP
? neztaçnim zairporp egaognel nerag naçi oyai aredebtab ugiuqzuçnad cug adab nataloN
? onaelilaG edaritze , coicug cuah nedarid oçnim , ánuH , aletastoic irrakle nétuç netserim ate , caicug neduec cautatnaps atE
. neztaçnim ceh zirporp egaognel ereb neutiztiab netuçne caredebtab nerec , nidec alburt ate , tabedladneg nidec lib , naenec niuge ruah stoh adaB
. ciratoro enoitan ocipza neraurec , ciratenoçiug netuç arrudleb neraocniaI uduI nedaric netioge nemelasureI nécab atE
. alaçeb neuarec netiame areztaçnim cautiripS , zeztorra egaognel neztaçnim necetic sah ate , zaudnias utiripS caicug necetic ehteb atE
. naeniag neraredebtab cirateh nidec assuap ate , cautitrap ihim ocoçna neraus neiuqziuqec reuga atE
: cirirrai nedueztiab non aicug ehcte naçec ehteb ate , aroçna netab eciah ned udleh iuqusterehtob tabunios citurec iuqotibus nidec niuge atE
. naereb natetab ukel zetab ogog nedaric caicug , anuge etsocedneM naenec irrohte atE





nautnoc neulotsopA acemah nidec raçe zetab udnemitnesnoc ate , areniag nesaihttaM aehtroç nidec rore ate , caehtroç néyah netaztic ztoge atE
. tárukel ereb taçnidel naoi , saduI atiab naçi icuare cirateniec , aenoitrop , ocenussatulotsopA ate ocatenuh oiretsinim táçnaçed raH
, ciratuah ib náud utigele niec castucare , ciuqzugaçetiab caztohib neicug anuaI ciH , netaçec narre aletuç netiuge etziohto atE
. saihttaM ate , atiab naçi uhtied otsuI zocitiog neci niec , anec neztied sabasraB hpesoI , agib adab netaztic atneserP
. niuqerug oinomitset neraenoitcerruser nerah nidad niuge tab , onarenuge ned naçi utibecer itiog cinagerug , citomsitpaB nesennaoI cirissaH
, naicug arobmed ned naçi irrohte ate naoi naetra erug anuaI suseI , ciratuah noçiug nedarid naçi udlib niuqerug zareb ad raheB
. cetab ecreb naçed rah aenoitartsinimda neraH , atE . cinidad atibah nah nétze ate , tresed aenoitatibah nerah ideb niugE , näurubil neumlasP ad autabircs necE
. adnal lodo , atiab ihan narre : amadlecaH , zirporp egaognel néyah aruh adnal atiab naçi uhtied non alah : zéicug tnatibah ocemelasureI ad naçi utugaçe ruah açuag atE
. caicug raslah nerah edarid naçi utarrv ate , ud nakv niuge rehel citidre ciriztoge äurub ereb ate , cituriacola oczetatiuqini tabadnal ud utisiuqca adab craH
. aenoitrop ocatenuh enoitartsinimda neuç nakv utibecer ate , niuqerug nec ocutnoc necE
: iradiug néliamaztah nesuseI atiab naçi niec , zesaduI , zoha ne-diuaD caudnias utiripS utiab narre citeniztia niec , ruah arutpircS nec raheb utilpmoc , cáeyana noçiuG
) cirocurugni neranosrep yeugoies tabainiapmoc naereb nah nec ate ( naçec narre , naetra neulupicsid cesirreiP ciriuqiai nateh nuge atE
, niuqeyana nerah ate , niuqerairaM ama nesuseI ate , niuqetzame natenoitaro ate nataztiohto zetabogog nétuç neztareuesrep céicug cuaH
. aeyana neseuqcaI aduI ate , setoleZ nomiS ate aemes neroehplA seuqcaI , uehttaM ate oemolohtraB , samohT ate eppilihP , uirdnA ate sennaoI , seuqcaI ate sirreiP nedueztiab non aratetab arog arebmag necetic nagi , naenedaric naçi uhtras atE
. naedib netab htabbaS , naedla ocemelasureI atiab niec , citidnem ned neztied ocateztauilO aremelasureI necetic luzti naudrO
. netiaoi tarurec euçutiab issuki alon ad nerirrohte alah , ruah suseI ned utibecer tarurec cirateuç itiog ? aleteduaç aheb tarurec , eteduaz citagrec , cánoçiug ocaelilaG , netaçeztiab ere-narre cénieC
: natiruhc aruditzev naeniztia néyah necetic atneserp noçiug ib , ánuh , naenec netaoi aruh aletaztudaç cautacnif caiugeb tarurec atE
. cirateiugeb néyah naçec namare cirutrah cetab yedoh ate : nidec ahctla aletassucaç ceh , naeneutic narre cuah açuag atE
onarerretzab nerarrul ate , nairamaS ate , naicug aeduI ate , nemelasureI oinomitset etadiuqziaç nenaçi ate , aetuhtrev neraudnias utiripS ned nerirrohte areniag neuç euçud nerutibicer aniaB
. aeztugaçe néniosas ode nérobmed neutid irraçe nairporp erehtob ereb catiA name yeuç atzE , néceic narre atE
? ilearsI ámuser cacuard ocarutats ereb natenuh arobmed , anuaI , aletioic , aruh netaçec agorretni naenedaric udlib adab ceH
. ebag nuge ztihna zaudnias utiripS eteraç nerutayehtab ceuç aniab , zerv ud utayehtab cesennaoI necE
. cinagene euçutiab nuçne , oid , nieC , assemorp neratiA netaçel iuqirugi aniab , citemelasureI itrap necetilze naztic anam , naeneutic udlib atE
. aleyaç neztaçnim zámuser neraocniaI ate netsucare yæh zenuge yeugorreb , zeruges elangies ztihtna citzoreug zaenoissap ereb ciriciv äurub ereb utiab ere-istucare yenieC
. onarenuge nec utibecer itiog , ciname caudnemanam zaudnias utiripS yeulotsopA neutic utigelE
. zéicug açuag nec naçi issah netsacari ate netiuge suseI , elihpoehT , cuan naçi utaçnim CINEHEL
































. cäurubil neuqzetil abircs aleeuqaztil iuqude etsv tutze ere-caudnum , utcnup zutcnup edarilab cautabircs nidlab niec , ciniuge cesuseI ere-ciraçuag ecreb ztihna adab aniaB
. aegainomitset nerah aled oczaiuge nece ugiuqadab ate : utid utabircs crah cuah açuag ate , zaçuah açuag utiab neztacifitset ceniec aruh ulupicsid ad ruaH
? cih cud aognem rec , onerrohtan neogad tudab ihan iroh nidlaB , aniab : nelih cutze , cesuseI narre nacuarezte aniab : nelih alezte aruh ulupicsid nece naetra néyana ruah ztih nidec ikli atE
. irin tierra ih ? cih cud aognem rec , onerrohtan neogad tudab ihan iroh nidlaB , cesuseI astoiD
? rec ruah ate , anuaI , isuseI astoid , cesirreiP naeneuç issuki adab ruaH
? aneua neztidart ih ad ron , anuaI , naçeztiab narre ate , areniag camotse nerah nairaffa néztiab ere-utagnetsus niec , alec netiuqierrai , aruh ulupicsid neuç etiam cesuseI naçec suki cesirreiP ciriluztI
. irin tierrA , astoid , naeneuç narre ruah atE . aocniaI neuç nerutacifirolg zoireh rec aleuç netiame areztida , naçec narre ruah atE
. arukel naeuqutze ihan ua nenamare ate , ua nerutacirreug cecreb ate , caucse erue cutid nerutadeh , naenida rahaç aniab : nécnihiab ihan taron naodnihab ate , nécni neztacirreug , naenecni ogaetzag , tauard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. caidra ene caztiaczaB , cesuseI astoiD . aladaçirad no nece ciuqadab cih , ciuqziuqadab caicug açuag cih , anuaI , nóçeic narre atE ? irin catzirad nO , naenereh nóçeiztiab narre nerec sirreiP nidec etsirT ? irin catzirad no , áemes neranoI nomiS , naenereh acuard netiarrE
. caidra ene caztiaczaB , astoiD . aladaçirad no nece ciuqadab cih , anuaI yaB , astoiD ? irin catzirad no , áemes neranoI nomiS , zirreb era astoiD
. castodlib ene caztiaczaB , astoiD . aladaçirad no nece ciuqadab cih : anuaI yaB , astoiD ? catzirad eboh oniab cuah , áemes neranoI nomiS , cesuseI isirreiP nomiS ástoid , naenedaric udlaczarab adaB
. citzoreug zutaticsuser ciratelih aneyaç naçi utatsefinam yeulupicsid ereb suseI aidla nereh ai nec ruaH
. rebalah citeniarra ate , euard netiame ate aiugo ud neztrah ate suseI adab ad netrohtE
. alec anuaI nece ciraletiuqaç ? zia ron iH , areztagorretni neztarutnev nóyazte ertab cirateulupicsid atE . etzetiaç laczarab etzotaÇ , cesuseI etsoiD
. aeras nehte nidezte , ere-necab tabmah ate : aehteb zidnah niarra ruriamah ate yeugorreb ate nuhe , arerrul aeras naçec arit ate , sirreiP nomiS nidec nagI
. cirateniarra neuçutid utrah niaro euçrakE , cesuseI etsoiD
. aiugo ate airraçe naeniag aniarra ate , cairraçe caztaki netaztic suki naenedaric istuai arerrul atE
. aehteb zeniarra aeras aletuç nuztarit ) äurugni nerosseb nuhe-reb aniab , nurrv citerrul nedarizte nece ( , necetic rohte naicnv caulupicsid ecreb atE
. arossasti äurub ereb naçec ztoge ate ) néztiab airrogzullib nerec ( nidec arugni záppui ereb , alec anuaI nece naeneuç nuçne , adab sirreiP nomiS . cud anuaI , isirreiP crah ulupicsid neuç etiam cesuseI adab astoiD
. zeztihna néniarra neteuqaçec arit aruh nice cirogaiheug ate , adab netaçec ztogE . euçud nenedire ate , aredla oceniucse neraicnv aeras euçaztogE , etsoid crah atE
. zE , netoçeic stedrahI ? euçudab ertab ciriuqai , cárruoaH , cesuseI adab etsoiD
. alec suseI céulupicsid tugaçe netaçezte ere-ciradab : naerretzab rv suseI nidec nedire , naenec irrohte açiog aniaB
. rah sued netaçezte natrah uag ate : natreb aricnv necetic nagi ate , necetic itraP . niuqerih ere-ug caçaoiugaB , etastoiD . araçniarra aonaB , cesirreiP nomiS etsoiD
. agib cirecreb cirateulupicsid nerah ate , caemes neroedebeZ ate , ocaelilaG anaC néztiab niec , leanahtaN ate , aned neztied sumydiD samohT ate , sirreiP nomiS niuqerrakle nedariC
: alenuh adab nidec atsefinam , naedla sasti ocairebiT yeulupicsid suseI zirreb néiuqec atsefinam oreuG











. naeneci nerah táçneuçud aezticiv aleuçud netsehnis ate , aemeS neraocniaI tsirhC aled suseI nece táçneuçaçed stehnis , edarid naçi utabircs cuah açuag aniaB
. natenuh urubil cautabircs edaritiapze niec , naeniztia néulupicsid ereb cesuseI naçec niuge ere-cirongis ecreb ztihna adaB
. canetud istehnis ate , ze issuki cutid ustahod : cud netsehnis samohT , cuaniab issuki nereC , cesuseI astoiD
. áocniaI ene ate anuaI enE , nóçeic narre ate : cesamohT naçec stedrahi atE
. nud-etsehnis aniab , ebag-etsehnis aleciaze ate : naestehies ene carraçe ate , aucse erue caçe adeh ate : caucse ene cazti suki ate , nemeh aihre erue carraçE , isamohT astoid oreuG
. niuqeuç aled aeuqaB , naçec narre ate , naetra néyah nidec idleug ate , aleduec caistre cáhtrob suseI nidec rohte : niuqeh samohT ate , naenrab caulupicsid nerah nedaric zirreb näurub nenuge iztroç atE
. neristehnis tutze , naestehyes nerah aucse eruen taçedapze raçe ate , naukel nézti aihre eruen taçedapze raçe ate , aelangies nézti nateucse nerah taçedapze suki nidlaB , néceic narre crah atE . anuaI ugaid issukI , céulupicsid ecreb irah adab netoçeic narrE
. naenec irrohte suseI niuqeh nézte , aned neztied sumydiD , tab cirateibamah , samohT atE
. edarid caiuqude , euçutitiab neriuqude ere-caneron ate : yæh etziaç neztakrab , euçutitiab nerutakrab cautakeb ere-neroN
. audnias utiripS euçaçe ibeceR , narre ate néceic name stah , naeneuç narre ruah atE
. ceuç tetzutiaç netrogi ere-cin , alaçeb neuan irrogi catiA in : niuqeuç aled aeuqaB , zirreb néceic narre atE
. anuaI cirissuki caulupicsid necetic areugela ate : astehies ereb ate caucse nézteic stucare , naeneuç narre ruah atE
. niuqeuç aled aeuqaB , etsoid ate , naetra néyah nidec idleug ate suseI nidec rohte , zerrudleb néuduI caulupicsid nedariztiab caudlib non , aleduec caistre cáhtrob ate , natrah nuge nehel ocetsa néohtabbaS naenec utsarra atE
. alaztuarec narre ceh açuag crah ate , anuaI aleuç issuki nece yeulupicsid aleuarec neztatnoc aneladgaM airaM nidec rohtE
. anagaocniaI neuç ate anagaocniaI eruen ate , anagatiA neuç ate , anagatiA eruen zian netiagI , nécei narre ate , arateyana ene libah aniab : anagatiA eruen nagi nuanze oniaro nece : iuqnuh alanaçenzE , cesuseI astoiD
. aurtsigaM , atiab ihan narre , inobbaR , astoid crah ciriluztI : áiraM , cesuseI astoiD
. taid nerudnek cin ate : náud irraçe non cadarre , aruh cudab namare cih nidlab , anuaI , astoid , alec aniaçeztarab nece zetsv craH ? aliba ahlib neron ? oga zerragin citagrec , áetzamE , cesuseI astoiD
. alec suseI naiuqazte ate , aleogec nah suseI naçec suki ate , tarelebiug nidec luzti naeneuç narre ruah atE
. nétud irraçe non tiuqatiapze ate , anuaI ene etutiab udnek nereC , etsoiD ? oga zerragin citagrec , áetzamE , netoçeic narre ceh atE
. naukel nec naçi nazte aztuprog nesuseI , aratenio aecreb ate arurub atab , aleduec cirirrai , cautitzev ziruhc ureugniA ib naztic suki atE
: aretnemunom nidec itieheb , aleogec zerragin adab : zerragin , citopmac naedla neratnemunom neogec airaM aniaB
. taratereb caulupicsid adab necetic luztI
. nidel aticsuser ciratelih aruh alec raheb nece , árutpircS netiuqazte oniaro necE
. naçec stehnis ate , naçec suki ate , ere-aruh nec naçi irrohte cinehel aretnemunom ulupicsid ecreb nidec ras adab naudrO
. aratetab ukel autaglibirib trappa aniab , airraçe niuqelahio ze , atehctiborc nec naçi naeniag urub nerah atE
: cairraçe nah calahio naztic suki ate , aretnemunom nidec ras ate , alocierrad irah sirreiP nomiS naudro ad netrohtE
. ras nidezte ere-ciradab : cautaradla calahio naztic suki cirutitieheb atE
. aretnemunom nidec rohte nehel ate , isirreiP nóiuqec niztia aruh ulupicsid ecreb aniab : niuqerrakle caib necaoic acretsal atE
. aretnemunom necetic rohte ate , aruh ulupicsid ecreb ate , sirreiP adab nidec iklI
. nétud irraçe non ugiuqatze ate , citetnemunom anuaI étud udneK , etsoid ate , anaganeuç etiam cesuseI ulupicsid ecreb ate , anagsirreiP nomiS ad netrohte ate ud netiuge retsal naudrO
. autaradla citetnemunom airrah ud netsuki ate : aretnemunom ciralec nuhli oniaro , naeciog ad netrohte aneladgaM airaM naenuge nehel néohtabbaS atE

. suseI netaçec raçe , atnemunom néztiab libruh nerec , zasuac neranuge ocenoitaraperp néuduI , adab naH
. naçi irraçe rohen néztiapze oniaro nateniec , tabirreb tnemunom naeztarab ate , tabeztarab nec natrah ukel nec naçi utacificurc aruh atE
. ocetzroho céuduI etutiab amutsoc alon , niuqeniassv oczetamora zelahiotsihim aruh netaçec tol ate , aztuprog nesuseI naudro netaçec raH
. tabenoitxim ocatarebil nuhe isauq oczeseola ate oczahrrym aleuç netrake ) cinehel zauag anagsuseI anec naçi irrohte ( ere-omedociN nidec rohte atE
. aztuprog nesuseI naçec nek ate adab nidec rohtE . cetaliP nóçeic ittemrep ate : aztuprog nesuseI naçel nek ) zerrudleb néuduI , oczilihci aniab , ulupicsid nesuseI néztiab niec ( caocaehtamirA hpesoI italiP nöçeic niuge ztiohto naodno neuah açuaG
. nétud utahluç ron étud nerissukI , ud netiarre cetab arutpircS ecreb zirreb atE
. cirruçeh nerah neristuah atzE , táçnidel ilpmoc arutpircS edarid naçi niuge cuah açuag necE
. táçneuçaçed stehnis ere-ceuç , aleutid netiarre cáiuge nece iuqadab crah : aegainomitset nerah ad aoczaiuge ate , ud nakv utacifitset caneud issuki atE
. rv ate lodo nidec ikli natreb ate , naçec nagari astehies nerah zaodrad cetab ciratesemradneg aniaB
. caognaç nerah stuah netaztizte alec lih aruh ai cirissuki , naenecetic rohte anagsuseI aniaB
. caneranec utacificurc niuqerah ecreb ate , caognaç neranehel netaztic stuah ate , casemradneg adab necetic rohtE
. necetil nek ate , caognaç néyah necetil stuah italiP netoiugec ztiohto ) nec aidnah nuge ocatrah htabbaS nece ( : anuge ocenoitaraperp néztiab naudro nerec , naohtabbaS caztuprog naezturc taçnedualze céuduI naudrO
. autirips naçec adner cirutareheb äurub ate : ad utilpmoc aicuG , naçec narre , aerganiv cesuseI naeneuç utrah atE
. aroha netoçeic atneserp , cirirraçe näurugni neraopossih ate , zerganiv tabaignops netaçec ehteb ceh atE . airraçe cirehteb zerganiv nah nec tabicnv atE
. zian irragE , naçec narre , árutpircS táçnidel ilpmoc , aledaric utilpmoc ai caicug açuag ecreb nece cesuseI naiuqaztiab alon oreuG
. anagereb caulupicsid aruh naçec ibecer cinadnaudro atE . ama erih árroH , iraulupicsid astoid oreuG
. aemes erih árroh , áetzamE , irama ereb astoid , aleogec nah aulupicsid neuç etiam ate , ama ereb cesuseI adab naenaztic sukI
. aneladgaM airaM ate anesapoelC airaM , ápziha nerama nerah ate ama nerah , naedla neraezturc nesuseI neduec atE
. netaztic niuge cuah açuag césemradneg adaB . étud nakv iztoge ehtroç naeniag neraudnemalliba ene ate , naetra ereb étzutid nakv utitrap caudnemalliba enE , aleoid , táçnidel ilpmoc arutpircS , ruah ate : ned nenaçi neniec ehtroç zaçrah nugiugad aniab , aridre aruh alugaçetzE , naetra ereb adab netaçec narrE
. aohe aicug citeniag ebag arutsoi nec ácai ate : netaçec rah ere-acai ) aetrap ereb iniec iraredebtab ciratesemradneg , etrap rual netaztic niuge ate ( , caudnemalliba nerah netaztic rah naenetuç utacificurc suseI césemradneg adaB
. tud utabircs , anadud utabircS , cetaliP naçec stedrahI
. zian aeugeR néuduI , aleud narre careb aniab : eugeR néuduI abircs aláçetzE , célapicnirp erodacifircaS néuduI italiP adab netastoiC
. zenitaL ate , zeuqcerG , zociarbeH autabircs nec ate : aukel nec utacificurc suseI nec naedla etatiuic nece : netaçec trucari ceztihna cirateuduI adab ruah ulutiT
. AEVGER NEVDVI ONERAZAN SVSEI , autabircs nec ate : naeniag ezturc nerah naçec raçe ate , cetaliP tabulutit naçec abircs atE
. naetra suseI ate , citecreb ate citetab edla , agib cirecreb niuqerah ate , aruh netaçeztiab acificurc noN
. ahtogloG zociarbeH ate , arened neztied açalp ruçeh-ruB nidec rohte aleuqracaç aezturc ereb aruh atE
. netaçec namare ate , suseI netaçec rah atE . táçnidel acificurc néceic name adab naudrO
. neciab raseC cireuger ugaitzE , célapicnirp erodacifircaS netaçaç stedrahI ? tud nerutacificurc aeugeR neuç , cetaliP etsoiD . caçe acificurc , nek , neK , netiugec uhio ceh aniaB
. aeugeR neuç ánuH , yeuduI cetaliP etsoid naudro : äurugni nénero yes ate , aenoitaraperp ococzaB naudro nec atE
. naukel ned neztied ahtabbaG zociarbeH ate , arudabaP , naelaicidui ikla nidec rai ate , suseI aropmac naçec namare , ruah ztih cinuçne adab cetaliP
. iraseC cóyaic neztatsartnoc aicug neud netiuge euger äurub ereb nece : ediuqsida neraseC ziaze , caçedab agral iroh nidlaB , neduec zarogayeh cauduI aniab : zihan utagral aruh etaliP nalibaçab tarah cidnaH
. cid aogaidnah utakeb , canauaran utaruil irih in , ztocalah : citeniag ciaztilapze name nidlab , artnoc ene ertab cirerehtob euquzE , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? oceztagral erih aladud erehtob ate , oceztacificurc erih aladud erehtob nece ciuqatzE ? oçnim tiaztaze iriN , cetaliP adab astoiD
. name nóçeizte ciratsoper cesuseI atE ? ih zia ognoN , isuseI nóçeic narre ate , zirreb aroiroterP nidec ras atE
. nidec ogarrudleb , ruah ztih cetaliP adab naeneuç nuçnE
. cid niuge äurub ereb emeS neraocniaI nece , cid raheb lih zeuara neraeugeL erug ate , ugaid aeugeL cuG , céuduI netoçeic stedrahI
. cineugoh nahtiab ruah netiedire tutze cin nece : euçaçe acificurc ate , coruec euçaçe raH , cetaliP etsoiD . caçe acificurc , caçe acificurC , aletioic , netaçec niuge uhio , céreiciffo ate célapicnirp erodacifircaS aruh naenetuç issuki aniaB
. anoçiug ánuH , cetaliP etsoid atE . audnemalliba oczatalracse ate , aleuqracaç áoroc oczirrohle , aropmac suseI adab nidec iklI
. netiedire ertab cineugoh natenuh aladutze nece taçneuçaçed tugaçe , aropmac teuçuard netrake , ánuH , néceic narre ate , aropmac etaliP zirreb adab nidec iklI
. netasnuarec zidlakv rohic atE . áeugeR neuduI alaiuqad leh iugnV , nétuç netiarre atE
. netaçec itzev zetab udnemalliba oczatalracse ate , naeniag urub nerah netaçec raçe zirrohle tabaoroc cirutagelp césemradneg atE
. naçec atoça ate , suseI cetaliP naçec rah adab naudrO
. tab-niugathciag sabbaraB nec ate : sabbaraB aniab , iroh zE , aletioic , caicug zirreb adab necetic rai zuhiO
? aeugeR neuduI nadeuçaçeid agral adab euçud ihan : zoczaB nadeuçaçeid agral tab euçutiab tabamutsoc atE
. ertab cirasuac nahtiab ruah netiedire tutze ciN , etsoid ate , arateuduI nidec ikli zirreb , naeneuç narre ruah atE ? aiuge ad reC , cetaliP astoiD
. azov ene cid netuçne , caicug ned citaiugE . iraiuge táçnadomed egainomitset , arudnum cuan naçi irrohte táztocatenuh ate , cuan naçi oyai táztocatenuh iN . in alecian eugeR nece coid ciH , cesuseI naçec stedrahI ? ih adab zia eugeR , cetaliP naudro nóçeic narrE
. ognemeh cutze ámuser ene niaro aniab : táçnidnenze aruil yeuduI ceuqzetil itabmoc caedneg ene , ámuser ene zilab ciratenuh udnum nidlab : ciratenuh udnum cutze ámuser enE , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? cud niuge rec : étuara utaruil célapicnirp erodacifircaS ate caenoitan erue ? zian uduI in alA , cetaliP naçec stedrahI
? zaçin euard narre cécreb ala , cud netiarre iroh cih citurub nerroruE , cesuseI noçeic stedrahI
? aeugeR neuduI zia iH , nóçeic narre ate , suseI naçec ied ate , etaliP aroiroterP zirreb adab nidec raS
. neul raheb lih zoireh rec aleuç netiame areztida naçeztiab narre niec , táçnidel ilpmoc aztih nesuseI nec ruaH
. aeztlih nerohen tázterug iros cutzE , céuduI netoçeic narre naudrO . euçaçe anmednoc zeuara neraeugeL neuç ate , ceuç ruah euçaçe raH , cetaliP naudro etsoiD
. utaruil irih náeuquardniuqze , zilapze eliuge-iuqziag iroh nidlaB , netoçeic narre ate netaçec stedrahI
