? artnoc nenuh noçiug euçeuqraccad enoitasucca reC , naçec narre ate , aropmac arateh etaliP adab nidec iklI
. taçnetaçel nai aoczaB aniab , taçnecetilze ustas , aroiroterP ras necetizte careb ate , açiog nec ate : aroiroterP cinagsahpiaC suseI netaçec namare oreuG
. naçec oi carrallio natreb ate , cesirreiP naçec akv zirreb naudrO
? niuqerah naeztarab issuki ih cin tua zE , cetab ediaha neranacuarec iuqabe airraheb cesirreiP , cetiebmec cirateiraztibrec neraonaribus erodacifircaS irah astoiD
. zian zE , naçec narre ate , crah naçec akv ? cirateulupicsid nerah ere-ih zia ehto zE , irah adab netoçeic narre : nec neztoreb ate , sirreiP nomiS nah neogec atE
. anagaonaribus erodacifircaS sahpiaC cirutacetse cesannA aruh naçec rogi naudrO
? cuan netioi citagrec , tudab narre iugnv nidlab ate : zaiuqziag caçe acifitset , zianab utaçnim iuqziag nidlab , cesuseI nóçeic stedrahI
? iraonaribus erodacifircaS cacuard netsedrahi alerroH , aleoic , isuseI nóçeic name tabeploc rohic cetab ciratereiciffo nedaric tneserp , naeneutic narre crah cuah açuag atE
. cin nadud narre rec éiuqaic ceh , árah : canetud nuçne neyaztan utaçnim rec in caztiagorretni ? in cuan neztagorretni citagreC
. sued utaçnim cuanze nauterces ate , edaritiab neztlib cirateicug edla cauduI aron , naelpmet ate nágoganys taid nakv istacari ereihteb cin , iraudnum cóyaztan naçi utaçnim iuqocilbup iN , cesuseI nóçeic stedrahI
. zánirtcod ereb ate zéulupicsid ereb suseI naçec agorretni adab caonaribus erodacifircaS
. neogec neztoreb ate ere-sirreiP niuqeh nec ate : nedaric neztoreb ate , nec ira ztoh nece , ciniuge arrobmak ztaki careiciffo ate cairaztibrec nah neduec atE
. nuan zE , crah oiD ? cirateulupicsid nenuh noçiug ere-ih zia ehto zE . caniaçlahtrob otacsen isirreiP nóçeic narre atE
. sirreiP naçec icare ras ate , iraniaçlahtrob otacsen nóiuqec açnim ate , anugaçe neraonaribus erodacifircaS ulupicsid ecreb adab nidec iklI . neogec citopmac naedlahtrob sirreiP aniaB
nálas neraonaribus erodacifircaS naetab niuqesuseI nidec ras ate , anugaçe neraonaribus erodacifircaS nec aruh ulupicsid ate , tabulupicsid ecreb ate , sirreiP nomiS isuseI nóyaç netiuqierrai atE
. citagaulupop nidel lih tabmoçiug alec uhcteborp nece yeuduI aneuarec name ulliesnoc nec sahpiaC atE
. anagaonaribus erodacifircaS sahpiaC cirutacetse aruh naçec rogi crah ate ) onaribus erodacifircaS ocatrah ehtrv néztiab niec , nec aberrahniug nesahpiaC nece ( : anagsannA cinehel netaçec namare atE
. netaçec acetse ate , suseI netaçec namaztah niuqerrakle céreiciffo neuduI ate caniatipac ate cádnab naudrO
? apoc natuard name irin catiA nenade tutze ala : nániugam átapze erue carraçE , isirreiP cesuseI adab nóçeic narrE
. suhclaM nec aneci nerairaztibrec ate : airraheb oceniucse nóçeic iuqabe ate , airaztibrec neraonaribus erodacifircaS naçec oi ate , aruh naçec iuqodi , átapze neuztiab alon cesirreiP nomiS atE
. ertab udlag táitze , ciratenadiuqzuard name cih iriN , táçnidel ilpmoc aztih neuç narrE
. aretiaoi cuah euçaztiztv , etaztlibaçab ahlib ene nidlab adab : alecian in nece teuçuard narrE , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
. neronerazaN suseI , netaçec narre ceh atE ? etaztlibaç ahlib neroN , naztic agorretni zirreb naudrO
. arerrul necetic rore ate , necetic tarelebiug , zian iN , naeneuarec narre adaB
. aruh neuztiab neztidart ceniec ere-saduI neogec niuqeh atE . zian iN , cesuseI etsoiD . neronerazaN suseI , netoçeic stedrahI
? etaztlibaç ahlib neroN , néceic narre cirutaraniztia , caicug açuag nenedaric ocetrohte areniag nerah ciralaiuqziuqaç adab cesuseI
. niuqemrah ate niuqeohcrot ate niuqenretnal arah nidec rohte , careiciffo cirateuesirahP ate ciratelapicnirp erodacifircaS ate , tabadnab oczodadlos cirutrah adab saduI
. niuqeulupicsid ereb arah nec naçi udlib suseI nateztihna nece : aruh neuztiab neztidart ceniec , ere-cesaduI aruh ukel naiuqaçab atE
caulupicsid nerah ate aruh nideztiab ras nateniec , tabeztarab néztiab non , aredla ecreb zatnerrot ognordeC niuqeulupicsid ereb suseI nidec ikli , naeneutic narre cuah açuaG







. nateh in ate , táçned nateh , aetzirehno nátuard iztire no irin cih : nericare tugaçe ate , aneci erih taeuarid icare tugaçe atE
. aläuan irrogi in cih nece éid utugaçe cuah ate , tua utugaçe ih cin aniab , utugaçe uaze ih caudnum , áotsui atiA
. cinadnehel oniab nidec adnuf audnum cuan nakv etiam nece , anátuard name irin cih airolg ene táçnetaçed alpmetnoc : niuqene nedarid ere-ceh , in zianiab non taid ihan , canadiuqzuard name irin , átiA
. alaçeb náuan nakv etiam in ceh alautid etiam ate , alauan irrogi in cih nece caudnum naçed tugaçe ate , naereb tab táçnedarid otcefrep , natin ih ate , nateh cuan iN
. alaçeb nerag tab ere-ug táçnedarid tab : yæh taeuarid name ere-cin , áirolg natuard name irin ciH
. aläuan irrogi in cih nece caudnum taçnaçed stehnis : nedarid tab natug ere-ceh , natih in ate , natin ziatiab atiA ih alon , táçnedarid tab caicuG
: yab ere-citagcanetud neristehnis nahtiab in zaztih néyah aniab , netiuge ztiohto tnemalos citagceh taitze atE
. záiuge táçnedarid cautacifitcnas ere-ceh äurub eruen táid utacifitcnas citagceh atE
. arudnum ceh taitic irrogi ere-cin , arudnum cuaniab irrogi in aloN
. áiuge cud aztih erih : záiuge erue ceh caztiacifitcnaS
. citudnum zianiapze ere-in alon , citudnum cutitzE
. citothciag náztid ariugeb aniab , citudnum ceh náztid nek netiuge ztiohto taitzE
. citudnum zianiapze ere-in alon , citudnum edaritiapze nerec , citic nakv isteztiag ceh caudnum ate , aztih erih yæh taeuarid name ciN
. nahtiab careb autilpmoc açnargela ene táçnetud , naudnum taitic netiarre cuah açuag ate , cuan netrohte anagerih niaro atE
. táçnidel ilpmoc árutpircS : neciab aemes oczenoitidrep , naçi udlag cutze ertab cirateh ate , taitic utariugeb cin , canadiuqzuard name irin : naeneci erih ceh náitin neztariugeb cin , naenecnin naudnum niuqeH
. alaçeb ug , taçnedarid tab , canadiuqzuard name irin , naeneci erue caztiariugeb , áudnias atiA . cuan netrohte anagerih in ate , cutid naudnum cuah aniab , naudnum cuanze cirogaiheug atE
. nateh cuan naçi utacifirolg ate , ene cáerih ate , cutid erih caicug açuag ene atE
. cutid cairih nece , citagcanadiuqzuard name irin cih aniab , netiuge ztiohto citagaudnum taitze : taid netiuge ztiohto citagceh ciN
. alauan irrogi cih nece éid istehnis ate , alecian ikli cinagerih in nece iuqzaiuge éid utugaçe ate , éitic utibecer ceh ate : taetzuarid name yæh caztih nádiuqzuard name irin necE
. aledarid cinagerih caicug açuag nádiuqzuard name irin nece , éid utugaçe niarO
. éid utariugeb aztih erih ate , cadiuqzuard name ceh irin ate , náutic caerih : yenoçiug nátzuard name citudnum irin cih aneci erih taeuarid utatsefinaM
. nehel oniab nidec niuge ruah udnum niuqerih tutiab nakv niec zaçrah airolg , nahtiab rorue , átiA cih caçen acifirolg niaro atE
. árbo nátuard name ocetiuge taid utabaca : naeniag nerarrul tua utacifirolg ciN
. anaud irrogi cih tsirhC suseI ate , oczaiuge ocniaI netaçe tugaçe rorue ih , alanrete ezticiv cud ruah atE
. táçneceid name alanrete ezticiv , yeicug náoiuqzuard name irah , naeniag neraicug iugarah erehtob cacuartiab name aloN
. táçnaçe acifirolg ih ere-caemeS erue , aemeS erue caçe acifirolg , anero cud irrohte , átiA , naçec narre ate , tárurec caiugeb naztic itiog ate , cesuseI naztic narre cuah açuaG
. oyaztan uhtiarag iraudnum in , no ztohib euçua aniab : euçud nenakv enoitcilffa naudnum : taçneuçud euqab natin , teuçiuqzuard narre cuah açuaG
. ad niuqene atiA nece : roruen zianze aniab : euçuaniab neriztv roruen in ate , tárateneuç niec aredebtab eteraztiab nerutayerrab , ad irrohte ai ate , audro ad netrohte , ánuH
? euçud netsehnis niarO , cesuseI neceic stedrahI
. alecia ikli cinagaocniaI nece netsehnis ugaid zaçenuh : naça agorretni crohen aognem cutze ate , caicug açuag alaiuqziuqadab nece ugaiuqaecab niarO
. netiarre cutze ertab cirenoitarapmoc ate , zia oçnim iuqoralc niaro , ánuH , céulupicsid ereb etastoiD
. tánagatiA aonab ate , audnum tud netiztv araçrah : arudnum zian irrohte ate , cinagatiA zian iklI
. alecian ikli cinagaocniaI nece euçutiab istehnis ate , euçuaniab nakv etiam in ceuç nerec , etzutiaç etiam careb catiA necE
. citagneuç iratiA aladacuard neniuge ztiohto cin nece netiarre teuçuartze ate , eteraç nerutacse naeneci ene natrah nugE
. euçiaztianiab nerutaçnim zatiA eruen iuqoralc aniab , nerutaçnim zenoitarapmoc cirogaiheug euçiaztianiapze audro ad netrohte aniab : teuçiuqzuard narre zenoitarapmoc cuah açuaG
. táçned autilpmoc áçnargela neuç , euçud nerutibecer ate , etzetiaç acse : naeneci ene utacse sued eterazte onardniarO
. aleuçuard nename , naeneci ene iratiA ene etoiuqziaztiab nerutacse ere-rec nece teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE . nerutagorretni zesued euçuanze natrah nuge atE
. cirateuç neriuqede crohen utze áçnargela neuç ate , ad nerutareugela aztohib neuç ate , tetzutiaç nerissuki araçrah aniab : euçud aititsirt niaro adab ere-ceuÇ
. netad oyai arudnum tabmoçiug nerec zoiraczob , tiohro zaerolod atze cirogaiheug , zetab ohctruoah naened idre aniab : atiab irrohte audro nerah nerec , ud erolod naened neztre , caetzamE
. aratoiraczob ad nerutitreunoc áititsirt neuç aniab , eteraç nenaçi etsirt ceuç ate : ad nerutzob audnum ate , ceuç euçud neniuge enoitatnemal ate ragin , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. euçuan nerissuki ate tabitug arobmed zirreb ate : nerissuki euçuanze ate tabitug arobmeD , tutiab narre nerec , eteduaç zedlag zaçenuh naetra nerraklE , néceic narre ate , aletuç ihan utagorretni nece cesuseI adab naçec tugaçE
neud netiarre rec ugiuqatze ? tabitug arobmed ruah neud netiarre ad reC , adab netuç netiarrE
. tánagatiA aonab in necE , ate : euçuan nerissuki ate , tabitug arobmed zirreb ate : nerissuki euçuanze ate , tabitug arobmeD , ruah nucuard netiarre ad reC , naetra nerrakle cuztab cirateulupicsid nerah adab netaçec narrE
. tánagatiA aonab in nece : euçuan nerissuki ate , tabitug arobmed zirreb ate : nerissuki euçuanze ate , tabitug arobmeD
. aleuçuard nerutaralced ate aleud nerutrah citene nece teuçuard narre ztocalah : edarid ene , caicug açuag neutid catiA
. euçuard nerutaralced ate , ud nerutrah citene nece : nerutacifirolg uan craH
. euçiuqzuard nerutaralced cáçuag nedarid ocetrohte ate : ud nenarre euqutiab nuçne ere-rec aniab , zurub ereb nerutaçnim atze nece : araticug aiuge etzutiaç nerutadiug crah , toid aoczaiuge utiripS , aruh naenerrohtad aniaB
. niaro euçeuqaztid rage nice aniab , ocetiarre yeuç tud açuag ztihna oniarO
. atiab utanmednoc aecnirp ocatenuh udnum nerec , zudnemegui atE
. nerissuki euçuanze cirogaiheug ate , zianiab netiaoi tánagatiA eruen nerec , zaititsui atE
. netsehnis nahtiab in etutiapze nerec , toid zutakeB
. zudnemegui ate zaititsui ate zutakeb audnum ud nerutuçnev crah naenerrohtad atE
. arateuç aruh tud nerirrogi , idanab naoi nidlab aniab : arateuç nerirrohte atze aelaçalosnoC , idanapze naoi nidlab nece : nidan naoi in euçud raheb , teuçuard netiarre aiuge cin aniaB
, aztohib neuç ud ehteb cáititsirt , nadeuçiuqzuard narre cuah acuag nerec aniaB
? aho taroN , naztagorretni uanze crohen cirateuç ate , tánaganeuan irrogi in aonab niaro aniaB
. nécniniab niuqeuç nerec , narre teuçiuqzuartze cinadnaestah cuah açuag ere-ciradab : aladeuçiuqzuard narre cin nece , zaçeh taçnetzetiaç tiohro , naenetad irrohte aruh udro , yeuc teuçiuqzuard narre cuah açuag aniaB
. in ze , atiA utugaçe etutiapze nerec , euçiuqzuard neniuge cuah açuag atE
. iraocniaI alacuard netiuge uztibrec utiab nenakv etsv etzutiaztiab nelih ere-cron non árobmed ad nerirrohte aniab : cirateugoganys etzutiaç neriztogE
: táçnetzetiazte aziladnacs teuçiuqzuard narre cuah açuaG
. eteraç niuqene cinadnaestah nece , euçud nerutacifitset ere-ceuç aniaB
. zaçin ud nerutacifitset crah , atiab neztidecorp cinagatiA ene niec toid aoczaiuge utiripS , naenerrohtad aelaçalosnoC nadeuçuard nerirrogi cinagatiA eruen cin aniaB
. etaduard iztire ztiag ebag neugoH , aleoid , táçnidad ilpmoc aztih neogad autabircs naeugeL néyah ad ruah aniaB
. iratiA ene ate irin etucuard iztire ztiag ate , étzutid issuki niaro aniab : eteuqulze cirutakeb , utinapze niuge cárbo neutitze niuge cecreb crohen naetra néyah nidlaB
. aztirad ztiag ere-iratiA ene , canatzirad ztiag iriN
. zautakeb ereb étutze cirasucxe niaro aniab : eteuqulze cirutakeb , eyaçninapze utaçnim yereb ate , zninapze irrohte nidlaB
. neztugaçe aneuan irrogi in étutiapze nerec , citaganeci ene euçiuqzuard neniuge caicug cuah açuag aniaB
. étud nerutariugeb ere-aneuç , étudab utariugeb aztih ene nidlab : etzutiaç nerutatucesrep ere-ceuç , étuanab utatucesrep in nidlab : ogaidnah oniab aissuban ereb airaztibrec atzE zaztih nadeuçuard narre cin etzetiaç tiohrO
. caudnum euztirad ztiag ztocalah , citudnum tetzutiaztiab utigele cin aniab , ocudnum eteraztiapze nerec aedro : euqul etiam aneul ereb caudnum , etenicab ocudnum nidlaB
. aleuan nakv isteztiag nehel oniab ceuç in nece euçiuqadab , étzutiaçab netseztiag caudnum nidlaB
. táçneuçud etiam rakle , teuçiuqzuard neztanam cuah açuaG
. taçneuçaçeid name , naeneci ene iratiA ene etoiuqziuqaztiab acse ere-rec : neogad autcurf neuç ate , neuçaçed rake utcurf ate taçnetzetiaç naoi , tétzutiaç utanedro ate , ceuç tetzutiaç utigele cin aniab , utigele in ceuç euçuanzE
. teuçuartiab icare tugaçe , aicug nadud nuçne cinagatiA eruen nerec , ediuqsida tetzutiaç uhtied ceuç aniab : neud netiuge rec caissuban nerah iuqatze cairaztibrec nece , neruhtied iraztibrec tetzutiazte cirogaiheuG
teuçuartiab neztanam cin ere-rec euçaçedab niuge nidlab , eteraç nenaçi ediuqsida ene ceuÇ
. naçed name citagcaediuqsida ereb ámira ereb cetiebron , utze crohen cirogaidnah oiroma oniab ruaH
alaçeb nadetzutiaç nakv etiam cin , neuçud etiam aecreb catab , audnemanam ene ad ruaH
. táçnidad éhteb áçnargela neuç ate , taçneogad nateuç áçnargela ene , yeuç teuçiuqzuard narre cuah açuaG
. naoiroma nerah zianiab netioge ate , alaçeb nadutid utariugeb caudnemanam neratiA eruen ere-cin : naetatirahc ene eteraç nenoge , euçaztidab ariugeb caudnemanam ene nidlaB
. naetatirahc ene eteduaç : ceuç tetzutiaç nakv etiam ere-cin , alaçeb neuan nakv etiam catiA iN
. ulupicsid ene eteraç nenaçi ate : neuçarraccad ztihna utcurf , atiA ene utacifirolg ad natenuH
. euçiaç neniuge ate , etzetiaç acse euçutiab ihan ere-rec , eduadab nateuç caztih ene ate , natin eteduaçab nidlaB
. neztarre ate , netzioge arus ate , neztlib oreug : ad neztrahie ate , alaçeb audnemrihc aropmac ad aiztoge , ogadapze natin tiebron nidlaB
. euçidiad nice sued ebag in nece : ztihna utcurf ud netrake crah , natrah in ate , natin ogatiab ron : caudnemrihc ceuç , anehia zian iN
. eteduaçapze natin nidlab ere-ceuç ateze : ogadapze naenehia nidlab , alaçeb neeuqaçed rake nice cinagereb cirutcurf careb caudnemrihc : nateuç in ate natin eteduaÇ
. citagaztih nadeuçuard narre cin eteraç uhahc ceuç aI
. táçnaçed rake ogaiheug utcurf , ud neztuhahc , aicug neud netrake utcurf ate : ud necnek , aicug udnemrihc neutze netrake utcurf natiN
aniaçitsaham ad atiA ene ate , aoczaiuge nehia zian iN
. cidnameh necaog , etzetiaç iuqiaI . tud netiuge alah , catiA uaniab utanam alon ate : iratiA aladaztirad no nece : caudnum táçnaçed tugaçe , ad netiuge ruah aniaB
. sued utze natin ate , aecnirp ocatenuh udnum ad irrohte nece : nerutaçnim ztihna niuqeuç cirogaiheug zianzE
. táçneuçaçed stehnis naenetad niuge , nehel oniab nidad niuge teuçuard narre niaro atE
. ad ogaidnah oniab in atiA nece : tánagatiA aonab , tutiab narre nerec eteuqzetnic areugela ruges , étziradnicab no nidlaB . arateuç zian neriluzti ate , aonaB , aladeuçuard narre nece euçud nuçnE
. tici alidatze ate , aztohib neuç alburt alidatzE . yeuç netiame cin , alaçeb neud netiame caudnum teuçuartze : teuçuard netiame aeuqab eruen , teuçuard netiztv aeuqaB
caicug açuag nadeuçiuqzuard narre euçiuqzuard nericare tiohro ate , caicug açuag euçiuqzuard neristacari crah , naeneci ene catiA utiab nerirrogi niec , caudnias utiripS , caelaçalosnoC aniaB
. aleogan niuqeuç , teuçiuqzuard narre cuah açuaG
. aneratiA neuan irrogi in aniab , aene atze , aztih neuçud netuçne ate : neztariugeb utitze caztih ene , canatziratze no iriN
. ugud neniuge aztioge nahtiab aruh ate , arag nerirrohte anagnerah ate , aruh ud neristehno catiA ene ate : ud nerutariugeb aztih ene , irin tziradab no cetiebron nidlaB , nóçeic narre ate , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? iraudnum ze ate , cucuartiab nerutatsefinam äurub erue irug nerec ad cidnon , anuaI , cetoiracsI ze , cesaduI astoiD
. äurub eruen irah tacuard nerutatsefinam ate , tacuard neriztire no irah cin ate : ad nenaçi aistehno zatiA ene , anatzirad no irin ate : anatzirad no irin ad , aneutid neztariugeb ceh ate , anetehctad yeudnemanam enE
. nahtiab ceuç in ate nahtiab in ceuç ate , nahtiab atiA eruen alecian in nece nerutugaçe euçud ceuç natrah nugE
. eteraç ociciv ere-ceuç , zianiab iciv in nerec : euçuan nerissuki ceuç aniab , nerissuki cirogaiheug uanze caudnum ate , tabitug oniarO
. arateuç zian neriluzti : ztruç neriztv tetzutiaztE
. ad nenaçi nateuç ate , atiab netioge nahtiab ceuç nerec , aruh euçugaçadab ceuç aniab : neztugaçe ze , aruh netsuki utiapze nerec : toid aneuqaçed ibecer nice caudnum utiripS oczaiugE
: iuqlanrete niuqeuç taçneogad , euçuard nename tabelaçalosnoC ecreb ate , iratiA tacuard neniuge ztiohto cin atE
. euçaztiariugeb caudnemanam ene , euçatziradab no irin nidlaB
. neniuge tud cin , naeneci ene etzetiaçab acse tiabrec nidlaB
. naemeS atiA taçnidad acifirolg : neniuge tud aruh , naeneci ene eteraztiab nerutacse ere-rec atE
. zian netiaoi tanagatiA in nece : utid neniuge caogaidnah oniab cuah ate , utid neniuge ere-crah , cárbo nadutid netiuge cin , utiab netsehnis nahtiab in cron , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. euçaçen stehnis citagcareb arbo erepze : aled nahtiab in atiA ate , nahtiab atiA in nece euçaçen stehniS
. cárbo utid netiuge catiA neogad natin aniab : netiarre tutitze cinagroruen , caztih nadeuçiuqzuard netiarre yeuç ciN ? aled nahtiab in atiA ate , nahtiab atiA in nece netsehnis cutzE
? atiA cugaçei stucarE , cud netiarre cih alon ate : atiA cid issuki , in caneuan issuki , éppilihP ? in utugaçe cuanze ate , cuan niuqeuç zarobmed tabmaH , cesuseI astoiD
, cuciaic ocsa ate , atiA cugaçei stucare , anuaI , ceppilihP astoiD
. aruh euçud issuki ate , aruh euçud neztugaçe cinadniaro ate : eteuqaçenic tugaçe ere-atiA ene , in euçudninab neztugaçe nidlaB
. neciab zaçin anagatiA netrohte atze rohen : aezticiv ate aiuge ate aedib zian iN , cesuseI astoiD
? ugeuqiuqad laha aedib natalon ate : necia netiaoi taron ugaiuqaezte , anuaI , cesamohT astoiD
. euçiuqadab aedib ate , euçiuqadab necian netiaoi in taron atE
. táçneteraç ere-ceuç , in zianiab non : anageruen tetzutiaç nerutrah ate , zian nerirrohte zirreb , naenadeuçeuquard udniappa yeuç ukel ate , naenetaçian naoi atE
. arecniappa ukel yeuç aonaB , neuçeuquaren narre zilab alecreb nidlab : edarid ztihna cáztioge naehcte neratiA enE
. euçaçe stehnis ere-nahtiab in , nahtiab aocniaI euçud netsehnis : aztohib neuç alburt alidatzE
. naterurih onaeuqun utakv carrallio neroi citze , tauard netiarre zaiuge zaiuge ? cutiab nerirraçe citagene ámira eruE , cesuseI nóçeic stedrahI
. táid nerirraçe citagerih amira eruen ? niaro cidiuqan iuqierrai nice nerec , anuaI , cesirreiP astoiD
. oreug tiazta neriuqierrai aniab : tidiuqa iuqierrai niaro nice , zianiab netiaoi in taroN , cesuseI nóçeic stedrahI ? zia netiaoi taron , anuaI , cesirreiP nomiS astoiD
. anagaecreb catab euçudab etatirahc nidlab , aleteraç ulupicsid ene nece céicug etud nerutugaçe natenuH
. taçneuçoztirad no irrakle ere-ceuç , alaçeb nadeuçuard iztire no yeuç cin , neuçoztirad no iraecreb catab , teuçuard netiame tabirreb udnemanaM
. niaro teuçuard netiarre ere-yeuç alah : eteuqzetiaç rohte nice ceuç , zianiab netiaoi in taroN , alaçeb nadeuard narre yeuduI aniab : euçuan nerutahlib : zian niuqeuç tabruppa oniaro , cáotruoaH
. aruh ud nerutacifirolg natreb ate , nahtiab ereb aruh ud nerutacifirolg ere-caocniaI , natrah adab utacifirolg aocniaI nidlaB
. natrah ad utacifirolg aocniaI ate , aemeS neranoçiug ad utacifirolg niarO , cesuseI naçec narre , naenec ikli atE
. äuag nec ate , nidec ikli natreb , cirutrah anemaha adab aruH
. néceil name tiabrec yerbuap ode : cáçuag nugutid raheb táztocatseb cazti sorE , cesuseI alacuarec narre nece , cesaduI neuztiab áslum nerec , netuç etsv cuztab necE
. nacuarec narre aruh aratrec neztida neuzte ere-cetab ciratenedaric naeniaham aniaB
. ztetif ciuge anaud netiugE , cesuseI astoid atE . nataS nóiuqec ras naodno neranemaha atE
. iranenomiS toiracsI saduI nóçeic name , anemaha naeneuç itsub atE . anadacuard nename autapmert nemaha cin cud aruH , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? ad niec , anuaI , astoid , cirutareheb areuqamots nesuseI crah adaB
. aneuç netiarre crah nec niec , nóiugel edlag , cesirreiP nomiS inuh nóçeic niuge uniek atE
: cesuseI neuztiab etiam niec , airrai arerrahlub nerah naeniaham tab cirateulupicsid nesuseI nec atE
. zenaçi natadud nec oçnim zeniec , nétuç neztaheb tanagaecreb catab céulupicsid naudrO
. in aleuan nerutidart cetab cirateuç nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , narre ate , naçec acifitset ate , nautirips nidec alburt suseI naeneutic narre cuah açuaG
. aneuan irrogi in ud neztibecer , caneuan neztibecer in ate : uan neztibecer in , utiab neztibecer aruh ere-cron , taçedab rogi tiebron cin nidlab , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. alecian in nece táçneuçaçed stehnis , naenetad niuge , nehel oniab nidad niuge teuçuard netiarre cinadniarO
. árogodnio ereb artnoc ene ud utahctla , caneud netai aiugo niuqenE , árutpircS nidad ilpmoc ad raheb aniab : nadutid utigele niec tiuqadab cin : oçnim zoicug zaçeuç zianzE
. euçaztidab niuge nidlab eteraç nenaçi ustahod , euçiuqziuqadab cuah açuag nidlaB
. ogaidnah aoniab aneud netrogi aruh aerodahcabme ateze , ogaidnah oniab aissuban ereb atze airaztibreC , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. neuçiugad ere-ceuç , alaçeb nadeuçuard niuge yeuç cin , teuçuard nakv name ulpmexe necE
. icuki canio irrekle euçetzuard raheb ere-ceuç , ciralecian aurtsigaM ate anuaI canio neuç tutidab icuki cin zareb nidlaB
. zianiab nerec : euçoid iugnv ate , anuaI ate aurtsigaM , euçuan neztied ceuÇ
? nadeuçuard niuge rec euçiuqadaB , néceic narre cirirrai , naeniaham zirreb , naeneutic utrah araçrah caporra ereb ate , canio néyah naeneutic icuki adaB
. coicug uhahc eteraztE , naçec narre ztocalah : aneuç neztidart aruh nec niec naiuqaçab necE
. coicug ze aniab , eteraç uhahc ceuç ate : aicug uhahc cud aniab , neciab naztid zuki canio ciraognem citze , caned aicukI , cesuseI astoiD
. äurub ate ere-caucse aniab , tnemalos canio ene ze , anuaI , cesirreiP nomiS astoiD
. niuqene ciretrap nenakv cutze , taçehapze zuki nidlaB , cesuseI nóçeic stedrahI . naluces canio ene nericuki cutitzE , cesirreiP astoiD
. cud nerutugaçe oreug aniab : niaro ciuqatze cih , anadud netiuge ciN , noçeic narre ate cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? cadiuqzuard neztuki canio irin cih , anuaI , noçeic narre crah ate : anagsirreiP nomiS adab nidec rohtE
. neztacuhci zalahio nec autacirreug ate , neztuki nénio neulupicsid nidec sah ate , aratetab nicab rv naçec raçe oreuG
. zaçrah nidec acirreug , tabaregnol cirutrah ate : áporra ud netiztv ate , citetiraffa ad netiuqiaI
: aled netiaoi tanagocniaI ate , aled ikli cinagaocniaI areb ate , arateucse cátiA irah alaczuard name aicug açuag cesuseI ciralaiuqaD
) naçel idart aruh , naeztohib neraemes nenomiS , netoiracsI saduI naeneuç irraçe ai caurbaed ( naodno laffa atE
. ceh utid nakv etiam onarenif , canedaric naudnum , caereb neutiztiab nakv etiam alon , tánagatiA ciratenuh udnum taçnidel nagari anero nerah alec irrohte nece cesuseI alaiuqaç , naeniztia atseb oczab atE
. tutid netiarre alah , tiuqzuartiab name catiA alon , cáçuag nadutid netiarre cin adab : aled lanrete ezticiv audnemanam nerah nece tiuqadab atE
. netian açnim rec ate nadeuqaçed narre rec , tuard name udnemanam careb catiA neuan irrogi in aniab : utaçnim zianze citurub eruen in necE
, naenuge neuqza aruh ud nerutanmednoc caztih necian utaçnim in : naçed anmednoc aruh cron udab , caztih ene neztibecer ze ate , caneuan netziari iN
. taçnadaçed aulas audnum aniab , táçnadaçed anmednoc audnum irrohte zianze nece : aruh neztanmednoc tutze cin , stehnis ze ate , caztih ene aztidab nuçne crohen nidlab atE
táçneogatze naebmuhli , ertab cineud netsehnis nahtiab in , zian irrohte arudnum iugrA iN
. aneuan irrogi in ud netsuki , caneuan netsuki in atE
. nahtiab aneuan irrogi in aniab , nahtiab in netsehnis utze , caneud netsehnis nahtiab iN , naçec narre ate , cesuseI naçec niuge uhio naudrO
. áirolg neraocniaI ze nece , áirolg nénoçiug etud nakv ogaetiam necE
. zerrudleb necetil ztoge aropmac citagoganys , neztrohtia netuzte citagcauesirahP aniab : netaçec stehnis nahtiab aruh ceztihna ere-ciratelapicnirp ere-ciradaB
. zaçrah ad naçi utaçnim ate , naeneuç issuki áirolg nerah , cesaiasE naztic narre cuah açuaG
. nadaztitze adnes ate , necetitze itreunoc ate , netaçetze ida zeztohib ate , taçnetaçetze suki ziugeb : aztohib néyah ud nakv utrogog ate , caiugeb néyah utid nakv utustI
, cesaiasE utiab narre zirreb nerec , neteuqaçec stehnis nice ztocalaH
? oyaç naçi utaleuer iron aosseb neranuaI ate , aztih erug ud nakv istehnis cron , anuaI , utiab nakv narre niec , táçnidel ilpmoc aztih neratehporp saiasE
: nahtiab aruh netsehnis netuzte , naeniztia néyah ere-neuçab niuge ulucarim tabmah atE
. cirateh nidec edrog cinaoi oreug : cesuseI naztic narre cuah açuaG . taçneteraç emes neraiugrA , nahtiab aiugrA . euçaçe stehnis oneuçud aiugrA
. ned netiaoi taron iuqatze , canalibad naebmuhli nece : táçnetaztiazte steidra caebmuhli , oneuçud aiugrA etzetiaç libe : ad niuqeuç aiugrA ztocatetab itug arobmed oniarO , cesuseI naudro néceic narrE
? iroh emeS neranoçiug ad ron ? aemeS neranoçiug nidad itiog aled raheb nece cud netiarre cih alon ate : iuqlanrete aleogadab tsirhC nece , citeugeL ugaid nuçne cuG , caeztedneg nóçeic stedrahI
) neuç raheb lih zoireh rec aleuç netiame areztida , neuç netiarre ruah atE (
. anageruen tutid nerutarit caicug , citerrul zianab autitiog nidlab , cin atE
. aropmac ad neriztoge aecnirp ocatenuh udnum niaro : audnemegui nenuh udnum ad niarO
. citagneuç aniab , naçi niuge ruah zov citagene atzE , narre ate cesuseI naçec stedrahI
. oyaç naçi utaçnim äureugniA , netioic cécreB . aleuç niuge tabiricrogi , neoic , caneuç nuçne ate , canec nah eztedneg atE
. nerutacifirolg zirreb ate , taid utacifirolg atE , aleoic , citurec tabzov naudro nidec rohtE . aneci erue caçe acifirolg , átiA
. aratenuh nero cuan irrohte ztocalah aniab : ciratenuh nero caçen arapme , átiA ? tud nenarre rec ate : ad autalburt ámira ene niarO
. catiA ene aruh ud nerutaroho , açenab aztibrec in cetiebmec nidlab ate : ad nenaçi ere-airaztibrec ene nah , zianiab nenaçi in non ate : tiuqeb iuqierrai irin , uanab neztaztibrec cetiebmec in nidlaB
. aruh ud nerutariugeb taztocelanrete ezticiv , natenuh udnum canaztirad ztiag iraiciv ereb ate : aruh ud nerudlag canaztirad no iraiciv ereB
. ud netrake ztihna utcurf idadab lih nidlab aniab : ogad areb aruh , idadapze lih cirirore arerrul aihib iugo nidlab , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. atiab nerutacifirolg aemeS neranoçiug audro ad irrohtE , aleoic , néceic stedrahi cesuseI atE
. isuseI etacuard netiarre ceppilihP ate zirreb cèuirdnA , iuirdnA acuard netiarre ate eppilihP ad netrohtE
. issuki suseI ceuqidneug ihan , anuaI , aletioic , netoçeic niuge ztiohto ate , naelilaG ocadiashteB néztiab niec anageppilihP necetic rohte adab cuaH
: nátseb areztaroda ciratenedaric iho netiagi uztab cerG nedaricab atE
. ad naoi naodno nerah audnum , árroh ? neztahcteborp sued aleterazte nece euçassucatzE , naetra ereb netaçec narre céuesirahP atE
. aleuç niuge ruah ulucarim crah , netuç nuçne nece , aeztedneg nóyaç naçi ere-irrohte arenizta ztocalaH
. ciratelih aleuç utaticsuser aruh ate , citetnemunom aleuç uhtied orazaL nece , caeztedneg nec niuqerah neuç neztacifitset atE
. aletaztuarec niuge cuah açuag irah ate , aledaric cautabircs zaçrah cuah açuag nece necetic tiohro naudro , naenec naçi utacifirolg suseI aniab : citenehel céulupicsid nerah tugaçe netaztizte cuah açuag atE
. naeniag netab-ra emv-otsa aleogad cirirrai nud netrohte eugeR erih , ánuh : ábala ognoiS rudleb aleciazE
, alaçeb ned autabircs , naeniag nerah nidec rai ate , tabra emv-otsa cesuseI naçec nedire atE
. aeuger ocelearsI ned netrohte naeneci neranuaI aled utacideneB , annasoH , nétuç netiuge uhio ate , areniztia noiuqziuqec ikli ate , carrada amlap netaztic raH
, aremelasureI alec netrohte suseI nece cinuçne , cidnah eztedneg nec naçi irrohte aratseb naenumarahiB
. nahtiab suseI netuç netsehnis ate , nedaric netiaoi zasuac nerah ztihna cirateuduI necE
. táçnetaçel lih ere-orazaL celapicnirp erodacifircaS netaçec atlusnoc atE
. neuztiab utaticsuser ciratelih crah niec , taçnetaçel suki orazaL era aniab , tnemalos citagsuseI ze necetic rohte ate : alec nah nece , cidnah eztedneg cirateuduI naçec tugaçe naudrO
. nenakv ereihteb euçuanze in aniab : niuqeuç euçutid nenakv ereihteb caerbuap necE
. cid utariugeb iroh ocenuge arutlupes ene , caçe iztV , cesuseI adab naçec narrE
. neutiztiab netrake crah canedaric netraçe ate , neuztiab áslum ate , neztiab nioho nerec aniab : zeneuç ciraisna crah zerbuap ze , naçec narre ruah atE
? yerbuap name ate , natorenid nuherurih naçi udlas atze ruah utneugnv nereC
. caneuç nerutidart aruh , caemes nenomiS toiracsI saduI , cetab cirateulupicsid nerah naçec narre naudrO
. zenirrv nerautneugnv nidec ehteb aehcte ate : zastada ereb naztic acuhci ate , canio nesuseI naztic atcnv , cirocatidnah oicerp zenif cipsa utneugnv tabarebil cirutrah cairaM naudrO
. tab cirateneduec cirirrai naeniaham niuqerah nec orazaL ate : neuç netiuge auztibrec cahtraM ate , nah tabiraffa irah adab netoçeic niugE
. ciratelih neuztiab utaticsuser niec , anec naçi lih orazaL néztiab non , arainahteB nidec rohte citeniztia neroczab nuge yes suseI adaB
. táçnetaçel namaztah , naçel stucare , nécil non ulab neztugaçe crohen nidlab , udnemanam céuesirahP ate célapicnirp erodacifircaS netaçec name atE
? aratseb nerirrohte aletze nece , euçiaç iduri reC , aleduel naelpmet , nétuç netiarre naetra nerrakle ate , naztlibaç ahlib nesuseI adaB
. taçnecetil acifirup , naeniztia oczab cirocatrah acramoc aremelasureI ztihna nidec nagi ate , aoczab néuduI libruh nec atE
. niuqeulupicsid ereb nec netioge nah ate : aririh ned neztied miarhpE , táracramoc ocedla nerautresed cidnah nidec naoi aniab : naetra néuduI zirreuga nalibazte cirogaiheug adab suseI
. táçnetaçel lih aruh niuqerrakle nétuç neztatlusnoc citzoreug zaçrah nuge adaB
aratetab táçnaztil lib cautayerrab ruoah neraocniaI era aniab , citagnerah enoitan tnemalos ze atE
. citagaenoitan aleul raheb lih cesuseI nece naçec azitehporp , onaribus erodacifircaS ocatrah ehtrv néztiab alon aniab : narre naçezte citurub ereb ruah atE
. nidatze lag aicug enoitan ate , citagaulupop nidad lih tabmoçiug , alugud uhcteborp nece neztasnep euçutze atE
: sued euçiuqatze ceuÇ , néceic narre , onaribus erodacifircaS ocatrah ehtrv néztiab niec , cesahpiaC , cetab cirateh naudrO
. aenoitan yab , aukel erug yab étud nerutasarra ate , caonamoR edarid nerirrohte ate : nahtiab iroh étud neristehnis céicug , ugaçedab iztv alenuh nidlaB
. ud netiuge ongis ztihna cenuh noçiug nece , ugud netiuge reC , netuç netiarre ate , aulliesnoc céuesirahP ate célapicnirp erodacifircaS netaçec lib naudrO
. cáçuag neutic niuge cesuseI yæh nezteic narre ate , arateuesirahP necetic naoi uztab cirateh aniaB
. nahtiab aruh netaçec stehnis ceztihna ciratenetzutic issuki cáçuag neutic niuge cesuseI ate , ciratenedaric irrohte anagairaM uduI adaB
. aretiaoi euçaçe iztv ate euçaçe ahcaL , cesuseI etsoiD . ailatse nec zetab tehctiborc aetrahtiugeb nerah ate : aleutic cauhtol zaruhtol canio ate caucse , nidec ikli anec naçi lih atE
. aropmac rohta , orazaL , naçec niuge uhio zarog zov , cinarre cuah atE
. alauan irrogi cih nece taçnetaçed stehnis , táid narre citagaeztedneg neogad urugni aniab : alauan netuçne ihteb nece náiuqainab cin atE
: cuaniab nuçne nerec , taiuqzuard netiame carreuqse , átiA , naçec narre , caiugeb itiog cirutahctla cesuseI naudrO . citukel nec naçi irraçe alih , airrah adab netaçec neK
? airolg neraocniaI alanud nerissuki naçedab stehnis nidlab nece , narre tanuartzE , cesuseI astoiD
. cud aocatenuge rual nece : oreugruag cud utserik , anuaI , cáberra neranec naçi lih , cahtraM astoiD . airrah euçaçe ahctlA , cesuseI oiD
. airraçe , areniag nerah tabirrah ate , nec aecel ate , aretnemunom ad netrohte , alec neztiuom nahtiab ereb zirreb adab suseI
? nidalze lih ere-ruah , cenuh neutid iuqeri caiugeb nerausti neeuqoric niuge nicE , netaçec narre cuztab cirateh atE
. neuç etiam alon arroH , céuduI adab netaçec narrE
. cesuseI naçec niuge ragin atE
. cassuki ate rohta , anuaI , etacuard netiarrE ? euçud irraçe noN , naçec narre atE
: äurub ereb naçec alburt cirutiuom zutirips , aleduel zerragin cauduI nedaric irrohte niuqerah ate , aleogel zerragin aruh naenaçec suki adab cesuseI
. eyana ene lih náeuquzte , nemeh znihab naçi nidlab , anuaI , alastoic , aratenio nerah äurub ereb naçec ztoge , cirissuki aruh , arukel nec suseI naenidec rohte , cairaM adaB
. taçnaiugad ragin nah , ad netiaoi aretnemunoM , aletioic , irah noiuqziuqec iuqierrai , alec ikli ate , iuqiai ztetif niah airaM nece cirissuki , canetuç neztalosnoc aruh ate , cauduI nedaric naehcte niuqerah naudrO
. naukel neuç utartnocne cahtraM nec aniab : arugrub suseI irrohte nézte oniaro necE
. anagnerah ad netrohte ate , ztetif ad netiuqiai , naeneud nuçne iroh , aruH
. ua neztied ate , nemeh nud aurtsigaM , aleoic , ápziha ereb airaM naçec ied iuquterces ate , nidec naoi , cinarre ruah atE
. anec ocetrohte arudnum emeS neraocniaI tsirhC alecia ih nece netsehnis taid cin , anuaI , yaB , acuard netiarrE
? ruah nud netsehniS . nelih nutze naluces , nahtiab in utiab netsehnis ate , atiab iciv ere-ron atE
: nud ociciv eredab naçi lih nidlab , aneud netsehnis nahtiab in : aezticiv ate aenoitcerruser nuan iN , cesuseI nóçeic narrE
. naenuge neuqza , naenoitcerruser aled nerutaticsuser nece taiuqaecaB , cahtraM astoiD
. eyana erih nud nerutaticsuseR , cesuseI astoiD
. irih alauard nename , iraocniaI cacuartiab neniuge edlag ere-rec nece taiuqaecab ere-niaro aniaB
: lih náeuquzte eyana ene , nemeh znihab naçi nidlab , anuaI , isuseI cahtraM adab nóçeic narrE
. neogec cirirrai naehcte airaM ate : nóiuqec ikli areniztia , alec netrohte suseI naenaçec nuçne adab cahtraM
. zaeyana ereb táçnetaztil alosnoc ceh , anagairaM ate anagahtraM necetic rohte ztihna cirateuduI atE
: äurugni neroidats zrobamah neremelasureI libruh ainahteB adab neC
. alec naetnemunom aleuç nuge rual ai aruh naçec nedire ate , suseI adab nidec rohtE
. táçnecetiag lih niuqerroh ere-ug necaoG , yenugal ulupicsid caned neztied sumydiD samohT adab néceic narrE
. anagnerah necaog aniab : nah nécniniapze nerec ) taçneuçaçed stehnis ( citagneuç zian areugela atE
: ad lih orazaL , iuqoralc cesuseI néceic narre adab naudrO
. aleuç netiarre zaeztrakol oczol netuç etsv ceh ate : zaoireh nerah cesuseI naçec narre ruah atE
. cud nerutadnes aztadab ol nidlab , anuaI , célupicsid ereb adab netoçeic narrE
. nadaçed raztari aonab aniab , aztad ol aedsiuqida erug orazaL , etsoid oreug ate , utid netiarre cuah açuaG
. nahtiab aruh atze ciriugra nece : ad neztapotzaheb , zauag idadab libe rohen nidlab aniaB
. ud netsuki aiugra ocatenuh udnum nece : neztapotzaheb atze , idadab libe zanuge rohen nidlab ? nero ibamah aritze naenugE , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? zia netiaoi arah zirreb ate , zihan utadipal ih cauduI naztlibaic niaro , áurtsigaM , céulupicsid etastoiD
. zirreb táraeduI necaoG , yeulupicsid néceic narre naodno nerroh oreuG
. natrah ukel néztiab non naudro , nidec noge nuge ib , alec ire nece naeneuç nuçne adaB
. orazaL ate , ápziha nerah ate , ahtraM cesuseI etiam neutic atE
. taçnidad acifirolg aemeS neraocniaI zaçrah nussatire , natairolg neraocniaI aniab , aratoireh atze iroh nussatirE , naçec narre cesuseI cinuçne iroh atE
. cud ire , anaud etiam cih , ánuh , anuaI , aletioic , anagnerah céberra nenuh adab netaçec rogI
) ire neztiab orazaL eyana neniec : aneutic utacuhci zeolib ocestada ereb canio nerah ate , aneuç utatcnv zutneugnv anuaI nec ruah airaM atE (
. ocugrub nerapziha nerah ahtraM ate nerairaM , ocainahteB , ire tabmoçiug nec neztied orazaL adab neC
. nahtiab aruh netaçec stehnis nah ceztihna atE
. nedaric caoczaiuge , caicug açuag neutid narre zaçenuh cesennaoI aniab : nakv niuge ertab cirongis utze cesennaoI , nétuç netiarre ate , anagnerah nidec rohte ztihna atE
. nah nidec noge ate : arukel nec ira neztayehtab sennaoI nehel , aredla ecreb zanadroI zirreb nidec naoi atE
. cirateucse néyah nidec ruzti aniab : naztlibaç zihan utrah aruh adab zirreB
. natrah in ate aled natin atiA nece neuçaçed stehnis ate tugaçe : euçazti stehnis cárbo , euçuanapze ihan istehnis in nidlab ate , tutidab netiuge nidlab aniaB
: stehnis aleuçaçenze , tutidapze netiuge cárbo neratiA eruen nidlaB
? alecian aemeS neraocniaI nece , nadud narre nerec , alecian ira neztamehpsalb nece euçoid ceuç , uaniab irrogi arudnum ate utacifitcnas catiA iN
: árutpircS etiatiab stuah nice ate , atiab naçi niuge aztih neraocniaI arateniec , ocniaI utidab uhtied ceh nidlaB
? eteraç ocniaI , tud narre ciN , naeugeL neuç autabircs atzE , cesuseI néceic stedrahI
. ocniaI äurub erue cutiab netiuge ciralecia noçiug cih nerec ate , citagaoimehpsalb aniab , neztadipal uguaze citagano arbO , aletioic , céuduI netoçeic stedrahI
? euçuan neztadipal citaganiec cirateh arbo : cinagatiA eruen teuçuard nakv istucare cino arbo ztihnA , cesuseI néceic stedrahI
. oceztadipal nerah céuduI irrah zirreb adab netaçec raH
. arag tab atiA ate iN
. citucse neratiA ene ceh euqaztid aparrah nice crohen ate , ad ogaidnah aniab caicug , anadiuqzuard name ceh irin atiA enE
. citucse ene crohen ceh nerutaparrah utitze ate : naluces nerudlag edaritze ate : yæh teuard netiame alanrete ezticiv cin atE
. irin tiuqziaç netiuqierrai ate , ceh tutid neztugace cin ate , étud netuçne azov ene céidra enE
. teuçuartiab narre alon , cirateidra ene eterazte nece : netsehnis euçutze ceuç aniaB
. étud neztacifitset zaçin cérbo nadutid netiuge naeneci neratiA eruen cin : netsehnis euçutze ate , teuçuard narrE , cesuseI néceic stedrahI
. iuqognarf cugaçei narre , tsirhC ziahab ih nidlab ? natadud cacudad ámira erug onardzioN , netoçeic narre ate , céuduI aruh adab netaçec arugnI
. nairelag nenomolaS naelpmet suseI nec neztaessap atE
. nec äugen ate , nemelasureI nidec niuge átseb neraenoitacideD naudrO
? euqaztid laha iuqeri caiugeb néusti caurbaed ala : caneraneud aurbaed edaritze cuah ztiH , nétuç netiarre cécreB
? etoiuqziaç neztaheb irroh citagrec : aod utohre ate , ud aurbaeD , ceztihna cirateh netuç netiarre atE
. citagcuah soporp naetra néuduI nidec niuge enoisnessid zirreb naudrO
. cinagatiA eruen tud utibecer ruah udnemanaM . oceztrah nerah zirreb tud erehtob ate , ocetraçe nerah tud erehtob : zurub eruen aruh netraçe tud cin aniab , netiuqede aruh tuartze croheN
. taçnadaçed rah aruh zirreb , aiciv eruen tutiab netraçe cin nerec , catiA in uan etiam ztocalaH
. tabmiaztra ate tabiugehtra ad neniuge ate , étud nenuçne azov ene nece : tutid raheb irrake ere-ceh : ocatenuh iugehtra edaritiapze niec tudab ere-ciridra ecreB
. citagcaidra eruen tud netraçe aiciv eruen ate : atiA tud neztugaçe ere-cin , alaçeb neuan neztugaçe in catiA
. zéidra eruen zian neztugaçe ate , caidra eruen tutid neztugaçe ate , ano niaztra zian iN
. ciraisna néidra utiapze ate , atiab oiranecrem nerec , ud netiuge sehi caoiranecrem atE
. caidra utid neztayerrab ate neztaparrah caosto ate : ud netiuge sehi ate , caidra utid netiztv , aled udleh aosto naenassucad , caidra edaritiapze caneniec , canetze niaztra ate , caoiranecrem aniaB
: citagcaidra ereb ud netraçe aiciv ereb cano niaztra : ano niaztra zian iN
. táçnetud aitnadnuba ate , taçnetud ezticiv zian irrohte in : neciab taçnaztid niugesed ate lih ate stabe caidra netrohte atze aniohO
. ud nenedire aczab ate , ad nerikli ate ad neruhtras ate : ad nerutaulas idadab ras rohen nidlab ciratin , áhtrob zian iN
. nakv nuçne ceh etzutitze céidra aniab : niugathciag ate edarid nioho edaritiab irrohte naeniztia ene ere-tabmec caicuG
. áhtrob néidra alecian in nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , cesuseI zirreb adab néceic narrE
. aneuarec netiarre yæh nec rec tugaçe netaçezte ceh aniab : cesuseI néceic narre ruah enoitarapmoC
. azov néztorra neztugaçe etutiapze nerec : etacuard neniuge sehi aniab , neriuqierrai acziazte itab ztorra atE
. azov nerah etud neztugaçe nece , acziaç netiuqierrai irah caidra ate : ad netiaoi naeniztia néyah , naeneutid iuqodi caidra ereb atE
. taropmac utid netiamare ate , zeneci ereb niec utid neztied caidra ereb ate : étud netuçne azov nerah céidra ate , acuard netiuqeri caniaçlahtrob inuH
. aniaztra neidra ad , aned neztras citahtrob aniaB
. niugathciag ate ad nioho aruh , ciratecreb netiagi ad aniab , anetze neztras ariugehtra néidra citahtrob , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE

. ogadab autakeb neuç zareb : ugassucadaB , euçud netiarre niaro aniab : cirutakeb etieuqudnizte , etenicab usti nidlaB , cesuseI néceic narrE
? arag usti ere-ug alA , netoçeic narre ate , cuztab nedaric niuqerah cirateuesirahP , iroh netaçec nuçne atE
. taçnecetid usti canetud netsuki ate : táçnetaçed suki , cénetutze netsuki : zian irrohte aratenuh udnum in aretiuge udnemeguI , cesuseI naçec narre atE
. aruh naçec aroda atE . anuaI , taid netsehniS , oid crah atE
. aruh cud aned oçnim niuqerih ate , aruh cud issuki atE , cesuseI noçeic narre atE
? nahtiab aruh nadaçed stehnis , anuaI , ad ron atE , naçec narre ate crah naçec stedrahI
? nahtiab aemeS neraocniaI cih cud netsehniS , nóçeic narre , aruh naeneuç nedire ate : aropmac aruh netuç nakv iztoge alon cesuseI naçec nuçnE
. aropmac aruh netaçec ztiari atE ? ug cutiag netsacari cih ate , iroicug zia auhtros natutakeb iH , netoçeic narre ate netaçec stedrahI
. idial nice sued , cinagaocniaI ruah zilapze nidlaB
. ciriugeb neruhtros usti aleud iuqeri crohen nece atze naçi nuçne onadnugE
. ud netuçne aruh , udab netiuge aetadnorov nerah ate , adab iraztibrec neraocniaI tiebron nidlab aniab : netuçne aleutitze caocatothciag ezticiv caocniaI nece ugiuqadab atE
. caiugeb ene utitiab iuqeri ate , ned cidnon euçiuqatiapze ceuç nerec , aulucarim ad natenuh , rugeS , néceic narre ate canoçiug naçec stedrahI
. ugaiuqaezte ned cidnon ruah aniab : aocniaI aloyaç naçi utaçnim isesyoM nece ugaiuqaecab cuG
. cutiag ulupicsid nesesyoM , naetabmeceb ned zaçug : ulupicsid nerah ih néciA , netaçec narre ate , aruh netaçec airuini naudrO
? eteraç ihan niuge ulupicsid nerah ere-ceuç ala ? euçud ihan nuçne zirreb citagrec : nuçne euçutze ate , teuçuard narre aI , néceic stedrahI
? caiugeb erih utid iuqeri natalon ? cuard niuge reC , zirreb netoçeic narre atE
. aladassucadab niaro ciralecnin usti nece , tiuqadab tabaçuag : tiuqatze zened othciaG , naçec narre ate , crah adab naçec stedrahI
. aled aothciag iroh noçiug nece ugaiuqecab cug : iraocniaI airolg cómE , netoçeic narre ate , anaçi usti noçiug naidla nerragib adab netaçec ieD
. euçaçe agorretni areb , ud nidA , netaçec narre cématia nerah ztocalaH
. nidel ztiari citagoganys , tsirhC alecil aruh açelab rohtia crohen nidlab , céuduI netuç utanedro ai nece : néuduI nedariztiab rudleb nerec , cématia nerah netaztic narre cuah açuaG
. ad nerutaçnim zäurub ereb areb , euçaçe agorretni areb : ud nida careb : ugiuqatze cug , caiugeb nenuh neutid iuqeri cron ode : ugiuqatze , nassucad niaro natalon aniaB
: aled naçi oyai usti ate , aemes erug aled ruah nece ugiuqadaB , netaçec narre ate , cématia nerah néceic stedrahI
? assucad niaro adab natalon ? aneuçoid alec oyai usti ceuç emes neuç ad ruaH , aletioic , ceh netaztic agorretni atE
: oneteuqaztil ied cámatia neraneuç utibecer aetsuki , aleuç utibecer aetsuki ate , alec naçi usti nece , zaçrah céuduI stehnis netaçezte aniaB
. aled atehporP , naçec narre crah atE ? naiuqzuard iuqeri caiugeb nerec , zaçrah coid rec ciH , zirreb irausti etacuard netiarrE
. naetra néyah nec enoisnessid atE ? euqaztid laha niuge cuah ngis cetab ocatothciag ezticiv noçiug nataloN , netuç netiarre cécreB . neztariugeb utze aohtabbaS nece : cinagaocniaI atze ruah noçiuG , cuztab cirateuesirahP adab netuç netiarrE
. tud netsuki ate , zian utibrag ate , areniag néiugeb eruen tuard nakv irraçe ihoL , néceic narre crah atE . neuç utibecer aetsuki natalon ere-céuesirahP aruh netaçec agorretni adab zirreB
. naeneutic iuqeri caiugeb nerah ate naeneuç niuge aihol cesuseI aohtabbaS nec atE
. arateuesirahP aruh nec iho usti etud netiamarE
. tiuqatzE , oiD ? aruh ad noN , netoçeic narre naudrO
. tud utibecer aetsuki cirutibrag ate cinaoi adaB . ida ibrag ate , arirragzuki oceoliS ahO , tuard narre ate , caiugeb ene utid utatorf ate , ud niuge ihol canociug ned neztied suseI , naçec narre ate , crah naçec stedrahI
? caiugeb erih edarid naçi iuqeri nataloN , adab netoçeic narrE
. aruh zian iN , neuç netiarre careb aniaB , idurid aruH , cécreb ate : ad ruaH , nétuç netiarre cuztaB
? anec neztacse ate aneogec iho cirirrai ruah atzE , nétuç netiarre , alec usti nece cénetuç issuki nehel ate , céoçua adaB
. aleuç netsuki nidec luzti ate , nidec ibrag ate , adab nidec naoI . arirragzuki ocened ihan narre airrogi , eoliS areztibrag ahO , noçeic narre atE
: caiugeb nerausti naztic atorf zaçrah ihol ate , cituht ihol naçec niuge ate , arerrul naçec niuge uht naeneuç narre ruaH
. zian aiugrA neraudnum , onecian naudnuM
. idiatiab cirarbo nice crohen zion auag euqrotadab : oned anuge , tutid raheb niuge cárbo neraneuan irrogi iN
. natenuh taçnecetil atsefinam cárbo neraocniaI , ad oyai usti aniab : cématia nenuh ze , ud niuge utakeb cenuh zE , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? nidel ros usti alenuh , cématia nenuh ala cenuh , ud niuge utakeb cenieC , áurtsigaM . aletuc netiarre . céulupicsid ereb netaçec agorretni atE
. tabusti citeztros noçiug naçec suki cesuseI alec netiagari atE
. citelpmet nidec ikli ate , nidec edrog suseI aniab : ocetihtrua artnoc nerah : irrah naudro netaçec raH
. zian in , nehel oniab nidec maharbA , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , cesuseI néceic narrE
? cud issuki maharbA ate , cutitze oniaro ehtrv ramah ate yeugorreB , céuduI adab netoçeic narrE
. ad naçi utareugela ate , ud nakv issuki ate : ruah nuge ene táçnaçel suki nidec areugela atia neuç maharbA
. tud neztariugeb aztih nerah ate , aruh tugaçadab aniab : itruçeug , iduri ceuç zian nenaçi , neztugaçe aruh aladutze nece taçedab narre nidlab ate : aruh tud neztugaçe cin aniab : aruh neztugaçe euçutze atE
. aled ocniaI neuç nece ceuç euçutiab netiarre zeniec , aneuan neztacifirolg in ad atiA ene : sued atze airolg ene , äurub eruen tudab neztacifirolg cin nidlaB , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? cud netiuge äurub erue cih ron : cutid naçi lih ere-catehporP ? atiab naçi lih niec , zia ogaidnah oniab maharbA atia erug ih alA
. naluces aoireh narutatsad utze , açedab ariugeb aztih ene crohen nidlaB , coid cih ate : cátehporP ate cud naçi lih maharbA : alaud aurbaed nece ugaid utugaçe niarO , céuduI netoçeic narre naudrO
. naluces nerissuki utze aoireh , açedab ariugeb aztih ene crohen nidlab , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. cineud neztaegui ate , cineud neztahlib adab : neztahlib áirolg eruen tutze cin atE
. in euçuan neztarohosed ceuç ate , atiA eruen , neztaroho tud aniab : aurbaed cin tutzE , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? alaud aurbaed ate , ih alecia onatiramaS nece , cug netiarre iugnv ugutzE , netoçeic narre ate céuduI naudro netaçec stedrahI
. cinagaocniaI eteraztiapze nerec , netuçne euçutitze ceuç ztocalah : utid netuçne caztih neraocniaI , caned cinagaocniaI
? netsehnis euçuanze ceuç nerec , tudab netiarre áiuge nidlab ate ? zutakeb in uan neztidneherper cirateuç croN
. netsehnis euçuanze , tutiab netiarre aiuge cin nerec atE
. atia nerarruçeug ate ad itruçeug nece : ad oçnim citirporp ereb , arruçeug utiab netiarre ere-zioN . natrah atze ciraiuge nece : utareuesrep utze náiuge ate , cinadnaestah nec eliahreciug aruh : euçutid ihan niuge carised neratia neuç ate , eteraç cinagaurbaed atia , ceuÇ
. aztih ene euçeuqoritiab nuçne nice nerec ? neztida euçutze aegaognel ene citagreC
. uan irrogi crah aniab , irrohte zurub eruen zianze ate : zian irrohte ate utitrap cinagaocniaI in nece : in euçeuqudnin etiam , zilab atia neuç aocniaI nidlaB , cesuseI adab néceic narrE
. aocniaI atiab , ugaid tabatia : oyai cirataçidralliap cutiagze uG , netoçeic narre atE . cárbo neratia neuç euçutid netiuge ceuÇ
. niuge utze cemaharbA iroh : anoçiug nadeuçuard narre aiuge nadud nuçne cinagaocniaI , zianiab , etaztlibaç zihan lih in adab niarO
. etzieuqaçnic niuge cárbo nemaharbA , etenicab ruoah nemaharbA nidlaB , cesuseI etsoiD . cud maharbA , atia eruG , netoçeic narre ate netaçec stedrahI
. aneuçud issuki nahtiab atia neuç euçud netiuge ceuç ate : anadud issuki nahtiab atiA eruen tud netiarre ciN
. nahtiab ceuç cirukel utiapze caztih ene nerec , etaztlibaç zihan lih in aniab : aleteraç aicah nemaharbA ceuç nece tiuqadaB
. eteraç nenaçi erbil iuqzaiuge , etaztiaçab niuge erbil ceuç caemeS nidlab adaB
. ztocereihteb ogad aemes , naehcte ztocereihteb netioge atze airaztibrec atE
. aled iraztibrec nerautakeb aicug neud netiuge autakeb nece teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , cesuseI néceic stedrahI
? alerag nenaçi erbil ug cih coid alon : onadnuge utaztibrec ugaitze rohen ate , cutiag aicah nemaharbA , netoçeic stedrahI
. etzutiaç neniuge erbil ceuç cáiugE ate , áiugE nerutugaçe euçud atE
. eteraç nenaçi ulupicsid ene iuqzaiuge , naeztih ene euçaçedab areuesrep ceuç nidlaB , yeuduI netuç nakv istehnis aruh cesuseI neuarec netiarre naudrO
. nahtiab aruh netaçec stehnis ceztihna , aleutic netiarre crah cuah açuaG
. ereihteb tutitiab netiuge cáçuag ocaragog nerah cin nerec , catiA roruen iztv uanze : ad niuqene aneuan irrogi in necE
. aladutid netiarre cuah açuag alaçeb , neuan istacari catiA aniab , netiuge sued aladutze zurub eruen ate , aruh alecian in nece euçud nerutugaçe naudro , aemeS neranoçiug naeneuçeuqud utahctlA , cesuseI adab néceic narrE
. aleyaç oçnim zatiA nece tugaçe netaçeztE
. toiuqzuard netiarre iraudnum cáçuag nadutid nuçne cinagnerah cin ate : ad itaiuge aneuan irrogi in aniab : oceztaegui ate oceztaçnim zaçeuç tud açuag ztihnA
. teustoidab , aocinadnaestaH , cesuseI néceic narre naudrO ? zia ron iH , adab netoçeic narrE
. eteraç nelih nateutakeb neuç , aruh alecian in euçaçedapze stehnis nidlab necE . aleteraç nelih nateutakeb neuç nece teuçuard narre ztocalaH
. ciratenuh udnum zian ze in , eteraç ciratenuh udnum ceuç : citiarag in , eteraç citereheb ceuç , néceic narre naudrO
. eteuqzotaç nice ceuç , zianiab netiaoi in taroN , utiab netiarre ? äurub ereb ud ehto nelih careB , céuduI adab netuç netiarrE
. eteuqzotaç nice ceuç , zianiab netiaoi in taron : eteraç nelih nautakeb neuç ate , euçuan nerutahlib ate aonab iN , cesuseI zirreb adab néceic narrE
anero nerah irrohte néztiapze oniaro nerec , tol nóiuqazte rohen ate : naelpmet alec ira netsacari , naireruaseht cesuseI naztic narre cuah ztiH
. eteuqaçednic tugaçe ere-atiA ene , euçudninab neztugaçe in nidlab : atiA ene ze , neztugaçe euçuan in zE , cesuseI naçec stedrahI ? atiA erih ad noN , adab netacuarec netiarrE
. catiA neuan irrogi in zaçin ud neztacifitset ate , anadud neztacifitset zaçroruen zian iN
. aled ocetsehnis aegainomitset nenoçiug ib nece , ad autabircs ere-naeugeL neuç aniaB
. atiA neuan irrogi in ate in aniab , roruen zianze nece : ad oczaiuge audnemegui ene , cin ere-taçedab aegui nidlab atE
. rohen neztaegui tutze cin , euçud neztaegui zeuara neraiugarah ceuÇ
nécian netiaoi taron ze , necian netrohte cidnon euçiuqatze ceuç aniab : necian netiaoi taron ate , nécian irrohte cidnon tiuqadab nece : aegainomitset ene ad ocetsehnis citaganeztacifitset zaçroruen ciN , néceic narre ate cesuseI naçec stedrahI
. ocetsehnis cutze aegainomitset erih , cud neztacifitset zäurub erue ciH , céuesirahP adab netoçeic narrE
. aiugra ocezticiv ud nenakv aniab , nerilibe naebmuhli atze anatierrad irin : aiugra neraudnum zian iN , aleoic , neiuqec açnim suseI adab zirreB
. alaniugatze cirutakeb ogaiheug ate , aho : neztanmednoc ere-cin tuazE , cesuseI nóçeic narre atE . anuaI , crohen zE , naçec narre crah atE
? utanmednoc uaze crohen ? caelaçasucca erih edarid non , áetzamE , irah nóçeic narre , neciab aetzame naenassucazte rohen cesuseI naenec udnehcuhc atE
aetzame neogec naetra ate , nidec idleug areb suseI ate : onarateneuqza cirissah ciratenerrahaç nedaric netikli naodno neraecreb atab , aleutic neztasucca caitneicsnoc , naenetuç nuçne iroh adaB
. naerrul neuç neztabircs ciruhtrug zirreb atE
. açeb iugidrua airrah artnoc nerroh cinehel , caned ebag utakeb cirateuÇ , néceic narre cirudnehcuhc , aletuç neztareuesrep zeztagorretni nerah atE
. naerrul neuç neztabircs zaihre ciruhtrug itieheb cesuseI aniaB . táçnetul asucca zaçrec aruh , aletuç neztatnet aruh netuç netiarre ruah atE
? coid rec adab cih : necetid adipal caocalenuh cucuarid utanam cesesyoM naeugeL atE
. naereb etatiuge ocoiretluda cud naçi namaztah ruah etzame , áurtsigaM , etastoiD
, cirirraçe naetra aruh ate : tab-namaztah naoiretluda etzame céuesirahP ate cébircS anagnerah netrake étud naudrO
. ceh neutic netsacari aleogec cirirrai ate : anagnerah nidec rohte aicug ulupop ate , arelpmet nidec rohte zirreb naiugeb neraiugra atE
. táridnem ocateztauilO nidec naoi suseI aniaB







. tárehcte ereb niec aredebtab nidec luzti atE
. ikli aletze ciratehporP citaelilaG nece ciuqai ate , idamrofni ? ocaelilaG ere-ih ziazE , netoçeic narre ate netaçec stedrahI
? ebag utugaçe neud niuge rec ate , ebag nuçne niheb areb , rohen ud neztanmednoc caeugeL erug alA
, tab cirateh néztiab niec , canec naçi irrohte zauag anagnerah omedociN etsoiD
. ad autacidaram , ruah naiuqatze ned rec aeugeL ulupop aniaB
? nahtiab aruh ud istehnis ere-cetab cirateuesirahP ode ciraterodanreboG alA
? uticudes ere-ceuç etzetanic ehtozE , céuesirahP neceic stedrahi ztocalaH
. ruah noçiug alon , cinoçiug utaçnim alah atze onadnugE , céreiciffo netaçec stedrahI
? irrake aruh euçutze citagreC , néceic narre ceh ate , arateuesirahP ate aratelapicnirp erodacifircaS careiciffo adab necetic rohtE
caucse aeniag nerah raçe naztizte crohen aniab , namaztah netuç ihan cuztab cirateh atE
. citagnerah naetra neraulupop adab nidec niuge enoisnessiD
? aled nerirrohte tsirhC citugrub nec netioge diuaD ogmehelhteB ate , citicah ne-diuaD nece , netiarre carutpircS utzE
? tsirhC ad nerirrohte citaelilaG aniabalA , nétuç netiarre cuztab atE . tsirhC ad ruaH , nétuç netiarre cécreB
. aruh atehporP iuqzaiuge ad ruaH , netuç netiarre , naenetuç nuçne ruah soporp cirateoceztedneg adab ceztihnA
) utacifirolg néztiapze oniaro suseI nerec , name nézte audnias utiripS oniaro rece : záutiripS netuç oceztibecer cénetuç netsehnis nahtiab aruh neuç netiarre ruah atE (
. citelebas ereb acziaç nerutairai caoiuulf ocziciv rv , alaçeb neoid cárutpircS , iraneud netsehnis nahtiab iN
açeb nade ate anagene rohteb , adab irrage rohen nidlaB , aleoic , neogec zuhio ate , nah suseI nidec nedire naidnah nuge neuqza ocatseb atE
? eteuqzetiaç rohte nice ceuç arah , zianiab nenaçi in non ate : nenedire ze ate , euçuan nerutahliB , ruah soporp neud narre ad cireC
? aretsacari néocerG ate , ad ocetiaoi taratenedarid cautayerrab naetra néocerG ala ? nenedire ugutiapze cug , ad ocetiaoi ruah taroN , naetra nerrakle céuduI adab netaçec narrE
. eteuqzetiaç rohte nice ceuç arah , zianiab nenaçi in non ate : nenedire ze ate euçuan nerutahliB
. tánaganèuan irrogi aonab oreug , zian niuqeuç ztocatetabitug arobmed oniarO , cesuseI adab néceic narrE
. táçnetaçel namaztah aruh careiciffo célapicnirp erodacifircaS ate céuesirahP netaztic rogi ate : neztarumrum zaçrah naeniag néuah aeztedneg céuesirahP netaçec nuçnE
? oniab caneutid netiuge cenuh , ud ehto neniuge ulucarim ogaiheug naenerrohtad cetsirhC , nétuç netiarre ate , nahtiab aruh netaçec stehnis ceztihna cirataoceztedneg atE
. anero nerah irrohte oniaro nézte nece , naeniag nerah raçe caucse naztizte crohen aniab : naztlibaç zihan namaztah aruh naudrO
. uaniab irrogi crah ate , zianiab cinagnerah nerec , aruh tud neztugaçe cin aniaB
. neztugaçe ceuç euçutiapze niec , aneuan irrogi in itaiuge ad aniab , irrohte zianze zurub eruen ate , euçiuqadab nécian cidnon ate , neztugaçe euçuan in atE , netiarre ate aleuç netsacari , naelpmet suseI adab neogec zuhiO
. netad cidnon neniuqai utze crohen , naenerrohtad tsirhC aniab : ned cidnon ugiuqadab ruah aniaB
? tsirhC iuqzaiuge aled ruah nece , cérodanreboG etieuqul ehto utugaçe iuqzaiuge ala : netiuge sued etacuartze ate , ad oçnim iuqognarf , anuh atE
? anetud neztahlib oceztlih ruah atzE , cuztab ratemelasureI adab nétuç netiarrE
. euçaçe aegui zetab oczedib udnemegui aniab , aruara neraitnerappa aegui aleuçaçetzE
? naohtabbaS nadud utadnes iuqosso tab-noçiug nerec artnoc ene eteraç erressa : táçnidatze stuah aeugeL nesesyoM , naohtabbaS canoçiug udab neztibecer aenoisicnocriC nidlaB
. anoçiug euçud neztidicnocric naohtabbaS ate ) ciratetiA aniab , zened cinagsesyoM ze ( , aenoisicnocriC euçuard name cesesyoM erelah aniaB
. eteduaç zarim caicug ate , tud niuge tabarbO , néceic narre ate cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? zihan lih ih alibad ron : cih cud aurbaeD , narre ate caulupop naçec stedrahI
? zihan lih in etaztlibaç citagreC ? aeugeL netraçe natarbo ere-cetab cirateuç utiapze ate ? aeugeL name cesesyoM euçuartzE
. atze nahtiab aruh ciraititsuini ate , itaiuge ad , analibad ahlib nerairolg neraneud irrogi areb aniab : alibad ahlib nerairolg ereb , aned oçnim zurub ereB
. zenecian oçnim zurub eruen in ala , zened cinagaocniaI aye , zánirtcod ud nerutugaçe , niuge aetadnorov nerah udab ihan crohen nidlaB
. aneraneuan irrogi in aniab , aene atze ánirtcod enE , naçec narre ate , cesuseI néceic stedrahI
? ebag issaki , iuqziuqad cártel cenuh nataloN , aletioic , cauduI neduec zarim atE
. nec ira netsacari ate , arelpmet suseI nidec nagi , naenec nagari idre ai atseb atE
. zerrudleb néuduI , zaçrah oçnim nézte iuqognarf rohen ere-ciradaB
. aulupop ud nezticudes aniab : atzE , nétuç netiarre cécreb ate : ad ano noçiuG netuç netiarre cuztab nece : zaçrah naetra neraulupop nec aidnah enoitarumrum atE
? aruh ad noN , netuç netiarre ate , nátseb aruh netuç neztahlib adab céuduI
. alaçeb cilihci aniab , zirreuga ze , aratseb nidec nagi ere-aruh naudro , caeyana nerah naenedaric nagi atE
. naelilaG nidec noge naenetzuarec narre cuah açuag atE
. ehteb oniaro atiapze árobmed ene nerec , aratenuh atseb netiagi oniaro zianze in : aratenuh atseb etzetiaç nagi ceuÇ
. aledarid othciag cárbo nerah nece , zaçrah tutiab neztacifitset cin nerec : tzirad ztiag irin aniab : ceuç etzeuqaztiaç steztiag caudnum nicE
. tserp ad ihteb árobmed neuç aniab : irrohte oniaro atze árobmed enE , cesuseI adab etsoiD
. nahtiab aruh netsehnis netuzte ere-ceyana nerah era necE
. iraudnum äurub erue coçei atsefinam , cutidab netiuge cuah açuag nidlab , cenalibad zihan naçi natenoitamitse , netiuge nauterces sued citze crohen necE
. canautid netiuge arbo erih táçnetaztid suki ere-ceulupicsid erih , táraeduI libah ate cidnemeh ida itraP , céyana ereb adab netoçeic narrE
. anec neztied nélcanrebat átseb néuduI nec libruh atE
. zihan lih aruh naztlibaztiab cauduI nerec , ihan ilibe naeduI nézte nece : naelilaG suseI nalibaçab oreug atE


. ere-necab tab cirateibamah , aneuç raheb utidart aruh nec ruah nece : zaemes nenomiS toiracsI saduI neuç netiarre ruah atE
? atiab urbaed tab cirateuç ate , utigele ibamah cin tetzutiaztE , cesuseI néceic stedrahI
. aemeS neraiciv ocniaI tsirhC alecia ih , nece ugaid utugaçe ate istehnis cug atE
: cih cutid caztih oczelanrete ezticiv ? arag nenaoi anagneron , anuaI , cesirreiP nomiS adab nóçeic stedrahI
? eteraç ihan naoi ere-ceuç alA , yeibamah cesuseI adab néceic narrE
. niuqerah naztlibazte cirogaiheug ate : necetic tarelebiug ztihna cirateulupicsid nerah cinadnaudrO
. oyaçapze name zatiA ene nidlab , anagene alerrohtad nice rohen nece teuçuard narre ztocalaH , neuç netiarre atE
. aneuç nerutidart aruh nec niec ate , canetuzte netsehnis nedaric niec cesuseI cinadnaestah naiuqaçab necE . cinetutze netsehnis cirateuç uztab edaridab aniaB
. ezticiv ate edarid utirips caztih nadeuçiuqzuard netiarre cin : neztahcteborp sued utze caiugarah , aneud neztacifiuiv ad autiripS
? arukel nec nehel netiagi aemeS neranoçiug euçaçedab suki nidlab adab etad reC
? etzutiaç neztaziladnacs cenuH , néceic narre , aletuç eztarumrum zaçenuh ceulupicsid nerah nece nahtiab ereb cesuseI adab ciralaiuqaÇ
? euqaçed laha nuçne cron : ruah ztih ad rogoG , netaçec narre cinuçne cuah açuag ceztihna adab cirateulupicsid neraH
. nemuanrepaC alec ira netsacari nágoganys naztic narre cuah açuaG
. iuqlanrete ad ociciv aneud nenai ruah iugo : edarid naçi lih ate , alaçeb netud nai ánnam cétia neuç ze : aned naçi istuai citurec iugo ad ruaH
. zaçin ere-aruh ad ociciv , ere aneuan nenai in alah : zatiA eruen zianiab iciv in ate , caned iciv atiA uaniab irrogi in aloN
. natrah in ate , ad netioge natin , netade alodo ene ate , aneud netai aiugarah enE
. irade ad iuqzaiuge alodo ene ate , adnaiv ad iuqzaiuge aiugarah ene necE
. naenuge neuqza aruh nerutaticsuser tud cin ate : alanrete ezticiv udab , alodo ene netade ate , aiugarah ene caneud netaI
. nahtiab ceuç cirezticiv euçutze , alodo nerah euçaçedapze nade ate , aiugarah neraemeS neranoçiug euçaçedapze nai nidlab , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , cesuseI néceic narre naudrO
? aretai ugeuqaçeid laha name aiugarah ereb irug cenuh nataloN , aletuç netiarre , naetra nerrakle céuduI adab netacudrahicaB
. anadud nename citagaezticiv neraudnum cin , ad aiugarah ene , aiugo nadud nename cin ate , iuqlanrete ad ociciv , ciratenuh iugo açedab nai crohen : anecian istuai citurec aiciv iugo zian iN
. táçnidatze lih aneud nenai ciratenuh , aned istuai citurec aiugo ad ruaH
. edarid naçi lih ate , nautresed ánnam étud nakv nai cétia neuÇ
. aiugo ocezticiv zian iN
. alanrete ezticiv udab caicug neud netsehnis nahtiab in , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. atiA ud issuki crah : neciab caned cinagaocniaI , crohen zeneud issuki atiA zE
. anagene ad netrohte aruh , issaki ate cinagatiA utiab nuçne zareb ere-croN . caistacari zaocniaI caicug edarid nenaçi atE , natetehporP ad autabircS
. naenuge neuqza aruh tud nerutaticsuser cin ate : açedapze arit catiA neuan irrogi in nidlab , anagene rohtad nice roheN
. naetra neuç arumrum aleuçaçetzE , néceic narre ate cesuseI adab naçec stedrahI
? zian istuai citureC , cenuh adab oid aloN ? ugutitiab neztugaçe cug ama ate atia neniec , aemes nehpesoI , suseI ruah atzE , nétuç netiarre atE
. aiugo necian istuai citurec zian iN , neuztiab narre nerec , zaçrah céuduI adab nétuç neztarumruM
. naenuge neuqza aruh tud nerutaticsuser cin ate , alanrete ezticiv neud , caicug neud netsehnis nahtiab aruh ate netsuki aemeS , aetadnorov neraneuan irrogi in ad ruah rebalaH
. naenuge neuqza aruh nadaçed aticsuser aniab , ciratrah lag nadaçetze , tuartiab name ererec , aneratiA , aetadnorov neraneuan irrogi in ad ruah atE
. aetadnorov neraueuan irrogi in aniab , aetadnorov eruen ze táçnedaçed niuge zian naçi istuai citurec necE
. neriztiari aropmac tutze , aned netrohte anagene ate , ad nerirrohte anagene , aicug natuard netiame catiA
. netsehnis euçutze ate , aleuçunab ere-issuki nece , teuçuard narre aniaB
. citiogai nerutirrage atze , aneud netsehnis nahtiab in ate : nerutessog atze , aned netrohte anagene : aiugo ocezticiv zian iN , cesuseI néceic narre atE
. iroh iugo ereihteb cugaçei name , anuaI , adab netoçeic narrE
. anacuard ezticiv iraudnum ate , aned istuai citurec ad aiugo neraocniaI necE
. aoczaiuge iugo ociturec euçuard netiame catiA ene aniab : aiugo ociturec name cesesyoM euçuartze , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , cesuseI adab néceic narrE
. aretai euard name aiugo ocitureC , alaçeb ned autabircs : nautresed ánnam éid nakv nai cétia eruG
? cud netiuge arbo rec ? nugaçe stehnis ih ate táçnugassucad , cud netiuge cih adab ongis reC , netoçeic narre naudrO
. nahtiab aneud irrogi crah neuçaçed stehnis , árbo neraocniaI ad ruaH , néceic narre ate , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? cárbo neraocniaI taçnugaztid niuge ugud neniuge reC , adab netoçeic narrE
. ud nakv utaliugic catiA ocniaI ruah emeS nece : euçuartiab nename caemeS neranoçiug niec , citaganeud netuari taztocelanrete ezticiv aniab , citaganed neztlag adnaiv ze etzetiaç alliabarT
. eteraztiab naçi utaisasser ate , cirateiugo euçutiab nai nerec aniab , neuçutid issuki caulucarim nerec ze , etaztlibaç ahlib ene , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , naçec narre ate , cesuseI néceic stedrahI
? zia irrohte anuh zion , áurtsigaM , netoçeic narre , naedla ecreb neraossasti cinedire aruh atE
. aletuç neztahlib suseI , aremuanrepaC necetic rohte ate , arateicnv ere-ceh necetic ras , caulupicsid nerah ze , nah alezte suseI nece caeztedneg adab naenaçec sukI
. canuaI cirutadner caitarg , nétuztiab nakv nai aiugo non aredla nerah ukel alec irrohte cirohcticnv ecreb citedairebiT atE
: aledaric naçi naoi careb caulupicsid nerah aniab , arohcticnv suseI niuqeulupicsid ereb uhtras alezte ate , nedariztiab naçi uhtras caulupicsid nerah arateniec , neciab tab nah alezte cirohcticnv ecreb nece naeneud issuki caeztedneg neogec cirutidleug citedla ecreb neraossasti naenumarahiB
. arukel nedaric netiaoi nidec abirra aicnv natreb ate : utibecer aricnv aruh adab nétuç nakv ihaN
. rudleb aleterazte , zian iN , néceic narre crah atE
. necetic ici ate , aloyaç neztlibruh iraicnv ate , alalibad zeniag sasti suseI etud netsuki , naodno utarit anioriba alaçeb edats ramah ate yeugoh ode , zrob ate yeugoh adaB
. nec neztahctla zistnuare cidnah eciah , aossasti atE
. irrohte arateh suseI nézte ate , nec anuhli ai ate : táredla muanrepaC aredla ecreb zaossasti nedaric netiaoi , aricnv ciruhtras atE
. arossasti caulupicsid nerah necetic stuai , naenidec rohte astarra atE
. areb-reb aridnem zirreb nidec ariter , táçnetaçel niuge euger aruh aledaric ocetrohte areztaparrah nerah nece cirutugaçe adab cesuseI
. aruh atehporP nec ocetrohte arudnum iuqzaiuge ad ruaH , nétuç netiarre , aulucarim neuç niuge cesuseI naenetuç issuki adab ceh edneG
. cirutarebos yenetuç nai , cirateoczerragarag iugo zrob , zihtaç iuqsas ibamah netaztic ehteb ate , adab netaztic liB
. nidatze lag sued , caihtaç nedarid utarebos euçazti liB , yeulupicsid ereb néceic narre naenedaric naçi utaisasser atE
. tabmeceb netuç ihan ere-cirateniarra rebalah : yeneduec cirirrai céulupicsid ate : yeulupicsid nézteic itrap cirutadner caitarg ate : caiugo cesuseI naztic rah atE
. äurugni nerautnoc nenoçiug allim zrob adab necetic raI . natrah ukel idnah rahleb nec atE . aedneg euçaçe icare raI , cesuseI naçec narre atE
? ocetra netabmah edarid rec cuah aniab : niarra ib ate , ciroczerragarag iugo zrob cineutid , taboclihtum nemeh cudaB
. caeyana nesirreiP nomiS uirdnA , cetab cirateulupicsid ereb astoiD
. naçel rah caredebtab aneitug ned , ocsa eyeuqilze zaiugo nerorenid nuhe-reB , ceppilihP nóçeic stedrahI
) neuç ocetiuge rec , naiuqaçab careb nece , citagaeztayesne nerah neuç netiarre ruah aniaB (
? taçnetaçed nai cuah , iugo ugud nerissore cidnoN , ireppilihP astoid , anagnerah alec netrohte aidnah eztedneg nece naeneuç issuki ate cesuseI naeneutic utahctla caiugeb adaB
. átseb neuduI , oczaB nec libruh atE
. niuqeulupicsid ereb nidec rai nah ate , suseI aratetab idnem nidec nagi naudrO
. caongis neutic netiuge naeniag néire crah netzutiztiab netsuki nerec , aidnah eztedneg nóyaç netiuqierrai atE
. arocairebiT , aredla ecreb zaossasti ocaelilaG suseI nidec naoi oreuG
. euçutid neristehnis caztih ene natalon , euçutidapze netsehnis cautabircs nerah nidlab aniaB
. ud nakv utabircs crah zaçin nece : in euçeuqoridnin ztehnis , etudnicab netsehnis sesyoM nidlab necE
. euçutiab açnareps ceuç nateniec , sesyoM , netaztiaç asucca cron adab : nahtiab atiA ceuç aladetzutiaç nerutasucca cin nece etsv aleuçutzE
? neztahlib euçutiapze áirolg ned udleh cinagareb cinagaocniaI ate , ciraleuçud neztibecer airolg cinagaecreb catab , euçeuqaçed laha stehnis ceuç nataloN
. euçud nerutibecer aruh , naeneci ereb idadab rohte tabecreb nidlab : neztibecer euçuanze ate , naeneci neratiA eruen zian irrohte iN
. nahtiab ceuç aleuçutze aoiroma neraocniaI nece tetzutiaç neztugaçe aniaB
. neztrah tutze ciratenoçiug cirairolG
. açneuçud aezticiv , anagene ihan irrohte eterazte atE
. canetud neztacifitset zaçin edarid ceh ate : aleuçud alanrete ezticiv nateh euçud etsv ceuç nece ; ciraterutpircS iuqtnegilid etzetiaç amrofnI
. netsehnis euçutze ceuç aruh , utiab irrogi crah ron nece : aled netioge nahtiab ceuç aztih nerah euçutze atE
. issuki aiduri nerah ateze , nuçne onadnuge azov nerah euçutzE . zaçin ud utacifitset careb catiA neuan irrogi in atE
. aleuan nakv irrogi catiA nece zaçin étud neztacifitset céreb arbo nadutid netiuge cin , cérbo nadiuqzuard name taçnadaztid ilpmoc catiA irin nece : tud aogaidnah egainomitset oniab anesennaoI cin aniaB
. naiugra nerah utareugela ztocatetab-ruppa eteraç naçi ihan ceuç ate : aneuç netiuge iugra ate anacehcaç alednac nec aruH
. táçnetzetiaç aulas ceuç tutid netiarre cuah açuag aniab : neztibecer ciregainomitset cinaganoçiug tutze cin aniaB
. iraiuge acuard name egainomitset crah ate , anagsennaoI euçud nakv irrogi ceuÇ
. aegainomitset neud neztacifitset zaçin aled oczaiuge nece tiuqadab ate , zaçin cineud neztacifitset ad tabecreB
. ocetsehnis atze aegainomitset ene , zäurub eruen tudab neztacifitset cin nidlaB
. naodno neraetadnorov neratiA , neuan irrogi in aniab : naodno neraetadnorov eruen alibanze nece : ad otsui audnemegui ene ate : tud neztaegui alaçeb naduçnad : sued zurub eruen cin tidiad nicE
. arenoitcerruser ocenoitanmednoc , canetieuqud niuge iuqziag aniab : arenoitcerruser ocezticiv , canetieuqud niuge iugnv edarid nerikli atE
. azov nerah etutiab nenuçne céicug ocatetnemunom nateniec anero ad nerirrohte nece : ruah sterim aleuçaçetzE
. naetabmeceb ned emeS neranoçiug , ocetiuge ere-udnemegui acuard name erehtob atE
. aetiakv neraezticiv nahtiab ereb ere-iraemeS acuard name alah , nahtiab ereb ezticiv utiab catiA alon necE
. edarid ociciv canetud nenuçne ate , azov neraemeS neraocniaI etutiab nenuçne célih zion , aled niaro ate , anero aled netrohte nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. arezticiv citoireh ad nagari aniab : nerirrohte aratenoitanmednoc atze aniah ate , alanrete ezticiv aleudab , caneud netsehnis aneuan irrogi in ate , netuçne aztih ene nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
. aruh utiab irrogi ceniec , atiA neztaroho utze , caneutze neztaroho aemeS : alaçeb netud neztaroho atiA , táçnetaçed aroho aemeS céicuG
: iraemeS acuard name aicug udnemegui aniab , rohen neztaegui utze catiA necE
. utid neztacifiuiv caneutid ihan ere-caemeS rebalah , neztacifiuiv ate calih utitiab neztaticsuser catiA alon necE
. táçneuçaçed sterim ceuç , irah aczuard neristucare caogaidnah arbo oniab cuah ate , aczuard netsucare caicug açuag neutid netiuge careb ate , aemeS ud etiam cátiA necE
. ud netiuge rebalah ere-caemeS aruh , utiab netiuge crah ere-rec nece : neztarbo átiA udapze issuki nidlab , ad ihan narre , sued zurub ereb caemeS idiad nice , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , néceic narre ate , cesuseI adab naçec stedrahI
. zeniuge nidrab neraocniaI äurub ereb , neuztiab narre alec aocniaI atiA nerah nerec era aniab , neuç istuah aohtabbaS nerec tnemalos ze , naztlibaç ogaztiugah zihan lih aruh cauduI adab ztocalaH
. tud neztarbo ere-cin ate , ud neztarbo onardniaro catiA enE , néceic stedrahi cesuseI aniaB
. naohtabbaS neutiztiab niuge cuah açuag nerec , naztlibaç zihan lih aruh ate , suseI céuduI nétuç neztatucesrep ztocalah atE
. aneuç nakv utadnes aruh alec suseI nece yeuduI néceic atnoc ate , ruah nociug nidec naoI
: náiuqatze leh ogaiuqziag tiabrec , alaiugatze cirutakeb ogaiheug : zia utadnes , ánuH , nóçeic narre ate , naelpmet cesuseI aruh naçec nedire oreuG
. citeztedneg nec natrah ukel nidec atrappa suseI nece : nec ron naiuqazte , canec naçi utadnes atE
? ida libe ate aeho erue caçe ahctlA , aruh noçiug nauard narre irih ad roN , netaçec agorretni naudrO
. ida libe ate aeho erue caçe ahctlA , tuard narre crah , uaniab utadnes in croN , néceic stedrahI
. náçed namare aeho iros cutze , cud aohtabbaS , iranec naçi utadnes céuduI adab netoçeic narrE
. natrah nuge aohtabbaS nec ate : nalibaçab ate , aeho ereb naçec ahctla ate : aruh noçiug nidec adnes natreb atE
. ida libe ate , aeho erue caçe ahctla , ida iuqiaI , cesuseI astoiD
. cud netsuai naeniztia ene tabecreb , naetratiuqzib necian netrohte in aniab : arirragzuki naçen raçe , naened utirrehv arv , cron taitze , anuaI , caire nóçeic stedrahI
? utadnes zia ihaN , ástoid , aleuç aecul arobmed ai nece cirutugaçe ate , alaztec cesuseI naenaçec suki ruaH
. cinacudaç canuçrahre zehtrv iztroçemeh ate yeugoh nah tab-noçiug nec atE
. nacudaztiab cenussatire ere-rec , nec neztadnes anec netsuai aratrah nehel naodno eztirrehv nerarv ate : neuç neztirrehv arv ate , arirragzuki zeniuqai udro nec netsuai tabureugniA necE
. aleduec ariugeb neraeztiugih nerarv , aidnah oçlum nudrahye orbmem , ugniam , usti , ire naztec nateH
. cineutid airelag zrob , cined neztied adse-hteB zociarbeH tabirragzuki náçalp idra nemelasureI ad atE
. aremelasureI suseI nidec nagi ate , nec tabatseb néuduI , naodno neuah açuaG
. araelilaG citaeduI naenec naçi irrohte cesuseI naçec niuge zirreb ruah ongis nerragiB
. caicug ehcte nerah ate , careb naçec stehnis atE . cud iciv aemes eriH , anacuarec narre cesuseI alec natrah nero nece cátia adab naçec tugaçE
. caztiagleh naic iztv natenero ipzaç oztA , netoçeic narre ate : nec naçi nedire iuqeboh zenero rec , néceic niugedlag naudrO
. cud iciv aemes eriH , aletioic , netoçeic atnoc ate , noiuqziuqec tab cairaztibrec ereb alec netsuai aruh ai atE
. nidec naoi ate aztih nacuarec narre cesuseI canoçiug naçec stehnis atE . cud iciv aemes erih : libaH , cesuseI astoiD
. nehel oniab nidad lih aemes ene ida istuai , anuaI , crah nuai etrog astoiD
. stehnis euçeuqaçetze , euçaztidapze suki caulucarim ate caongiS , cesuseI naudro nóçeic narrE
. naoic areztlih nece : aemes ereb nóçeil adnes ate , nidel stuai noçeic niuge ztiohto ate , anagnerah nidec naoi , araelilaG citaeduI alec irrohte suseI nece cinucne , ruaH
. nemuanrepaC ire néztiab aemes neniec , tab-nuai etrog nec atE . onrastaham arv neuztiab nakv niuge non , aririh ocaelilaG anaC zirreb suseI adab nidec rohtE
. aratseb nedaric naçi irrohte ere-ceh nece : cirissuki caicug açuag neutic niuge nemelasureI nátseb , ceonaelilaG netaçec ibecer , araelilaG naenec naçi irrohte adaB
. aleutze cireroho nairreh ereb cetab atehporP nece , naçec acifitset careb cesuseI necE
. táraelilaG nidec naoi ate , cidnah nidec itrap näurub nenuge ib atE
. aerodaulaS neraudnum tsirhC iuqzaiuge aled ruah nece uganiuqaecab ate , uganid nuçne corueug nece : netsehnis citaganarre erih ciritiog uganitzE , netacuarec netiarre iraetzame atE
. citagaztih nerareb netaçec stehnis cogaiheug zeztihna atE
. nuge ib nah nidec noge ate : nidel noge niuqeh netoçeic niuge ztiohto , caonatiramaS adab naenedaric irrohtE
. tuard narre aicug nadud niugE , aleoic , citaganarre neraneuç utacifitset etzame , nahtiab aruh netaçec stehnis ceztihna cirateonatiramaS ocatrah irih atE
. eteraç naçi uhtras naulliabart néyah ceuç ate , edarid naçi utaken caecreb : areztlib neraneterazte utaken tetzutiaç irrogi ciN
. aneud neztlib tabecreb ate , aneud netiere ad taB , ad oczaiuge ruah narre natenuh necE
. ere-caneud neztlib ateyab , táçneud oiraczob caneud netiere : táztocarelanrete ezticiv autcurf ud neztlib ate , ud neztibecer iras , caneud neztlib átzv atE
. oceztlib neratzv edarid utiruhc ai nece , carretzab euçaztiarim , caiugeb neuç euçaztitiog , teuçuard netiarre , ánuH ? ad nerirrohte átzv ate , edarid ehtebelih rual oniarO , netiarre ceuç euçutzE
. árbo nerah nadaçed abaca ate , aetadnorov neraneuan irrogi in nadaçed niuge ad ádnaiv enE , cesuseI etsoiD
? aretai acuard ehto irrake croheN , naetra nerrakle céulupicsid adab netuç netiarrE
. cineuçiuqatze ceuç , ocetai tud tabadnaiv ciN , néceic narre crah aniaB
. caçe nai , aurtsigaM , aletioic , céulupicsid netacuarec netiuge ztiohto naetratiuqzib atE
. anagnerah necetic rohte ate , citirih adab necetic iklI
? tsirhC ruah atze : caicug açuag nadutid niuge tiuqzuartiab narre ceniec tab-noçiug euçassuki , etzotaÇ
. yedneg ocatrah ukel néceic narre ate , aririh nidec naoi ate , caetzame aicnv ereb adab naçec iztV
? niuqerroh zia oçnim reC , ode ? oga zedlag nereC , narre nóçeizte crohen ere-ciradab : nec oçnim niuqetab etzame alon netaçec sterim ate , caulupicsid nerah necetic rohte naetratiuqzib atE
. anecian oçnim niuqerih , aruh nuan iN , cesuseI astoiD
. caicug açuag cugiuqzuarid nerutaralced naenerrohtad crah , aned neztied tsirhC , aled ocetrohte asaisseM nece taiuqaecaB , caetzame astoiD
. énid raheb utaroda zaiuge ate zutirips , cénetud neztaroda aruh ate : utiripS nud aocniaI
. nogaid zedlag nélaçaroda ocalah ere-atiA nece : zaiuge ate zutirips atiA etutiab nerutaroda céoczaiuge elaçaroda zion , nud niaro ate , anero nud netrohte aniaB
. nud cirateuduI audnemaulas nece : anugiuqad uganid neztaroda cug , aneuçiuqatze euçud neztaroda ceuÇ
. atiA nerutaroda nemelasureI ze natenuh idnem euçutiapze zion anero aled netrohte nece , in naçen stehnis , áetzamE , cesuseI astoiD
. atiab raheb utaroda non aukel aled nemelasureI nece euçoid ceuç ate : éid nakv utaroda natenuh idnem cétia eruG
. ih alecia atehporP nece tássucaidab , anuaI , caetzame astoiD
. nud narre zaiuge iroh : rahnes erih nutze , ananud niaro ate , nutid nakv rahnes zrob necE
. cirrahnes táitzE , nud narre iugnV , cesuseI astoiD . cirrahnes táitzE , nóçeic narre ate caetzame naçec stedrahI
. anuh rohta ate , arrahnes erue naçe ied libaH , cesuseI astoiD
. aretiuqodi anuh nidanze rohte ate , nidanze irrage , ciraterroh rv cadni , anuaI , caetzame astoiD
. taztocelanrete ezticiv , irruhti oczened netzuai rv nahtiab aruh nud neniuge , arv nadacuard nename cin aniab : naluces nerutirrage nutze , citerv nadacuard nename cin utiab nenade ere-cron aniaB
: zirreb nud nerutirrage aicug neud netade ciratenuh rV , noçeic narre ate cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? cérba nerah ate , cérruoah nerah ate , utiab nade ciratenuh careb ate , ruah uztup ucuartiab name ceniec , ih zia ogaidnah oniab bocaI atia erug alA
? iroh iciv rv zareb cud cidnon : anrab cud auztup ate , náçed iuqodi zaçrec cutze , anuaI , caetzame astoiD
. citiciv rv náneuquareztiab name ate , irah noeuqyaçni utacse ih , aretade nadnI , ananuard netiarre irih ned ron ate , aniahod neraocniaI iuqahab nidlaB , noçeic narre ate cesuseI naçec stedrahI
. niuqeonatiramaS céuduI cirenoitasreunoc éitze nece ? anatiramaS etzame zianiab , tua zeuqse irin aretade , ciralecia uduI ih aloN , cenuh anatiramaS etzame irah adab astoiD
. aretsore ocetai aririh nedaric naçi naoi caulupicsid nerah necE
. aretade nadnI , cesuseI irah nóçeic narre : aretiuqodi rv tabanatiramaS etzame nidec rohtE
. äurugni nénero yes nécab nece : naerretzab ruhti nidec rai alahereb autahnv naedib adab suseI : airruhti ne-bocaI nah nec atE
. naedla neraenoissessop nacuarec name ihpesoI emes ereb ce-bocaI atiab niec aratetab ned neztied rahciS irih ocairamaS adab ad netrohtE
. citairamaS nagari neuç raheb crah atE
. táraelilaG zirreb nidec naoi ate , aeduI naçec iztV
) caulupicsid nerah aniab , ere-necapze ira neztayehtab areb suseI (
: cesennaoI ze nece , neztayehtab ate aleuç netiuge ogaiheug ulupicsid cesuseI nece céuesirahP netuç nuçne alon canuaI naeneuç utugaçe adaB
. naeniag nerah ogad árih neraocniaI aniab , aezticiv nerissuki utze , caneutze neztidebo aemeS aniab : alanrete ezticiv udab , nahtiab aemeS caneud netsehniS
. arucse nerah utid name caicug açuag ate , aemeS ud etiam cátiA
. autiripS netiame zirruen acuartze caocniaI nece , ad neztaçnim zéztih neraocniaI aneud irrogi caocniaI necE
. aled itaiuge aocniaI nece ud utaliugic caneud utibecer aegainomitset neraH
