. neztibecer utze crohen aegainomitset nerah aniab : ud neztacifitset aruh utiab nuçne ate issuki rec atE
. ad oceniag néicug aned irrohte citurec : ad oçnim zécuag ocerrul ate , ad ocerrul , aned citerrul : ad oceniag néicug , aned irrohte citiaraG
. utipihc cin ate , utidnah ud raheb craH
. ad utilpmoc áçnargela ene zareb : citagazov neraosops ad neztareugela ztiugah , aneud netuçne aruh ate aned nah ediuqsida neraned osops aniab : ad osops aneud asopS
. naeniztia nerah zian naçi irrogi aniab , tsirhC in zian zE , nadud narre alon oinomitset tetzutiaç coruec ceuÇ
. citurec oiuqadapze name nidlab , sued euqaçed ibecer canoçiug nicE , naçec narre ate ce-sennaoI naçec stedrahI
. anagnerah cutid netrohte caicug ate , cud ira neztayehtab , árah , cutiab utacifitset cih zeniec , anec niuqerih naedla ecreb zanadroI , áurtsigaM , netoçeic narre ate , anagsennaoI necetic rohte atE
. zaenoitacifirup niuqeuduI cirateulupicsid nesennaoI tabenoitseuq adab nidec ahctlA
. naiugednioserp sennaoI naçi irraçe nézte oniaro necE
. nedaric neztayehtab ate caedneg nédaric netrohte ate : nah néztiab rv ztihna nerec , naedla ogmilaS nenonE nec ira neztayehtab ere-sennaoI atE
. nec ira neztayehtab ate , niuqeh nec netioge nah ate : arerrul ocaeduI niuqeulupicsid ereb suseI nidec rohte oreuG
. edaritiab caniuge aruara neraocniaI nerec : taçnecetid atsefinam cárbo nerah , ariugra ad netrohte , aned ira iuqzedib aniaB
. taçnecetitze idneherper cárbo nerah , netrohte ariugra atze ate : iraiugra aztirad ztiag , caicug ned ira iuqziag necE
. edaritiab caothciag cárbo neyah nerec : aiugrA ze nece aebmuhli cénoziug etud ogaistehno aniab , arudnum ad irrohte aiugrA nece , aenoitanmednoc adab ad ruaH
. naeneci neraztiokab emeS neraocniaI istehnis utze nece : ad autanmednoc ai aneutze netsehnis aniab : neztanmednoc atze , cineud netsehnis nahtiab aruH
. táçnidad aulas zaçrah audnum aniab , táçnaçed anmednoc audnum , arudnum aemeS ereb caocniaI irrogi utze necE
. táçneud alanrete ezticiv aniab , nidatze lag cineud netsehnis nahtiab aruh , utiab nakv name aztiokab emeS ereb non , audnum ud nakv istehno caocniaI alah necE
. táçneud alanrete ezticiv aniab , nidatze lag ertab cineud etsehnis nahtiab aruH
: aemeS neranoçiug ad raheb nidad ahctla alah , nautresed aeugus naçeztiab ahctla cesesyoM alon atE
. aned näurec emeS neranoçiug atiab niec , neciab aned istuai citurec , arurec nagi atze rohen necE
? euçud neristehnis teuçazteidab narre cáçuag ocurec nidlab natalon ? euçutidapze netsehnis ate , teuçiuqzuardab narre cáçuag ocerrul nidlaB
. neztibecer euçutze aegainomitset erug aniab : alugud neztacifitset záçuag nugud issuki ate , alugud netiarre áçuag nugiuqad nece , tauard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE
? neztugaçe cutitze cuah açuag ate , rotcod ocelearsI zia iH , nóçeic narre ate , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? euqzetiad laha niuge cuah açuag nataloN , noçeic narre ate , comedociN naçec stedrahI
. aicug ned oyai citutirips cud alah : ned netiaoi taron ze ned udleh cidnon ciuqatze aniab : cud netuçne astoh nerah ate : casnuarid arukel neud ihan caeciaH
. eteraç raheb oyai zirreB , nadauard narre nerec sterim aláçetzE
. cud utirips , aned oyai citutiripS ate : cud iugarah aned oyai citiugaraH
. námuser neraocniaI aletiad ras nice , anetze oyai zutiripS ate zerv , táuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? etiad laha oyai ate ras naelebas nerama ereb zirreb ala ? naened rahaç etiad laha oyai anoçiug nataloN , comedociN nóçeic narrE
ámuser neraocniaI aleuqaçed suki nice , cenetze nenaçi oyai zirreb , tauard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , nóçeic narre ate cesuseI naçec stedrahI
. adapze niuqerah aocniaI , cuah ongis náutid netiuge cih ceuqaztic niuge nice crohen nece : alecia airrohte urtsigam cinagaocniaI nece ugaiuqaecab , áurtsigaM , nóçeic narre ate , zauag anagsuseI nidec rohte ruaH
: tab ciratelapicnirp ocetra néuduI , cinec neztied omedociN tabmiecode cirateuesirahP adab neC

. naenoçiug nec rec naiuqaçab careb nece : zanoçiug naçel acifitset crohen ciraognem neuztiapze nerec atE
: caicug neutiztiab neztugaçe crah nerec , adif neyazte areb suseI aniaB
. caongis neutic netiuge crah cirissuki , naeneci nerah netaçec stehnis ceztihna , nátseb oczaB naenec nemelasureI atE
. aztih neuç narre cesuseI ate , árutpircS netaçec stehnis ate : neuarec nakv narre ruah alon , caulupicsid nerah necetic tiohro , ciratelih naenec utaticsuser adaB
. zaelpmet oczaztuprog ereb nec oçnim aruh aniaB
? cud nerutahctla zenuge rurih cih ate ate , ruah elpmet cud naçi utacifide zehtrv yes ate , yeugorreB , céuduI adab netaçec narrE
: nerutahctla tud zenuge rurih ate , ruah elpmet euçaçe niugeseD , néceic narre ate , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
? náztid niuge cairoh açuag cucuard netsucare ongis reC , netoçeic narre ate céuduI adab netaçec stedrahI
. cuain nai in caolez oczaehcte eriH , aled autabircs nece caulupicsid nerah necetic tiohro naudrO
. ehcte ocataoglatakrem zaehcte neratiA ene aleuçiugatze ate : cidnemeh cuah açuag euçaçti neK , néceic narre yelaçlas abmuloc ossv atE
. naztic luzti caniaham ate , naçec russi ádenom nérodaibmac ate : caidi ate caidra ate , citelpmet naztic ztoge caicug , zotadrok tabetoça ciniuge atE
. aleduec cirirrai caerodaibmac ate , caelaçlas abmuloc ossv ate idra ate idi naelpmet naztic nedire atE
. aremelasureI suseI adab nidec nagI . aoczaB néuduI nec libruh necE
. nuge ztihna ze , nah necetic noge ate : caulupicsid nerah ate caeyana nerah ate áma nerah ate areb , aremuanrepaC nidec stuai oreuG
céulupicsid nerah nahtiab aruh netaçec stehnis ate : áirolg ereb naçec atsefinam ate , naocaelilaG anaC cesuseI naçec niuge ruah estah ongiS
. onardniaro ano onrastaham cud nakv utariugeb cih aniab : aneothciag , naudro netieuqud nade iugnv oreug , cid netraçe ano onrastaham cinehel caicug noçiuG , astoid atE
, calatsodetsem aosops ud neztied ) netiuqaçab céiraztibrec netuç utaerrak arv aniab : nec cidnon naiuqazte ate ( anec naçi niuge onrastaham rv calatsodetsem naeneuç utatsad atE
: netoçeic rake atE . iralatsodetsem euçorrake ate , niaro euçastiarE , etsoid naudrO
. onariarag netaztic ehteb atE . zerv cábuk euçaztiahteB , cesuseI etsoiD
. irruen ánrurih ode árib caredebtab cinetacudaç , aruara neraenoitacifirup néuduI cairraçe ciroczirrah abuk yes nah nedaric atE
. euçiuge , euçaçeitiab narre ere-reC , yeiraztibrec cama nerah etsoiD
. anero ene irrohte nutze oniaro ? aetzame niuqerih cin tud reC , cesuseI astoiD
. éitze cironrastahaM , isuseI , astoid cáma ereb , aonrastaham naenec utatlaf atE
. arateyetze caulupicsid nerah ate , ere-suseI nec naçi uhtied atE
nah nec ama nesuseI ate : naocaelilaG anaC necetic niuge cayetze naenuge ocenereh atE



. areniag neraemeS neranoçiug aledarid netsuai ate netiagi caureugniA neraocniaI ate , ciriuqeri äurec euçud nerissuki tarah cidnemeH , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge zaiugE , nóçeic narre rebalaH
. cud nerissuki cirogaidnah oniab cuah açuag ? cud netsehnis , naipza eztocif tua issukI , nadauard narre nereC , nóçeic narre ate , cesuseI naçec stedrahI
. aeugeR ocelearsI zia ih : aemeS neraocniaI zia ih , áurtsigaM , nóçeic narre ate , celeanahtaN naçec stedrahI
. nadudni netsuki naenecni naipza eztocif , nehel oniab naçne ied ceppilihP , nóçeic narre ate cesuseI naçec stedrahI ? cugaçan cidnoN , celeanahtaN astoiD
. atiapze ciroinagne nateniec tabatilearsI oczaiuge ánuH , zaçrah naçec narre ate , alec netrohte anagnerah leanahtaN cesuseI naçec sukI
. cassuki ate rohtA , ceppilihP astoiD ? etad laha cino sued citehterazaN , celeanahtaN nóçeic narre atE
. cétehporP ate naeugeL cesesyoM utiab utabircs zeniec , aemes nehpesoI , aocehterazaN suseI ugaid nedirE , astoid ate , leanahtaN ceppilihP ud netiedirE
. ocirih nesirreiP ate neuirdnA , ocadiashteB nec eppilihP atE
. irin tierrA , noçeic narre ate , eppilihP naçec nedire ate araelilaG nec naçi ihan naoi suseI naenumarahiB
) airrah alon atiab ihan narre tabmah ( sahpeC zia neruhtied ih : aemes neranoI nomiS zia iH , naçec narre cirutaheb tanagnerah cesuseI atE . anagsuseI aruh naçec namare atE
) . tsirhC alon tabmah atiab ihan narre ( , saisseM ugaid nedirE , nóçeic narre ate , aeyana ereb nomiS cinehel naçec nedire cenuH
. atab ciratenocziaç iuqierrai irah ate cirateib netuç nuçne neztaçnim sennaoI , aeyana nesirreiP nomiS uirdnA neC
. nec äurugni nénero ramah nece : natrah nuge necetic noge nahtiab aruh ate : nec netioge non netaçec suki ate necetic rohtE . euçassuki ate etzotaÇ , etsoiD
? zia netioge non ) aurtsigaM alon tabmah atiab ihan narre ( ibbaR , netoçeic narre ceh atE ? etaztlibaç ahlib nereC , yæh etsoid , alaztierraç ceh cirissuki ate , cesuseI ciriluzti atE
. isuseI nacziaç naçi iuqierrai ate , neztaçnim céulupicsid ib aruh netaçec nuçne atE
. astodliB neraocniaI áraH , naçec narre , netlibe suseI cirissuki atE
: ulupicsid ib cinerah ate , sennaoI neogecab zirreb naenumarahiB
. aemeS neraocniaI aled ruah nece utacifitset tud ate , issuki tud cin atE
. aneud neztayehtab zaudnias utiripS cud aruh , naeniag nerah netioge ate , netsuai autiripS cutiab nerissuki areniag neroN , natuarec narre , caneuan irrogi areztayehtab zerv aniab : aruh neztugaçe neunze cin atE
. naeniag nerah nidecab ere-noge ate citurec nássiug netab abmuloc ossv aled netsuai autiripS tud issukI , aleoic , cesennaoI naçec acifitset adab naudrO
. areztayehtab zerv in zian irrohte ztocalah , táçnoiuqad atsefinam ilearsI aniab : neztugaçe aruh neunze cin atE
. nec nehel oniab in nece , atiab ogaoceniztia oniab in niec , tab-noçiug ad netrohte naodno enE , neuniab netiarre zeniec ad ruaH
. aneutid necnek cautakeb neraudnum astodliB neraocniaI ánuH , oid ate , aled netrohte anagnerah suseI cesennaoI ud netsuki naenumarahiB
. néztiab ira neztayehtab sennaoI non , naedla ecreb zanadroI nedaric naçi niuge narabahteB cuah açuaG
. engid in zianiapze oceztahcal neraedeh ocatapaç neniec , atiab ogaoceniztia oniab in niec , aned netrohte naodno ene ad aruH
: cineuçutze neztugace ceuç tab ad naetra neuç aniab , zerv zian ira neztayehtab iN , aleoic , cesennaoI néceic stedrahI
? atehporP ze , sailE ze , ziahapze tsirhC ih nidlab , zia ira neztayehtab zareb citagreC . netoçeic narre ate , aruh netaçec agorretni atE
. nedaric uesirahP canedaric naçi irrogi atE
. alaçeb neuç narre cátehporP saiasE , aedib neranuaI euçaçe analP , azov neraneogad zuhio nautresed zian iN , oiD
? zerrorue coid rec : yenetzutiag irrogi táçnugeyed utsopser ? zia roN , adab netoçeic narrE
. zE , naçec stedrahi atE ? ih zia atehporP . zianzE , naçec narre atE ? ih zia sailE ? zareb reC , netaçec agorretni naudrO
. tsirhC in zianzE , aleoic , naçec rohtia ate : akv naçezte ate , naçec rohtia atE
? zia ron iH , taçnetaçel agorretni aruh , aocenetzutic irrogi cátiueL ate caerodacifircaS citemelasureI céuduI , egainomitset nesennaoI ad ruah atE
. ucuard utaralced careb caztiokab emes ned naerrahlub neratiA , onadnuge issuki utze crohen aocniaI
. ad naçi niuge zetsirhC suseI áiuge ate áitarg aniab , ad naçi name zesesyoM aeugeL necE
. citagaitarg aitarg ate , ugud nak v utibecer céicug citaitnadnuba nerah atE
. nec nehel oniab in nece : ad ogaoceniztia oniab in , aned netrohte naodno enE , neuniab-netiarre zeniec ad ruaH , aleoic , niuge uhio ate , zaçrah ud nakv utacifitset cesennaoI
aehteb zaiuge ate zaitarg ) alaçeb aneraztiokab utardnegne cinagatiA toid áirolg , áirolg nerah ugud nakv utalpmetnoc ate ( , naetra erug ad naçi utatibah ate , ad naçi niuge iugarah aztiH atE
. cinagaocniaI aniab : citetadnorov neranoçiug ze , citetadnorov neraiugarah ze , ciratelodo oyai edaritiapze nieC
: yenetud netsehnis naeneci nerah , ocetaçi ruoah neraocniaI oigeliuirp euard name , yeicug netud utibecer aruh aniaB
. utibecer , aruh etutze céreb ate , ad naçi irrohte aratereB
. utugaçe aruh utze caudnum ate , ad naçi niuge zaçrah audnum ate , nec naudnuM
. aneud neztiugra aicug noçiug ned netrohte arudnum , aoczaiuge iugrA nec ruaH
. táçnaçel acifitset zaiugrA nec irrogi aniab , aiugrA aruh néztE
. taçnetaçel stehnis zaçrah céicug , taçnaçel acifitset zaiugrA aretrake egainomitset nidec rohte ruaH
. cinec neztied sennaoI , airrogi zaocniaI tab-noçiug ad naçI
. utidneherpmoc utze aruh caebmuhli ate : ud neztiugra naebmuhli cenuh iugrA atE
: aiugrA nénoçiug nec aezticiv ate , aezticiv nec natraH
. cined niuge , niuge atze sued ebag aruh ate : edarid naçi niuge zaçrah ztiH caicug açuaG
. nahtiab aocniaI naestah nec ruah ztiH
. aztiH nec ocniaI ate , nahtiab aocniaI nec aztiH ate , aztiH nec NAESTAH

. nemA . aocniaI aletuç neztacideneb ate neztadual , naelpmet ihteb nedaric atE
. niuqeridnah oiraczob , aremelasureI necetic luzti cirutaroda aruh ceh atE
. tárurec nideztiab ahctla itiog , cirateh cirutatrappa , aleutic neztacideneb ceh nidec ahtreug atE
. naztic acideneb , cirutahctla caucse ereb ate onarainahteB táropmac naztic namare oreuG
. oneteuqzetiaç itzev citiarag zetuhtrev nairih ocemelasureI eteduaç ceuç aniaB
: areniag neuç assemorp neratiA eruen tud nerirrogi cin ánuh ate : zaçuah açuag oinomitset eteraç ceuç atE
. citemelasureI cirissah , nateicug enoitan audnemakrab néutakeb ate áitnetinep naeneci nerah nidel aciderp atE
. naenuge ocenereh ciratelih nidel aticsuser ate , naçel irffus cetsirhC nec raheb alah ate autabircs ad alaH , néceic narre atE
. oceztida nérutpircS , audnemida néyah naçec iuqeri naudrO
. caicug açuag neduad cirutabircs nateumlasP ate , natetehporP ate , naeugeL nesesyoM zaçin utilpmoc aledaric raheb nece , alecnin niuqeuç oniaro , caztih neuçiuqzuaren netiarre edarid cuaH , néceic narre atE
. naçec nai naeniztia néyah cirutrah atE
. ciratetab ecarro itze ate , tabihtaç erre niarra netoçeic atneserp ceh naudrO
? cirocetai sued nemeh euçudaB , néceic narre , aleduec zarim ate , aletuzte netsehnis zareugela ceh oniaro aniaB
. canio ate caucse nézteic stucare , naeneutic narre cuah açuag atE
. euçassucatiab aladud cin alon , utze cirruçeh ze ciriugarah cautirips nece : arim ate , euçaçen atzah , in zian areb aruh nece : canio ene ate caucse ene euçazti sukI
? arateztohib neuç edarid netiagi caudnemasnep citagrec ate , eteraç utalburt citagreC , néceic narre naudrO
. aletassucaç tabutirips nétuç etsv , cirutici ate cirutalburt ceh aniaB
. niuqeuç aled aeuqaB , néceic narre ate , naetra néyah areb suseI nidec atneserp , aledaric oçnim zaçuah açuag atE
. naetsuah neraiugo nec naçi utugaçe zaçeh alon ate , cáçuag ocedib netaztic atnoc ere-ceH
. inomiS óyaç naçi utreuga ate , iuqzaiuge anuaI ad utaticsuseR , aletuç netiarrE
: canedaric niuqeh ate , cácemah caudlib anagrakle netaztic nedire ate , aremelasureI necetic luzti naereb natrah udro ciriuqiai atE
? cárutpircS naenugiuqzuarec neztaralced ate , naedib naenuciaç oçnim , natug neztarre aztohib erug aneztE , naetra nerrakle netaçec narre atE
. citirreuga néyah nidec nek aruh aniab : aruh netaçec tugaçe ate , caiugeb néyah necetic iuqeri naudrO
. néceiztiab name ciristuah ate , naztiztiab adner cáitarg cirutrah aiugo , aleogec cirirrai naeniaham niuqeh nidec ahtreug atE
. aretioge niuqeh adab nidec raS . utareheb cud anuge ate , cud astarra nece : niuqerug ogA , aletioic , netaçec ahctrob aniaB
. neuç netiuge iduri aretiaoi oganurrv crah ate , arugrub nedaric netiaoi necetic libruh atE
. cáçuag nedaric zareb zaçrah nateicug arutpircS netzuarec neztaralced , cirateicug atehporP ate cirahtiab sesyoM cirissah oreuG
? nidel ras nairolg ereb ate , naztic irffus cairoh açuag cetsirhC raheb aneztE
! caocaterroctnareb ztohib aretsehnis néicug açuag netzutid narre cétehporP ate , caebag udnemida O , neceic narre crah naudrO
. issuki éitze areb aniab : netuztiab narre cétzame alon éid nedire alah ate , aretnemunom uztab ciratenedaric niuqerug cutid naçi naoi atE
cinenetioid aled iciv aruh , aletud nakv issuki cinèureugniA ere-tabenoisiv aletioid , cutid naçi irrohte , aztuprog nerah naenetutze nedire atE
: edaritiab naçi naetnemunom ziog zicug niec , éitiaiug utici ere-cuztab etzame ocetra erug aniaB
. aledarid naçi niuge cuah açuag anuge néreh cud nuge , areniag noicug néiroh ere-ciradab : aneuç raheb utimeder learsI alec aruh náidneug açnareps cug atE
. nétud nakv utacificurc ate , arenoitanmednoc neraoireh cérodanreboG erug ate célapicnirp erodacifircaS nétud nakv utaruil aruh alon atE
. naeniztia neraicug ulupop ate neraocniaI , austerehtob zenarre ate zeniuge , atehporP noçiug atiab naçi niec , zaonerazaN suseI , netoçeic narre atE ? açuag reC , néceic narre crah atE
? caçuag nedarid naçi niuge natuah nuge natrah ciuqziuqatze ate , ztorra nemelasureI zia rorue iH , nóçeic narre , canec neztied sapoelC catab aleuç netsedrahi atE
? etsirt eteraç citagrec ate , cairoh ztih neuçutid neztitrapmoc naetra neuç aleteraç netiaoi edarid cireC , néceic narre atE
. táçnetaçelze tugaçe aruh neduec cautarulul caiugeb neyah aniaB
. naetab niuqeh nideztiab naoi cirudlibruh yæh ere-suseI , aletacudrahic ate aledaric oçnim ceh adab nidec ahtreuG
. zéicug zaçuah açuag nedaric naçi udleh naetra nerrakle nedaric oçnim atE
: arenec neztied suamE , nurrv citemelasureI oidats yeugorurih aratetab ugrub naereb natrah nuge nedaric netiaoi agib cirateh , ánuh atE
. zanec naçi niuge aleuç netserim nahtiab ereb nidec naoi oreug : cairraçe niag ereb castuh essihim naztic suki cirutitieheb areztraki ate , aretnemunom naiugec retsal ciriuqiai cesirreiP aniaB
. stehnis netaztizte ate , caztih néyah alaçeb aireuqleugre nétziuqec iduri atE
. caeliarre yeulotsopA néuah açuag , canedaric niuqeh ecreb ate , ama neseuqcaI airaM ate annaoI ate aneladgaM airaM nedaric atE
. yeicug ecreb ate , yeuqemah caicug cuah açuag nézteic atnoc , naenedaric iluzti citetnemunom atE
. zéztih nerah necetic tiohro atE
. nidad aticsuser naenuge ocenereh ate : nidad acificurc ate , arateucse neocatothciag ezticiv nidad aruil aemeS neranoçiug ad raheB , aleoiC
, alec naelilaG oniaro neuçuarec narre alon etzetiaç tiohro : ad utaticsuser aniab , nemeh atzE
? aned iciv euçud neztahlib naetra nélih citagreC , néceic narre ceh nociug arerrul zetrahtiugeb nedariztiab neztitieheb ate , nedariztiab cautici alon atE
. natudnemalliba netuç neztiugra aroçna tsimtsihc , nah necetiztiab nedire noçiug ib ánuh , aledaric natidnah adud ztocalah ceh nidec ahtreug atE
. aztuprog neranuaI suseI nedire netaçezte naenedaric uhtras atE
. autaradla citetnemunom airrah netaçec nedire atE
. niuqeh etzame tiebmec ate : cano niassv nétzutic udniappa aletzutic netrake , aretnemunom necetic rohte ziog zicug , naenuge nehel ocetsa aniaB


. aruara neraudnemanam , necetic asoper naohtabbaS ate , cautneugnv ate caniassv netaztic atserppa naenedaric iluzti oreuG
. aztuprog nerah nec naçi irraçe alon ate , atnemunom netaçec arim ere-cetzame nedaric naçi irrohte citaelilaG niuqerah ciriuqierrai atE
. nec udleh naodno nerah anuge htabbaS ate , anuge ocenoitaraperp nec atE
. naçi irraçe néztiapze rohen oniaro nateniec , aiuqabe natetab acorra néztiab niec natetab tnemunom naçec raçe ate , zetab essihim naçec latse ciristuare aruh atE
. neraztuprog nesuseI nidec acse , anagtaliP cirirrohte aruH
: neogec ariugeb neramuser neraocniaI ere-aruh ate , ocirih aehtamirA néuduI ) naetatiuge ze naulliesnoc néyah utitnesnoc neuzte cenuH (
: aotsui ate ano noçiug , relliesnoc , tabmoçiug naztiraç hpesoI , anuh atE
. aletzutic netsuki cuah açuag , canacziaç naçi iuqierrai citaelilaG irah niuqerrakle etzame ate , nurrv caicug canugaçe nerah neduec atE
. nedaric neztluzti aletsnuarec yerrahlub ereb cáçuag nedaric naçi niuge cirissuki , caicug eztedneg nedaric naçi udlib aratrah elcatceps atE
. nec otsui ruah noçiug iuqzaiugE , aleoic , aocniaI naçec acifirolg , nec naçi niuge rec carenetneC cirissuki atE
. autirips naçec adner cinarre ruah atE . autirips eruen taid netraçe nateucse erih , átiA , oid cesuseI zidnah zov ciniuge uhio atE
. citetra nidec aridre álev ocelpmet ate , nidec dnuhli ere-aiuqzugI
. onaratenero iztardeb naeniag neraicug rul nidec niuge ebmuhli ate , äurugni nenero yes nec atE
. naosidarap alecia nenaçi niuqene nuge , tauard netiarre zaiugE , cesuseI nóçeic narre naudrO
. aramuser erue naenida rohte , anuaI , zaçin idnetiebla tiohrO , isuseI nóçeic narre atE
. niuge ciriuqziag sued citze cenuh aniab : ugaitic neztibecer cauticerem nénugutid niuge nece : iuqotsui taçniheb ug atE
? alecia naereb enoitanmednoc nece cirissuki , rudleb erereb neraocniaI ziazE , aleoic , aruh naçec ahctorper caecreb aleuç netsedrahi aniaB
. ug ate äurub erue caçe arapme , tsirhC ziahab ih nidlaB , aleoic , aruh neuç neztamehpsalb catab cirateutakrv eliugiuqziag atE
. AEVGER NEVDVI AD RVAH , natuah ztih , autabircs zociarbeH ate zenitaL ate ze-cerG artel , nayarag nerah ere-tabotubircs nec atE
. äurub erue caçe arapme aeugeR néuduI ziahab ih nidlaB , aletuç netiarre atE
: aletacuarec neztatneserp erganiv ate alacziaç neztlibruh , ere-casemradneg zaçrah nedaric neztaffurt atE
. autigele neraocniaI tsirhC adab ruah nidlab , aurub ereb açeb arapme , utid nakv utarapme caecreB , aletioic , niuqeh ere-caerodanreboG zaçrah nedaric neztaffurt ate : aleogec aheb nec netioge nah aulupop atE
. netaçec ztoge etroç , cirutitrap caudnemalliba nerah oreuG . nétud netiuge rec eiuqaezte nece : cecei akrab , átiA , neuç netiarre cesuseI atE
. naerreuqze aecreb ate naeniucse atab : caeliugiuqziag ate , aruh netaçec acificurc nah , arukel ned neztied ruçeh-ruB adab naenedaric naçi irrohtE
. oceticare lih niuqerah ere-eliugiuqziag ib cirecreb nedaric netiamare atE
? ad neniuge rec naerrahye , etzutidab netiuge cuah açuag naeceh ruge nidlab necE
. euçaztiag latse , yeuqsidnem ate : areniag erug etzetiaç rorE , yeidnem netiarre edarid nerissah naudrO
. caztagv netutze iuqsodere ate , calebas netutze utardnegne ate , calirets edarid ustahod , etutiab nenarre naténiec canuge edarid nerirrohte , ánuh necE
. naeniag nérruoah neuç ate , ragin euçiuge naeniag néurub noruec aniab : naeniag ene cirragin aleuçiugatze , cábala ocemelasureI , naçec narre cesuseI tárateh ciriluzti aniaB
. aletuç neztatnemal ate neztingialp aruh , ciratetzame ate citulupop aidnah eztedneg nóyaç netiuqierrai atE
. ocetiamare naodno nesuseI netoçeic raçe naeniag aezturc irah , tab-nec udleh ciratednal onaeneryC nomiS cirutrah , aletuç netiamare aruh atE
. netiugel anetul ihan , suseI néceic name ate : nedariztiab naçi utacse neniec , anec naçi irraçe naiugednioserp citagaeztoireh ate citagaenoitanitum néceic agral atE
. anetuç netiuge edlag néiuqel niuge naçec aegui cetaliP naudrO
. nedaric neztaçrofner canelapicnirp erodacifircaS ate cárogayeh néyah ate : nidel acificurc , aletuç neztireuqer zidnah uhio nétuç nestreh ceh aniaB
. tud nerutagral zareb cirutagitzag : nahtiab ruah netiedire tutze cineugoh oceztlih ? cenuh ud niuge iuqziag rec aniaB , néceic narre naidla nereh crah atE
. iroh caçe acificurc , caçe acificurC , aletuç netiarre , nedaric netrai zarogayeh ceh aniaB
. zihan utagral suseI , néiuqec açnim etaliP adab zirreB
. airraçe naiugednioserp citageztoireh ate citagenoitanitum tiebmec nec naçi niuge nairih , néztiab nieC
, sabbaraB cugaçei agral ate , ruah cugaçei neK , aleoic , aicug eztedneg niuqerrakle zuhio nidec rai adaB
. nátseb utagral tab neuarec raheb atE
. tud nerutagral , ate utagitzag zareB
. niuge acuartze ciraçuag neud icerem oireh , ánuh ate , anagnerah tetzutiaç nakv irrogi nece : ere-cesedoreH ze aniaB
: cirateneuçud neztasucca ceuç , natenuh noçiug nedire tutze ertab cineugoh , cirutagorretni naeniztia neuç cin , ánuh ate : alaçeb elastahan neraulupop ruah noçiug euçatuard utatneserP
, néceic narre , aulupop ate , caerodanreboG ate , calapnirp erodacifircaS ciruhtied , cetaliP naudrO
. naetra nerrakle nedaric yaste nehel nece : sedoreH ate etaliP naetra nerrakle necetic edsiuqida naereb natrah nuge atE
. anagtaliP naçec rogi araçrah , cirutitzev zetab iruhc udnemalliba , cirutainracse ate , cirutaicerpsonem aruh niuqeraedneg ereb cesedoreH aniaB
. aletuç neztasucca aruh iuqtnagorra nah neduec cábircS ate calapicnirp erodacifircaS atE
. stedrahi sued noçeizte crah aniab : zeztih ztihna naçec agorretni atE
. netiuge zaçrah aleuç nerissuki ongis tiebmec neuç açnareps ate : zaçrah neuztiab netuçne açuag ztihna nerec , neuç arised ocetsuki nerah , aleuç idlapsa nece : ztiugah nidec areugela cirissuki suseI sedoreH atE
. nateh nuge nec nemelasureI ere-aruh , anagsedoreH naçec rogi , alec ocenoitcidsirui nesedoreH aruh nece cirutugaçe atE
. anoçiug zenec onaelilaG aye , naçec agorretni , naeneuç nuçne neztaçnim zaelilaG cetaliP atE
. onardanuh cirissah naelilaG , naicug aeduI aled ira netsacari , aulupop cid neztiuoM , aletioic , nedaric oganeztrog tabmah ceh atE
. natenuh noçiug netiedire tutze ertab cineugoH , yeztedneg ate yelapicnirp erodacifircaS cetaliP néceic narre atE
. coid ciH , naçec narre , alacuarec netsedrahi crah atE ? aeugeR néuduI zia iH , aleoic , aruh naçec agorretni cetaliP naudrO
. aeugeR tsirhC aled areb , aleoid , aled ira neztatebed citetiame iraseC nétubirt ate , neztipmurroc neraulupop ruah ugud nakv nedirE , aletioic , neztasucca nerah necetic sah atE
. anagtaliP aruh netaçec namare ate , aicug eztedneg néyah nidec ahctla oreuG
. citoha nerareb ugud nuçne corueug nece ? arag atlaf egainomitset ogaiheug reC , netaçec narre ceh atE
. alecian in nece euçoid ceuÇ , néceic narre crah atE ? aemeS neraocniaI adab zia iH , céicug netoçeic narre naudrO
. naeniucse neraetuhtrev neraocniaI ad nenaçi airrai aemeS neranoçiug tárah cidnemeH
. neriztv aretiaoi ateze , neristedrahi euçuanze , ere-tetaztiaçab agorretni nidlab atE
: neristehnis euçutze , teuçaçeidab narre nidlaB , néceic narre atE . cugaçei narre ? tsirhC zia iH , aletioiC
arenrab ulliesnoc ereb aruh netaçec namare ate , cábircS ate , calapicnirp erodacifircaS ate , caonaicnA oculupop necetic lib naenec utiugra atE
. aletuç neztardnosed artnoc nerah nétuç netiarre ciraçuag ecreb ztihna atE
. aneua oi ih ned ron caçe azitehporP , aletioic , netuç neztagorretni ate , netasnuarec iraetrahtiugeb nerah cirilatse urugni aruh atE
: nétuç neztahec ate , zaçrah nedaric neztaffurt , canoçiug netacudaç suseI atE
. iugnim naçec niuge ragin cesirreiP cirikli taropmac atE
. cuan nerutakv naterurih nehel oniab naçed oi carralliO , nacuarec nakv narre alon , zaztih neranuaI sirreiP nidec tiohro ate : naçec aheb tanagsirreiP canuaI ciriluzti naudrO
. carrallio naçec oi , alec oçnim aruh oniaro natreb atE . náud netiarre rec taiuqaezte , ánoçiuG , oid cesirreiP atE
. ad onaelilaG nece : nec niuqerah ere-ruah iuqrugeS , aleoic , neuç neztaruges cetab ecreb , näurub netab nero isauq atE
. cuan ze , ánoçiuG , astoid cesirreiP aniaB . zia cirateh ere-iH , naçec narre cirissuki aruh cetabecreb näurub netab ruppa atE
. aruh neztugaçe tanitze , áetzamE , aleoic , zaçrah naçec akv aniaB
: nec niuqerah ere-ruaH , naçec narre ciriuqehctare iugeb irah , airrai naerretzab us cetab otacsen aruh naeneuç issuki atE
. naetra néyah ere-sirreiP nidec rai , naenedaric irrai niuqerrakle ate , naidre neralas naenetuç utziv aus atE
. cinadnurrv nóyaç netiuqierrai sirreiP atE . naehcte neraonaribus erodacifircaS netaçec icare ras ate , netaçec namare aruh cinamaztah naudrO
. aerehtob neraebmuhli ate , aruh nero neuç ad ruah aniab : areniag ene utadeh caucse euçutitze , naelpmet alecnin niuqeuç zoro nugE
? niuqehv ate niuqetapze eteraç naçi ikli alaçeb naodno netab niugathciaG , yeonaicnA ate , yeniatipac ocelpmet ate , yelapicnirp erodacifircaS nedaric irrohte anagnerah cesuseI néceic narre oreuG
. aruh naçec adnes , ciriuqnuh airraheb nerah atE . onardanuh aretiuge euçaztiztV , naçec narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi aniaB
. airraheb oceniucse noçeic iuqede ate , airaztibrec neralapicnirp erodacifircaS cetab cirateh naçec oi atE
? zatapze ugud neroi , anuaI , netoçeic narre , nec ocetrohte rec cirissuki cénedaric naedla nerah naudrO
? cud neztidart aemeS neranoçiug zetab top , saduI , nóceic narre cesuseI atE
. táçnoiugel top isuseI noiuqec libruh ate , nec netrohte naeniztia néyah , tab cirateibamah , anec neztied saduI ate , tabainiapmoc , ánuh , alec oçnim oniaro aruh atE
. natenoitatnet netzetiazte ras euçiuge ztiohto ate , etzetiaç iuqiai ? etaçnuaç ol citagreC , néceic narre atE
. alaçnuec ol zetsirt naztic nedire ate , arateulupicsid ereb nidec rohte ciriuqiai citenoitaro oreuG
. alaçeb canedarid netrore arerrul utaztag atrohc lodo aidreci nerah nec ate , ogaçenic neuç netiuge eztiohto cirirrai natarutsreh atE
. aleuç neztatrofnoc aruh citurec äureugniA nóiuqec reuga atE
. ideb niuge aerih aniab aetadnorov ene ze ere-ciradab : cinagene ruah apoc caçe nagari cudab ihan nidlab , átiA , aleoiC
, neuç netiuge ztiohto cirutaciruahleb ate , äurugni netab iztiari irrah cirateh nidec dnurrv aruh naudrO
. natenoitatnet netzetiazte ras euçiuge ztiohtO , néceic narre , naenec irrohte aratrah ukel atE
. ere-caulupicsid ereb nacziaç naçi iuqierrai ate : táridnem ocateztauilO alaçeb utamutsoc nidec itrap cirikli oreuG
. ad ocsA , néceic narre crah atE . nemeh atapze ib ánuh , anuaI , netaçec narre ceh atE
. étud neztrah nif cécuag oczaçin ruges necE . ad naçi utatnoc niuqeothciag atE , ruah neogad cirutabircs utilpmoc natin aled raheb oniaro teuçuard netiarre necE
. tabatapze açeb sore ate , áporra ereb açeb las , caneutze ate : ere-atelam rebalah , açeb rah , caneud aslum niaro aniaB , adab néceic narrE
. ere-nesueD , netaçec narre ceh atE ? eteraç naçi atlaf nesued , ebag atapaç ate atelam ate aslum naenadetzutiaç irrogi ceuÇ , néceic narre oreuG
. nehel oniab náeuqaçed akv aláugaçen in naterurih , carrallio nuge neroi citze , sirreiP tassoid iriH , naçec narre cesuseI aniaB
: aretiaoi aroireh ate ariugednioserp ate niuqerih cuan tserp , anuaI , nóçeic narre crah atE
. caeyana erue caztiamrifnoc cirutitreunoc tiapzion adab cih : aedef erih nidatze atlaf , citagerih taid niuge eztiohto cin aniaB
: cid arised oceztahab neuç aroçna neraihib cenataS , ánuh , nomiS , nomiS , canuaI rebalah naçec narrE
. cauniel ibamah ocelearsI aleuçutid neztaegui naeniag néonorht netzetiaç rai ate , námuser ene naeniaham ene nade ate taçneuçaçed naI
. alaçeb natuard nakv utasopsid catiA eruen irin , ámuser teuçuard neztasopsid adab ciN
. naténoitatnet ene caneuçud nuari niuqene eteraç ceuç atE
. alaçeb aned ira neztaztibrec naetra neuç zian in adaB ? aneogad cirirrai naeniaham aze ? aned ira nuztibrec ala , aneogad cirirrai naeniaham , ogaidnah ad niec necE
. alaçeb aneud neztaztibrec , aneud neztanrebog ate : alaçeb néipihc zib aneidnah ocetra neuç citiztia : alah atze zaçeuç aniaB
. edarid neztied eliugiugnv , canetud etatirohtua naeniag néyah ate , naeniag néyah etud neztairongies céuger nénoitaN , néceic narre crah aniaB
. neiheug nec nerutamitse cirateh niec , naetra néyah ere-tabenoitnetnoc nidec ahtreug atE
. aneul neniuge aruh cirateh nec niec aye , naetra nerrakle netiuge edlag iraecreb atab nóiuqziuqec sah ceh naudrO
. atiab neztidart zeniec , irah noçiug enoitcidelam ere-citagaicug : aodab alaçeb ned naçi utanedro , aemeS neranoçiug ruges atE
. naeniaham ad niuqene , aucse neraneuan neztidart in , ánuh ere-ciradaB
. atiab netrussi citagneuç niec , naelodo ene airreb utnematseT ad ruah apoC , aleoic naodno laffa , néceic name ere-apoc rebalaH
. natoiromem ene euçiuge ruah : aned netiame citagneuç aztuprog ene ad ruaH , aleoic , néceic name ate : naçec stuah , naeneutic utadner cáitarg , aiugo cirutrah atE
. onetiad rohte ámuser neraocniaI , citutcurf neranehia nenade aladutze teuçuard netiarre necE
. naetra neuç euçaçe itrap ate , ruah euçaçe raH , naçec narre naeneutic utadner cáitarg cirutrah apoc atE
. námuser neraocniaI onetiad ilpmoc , ciratenuh nenai aladutze cirogaiheug , teuçuard netiarre necE
. nehel oniab nadaçed irffus cin , aretai niuqeuç nenuh oczaB tud nakv utarised zeriseD , néceic narre atE
. niuqerah caulotsopA ibamah ate , naeniaham nidec rai , ate irrohte aruh udro adaB
. aoczaB netaçec niappa ate : alaçeb neuarec narre caiçug açuag netaztic nedire cinaoi naudrO
. aoczaB euçaçe niappa nah : autatserppa tabidnah arebmag euçuard neristucare crah atE
? autatso nadud nenai aoczaB niuqeulupicsid eruen ad noN , cuard netiarre caurtsigaM , irailimafatia ocehcte euçorre atE
: arehcte ned neruhtras etaztierraç irah : alamarad rv tabragep , tabmoçiug euçiaç neruhtab , ate uhtras nairih , ánuH , néceic narre craH
? nugaçed niappa cud ihan noN , netoçeic narre ceh atE
. taçnugaçed nai aoczaB euçugaçei niappa cinaoI , aleoic , sennaoI ate sirreiP naztic rogi atE
. aoczaB neztiab raheb lih nateniec , anuge néiugo ocirebag irragahctla adab nidec rohtE
. nalibaç ahlib neriporp arobmed oceztaruil yæh nerah naenecilze cireztedneg ate : naçec attemorp crah atE
. aretiame urid irah necetic adrocca ate , necetic areugela atE
. neeuqaçeil aruil aruh alon niuqeniatipac ate niuqelapicnirp erodacifircaS nidec açnim cinaoi aruh atE
. ocutnoc néibamah néztiab niec arenec neztied toiracsI zocitiog neci saduI nidec ras nataS aniaB
. nedaric rudleb neraulupop nece : neteuqaçel laha lih aruh natalon cábircS ate calapicnirp erodacifircaS naztlibaç atE
: aned netiarre oczaB , átseb néiugo ocirebag irragahctla neztlibruh nec atE
. taçnaçel nuçne aruh naelpmet , anagnerah nec netrohte naeciog aicug ulupop atE
. nec netioge naidnem ned neztied ocateztauilO zauag ate , nec ira netsacari naelpmet zánuge atE
. taçnetzetiaç laha noge naeniztia neraemeS neranoçiug ate , taçnetzetiaç niuge engid ocetruzti yeicug açuag nedarid ocetrohte , aleuçud netiuge ztiohto naicug arobmed , adab euçaçe allieV
. caicug nedarid neztatibah naeniag neraicug rul utid nerutapartta alaçeb cetab oçal necE
. aruh nuge neuçiuqatze rohte areniag iuqotibus ate : zéisna ocatenuh ezticiv ate , zaireuqidroh ate , zaçidnamrog necetitze ahtros caztohib neuç , yèurub neuç adab euçeye aogoG
. nenagari edaritze caztih ene aniab , edarid nenagari arrul ate äureC
. oneuqzetiad niuge coicug cuah açuag , ruah ednem nenagari aletze nece teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. ámuser neraocniaI aled libruh nece etaçeniztiebla tugaçe , aledarid netiuge cuah açuag naeneuçeuqud nerissuki ere-ceuç rebalaH
. ádv aled libruh ai nece euçud neztugaçe zurub noruec , naeneuçassucad aledarid neztatsoh aI
. caicug erobra ate aeztocif euçiuqsukI , ruah enoitarapmoc néceic narre atE
. aenoitpmeder neuç ad neztlibruh nece , cäurub neuç etaçniztiebla itiog ate , etzietniztiebla tnehcuhc , naenecetid sah netiuge cuah açuag atE
. niuqeridnah airolg ate erehtob natetab yedoh aled netrohte aemeS neranoçiug étud nerissuki naudro atE
. edarid nerutaraki caetuhtrev ocatèurec nece : zetioge ariugeb néztiag nedarid nerirrohte arudnum ate , zidnah nerarudici edaritiab nerutacalaçeb calih canoçiug non alaH
: cágab ate aossasti aleduad zaorro , niuge rec zeniuqai ze natenoitan enoitcilffa naerrul ate : naterraçi ate naiugrahli ate naiuqzugi caongis edarid nenaçi naudrO
. oneuqzetiad ilpmoc cárobmed nélitneG , zélitneG ad nenaçi aiuqzirua emelasureI ate , arateicug enoitan edarid nenamare ouitpac ate , zoha neratapze edarid nerirore atE
. natrah ulupop arih ate , naeniag nerah rul ad nenaçi aidnah etatissecen nece , nateh nuge nénetieuqud netiuqsodere ate nérroçi etzame ziag niahod atE
taçnecetid ilpmoc caicug açuag nedarid cautabircs , cuah edarid canuge oczoiuqednem necE
. ras natrah zetilieblaze canedarid nateopmac ate : zetiliebla ariter caocetra nerah ate : tárateidnem etiugeliebla sehi cénedarid naeduI naudrO
. aenoitcurtsed nerah aletad libruh nece etiuqeniztiebla naudro , autarugni zairemradneg emelasureI naeneuçaçed suki atE
. cámira neuç euçaztidessop záitneitap neuÇ
. nerudlag atze tabolib ocurub neuç aniaB
. zasuac neraneci ene eteraç nenaçi caisteztiag zéicug atE
: étud nericare lih cirateuç ate : zédiuqsida ate zédiaha ate zéyana ate zéma ate zétia eteraç nerutaruil rebalaH
. céicug neuçiuqziaç nerutatsartnoc yeuç nerutitsiser ateze , oiuqziaztiab nerutatsartnoc nice iniec etiuqai ate , oha teuçuard nename cin necE
. neuçud neristedrahi alon areztasnep ze citeniztia , nateztohib neuç adab euçraçE
. nategainomitset euçiuqziaç nerudleh cairoh atE
. citaganeci ene , araterodanreboG ate arateugeR cinamare , arateiugednioserp ate arateugoganys aletzutiaç neztaruil , etzutiaç nerutatucesrep ate , naeniag neuç etzutid nerirraçe caucse ereb citeniztia noicug neuah açuag aniaB
. citurec , edarid nenaçi caidnah ongis ate : cárudici ate , caetirruçi ate caetessog ate , arukel citukel edarid nenaçi caidnah eztaraki rul atE
: artnoc neramuser ámuser ate , artnoc neraenoitan aenoitan ad nerutahctlA , néceic narre naudrO
. nenaçi anif natreb atze aniab : edarid raheb irrohte nehel cuah açuag nece : tici etzietniztieblaze caenoitides ate cálreug naeneuçaztid nuçne atE
. naodno néyah adab aletzaozte : ad neztlibruh eruh arobmed ate : tsirhC zian iN , aletioid , naeneci ene edarid nerirrohte ztihna nece : netzetiazte icudes euçuariugeB , naçec narre crah atE
? naenedarid raheb irrohte cairoh ad nenaçi ongis rec ate ? edarid nenaçi cairoh adab zion , áurtsigaM , aletioic , aruh netaçec agorretni naudrO
. nidatze niugesed naeniag nerairrah airrah nerutidleug atiapze nateniec canuge edarid nerirrohte ? caneuçutid neztarim edarid cuaH
. naçec narre , alec autanro zaztiame ate zerrede irrah nece , zaelpmet naenetuç netiarre cuztab atE
. ud nakv irraçe aicug neuç aitnatsus ereb citaicerbuap ereb cenuh aniab : aratenoitalbo neraocniaI étud nakv irraçe citenetud cirutarebos céicug cuah necE
. aleud nakv irraçe ogaiheug oniab céicug ecreb cenuh erbuap nugrahla nece , teustoid iuqzaiugE , naçec narre atE
. aleutic netraçe ipihc açep ib ere taberbuap nugrahla etzame naçec suki atE
. arocnurt caonod ereb aletzutic netraçe castarba naztic suki naeneuç utaheb atE
. aogaidnah enoitanmad étud nerutibecer ceh : ziduri niuge ztiohto iuqaçul era , caehcte nénugrahla ame etzutitiab netseri cénieC
. nateteuqnab yecalp nehel ate , nateugoganys yeridac nehel ate , nateutakrem yenoitatulas ciratenetzirad no ate , ciratenedarid ihan ilibe niuqecul aporra abircS euçuariugeB
. yeulupicsid ereb néceic narre , aleuç netuçne caicug ulupop atE
? émes nerah ad alon ate , ud neztied aruh nuaI zareb ce-diuaD
. allebacs nénio erih cayaste érih onadeuqaztid raçE
, naeniucse ene ida raI , iranuaI ene canuaI acuard narrE , näurubil néumlasP aleoid careb ce-diuaD nece cirissukI
? aled emes ne-diuaD tsirhC étud netiarre aloN , néceic narre atE
. areztagorretni nerah zesued neztrasua nedarizte cirogaiheug atE
. cud narre iugnv , áurtsigaM , netaçec narre cuztab ciratebircS aletuç netsedrahi atE
. oiuqziaç iciv irah caicug nece : aneiciv aniab , anelih atze aocniaI adaB
. aocniaI ne-bocaI ate , aocniaI ne-caasI ate , aocniaI nemaharbA aled anuaI naeneoid , naedla orreb ud nakv istucare ere-cesesyoM , aledarid neztaticsuser calih atE
. zoreug zanedarid emes oczenoitcerruser , edarid emes neraocniaI ate : edarid erap nèureugniA nece : euqzetiad lih nice cirogaiheug necE
. nerutrah edaritze ze , zaçnocze nerutrah étutze , cénedarid nenedire engid ocetiakv neranoitcerruser ocatelih ate , nerah aluces aniaB
. edarid neztrah ate zaçnocze étud neztrah cérruoah ocatenuh udnuM , cesuseI néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi naudrO
etzame aruh éid nakv céipzaç nece ? ad nenaçi etzame neniec cirateh adab naenoitcerruseR
. ere-aetzame náideic lih naodno néicug atE
. náutic lih ate , iztv cirruoah naetaçezte ate : ere-ceipzaç rebalah ate , aruh náçeic rah canereh oreuG
. ebag cirruoah naidic lih ere-aruh , canerragib aruh náceic rah atE
. ebag cirruoah , cud naçi lih cirutrah etzame anehel cirateh ate , cutid naçi eyana ipzaç adaB
. ireyana ereb uniel nóçeid niuge ate , aetzame nerah caeyana nerah naçed rah , idadab lih ebag cirruoah ate , ciraleud etzame idadab lih aeyana netiebmec nidlaB , cucuarid utabircs cesesyoM , áurtsigaM , aletioiC
. netaçec agorretni ate ) aenoitcerruser étutiab neztakv céniec ( uztab uecuddaS noiuqziuqec libruh naudrO
. necetic lihci naeniag neratsoper nerah cirirrai zarim ate : naeniztia neraulupop étud nakv utidneherper aztih nerah nice atE
. iraocniaI , canedarid neraocniaI ate : iraseC , canedarid neraseC zareb euçoztei adneR , néceic narre naudrO
. caneraseC , netaçec narre aletuç netsedrahi atE ? aubircs ate anigami utid caneron : taborenid euçatsucarE
? euçuan neztatnet citagreC , néceic narre , áicenif néyah cirutida atE
? ze ala , iraseC citubirt name ugud ediB
. alaud netsacari iuqzaiuge aedib neraocniaI aniab , áheb aranosrep aleogaze ate , alaud netsacari ate netiarre iugnv ugaiuqaecab , áurtsigaM , aletioic , aruh netaçec agorretni ceh atE
. taçnetaçel raçe naerehtob ate náirongies neraerodanreboG , taçnetaçel namaztah naeztih aruh , aletuç netiuge iduri aledaric otsui cáipse netaztic rogi , aletuç neztaogog aruh atE
. ruah enoitarapmoc aleuç narre artnoc néyah nétuç nakv utugaçe nece : necetic rudleb neraulupop aniab : naereb natrah udro aretraçe néucse naeniag nerah cabircS ate calapicnirp erodacifircaS nedaric rehia naudrO
. nerutacehehc ud aruh , atiab nerirore areniag neron ate : ad nerutacihtaç , aicug ned nerirore areniag nerah irraH
? ad naçi niuge urub niotnac airrah netud utayubra célaçacifidE , aruh ned autabircs adab ad reC , oid cirutaheb tarateh naudro craH
. alidatze ahtreug alaH , netaçec narre naenetuç nuçne ruah atE . yeuztab ecreb aitsaham euard nename ate , ceh irarobal utid neniugesed ate ad nerirrohtE
? caebai itsaham yæh euard neniuge adab reC . netaçec lih , aropmac cititsaham aruh ciriztoge atE
. taçned erug aegatereh , ruah nugaçed lih , etzotaç : aumirp ad ruaH , aletioic , netaçec iuqude soporp céirarobal cirissuki aruh aniaB
: étud nerutaroho naenetassucad ruah naiuga : aetiam emes eruen tud nerirrogi ? tud neniuge reC , caebai itsaham naçec narre naudrO
. aropmac netaçec ztoge ciruhtruaç ere-ruah ceh aniab : aretrogi neranereh naçec aunitnoc atE
. cistuh netaçec rogi cirutatcart iuqziag ate cirutahec ere-ruah ceh aniab : aretrogi netab iraztibrec ecreb naçec aunitnoc atE
. cistuh netaçec rogi cirutahec aruh ceh aniab : taçnetomel citutcurf ocitsaham , tabiraztibrec arateh irarobal naçec rogi naeniosas atE
. nidec noge naopmac zecul arobmed ate , yeirarobal aruh néceic acola ate , tabitsaham naçec adnal cetab noçiuG , netiarre nenuh enoitarapmoc iraulupop nidec sah náudrO
. nadutid netiuge cuah açuag zetatirohtua rec nenarre teuçuartze ere-ciN , néceic narre cesuseI naudrO
. nec cidnon aletiuqazte , adab netaçec stedrahI
. alec atehporP sennaoI , etacudad ruges nece : utiag nerutadipal caicug ulupop : ciratenoçiuG , ugarradab nidlab atE
? aruh istehnis euçutze zareb citagreC , ud nenarre : citureC , ugaçedab narre nidlaB , aletioic , naetra néreb netacudrahicab ceh atE
? ciratenoçiug ala , nec citurec aomsitpab nesennaoI
, irin adab euçadarre : zetab açuag ceuç ere-cin tetzutiaç nerutagorretnI , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. anauard name iroh etatirohtua irih ned ron ode , náutid netiuge cairoh açuag zetatirohtua rec cugarrE , netoçeic narre atE
, niuqeonaicnA , cábircS ate calapicnirp erodacifircaS necetiztiab rohte , aleogec neztazilegnaue ate , naelpmet aleuç netsacari aulupop crah , zetab ciratateh nuge nidec ahtreug atE
. aretuçne nerah otnetta nec aicug ulupop nece : netoeuqaçel laha niuge rec netiedire nétuzte aniaB
. naztlibaç zihan icare lih aruh calapicnirp oculupop ate cábircS ate calapicnirp erodacifircaS ate : naelpmet zoro nuge nec ira netsacari atE
. euçud niuge ecel niugathciag aruh ceuç ate , ad aehcte ocatenoitaro aehcte enE , ad autabircS , aletsoiC
. netzioge aropmac nénedaric ira netsore ate neztlas natrah , nidec sah , naelpmet ciruhtras atE
. árobmed neraenoitatisiv erue utugaçe cutiapze nerec : naeniag nerairrah airrah natih neriztv éitze ate : canedarid anrab natih ruoah erih ate , ih étua nerutasarra atE
. cirateicug edla nerutsreh ate , nerutarugni ate , zaehcnart étua nerutaitessa céyaste erue ate , areniag erih canuge cutid nerirrohte necE
cirateiugeb erih ceduaid cailatse niaro aniaB ! cáçuag neraeuqab erue , erereb natenuh atanroi erue utihab nakv utugaçe erereb cih nidlab O
, aleoic , naeniag nerah naçec niuge ragin , airih cirissuki , naenec udlibruh atE
. aletud neniuge uhio céirrah natreb , cuah zetidab lihci nidlab , teuçuard netiarrE , néceic narre aleuc netsedrahi crah atE
. caulupicsid erue cazti ahctahem , áurtsigaM , netóçeic narre cuztab cirateuesirahP oceztedneg naudrO
. natenerog ukel airolg ate näurec aled aeuqab : aeugeR ned netrohte naeneci neranuaI aled utacideneB , aletuç netiarrE
, citagcaicug etuhtrev netzutic nakv issuki , iugneco neztadual neraocniaI zareugela aicug eztulupicsid nidec sah , alec neztlibruh arodno idnem ocateztauilO ai atE
. naedib caudnemalliba néreb netzutic neztadeh , alaoic aruh atE
. suseI naeniag netaçec raçe , naeniag emv-otsa caudnemalliba néreb cirirraçe ate , anagsuseI aruh netaçec namare atE
. utiab arraheb nenuh canuaI nereC , netaçec narre ceh atE
? aemv-otsa euçud neztahcal citagreC , cébai nerah neceic narre , aletuç neztahcal aemv-otsa ceh atE
. alaçeb neuarec narre netuç nedire cenedaric naçi irrogi cinaoi atE
. utiab arraheb nenuh canuaI nereC , euçacuard nenarre alenuH ? euçud neztahcal citagreC , euçiugadab edlag crohen nidlab atE
. euçadrake cirutahcal aruh : cinoyazte irrai naeniag rohen onadnuge , autacetse tabra emv-otsa euçud nenedire , ate uhtras natrah : arugrub ocakrua neuç etzaoÇ , aleuç netiarrE
, agib cirateulupicsid ereb naztiztiab rogi , aredla idnem ned neztied ocateztauilO , arainahteB ate aregahphteB naenec udlibruh , nidec ahtreug atE
. alec netiagi taremelasureI nec netiaoi naeniztia , cinarre cuah açuag atE
. naeniztia ene euçazti lih ate anuh euztake , ceh netutze nakv ihan naçen anger naeniag néyah cin yaste ene , ogaiheuG
. aloyaç neriuqede ere-aneud , iraneutze ate , aloyaç nename iraicug neud nece , teustoid alaH
. ocram ramah citicab , anuaI , netoçeic narre ceh atE
. iraneutid ramah euçome ate , aocram euçoçe iuqedE , neceic narre yenedaric tneserp atE
? neeuquniab irrakere niuqeraurucul aruh cin ate , name naeuqnab äurid ene cutze zareb aloN
: anadutze niere aladud neztlib ate , anadutze irraçe aladud neztrah , alecian arrogog noçiug nece naiuqahab : áothciag iraztibrec , tua nerutaegui citoha eruE , nóçeic narre crah naudrO
. anautze niere cud neztlib ate , anautze irraçe cud neztrah : arrogog noçiug ziatiab nerec , cuan naçi rudleb erih necE
: natetab lahio ciredrog tutiab iuqude niec , aocram erih ánuh , anuaI , aleoic , nidec rohte aecreb atE
. oceniag neririh zrob nécia ere-iH , nóçeic narre ere-inuh crah atE
. ocram zrob citic niuge caocram erih , anuaI , aleoic , nidec rohte aecreb atE
. naeniag neririh ramah , erehtob cua , ziatiab naçi layel naipihc açuag nerec : áno iraztibrec cud iugnV , nóçeic narre crah atE
. citic icabari ocram ramah caocram erih , anuaI , aleoic , anehel adab nidec rohtE
. neuç niuge aciffart rec cron taçnaiuqal , cairaztibrec neuarec name äurid noiuqziuqel ied naçeztiab anam , cirutatseuqnoc ámuser naenec iluzti nidec ahtreug atE
. naeniag erug naçed anger cerroh ihan ugutzE , aletioic , citelebiug taberodahcabme netoçeic rogi ate , ztiag netoztiraç céocetatiuic ereb atE
. naetra nerrohtan euçaçe aciffarT , néceic narre ate , ocram ramah nézteic name , cirereb iraztibrec ramah ciruhtied atE
. nátoceztluzti oreug , areztatseuqnoc netab amuser , aratetab nurrv ukel nidec itrap tabelbon noçiuG , adab naçec narrE
. alec nerutatsefinam ámuser neraocniaI natreb nétuztiab etsv nerec ate , naedla ocemelasureI néztiab nerec , tabenoitarapmoc naçec narre ate , neuç neztaunitnoc , aletzutic netuçne cuah açuag ceh atE
. taçnaçel aulas ate ahlib anec naçi udlag aemeS neranoçiug ad naçi irrohte necE
. atiab emes nemaharbA ere-ruah nerec , cóyaic naçi niuge inuh ehcte audnemaulas nugE , nóçeic narre cesuseI naudrO
. rual ocalah taid neztadner , tacuardab iuqede iuqebagedib irohen sued nidlab ate : yerbuap taetziarid netiame , anuaI , caidre néno eruen , ánuH , iranuaI nóçeic narre coehccaZ aleogec nah atE
. táçnidel aegola , alec uhtras naenetab ocatothciag ezticiv noçiug necE , aletioic , netuç neztarumrum céicug cirissuki iroh atE
. iuqareugela aruh naçec ibecer ate , iuqutaihel nidec stuai ruah naudrO
. taid raheb noge naehcte erih nuge nece : iuqutaihel astiah , oehccaZ , noçeic narre ate : aruh naçec suki cesuseI cirutaheb itiog alaçeb nidec rohte aratrah ukel atE
. neuç raheb nagari cidnah nece : taçnaçel suki aruh , aratetab eztocif assab nidec nagi ciniuge retsal areniztia atE
. nec ocatipihc ulliaht nece : zasuac neraeztedneg neeuqaçec nice ate : suseI nec niec , nalibaç zihan issuki atE
: starba ate , lapicnirp onacilbup nec aruh ate , tabmoçiug nec neztied oehccaZ , ánuh atE
. nec netiagari , nocireI ciruhtras atE
. iraocniaI oirodual noçeic name cirissuki iroh caicug ulupop atE : aocniaI aleuç neztacifirolg , nóyaç netiuqierrai irah ate , naçec suki natreb atE
. ua utaulas caedef erue : átsiv caçe ibecer , nóçeic narre cesuseI atE
. nadaçed ibecer átsiv , anuaI , naçec narre crah atE ? nadaiugad cud ihan reC , aleoiC
, naçec agorretni , naenec naçi udlibruh aruh ate , anagereb noiuqel rake naçec anam cirutidleug cesuseI atE
. zaçin etateip cua , aemes ne-diuaD , neuç netiuge ogaiheug uhio ziugnv crah aniab : táçnidel lihci nétuç neztahctahem cénedaric netiaoi naeniztia atE
. zaçin etateip cua , áemes ne-diuaD suseI , aleoic , naçec niuge uhio naudrO
. alec netiagari onerazaN suseI nece netoçeic narre atE
. nec rec aruh , naçec niuge edlag , netiagari aulupop naenaçec nuçne crah atE
. aleogec euqse naerretzab edib airrai néztiab tabusti , alec neztlibruh tárocireI aruh nidec ahtreug atE
. neztida netzutizte canedaric netiarre ate , cailatse cirateh cuah ztih nedaric ate : ida sued netaçezte ciratuah açuag ceh atE
. ad nerutaticsuser naenuge ocenereh aniab : étud nelih , naenetieuqud utatoça atE
. ad nerutatsuht ate nerutairuini ate nerutainracse ate , eyaç nerutaruil yelitneG necE
. caicug açuag nedarid naçi utabircs zétehporP iraemeS neranoçiug , óiuqziaç nerutilpmoc ate , aremelasureI arag netiagi , ánuH , neceic narre caibamah cirutrah atE
. alanrete ezticiv náluces ned ocetrohte ate , natenuh arobmed naçetze ibecer ogaiheug ziugnv noN
, zasuac neramuser neraocniaI carruoah ode , aetzame ode , caeyana ode , cámatia ode , aehcte cineud iztv aletze rohen , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE , néceic narre crah atE
. irih ciuqziaztiag iuqierrai ate , cáicug açuag ugaitic iztv cug , ánuH , cesirreiP naçec narre atE
. nahtiab aocniaI edarid elbissop , cáçuag nedarid elbissopmi nahtiab canoçiuG , naçec narre crah atE
? etiad laha aulas ron atE , netaçec narre cénetuç nakv nuçne ruah atE
. námuser neraocniaI nidad ras astarba ze nece , citohluç neraztarro nidad ras tabelbac ad ogahcarre necE
! necetid ras námuser neraocniaI canudnussahno ned ztiag nieC , naçec narre , alec utetsirt ztiugah aruh cesuseI cirissuki atE
. nec astarba zicug nece : nidec etsirt , cinuçne cairoh açuag aruh atE
. irin tierra , rohta ate : näurec tabruaseht cud nenakv ate : yerbuap cecei name ate caçe las aicug náud : ciaç atlaf tabaçuag oniarO , nóçeic narre cinuçne iroh cesuseI atE
. citenussatetzag eruen táitic utariugeb caicug cairoH , naçec narre crah atE
. ama erue ate atia erue caztiarohO , nenarre ciruslaf egainomitset cutzE , neristabe cutzE , nelih cutzE , nerutaretluda cutzE , ciuqziuqadab caudnemanaM
. aocniaI , aruh ate , neciab tab cino cutze rohen ? no in cuan neztied citagreC , cesuseI noçeic narre atE
? tud nerutidessop alanrete ezticiv , zeniuge rec , áno urtsigaM , aleoic , cenuai tiebmec naçec agorretni naudrO
. natrah neruhtras aletze , alaçeb caohctruoah ámuser neraocniaI nerutibecer utiapze ere-cron , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. ámuser neraocniaI ad néocalenuh nece : ahctapme aleuçaztitze ate , aretrohte anagene caohctruoah euçaztiztV , naçec narre , ciruhtied anagereb caohctruoah cesuseI aniaB
. netaztic ahctahem , céulupicsid naenetaçec suki iroh ate : taçnaztil iuqnuh ceh , ere-caipihc ruoah anagnerah netzutic netrake atE
. ad nerutarog , aneud neztareheb äurub ereb ate : ad nerutareheb , aicug neud neztarog äurub ereb nece : aecreb ze ate , tarehcte ereb cirutacifitsui ruah aled naçi istuai , teustoidaB
. inoerotakeb irin iohto , tiuqa agitama , anuaI , aleoic , nósnuarec irarrahlub ereb aniab : ihan utahctla tarurec ere-caiugeb era neutizte , aleogec nurrv caonacilbup atE
. táitic netiame canerramah cirateiçug açuag nadutid neztidessop , rurab taid netiuge nateugib naetsA
. ere-alaçeb ruah onacilbup ode : alaçeb caoretluda , caotsuini , cairaparrah noçiug ecreb zianiapze nerec taiuqzuard netiame carreuqse , áocniaI , neuç netiuge ztiohto nahtiab ereb zaçuah açuag aleogec cauesirahP
: onacilbup aecreb ate uesirahP atab , aretiuge ztiohto arelpmet nedaric naçi nagi noçiug iB
: ruah enoitarapmoc , yenetzutizte neztamitse ere-sued caecreb ate , yeuztab nedaric adif aledaric otsui natèurub ereb néceic narre atE
? naerrul ciredef ud ehto nenedire , naenerrohtad aemeS neranoçiug aniaB . irras aleud neniuge aoiuqednem néyah nece , teuçuard netiarrE
? ere-udab neztaçul arezterressa edla néyah , yenaczogad zuhio irah nuge ate uag utigele ereb neniuge aititsui euartze caocniaI adaB
: neud netiarre crah othciag egui rec euçuçnE , canuaI oid atE
. nadaçeitze stuah äurub zirrohte ere-naenif , tacuard neniuge aititsui , cenuh nugrahla tuartiab netiame airehcsaf nerec ere-ciradaB
: citaganetiuge ze cirutnoc zaçrohen ate ere-zianapze rudleb neraocniaI , nahtiab ereb naçec narre oreug aniab : zecul arobmed nakv ihan niuge sued neuzte crah atE
. zatsartnoc aditrap eruen aititsui cadiugE , aleoic , anagnerah nidec rohte ate , tabmugrahla etzame natrah irih nec atE
: cineuzte netiuge cirutnoc zaçrohen ate , cinezte rudleb neraocniaI natetab irih nec tabeguI , aleoiC
: ebag utayone , aled raheb niuge ztiohto ihteb nece ztocaratenuh nif ere-tabenoitarapmoc neceic narre atE
. ere-caonarra edarid nerudlib arah , aztuprog atiab nenaçi ere-noN , néceic narre crah atE ? anuaI noN , etacuard netiarre , aletud netsedrahi naudrO
. neriztv aecreb ate , ad nerutrah atab : nádnal edarid nenaçi agiB
. neriztv aecreb ate , ad nerutrah atab : cinetieuqud netiahe natorre niuqerrakle edarid nenaçi agiB
. neriztv aecreb ate , ad nerutrah atab : natetab eho edarid nenaçi agib natrah uag , teuçuard netiarrE
. aruh ud nerutacifiuiv , utiab nerudlag ere-cron ate : aruh nerudlag ud crah , neztaulas neraiciv ereb atiab nerutayesne ere-roN
. zaetzame ne-toL etzetiaç tiohrO
. arateocelebiug luzti idelieblaze rebalah , aned nádnal ate : aretiamare nerah stuai idelieblaze , udab naehcte audnemallitso ereb ate , anetad naeniag ehcte natrah nugE
. naenuge ned nerutaralced aemeS neranoçiug ad nenaçi rebalaH
: naztic niugesed caicug ate , citurec naçec niuge irv zerhpus ate zus , naenuge nec ikli citamodoS toL aniaB
: nétuç neztacifide , nétuç neztadnal , nétuç neztlas , nétuç netsore , nétuç netade , nétuç netai : alaçeb nec naçi niuge ere-natenuge ne-toL rebalaH
. caicug naztic lag ate , aoibulid nidec rohte ate : onarenuge nidec ras nákra eoN , netiame zaçnocze ate nétuç neztrah etzame , nétuç netade , nétuç netaI
. ere-natenuge neraemeS neranoçiug ad nenaçi alah , natenuge nereoN nideztiab niuge alon atE
. zenuh enoitan nidad aborper ate , crah naçed irffus ztihna ad raheb nehel aniaB
. naenuge ereb ere-aemeS neranoçiug ad nenaçi alah : onarened naipza neräurec retzab ecreb neztiugra ate , citetab retzab ned naipza neräurec utiab netiuge iugra catsimtsihc alon necE
. aletzierrazte ate , aletzaozte aniab : nah arah , ode , nemeh anuH , yeuç euçiaç nenarre atE
. nerissuki euçutiapze ate , aretsuki netab ciratenuge neraemeS neranoçiug euçutiab nerutarised canuge edarid nerirrohtE , yeulupicsid néceic narre rebalaH
. euçud naenrab ámuser neraocniaI , ánuh nece : nah árah , ode , nemeh ánuH , nenarre etutze atE
: niuqeradarap ámuser neraocniaI nerirrohte atzE , narre ate , néceic stedrahi : ámuser neraocniaI nec ocetrohte zion zéuesirahP cinaçi utagorretni atE
. ua utaulas caedef erue , aho ciriuqiaI , irah nóçeic narre atE
. neciab ruah ztorra , aretiame airolg iraocniaI , cined iluzti naçi nedire atze ertaB
? edarid non adab caiztardeB ? naçi utuhahc carramah edaritzE , naçec narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. onatiramaS nec ruah ate , alaczuarec netiame carreuqse , aratenio nerah zepzoha äurub ereb naçec ztoge atE
: iugneco aocniaI aleuç neztacifirolg , nidec luzti , alec utadnes nece , naeneuç issuki cetab cirateh atE
. necetiztiab uhahc aledaric netiaoi , nidec ahtreug atE . yerodacifircaS cäurub neuç euçeztei stucare , etzaoÇ , néceic narre naenutic issuki atE
. zaçug aidrociresim cua , áurtsigam suseI , aletioic , azov netaçec ahctla atE
: nurrv necetic idleug ate , oyahros noçiug ramah nacziaç naçi uhtab , alec neztras natetab ugrub aruh atE
. citetra ocaelilaG ate ocairamaS neztiab netiagari naetiaoi taremelasureI aruh nidec ahtreug atE
. ugud nakv niuge aneudneug raheb niuge : arag calituni iraztibreC , euçarre , caicug açuag neuçiuqziaç naçi utanam naeneuçeuqutid niuge , ere-ceuç alaH
. etsv tutzE ? cáçuag nacziaç naçi utanam utitiab niuge nerec , irah iraztibrec acuard ehto cirreuqsE
? cih caçe nade ate nai oreug ate : onadeuqud nade ate nai , caçen aztibrec cirutacirreug ate , airaffa cadaçei niappA , netiarre acuartze citiztianiaB
. naeniaham ida rai ate , idaçnauA , natreb acuard netiarre naened iluzti citadnal , cined ira neztaczab nérba ode neztarobal naeneud tabiraztibrec , cirateuç ceniec aniaB
. etzieuqaçnic idebo ate : naossasti ida adnal ate , ida ikli cirateorrE , inuh récuçram etoeuqaçenic laha narre , tabmeceb ned tabihib adratsum etudnicab edef nidlaB , canuaI naçec narre atE
. aedef cugaçei atnemguA , iranuaI céulotsopA netoçeic narre naudrO
. cacuard nerutakrab : táid uloD , aleoid , anagerih adab neztluzti naenuge natipzaç ate , artnoc erih udab neztatlaf naenuge natipzaç nidlab atE
. cóçei akrab idadab adneme nidlab ate , aruh caçe idneherper , udab utatlaf artnoc erih ceyana erih nidlaB , etzetiaç ariugeB
. naçed aziladnacs tab ciratuah ipihc ze nece , arossasti nidel ztoge ate , idelab raçe naurugni neraoppel nerah tabirrah atorre nidlab euqul eboh craH
. edaritiab netrohte zaçron , irah enoitcidelam aniab : necotatze caoladnacs ad elbissopmI , yeulupicsid ereb etsoid ogaiheuG

. neristehnis éitze , ere-idadab aticsuser ciratelih tiebmec nidlab ateze , etzutidapze netuçne cátehporP ate sesyoM nidlaB , nóçeic narre cemaharbA atE
. cutid nerutadneme , arateh idadab naoi tiebmec ciratelih nidlab aniab : máharbA atia , zE , naçec narre crah aniaB
. ceh etaztib nuçne : cátehporP ate sesyoM éiticaB , cemaharbA astoiD
. aratenuh ukel oczatnemrot taçnecotatze ere-ceh , táçneceid acifitset yæh , eyana zrob taiticab necE
. arehcte neratia ene iroh náçed rogi , átiA , zareb tauard netiuge ztiohtO , crah naçec narre atE
. nagari tánuh citroh ateze , euqzetitiab nice , canedarid ihan nagari tárateuç cidnemeh non alah : cud tabidnah omsyba naetra neuç ate erug , edla ecreb atE
. zia neztatnemrot ih ate , cud neztalosnoc ruah niaro ate : caztiag rebalah corazaL ate , alautid utibecer naiciv erue cano erue nece ida tiohro , émeS , cemaharbA naçec narre atE
. natenuh rag cuan neztatnemrot nece , aihim nadaçeid acserfer ate , naerv aocom ihre ereb naçed atsub , orazaL caçe rogi ate , zaçin aidrociresim cua , máharbA atiA , naçec narre aleogec zuhio crah naudrO
: naerrahlub nerah orazaL ate , cinadnurrv maharbA naçec suki , alec natetnemrot cirutahctla itiog caiugeb ereb nateunreffi atE
. nec naçi eztroho ate , ere-aruh starba adab nidec lih : arerrahlub nemaharbA zéureugniA nideztiab namare ate , aerbuap nideztiab lih adab nidec ahtreuG
. nétzutic neztacimil cairuaç nerah ate nedaric netrohte caro era aniab , oceztessa ciraterruppa nedaric netrore citeniaham nerastarba rised neuç atE
: aehteb ziruaç , náhtrob nerah nazteztiab niec , cinec neztied orazaL taberbuap rebalah neC
. iuqocifingam ate iugnv nec neztatcart zoro nuge ate , zatec ate zatalracse nec neztitzev ate , tabstarba noçiug adab neC
. ud netiuquai oiretluda , caned necnocze niuqeraneud iztv carrahnes ate : ud netiuquai oiretluda , atiab necnocze niuqetab ecreb ate , aetzame ereb utiab netiztv ere-croN
. nidad rore tabstuh utcnup neraeugeL ze nece , necetid nagari arrul ate äurec ad ogahcarrE
. neztahctrob ud aruh caredebtab ate , ad neztazilegnaue ámuser neraocniaI citzoreug zaçrah arobmed : onanagsennaoI étud nuari cétehporP ate caeugeL
. naeniztia neraocniaI ad enoitanimoba , aneyaç arog yenoçiug nece : caztohib neuç iuqzugaçadab caocniaI aniab : naeniztia nénoçiug caneuçutid neztacifitsui cäurub neuç eteraç ceuÇ , néceic narre atE
nedaric neztaffurt zaçrah ate : osoitiraua nedariztiab niec , ere-ceuesirahP netzutic netuçne caicug cuah açuag atE
canussatsarba ate , aocniaI euçeuqaztid aztibrec nicE . nerutaicerpsonem aecreb ate ud neriuqude niuqeratab ode : no iraecreb ate , acuard neriztire ztiag iratab ode nece : euqaztid aztibrec issuban ib nice ere-cetab ciraztibreC
? euçuard nename cron aned neuç , eteraçapze naçi layel náçuag nerecreb nidlab atE
? euçiaç nerutadif ron nateoczaiuge nussatsarba , eteraçapze naçi layel nateouqini nussatsarba nidlab adaB
. ad otsuini ere-naidnah , aned otsuini naipihc açuag ate : ad layel ere-naidnah , aned layel nateneipihc açuaG
. aratelanrete elcanrebat taçnetaztiaç ibecer naenetzetiaç atlaf zéouqini nussatsarba caediuqsida ocadneuç euçazti niugE , teuçuard netiarre cin atE
naenoitareneg ereb carruoah ociugra ze nece , edarid ogarruhuç carruoah ocatenuh udnum citagenuh : neuztiab nakv niuge iuqruhuç nerec , aothciag resnepsed caissuban naçec adual atE
. yeugorual caçe abircs ate , áludec erue caçe raH , nóçeic narre crah naudrO . iugo irruen nuhE , naçec narre crah ate ? cudroç tabmec cih atE , nóçeic narre itab ecreb oreuG
ramah ate yeugorreb caçe abircs , ztetif cirirrai ate , áludec erue caçe raH , nóçeic narre crah ate : oilo lirrab nuhE , naçec narre cenuh atE
? iraissuban ene cacuard roç tabmeC , iranehel nóçeic narre , aredebtab ciratenudroç neraissuban ereb ciruhtied naudrO
. aratehcte ereb cuztab táçnetaçen ibecer naenecian udnek citaogresnepsed , nadud neniuge rec tiuqadaB
. zian euqlaha aretlibe euqse , tidiad nice cirerruztia ? zoreug zanatuard netiuqede äugrac nerasnepsed caissuban eruen , tud neniuge reC , caresnepsed nahtiab ereb naçec narre naudrO
. résnepsed etaçia nice cirogaiheug nece : autnoc nerasnepsed erue caçe adner ? zaçih ruah tuçnad reC , nóçeic narre ciruhtied aruh atE
: alaçeb elioiri néno nerah , nahtiab aruh nidec asucca ruah , cineuç tabresnepsed nec tabstarba noçiuG , ere-yeulupicsid ereb néceic narre atE

. atiab nedire ate , néztiab udlag , atiab utziv ate , néztiab lih ruah eyana erih nerec , utareugela ate náuç raheb utrah niugesta atE
: cud erih aicug ene ate , zia niuqene ihteb ih , émeS , nóçeic narre crah atE
. aneciug eztera inuh cacuard nakv lih , naened naçi irrohte , niuqétup aicug nussahno erih utiab nakv isteri ceniec , ruah emes erih aniaB
. oceztrah niugesta niuqediuqsida eruen name catuartze tabanitip onadnuge ate , nagari taitze cirunam erih onadnuge ate , aladua neztaztibrec cid ehtrv tabmah , ánuH , iratia ereb nóçeic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah aniaB
. noçeic niuge ztiohto cirikli adab cátia ereb : naçi ihan uhtras nézte ate : nidec erressa atE
. neud utibecer aruh cirosso nerec , tabmeciug eztera catia erih cid nakv lih ate , cud naçi irrohte eyana erih , nóçeic narre crah atE
. nec rec aruh naçec agorretni , tab cirateiraztibrec ciruhtied atE
. cáçnad ate áidolem naztic nuçne , naenoyaç udlibruh iraehcte alec netrohte ate , nádnal anerrahaç emes nerah nec atE
. neztrah niugesta necetic sah atE . ad nedire ate , nec udlag : ad utziv araçrah ate , nec lih ruah emes ene necE
. nugaçed rah niugesta alugud netai ate : euçaçe lih , aneciug eztera cirirrake atE
: aratenio catapaç ate , arucse ereb tabmutzahre euçome ate : euçoçe znuai ate , anelapicnirp aporra euçrakE , yeiraztibrec ereb cátia néceic narre naudrO
. oceztied emes erih engid cuanze cirogaiheug ate , naeniztia erih ate , artnoc neräurec taid niuge stuh , átiA , caemes nóçeic narre atE
. noçeic niuge top ate , aroppel nerah äurub ereb naçec ztoge ciniuge retsal ate , naçec rah enoissapmoc ate , catia ereb naçec suki , alec nurrv oniaro aruh atE . anagatia ereb nidec rohte adab ciriuqiaI
. alaçeb tab ciraterecacola erue caçen niuge : oceztied emes erih engid cuanze cirogaiheug atE
. naeniztia erih ate , artnoc neräurec taid niuge stuh , átiA , tacuard nenarre ate , anagatia eruen zian nenaoi ciriuqiaI
! zianiab neztlih zessog in ate , cinetud ognarf aiugo naehcte neratia ene nedarid recacola tabmeC , naçec narre , naenoiuqec traho iräurub ereb atE
. netiame nacuarezte crohen ate : areztahteb neralebas ereb ciratehcniugam netuç netai cédrv neuç rised atE
. areztaczab nédrv aratenoissessop ereb naçec rogi crah ate , nidec rai niuqetab ségrub ocatrah ukel cinaoi atE
: netaçi raheb nidec sah aruh ate , natrah irreh tabrogog etessog nec naçi niuge , naeneuç nakv utadnepsed aicuG
. zenaçi iciv iuqogidorp , anussahno ereb naçec noiri nah ate : aratetab nurrv irreh nidec naoi ronetzag emes cirudlib caicug , näurub neritug nuge atE
. cano nézteic itrap atE . aetrap nadatiaç neztleh irin citenussahno cadni , átiA , irátia nóçeic narre canetzag cirateh atE
: emes ib neutic cetab noçiuG , naçec narre rebalaH
. naeniag netab ned neztadneme erotakeb , naeniztia néureugniA neraocniaI aled nenaçi oiraczob , teustoid , alaH
. ámhcard neun udlag tud nedire nece : niuqene etzetiaç areugelA , aleoid , caoçua ate caediuqsida etzame utid neztied , naeneud nedire atE
? oneuqaçed nedire aruh iuqtnegilid neztahlib ate , neztabocse aehcte ate netziv aiugra utze , tabamhcard açedab lag nidlab , ceneutid amhcard ramah etzame niec odE
netab ned neztadneme erotakeb näurec aled nenaçi oiraczob alah nece teuçuard netiarrE
. audlag idra eruen tud nedire nece : niuqene etzetiaç areugelA , aletsoid , caoçua ate caediuqsida utid neztied , arehcte cirirrohte oreuG
. cirareugela naeniag nédlabros ereb ud netraçe naeneud nedire atE
? oneuqaçed nedire aruh , naodno neraudlag netiaoi atze ate nautresed caizteremeh ate yeugorual netiztv utitze , aleud neztlag tab cirateh ate aleutid idra nuhe cirateuç cenoçiug nieC
, aleoic , ruah enoitarapmoc néceic narre crah aniaB
. niuqeh ud netai ate , utid neztibecer caocatothciag ezticiv edneg cenuh , aletioic , cébircS ate céuesirahP nétuç neztarumrum atE
. táçnetaçel nuçne aruh , caicug ocatothciag ezticiv edneg ate onacilbup anagnerah nedaric neztlibruh atE
. aceb nuçne , caneud cirirraheb ocetuçnE . aruh ad netzioge taropmac aniab : yagsued taztocirragno ze , taztocerrul atzE
? ad neruticag zaçrec , idadab taçeug aztag nidlab aniab : aztag ad nO
. ulupicsid ene etad nice aruh neztaitnuner utitiapze caicug no ereb cirateuç ere-cron , zareb alaH
. ad netrai zeuqse euqab cirirrogi erodahcabme , oned nurrv oniaro aruh alecreB
? iraned netrohte artnoc nerah niuqerallim yeugoh , zenoidiuqad laha ikli areniztia niuqerallim ramah aye , neutze neztatlusnoc cirirrai nehel , aned neztaiba aretiame alliatab artnoc netab euger ecreb aeuger ad niec odE
. ud utabaca nice ate neztacifide ud issah cenuh noçiuG
, aletioid , táçnecetitze sah neztaffurt zaçrah caicug netud nerissuki , naeneeuqud utabaca nice ate , naodno neeuqud irraçe atnemadnuF
? zeneudab oceztabaca aye , aneutitze neztatnoc cautsog cirirrai nehel , cineud ihan utacifide taberrod cirateuç ad niec necE
. ulupicsid ene etad nice , atiapze netrohte naodno ene ate , aezturc ereb euqracatiapze ere-cron atE
. ulupicsid ene etad nice , ere-amira ereb ogaiheug erate , cáberra ate caeyana ate , carruoah ate aetzame ate , áma ate atia ereb utidapze netseztiag ate adab netrohte anagene rohen nidlaB
. néceic narre ciriluzti ate : niuqerah nedaric netiaoi caidnah eztedneg atE
. nerutatsad citiraffa ene aleutze ere-cetab cirateh nedaric naçi uhtied noçiug , teuçuard netiarre necE
. aehcte ene táçnidad ehteb areztras , caztiahctrob ate , arateorreb ate aratedib ahO , irairaztibrec caissuban nóçeic narre naudrO
. ukel cudab oniaro ate alaçeb náud utanam , cud naçi niuge , áissubaN , cairaztibrec naçec narre atE
. cazti rakere arenrab anuh causti ate cäugniam ate , catnetopmi ate caerbuap ate , arateuqirrac ocirih ate , aratecalp ztetif libaH , irairaztibrec ereb nóçeic narre cáilimafatia ciruterressa naudrO . iraissuban ereb cuah açuag nózteic atnoc crah iraztibrec ciriluzti atE
. cerrohtain nice ztocalah ate , taid utrah etzamE , naçec narre caecreb atE
. natutasucxe caçen iuqude tauard netiuge ztiohto : areztagorohp néyah caohinab ate , taitic issore irratzv idi zroB , naçec narre caecreb atE
. natutasucxe caçen iuqude , tauard netiuge ztiohto : taid raheb ikli aretsuki nerah ate , taid issore tabenoissessoP , nóçeic narre caneheL . neztasucxe zetab udnemitnesnoc necetic sah caicug aniaB
. edarid tserp caicug açuag nece , etzotaÇ , aretiarre yeutatimog , natudro laffa airaztibrec ereb naçec rogi atE
: ztihna naçec ied ate , tabidnah iraffa naçec niuge cetab noçiuG , nóçeic narre crah atE
. aneud nenai iugo námuser neraocniaI cud ustahoD , nóçeic narre cetab cirateneduec cirirrai naeniaham niuqerah cinuçne cuah açuag atE
. naenoitcerruser néotsui aniadro ciaç nerutadner irih nece : adner aniadro irih cidnon etutiapze nerec : zia nenaçi ustahod atE
: causti , cäugniam , catnetopmi , caerbuap cazti ied , tabteuqnab naenaud netiuge aniaB
. náiuqatze adner aniadro ate , táçnetaçeze atimog citedla ereb zidla ere ceh , castarba oçua ze , caediaha erue ze , caeyana erue ze , caediuqsida erue ied alaztitze , tabiraffa ode tabiraczarab naenaud netiugE , nacuarec netiarre ere-iraneuç utatimog areb atE
. ad nerutarog , aneud neztareheb äurub ereb ate : ad nerutareheb , aicug neud neztarog äurub ereb necE
. naeniztia néneduad cirirrai naeniaham niuqerih eroho ceuqud naudro : ogarog ida nagi , áediuqsidA , taçnaçeid narre caneua utatimog ih naenerrohtad : naukel neuqza ida rai , libah , naenecia utatimog aniaB
. netiuqude neraukel neuqza niuqereuqlaha nidaze sah naudro ate : aukel inuh cómE , náçeid narre canetzutiaç uhtied ih ate aruh cirirrohte atE
: neud uhtied crah tabogautaroho oniab ih , nidatze ahtreug , naukel nehel rai alidaze , arateyetze naenaça ied cetiebroN
, aletsoic , nedaric neztatuah zéukelrai nehel alon aleuç neztaogog , tabenoitarapmoc yenedaric naçi utatimog rebalah neuarec netiarrE
. netoeuqaçec stedrahi naeniag néuah açuag nice atE
? naenuge htabbaS neriuqodi aruh natreb utze , óiuqadab rore aruztup aidi ode aotsa cirateuç cenieC , naçec narre , aleuarec netsedrahi atE
. naçec rogi ate , naçec adnes cirutrah aruh crah atE , necetic noge cilihci ceh atE
? aeztadnes naohtabbaS ad iroS , aleoic , yeuesirahP ate yerotcod oceugeL néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi naudrO
. naeniztia nerah nec tabocipordyh noçiug , ánuh atE
. netacuareztiab netiame aogog ceh , areztrah neraenoitcefer ereb naohtabbaS arehcte netab lapicnirp ocateuesirahP naenec irrohte aruh rebalah nidec ahtreuG
. aned netrohte naeneci neranuaI aled utacideneB , neuçarrad onetiad ahtreug , nerissuki aleuçuanze nece , teustoid zaiuge aniaB . tresed aehcte neuç euçiaç netiztv árroH
? nakv ihan euçutiapze ate , alaçeb aripza nélageh ereb aedla otihc ereb caollio , carruoah erih udlib tutid nakv ihan zidla tabmec , canedarid irrogi anagerih neztadipal ate , cátehporP cutitiab neztlih ceniec , emelasureI , emelasureI
. arokel citemelasureI nidad lih ertab ciratehporP neztahtreug cutze nece : izte ate rahib ate nuge taid raheb niuge edib aniaB
. taid neztrah nif naenuge ocenereh ate , rahib ate nuge táid neztabaca aeztadnes ate , aropmac caurbaed táitic netzioge , ánuH , irah ireca euçorre ate etzaoÇ , néceic narre atE
. ua ihan lih cesedoreH nece : cidnemeh aho ate , ida iklI , aletacuarec netiarre , uztab cirateuesirahP necetic libruh naereb natrah nugE
. canedarid nenaçi neuqza , nehel edarid ate : canedarid nenaçi nehel , neuqza edarid , ánuh atE
. námuser neraocniaI naeniaham edarid nerirrai ate : citidre-ugE ate , citenoliuqA : citetnediccO ate , citetneirO edarid nerirrohte naudrO
. aleteraç netziari aropmac ceuç ate , námuser neraocniaI caicug atehporP ate bocaI ate , caasI ate , maharbA naeneuçaztid suki : stocsarrag ztroh ate ragin ad nenaçi naH
. cáicug neuçud netiuge etatiuqini cinagene etzetiaç itrap : neteraç ognon ceuç tiuqatze teuçuard netiarrE , ud nenarre atE
. cih cud istacari nateuqirrac erug ate , ugaid nade ate , náitneserp erih ugaid naI , netiarre eteraç nerissah naudrO
. neteraç ognon ceuç tiuqatzE , euçuard nenarre aleud netredsahi ate : cugaçe iuqeri , anuaI , anuaI , aleuçud netiarre , neztaklub nerahtrob ate , netioge naopmac naenetzetiaç sah ate , naeneeuqud istre áhtrob ate , naenetad iuqiai ailimafatia atE
. edaritiab neruhtras nice ate , aledarid nerilibe zihan uhtras , teuçuard netiarre , ztihna nece : citissreh ahtrob neztras etzetiaç ayesnE
, néceic narre crah atE ? canedarid neztaulas arid caitug , anuaI , cetiebron nóçeic narre atE
. aleuç netiuge aedib octaremelasureI ate , aleuç netsacari , natèugrub ate nateirih nec netiagari oreuG
. onetaçil utahctla aicug , nateniri irruen rurih naçeztiab raçe cetab etzame cirutrah niec , ud iduri airragahctlA
? ámuser neraocniaI tud nerutarapmoc niuqereC , naçec narre zirreb atE
. naterrada nerah etzutid niuge caeztaho céirohc ocurec ate nidec niuge aidnah erobra ate nidec zah ate , naeztarab ereb naçeztiab raçe cetab noçiug cirutrah niec , ud iduri aihib adratsuM
? aruh tud nerutarapmoc niuqerec ate ? cámuser neraocniaI ud iduri reC , cesuseI neuç netiarre naudrO
. zéicug osoirolg açuag nedaric netiuge zaçrah nec neztareugela aicug ulupop aniab : caicug noiuqziaç neztatsartnoc irah nedaric neztidnufnoc , naeneutic netiarre crah cuah açuag atE
? naenuge htabbaS raheb utahcal ciratenuh arudacetse nézte , aleud ehtrv iztroçemeh , ánuh , cenataS neuztiab utacetse niec , ruah abala nemaharbA atE
? aretarede netiamare ate , citaredegnam aotsa ereb ode aidi ereb neztahcal utze naohtabbaS caredebtab cirateuç , átircopyH , naçec narre ate , canuaI adab nóçeic stedrahl
. naenuge htabbaS ze ate , etzetiaç adnes ate etzotaçadab nateh , atiab raheb niuge nal nateniec edarid nuge yeS , iraulupop noçeic narre , cesuseI neuç utadnes naohtabbaS nerec cirutiztiag , calapicnirp ocagoganys aleuç netsedrahi aniaB
. aocniaI neuç neztacifirolg ate , nidec tnehcuhc natreb ate , caucse nózteic raçe naeniag atE
. citenussatire erue zia utahcal , aetzamE , nóçeic narre ate , anagereb naçec ied cesuseI naeneuç issuki aruh atE
. netiec tnehcuhc nice ere-natelohen ate , autacorc nec ate : zehtrv iztroçemeh ai cineuç autirips oczenussatire nidec rohte tabetzame , ánuh atE
. naohtabbaS natetab agoganys nec ira netsacari atE
. ceuqud nerutaccip oreug , erepze , iugnv , cirutcurf açedab rake nidlab atE
. onadoeuqaçed name irragnv ate , onadeuqud utruztia urugni , natenuh ehtrv era caçe iztv , anuaI , nóçeic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
? ud neztahctapme ere-arrul ocatrec : caçe accip : netiedire taitze ate , aratenuh eztocif ahlib utcurf alecian netrohte cid ehtrv rurih , ánuH , iraniaç itsaham nóçeic narre atE
. nedire naçezte ate : aratrah nidec rohte ahlib utcurf ate : naitsaham ereb autadnal cetab-niecode neuç tabeztocif , ere-ruah enoitarapmoc neuç netiarrE
. eteraç nerudlag rebalah caicug , etzetiaçapze adneme nidlab citiztia : teustoid ztezE
? aledaric oganudneugoh oniab caicug tnatibah ocemelasureI euçud etsv , ceh iztroçemeh neutic nakv lih cirirore areniag caerrod oceoliS , apzE
. eteraç nerudlag rebalah caicug etzetiaçapze adneme nidlab citiztia : teustoid ztezE
? etzutitiab utirffus cáçuag ocalah nerec , aledaric ogaerotakeb oniab caicug onaelilaG ecreb cuah onaelilaG nece euçud etsV , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. niuqeoicifircas néyah neuztiab nakv issahan cetaliP alodo néniec , zéonaelilaG cinetacuarec neztatnoc irah naereb natrah arobmed uztab nedaricab atE
. onaeuqorid adner ere-atalep neuqza cidnah nerikli ziaze , tauard netiarrE
. naiugednioserp naçeze raçe catnaegras ate , iratnaegras noçei name caegui ate , anagaegui taçnaçeze arit : netikli citenem nerah naedib ida ayesne , anagautartsigam niuqeratsartnoc aditrap erue naenecia netiaoi adaB
? aned edib neztaegui euçutze ere-zurub noruec alon atE
? neztaegui euçutze alon zenuh arobmed ate : euçiuqad neztaegui neraruhcti nerarrul ate neräurec , cátircopyH
. ad neztahtreug alah ate : aleud neniuge oreb nece , euçud netiarre , naenasnuard cáogeh atE
. ad neztahtreug alah ate : ad udleh airv , euçoid natreb , citetnediccO aled neztahctla tabyedoh naeneuçaçed sukI , ere-yeztedneg neuarec netiarre oreuG
. artnoc neraberrahniug-ama ereb anerre ate , artnoc neranerre ereb áberrahniug-ama : artnoc nerama ábala ate , artnoc nerabala áma : artnoc neratia aemes ate , artnoc neraemes átia ad nenaçi natenoisiuiD
. artnoc nérurih caib ate , artnoc néib carurih , cinetarid natenoisiuid natetab ehcte zrob edarid nenaçi tárah cidnemeh necE
. neraenoisiuid aniab , teustoid , ze ? alecian irrohte aretraçe neraeuqab naerrul nece euçud etsV
? naetra netiad ilpmoc ruah zian nestreh alon ate , zian oceztayehtab zetab omsitpab aniaB
? adab aiuqehcari ai nidlab ogaiheug tud ihan rec ate : arerrul zian irrohte aretiame nerauS
. óyaç neniuge edlag ogaiheug tabmah , iranoyaç naçi name ztihna areztariugeb ate : óyaç neniuge edlag ztihna , iraicug noyaç naçi name ztihna adaB . zitug idlakv ad nerutahec , aneutid niuge caçuag neeuqud icerem ocetaçi utahec ate , aneutze utugaçe aniaB
: zidlakv ztihna ad nerutahec , niuge aruara neraetadnorov nerah utiapze ate , utaraperp atiapze ate , airaztibrec neud utugaçe aetadnorov neraissuban ereb atE
. nerirraçe niuqeledifni aetrap nerah ate , aruh ud nericereb ate : naenero naiuqatze ate , naenuge neutze etsv crah , aissuban nerah iraztibrec ad nerirrohtE
: neztidroh ate netade ate netai ate , néotacsen ate néllihtum neztahec idadab sah ate : aretrohte caissuban ene ud necnareB , naeztohib ereb crah iraztibrec açedab narre nidlab atE
. aruh aleud nerirraçe oceniag neraicug neud nece , teuçuard netiarre iuqzaiugE
. aneud nenedire netiuge alah caissuban naenirrohtad , aruh iraztibrec ad ustahoD
? táçneyed aoiranidro nárobmed , aneud utanedro oceniag nerailimaf ereb caissuban , arruhuç ate alayel résnepsed ad nieC , canuaI naçec narre atE
? ere-yeicug yab ala iroh enoitarapmoc cucuard netiarre irug , anuaI , cesirreiP nóçeic narre naudrO
. ad nerirrohte aemeS neranoçiug naudro neuçutze etsv nece , tserp neteraç adab ere-ceuÇ
. aehcte ereb areztahluç iztv aleeuqaçelze ate , aleeuqaçel alliev , nécil ocetrohte anioho zudro rec cáilimafatia iuqaelab nidlab nece , euçiuqai ruah atE
. ceh iraztibrec edarid ustahod : naztid nedire alah ate , rohtadab nálliev nereh ate , nálliev nerragib rohtadab nidlab atE
. aleutid nerutaztibrec cirutaraniztia ate , aleutid nericare rai naeniaham ate , areb aled nerutacirreug teustoid zaiuge : cairraztari utitiab nenedire caissuban naenerrohtad niec , ceh iraztibrec edarid ustahoD
. táçnetoçed iuqeri natreb , naenaçed aklub áhtrob ate , naenerrohtad : iduri táratenoçiug neduad ariugeb netiad luzti cirateyetze aissuban néyah zion neteraç ceuç atE
. caiuqehcari cálednac neuç ate , cautacirreug caecnurreug neuç ariB
. ere-aztohib neuç ad nenaçi nah , aruaseht neuç atiab non necE
. netiugesed utiapze cenerrec non ate , neztlibruh atiapze cinioho aron : tabmetiatze atlaf ere-ziohen ruaseht natèurec , cáslum nedaritze neztrahaç ocadnoruec euçazti niugE . natanysomele euçazti name ate , cano neuç euçazti laS
. aretiame neramuser yeuç ad naçi ano recalp neratiA neuç nece , áipihc leport rudleb aleciazE
. ocareniag euçiuqziaç nename caicug cuah açuag ate , ámuser neraocniaI euçaçe ahlib citiztianiaB
. aleuçudab arraheb nèuah nece , iuqadab catiA neuç aniab : étzutid neztahlib cédneg ocudnum caicug cuah açuag necE
rai nádud aletzetiazte ate : nenade rec ode neuçud nenai rec ciredlag aleuçiugatze zareb ceuÇ
caocatipihc edef ceuç ogaera zetabmec , udab neztitzev urugni alah caocniaI aned netraçe naebal rahib ate , aned rahleb nádnal nuge nidlab adaB
. alaçeb tab cirateh naçi utitzev aletze niuqeraicug airolg ereb ere-nomolaS era , teustoidab aniab : neturi etutze ate , neztaken edaritze : nedarid neztidnah alon , caerolf euçaztiaredisnoC
? eteraç ustahtra zéocitiog rec , euçiugadab nice ere-aned néipihc nidlab adaB
? iranussatidnah ereb tabosseb oeuqaçeid laha iuqehctare zenakv ahtra cirateuç cron atE
