? euçud oilab ogaiheug oniab céirohc ceuç zetabmec , ceh utid neztah caocniaI ate , cirenarg ze cirotos étutze ceh ate , neztlib ze netiere aletutze nece , caeleb euçazti aredisnoC
. oniab audnemalliba aztuprog ate , ad ogaiheug oniab adnaiv aiciV
. neteraç nerutitzev zaçrec zaztuprog ate ze : neuçud nenai rec , zaezticiv neuç cirahtra neuçutze , teustoid ztocalaH , yeulupicsid ereb néceic narre naudrO
. anetze starba nahtiab aocniaI ate , aneutid neztlib ocatereb caidnah nussahno ad alaH
? edarid nenaçi neron , cáçuag náutid ate : ciaç neriuqede ámira erue naèuag ocruag , áohrE , caocniaI nóçeic narre aniaB
. caçe rah niugesta ate , caçe nade , caçe nai , ida asoper : caudlib tazocatehtrv ztihna caidnah no cutidab , ámirA , iramira eruen tacuard nenarre atE
. cano eruen ate , caicug utcurf eruen tutid nerudlib arah ate : tutid neniuge caogaidnah ate , carenarg eruen tutid neniugesed : tud neniuge ruaH , naçec narre atE
. cautcurf eruen nadaztid lib aron tutze nece ? tud neniuge reC , aleoic , nahtiab ereb neuç netiuge ateugog atE
: étud nakv irrake utcurf iuqtnadnuba cédnal netab starba noçiuG , aleoic , tabenoitarapmoc néceic narre atE
. cirateno ereb utze aiciv ereb , ere-udab aitnadnuba zenussahno cetiebmec nece : citaitiraua etzetiaç ariugeb ate , euçassukI , nóçeic narre oreuG
? naeniag neuç elaztitrap ode , egui in uan irraçe cron , ánoçiuG , nóçeic narre crah aniaB
. aegatereh niuqene naçed itrap ireyana ene córre , áurtsigaM , cetab cirateoceztedneg nóçeic narre atE
. netad raheb narre rec , naereb natrah udro etzutiaç neristacari caudnias utiripS necE
. nenarre rec ode neuçud neristedrahi rec ode alon , ciraisna aleuçutze , aratetatsetop ate , arateutartsigam ate , arateugoganys naenetzutiaç nenamare atE
. nerutakrab óyazte , iraneud nerutamehpsalb artnoc neraudnias utiripS aniab : irah óyaç nerutakrab artnoc neraemeS neranoçiug ciztih utiab nenarre ere-cron atE
. naeniztia néureugniA neraocniaI ad nenaçi autakv , aneuan nerutakv naeniztia nénoçiug in aniaB
. naeniztia néureugniA neraocniaI aruh ud nerutrohtia ere-caemeS neranoçiug , naeniztia nenoçiug uaniab nerutrohtia in ere-croN , adab teustoidaB
. ceuç euçud oilab ogaiheug oniab caedlara irohc-arrap : rudleb zareb aleterazte edarid cautatnoc ere-caicug olib ocurub neuç aniaB
? naeniztia neraocniaI ciricnaha atiapze tab cirateh ate , neztlas natohcturid ib irohc-arrap zrob aritzE
. neteraç rudleb nerah , teustoid era : néraneud aetatirohtua ócetzioge aranneheg naeneeuqud lih , rudleb neteraç : neteraç raheb rudleb neron teuçuard neristucare aniaB
. netaçed niuge cirogaiheug rec etutiapze oreug ate , nénetud neztlih aztuprog rudleb aleteraztE , yoediuqsida eruen yeuç teustoid atE
. nateniag ehcte ad nerutaciderp , aneuçud narre naterebmag arirraheb ate : edarid nenuçne naiugra , cáçuag neuçutid narre naebmuhli ztocalaH
. cinetze neniuqai ciruterces sued ateze : cinetze nerutreuga cirilatse sued atze necE
. áisircopyh atiab niec , citirragahctla néuesirahP etzetiaç ariugeb cineheL , yeulupicsid ereb netiarre néiuqec sah , nétuztiab netiuqzirua rakle non tabmah caidnah oçlum eztedneg cinaçi udlib naetratiuqziB
. taçnetaçel asucca , alaztlibaç zerrehia namaztah citoha nerah tiabrec ate , aleduec nataleC
. zaçuag ztihna netiuqodari soporp ate , nestreh ztiugah cauesirahP ate cábircS noztiuqec sah , naenetzuarec netiarre yæh cuah açuag atE
. euçutid utariugeb canedaric neztras ate , naçi uhtras eterazte coruec : euçud udnek aokag neraeztugaçe nece : cárotcod oceugeL naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. inuh enoitan aloyaç neniuge edlag , teustoid era : naetra iraelpmet ate iraeradla nétuztiab nakv lih niec , onarelodo nesairahcaZ citelodo nelebA
: alodo néicug atehporP ned irussi citzoreug zaenoitaerc neraudnum , taçnoiuqad niugedlag inuh enoitaN
. nerutatucesrep ate étud nelih cirateh ate , caulotsopA ate cátehporP arateh tutid nerirrogI , ud narre ere-caitneipas neraocniaI ztocalaH
. cábmuht néyah euçutid neztacifide ceuç ate , etzutid lih ceh nece : aleuçud neztitnesnoc naterbo netia neuç coruec euçud neztacifitset iuqrugeS
. ceh etzutid nakv lih cétia neuç ate , cábmuht nétehporP euçutid neztacifide nece , naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. neztiuqnuh cágrac euçutitze zetab cirateihre neuç coruec aniab : zeoczeuqen ocetiassai agrac canoçiug euçutid neztagrac nece , cárotcod oceugeL ere-naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM , oid crah atE
. cutiag neztairuini ere-ug naetiarre néiroh açuag , aurtsigaM , astoid cetab ciraterotcod oceugeL aleud netsedrahi naudrO
. etiuqziuqatiapze cénoçiug naztlibad naeniag néyah ate , eteraç alaçeb canedaritze ireuga tnemunom nece : cátircopyh uesirahP ate abircS naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. nateutakrem yenoitatulas ate , nateugoganys yeukel rai nehel euçetzirad no nece : cáuesirahP naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. iztv ze ceh ate , nedaric raheb niuge cuah : aetatirahc ate audnemegui neraocniaI arelebiug euçutid netiztv aniab , aicug rahleb eztarab ate , átur ate áhtnem euçutid neztamehcted nece : cáuesirahP naeniag neuç enoitcidelam aniaB
. euçeuqutid uhahc caicug açuag , anuh ate : natanysomele euçame citeneuçud citiztiA
? niuge ere aocenrab utze caneud niuge aocopmac , cáebag udnemidA
. zaireuqathciag ate zaireuqaparrah ad aehteb , aned naenrab neuç aniab : euçud neztuhahc aedla ocopmac neratalp ate nerapoc couesirahP ceuç aniaB , canuaI nóçeic narre atE
. naeniztia laczarab zuki nideztiapze cinehel nerec naçec sterim cirissuki iroh cauesirahP atiaB
. naeniaham nidec rai ciruhtras suseI ate , nahtiab aruh nidel laczarab cetab uesirahP noçeic niuge ztiohto , naenec utaçnim atE
. alaçeb naenèua neztiugra zaetateralc ereb cálednac , aicug cud nenaçi iugra : aleutze cinuhli ertab ciretrap , adab iugra aicug ztuprog erih nidlab zareB
. nétze ebmuhli aiugra ned natih adab caçe aredisnoC
. ceuqud nuhli ere-aztuprog erih , adab othciag aniab : ceuqud iugra ere aicug ztuprog erih , adab elpmis aiugeb erih nidlab zareb : ad aiugeb , álednac neraztuproG
. taçnetaçed suki aiugra cénedarid neztras , naerelednac aniab : naepuruztiag ze , netraçe nailatse ukel utze aiuqehcari alednac crohen atE
. natenuh ukel aogaoniab sanoI , ánuh ate : necetiztiab adneme arenoitaciderp nesanoI nerec : étud nerutanmednoc ate , niuqenuh enoitareneg naoicidui edarid neriuqiai canoçiug ocauiniN
: natenuh ukel aogaoniab nomolaS , ánuh ate : aretuçne neraitneipas nenomolaS citerretzab nerarrul nideztiab rohte nerec : utid nerutanednoc ate , niuqenoçiug ocatenuh enoitareneg naoicidui ad neriuqiai aniuger ocedla idre-ugE
. inuh enoitareneg ere-aemeS neranoçiug óyaç nenaçi alah , neyaztiab naçi ongis yeocauiniN sanoI alon necE
. neciab aongis neratehporp sanoI nename óyazte cirongis aniab : ogad zeuqse ongis : ad aothciag ruah enoitareneG , netiarre nidec sah , aledaric neztlib caeztedneg atE
. canetud neztariugeb aruh ate , netuçne aztih neraocniaI edarid ustahod citiztia aniaB , naçec narre crah atE
. caztagv náutid iuqsode cih ate , alebas neua irage ih cutid ustahoD , nóçeiztiab narre , citetra neraulupop cetab etzame azov cirutahctla , aleutic netiarre cuah açuag nidec ahtreug atE
. ogaothciag oniab anehel aenoitidnoc neuqza nerah noçiug ad netiuge ate : nah edarid neztatibah ciruhtras ate : caogaothciag oniab areb utirips ipzaç cirecreb utid neztrah ate , ad netiaoi naudro atE
. audniappa ate autabocse aruh ud netiedire cirirrohte atE
. zianiab naçi ikli cidnon arehcte eruen zian neriluztI , oid , naeneutze netiedire ate : ahlib ussuap , alibad zérrohiel ukel cinaganoçiug tiebmec naened ikli austas utiripS
, ad ira neztayerrab anetze ira neztlib niuqene ate : ad artnoc ene anetze niuqenE
. neztiubirtsid audnemallitso nerah ate , ud netiuqede , néztiab adif nateniec , aicug arudamrah nerah , açedab tiarag cirutattemoca cetab ogaztihrob oniab areb aniaB
. cáçuag neutid crah edarid naeuqab , aiugeruai ereb naeneud neztariugeb cetab utamrah zihtrob noçiuG
. ámuser neraocniaI arateuç ad naçi udleh ruges , caurbaed tutidab netzioge aropmac zaihre neraocniaI nidlab aniaB
. egui neuç edarid nenaçi ceh ztocalah ? etzutid netzioge aropmac zetrap neron cémes neuç , caurbaed tutidab netzioge aropmac zetrap ne-bubezleeB cin nidlab atE
. caurbaed cin aladutid netzioge aropmac zetrap ne-bubezleeB euçoidab nece ? ad nenoge ámuser nerah natalon , adab autitrap artnoc ereb ere-nataS nidlab atE
. ad netrore autitrap artnoc ereb ehcte ate : ad netiugesed , aicug amuser ned autitrap artnoc ereB , néceic narre , caudnemasnep néyah naiuqziuqeztiab alon crah aniaB
. nacziaç zeuqse citurec ongis , aletuç neztatnet caecreb atE
. caurbaed aropmac utid netzioge zetrap neraecnirp néurbaed bubezleeB , netaçec narre cuztab cirateh atE
. céztedneg netaçec sterim ate : autum nideztiab açnim , naenec ikli aurbaed , nidec ahtreug ate : utum nec aruh ate , taburbaed aropmac naçec ztoge naudrO
. yenocziaç nerutacse audnias utiripS euard nename calaitselec atiA neuç ogaiheug zetabmec , netiame yerruoah neuç néno açuag euçiuqadab , ciraleteraç othciag nidlab ceuç zareB
? acuard nename anoiprocs ala , idadab acse netab eztluarra nidlab odE
? acuard nename tabeugus naukel neraniarra ala , oiuqadab acse niarra nidlab ode ? anacuard nename tabirrah , óiuqadab acse iugo aemes , átia cirateuç ad niec atE
. oyaç neriuqeri , iraneud neztaklub ate : ud netiedire caneud neztahlib ate : ud neztibecer caicug ned neztacse necE
. euçiaç neriuqeri ate euçaçe aklub : euçud nenedire ate , euçaçeahlib : euçiaç nename ate , etzetiaç acsE , teuçuard netiarre cin atE
. utiab raheb ere-tabmec acuard néname ciriuqiai citaganussatirihtum nerah erelah : ned ediuqsida nerah nerec , ere-oçeidapze name ciriuqiai nidlab , teuçuard netiarrE
. aretiame irih cetiain iuqiai nice : naeho cutid aliuqene caohctruoah ene ate , cud aistre áhtrob ai : ahcsaf aláçenzE , naçed narre aleud netsedrahi citenrab crah atE
. nadoçeid raçe naeniztia rec táitze ate , anagene citedib cud naçi irrohte tabediuqsida ene necE
: iugo rurih cadaztei atserp , áediuqsidA , anacuard nenarre ate natidre-uag anagnerah aned nenaoi ate , tabediuqsida aneud nenakv cirateuç ad nieC , néceic narre atE
. citothciag caztiag aruiled aniab , natenoicatnet icare ras alaztiagze atE . yeicug netucuard roç irug ugaèuarid neztakrab ere-cug nece : cautakeb erug cugaztei akrab atE
. taztocenuge cugi aiugo ocenuge eruG
. ere-naerrul , alaçeb näurec , aetadnorov erih ideb niugE , ámuser erih ideb rohtE , aneci erih ideb acifitcnaS , anecia natèurec atiA eruG , euçaçe narre , naeneuçud netiuge ztiohtO , néceic narre atE
. alaçeb neuard istacari yeulupicsid ereb ere-cesennaoI , netiuge ztiohto cugaçei stacari , anuaI , cetab cirateulupicsid ereb nóçeiztiab narre , naenec utassec , aleogec netiuge ztiohto natetab ukel rebalah nidec ahtreuG

. neriuqede oyaztiapze niec , nid utatuah ano etrap cairaM aniaB . óirassecen nud tabaçuag aedrO
: naodno neraçuag ztihna zia neztatnemrot ate , nud arugnarra , ahtraM , ahtraM , cesuseI nóçeic narre aleuç netsedrahi atE
. naçen atuia zidla in adab corre ? neuan netiztv areztaztibrec roruen cápziha eruen nerec ciraisna cih cutze , anuaI , naçec narre cirutidleug ate : netiuge neruztibrec ztihna nec natocetiuge ahtraM aniaB
. neuç netuçne aztih nerah , aleogec cirirrai aratenio nesuseI ere-crah , cinec neztied airaM tabapziha neuç cenuh atE
. arehcte ereb aruh naçec ibecer cetab nec neztied ahtraM , etzame ate : natetab ugrub nideztiab ras aruh , aledaric netiaoi ceh nidec ahtreug atE
. rebalah ciuge ere-cih , ahO , cesuseI adab astoiD . anacuard nakv niuge aidrociresim iraH , nóçeic narre crah atE
? aled naçi ocruh neraned naçi irore arateniugathciag ciaç iduri ciratuah rurih adab nieC
. tauard nerutadner naenidan luzti cin , cutiab nerutadnepsed ogaiheug ere-rec ate , inuh cóme utieuqerrE , nóçeic narre ate , irautatso nózteic name orenid ib ciriuqodi naeztitrap naenumarahiB
. naçec asnep ate , arairelatso naçec namare , naeniag neraerba ereb cirirraçe aruh ate , onrastaham ate oilo ciname , cairuaç nerah naztic tol cirudlibruh atE
. naçec rah enoissapmoc cirissuki aruh ate , anagnerah nidec rohte , aleuç netiagari aedib ereb tabonatiramaS aniaB
. nidec nagari citedla ecreb , cirissuki aruh ate cirudleh aratrah ukel ere-tabatiueL rebalaH
. nidec nagari citedla ecreb cirissuki aruh ate : zareb zaçrah edib nidec stuai taberodacifircaS zurtnocne atE
. ciriztv cilih idre aruh , necetic naoi ciruhtruaç ate , ciricullib aruh ceh ate , aretra néniugathciag nidec rore ate , arocireI citemelasureI nec netsuai tabmoçiuG , naçec narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
? aocruh ene ad ron atE , isuseI nóçeic narre , zihan utacifitsui äurub ereb crah aniaB
. zia ociciv ate ciuge iroh : cud istedrahi iugnV , nóçeic narre naudrO
. alaçeb äurub erue aocruh erue ate : zaicug udnemasnep erue ate , zaicug radni erue ate , zaicug amira erue ate , zaicug ztohib erue anuaI ocniaI erue cud neristehnO , naçec narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
? cud neztrucari alon ? autabircs ad rec naeugeL , nóçeic narre crah atE
? tud nerutatereh alanrete ezticiv zeniuge rec , áurtsigaM , aleoic ate , aleuç neztatnet aruh , nidec iuqiai tabrotcod oceugeL , ánuh naudrO
. nuçne etzutitiapze ate , aretuçne nécuag neuçutid netuçne ate : issuki etzutitiapze ate , aretsuki nécuag neuçutid netsuki ceuç aletud nakv utarised ceuger ate catehporP ztihna , teuçuard netiarre necE
. caiugeb netiuqsucad caçuag neuçiuqsucad ceuç edarid ustahoD , néceic narre trappa , ciriluzti tarateulupicsid atE
. acuartiab nenakv ihan utatsefinam caemeS ere-iron ate , neciab caemeS , atiA ned ron ate : neciab cátiA , aemeS ned ron iuqatze crohen ate , tiuqziaç name zatiA eruen irin caicug açuaG , naçec narre ciriluzti tarateulupicsid naudrO
. ano recalp erih atiab naçi alah nerec , átiA yab : yeipihc ruoah cetzuartiab utatsefinam ate , yeutida ate yérruhuç cuah açuag cetzuartiab ilatse nerec , taiuqzuard neztadner carreuqse , ánuaI ocerrul ate ocurec , átiA , naçec narre ate , zutirips suseI nidec areugela naereb natrah udrO
. natèurec edaritiab cautabircs caneci neuç nerec , etzetiaç areugela citiztia aniab : neuçiuqziaç netiuge teius cautirips nerec , areugela aletzetiazte zaçrah aedrO
. neniuge ciretlac euçuartze cessued ate : naeniag neraicug açnassiup nerayaste ate , ocetlibe naeniag nénoiprocs ate néugus erehtob teuçuardab , ánuH
. netrore citurec alaçeb atsimtsihc nataS neun netsukI , néceic narre atE
: naeneci erih cugiuqziaic netiuge teius ere-caurbaed , anuaI , aletioic , niuqeroiraczob carramah ate yeugorurih edarid naçi iluzti atE
. ud netziari aneuan irrogi in , caneuan netziari in ate : uan netziari in , canetzutiaç netziari ceuç ate : uan netuçne in , canetzutiaç netuçne ceuÇ
. zia nerutareheb onarunreffi , anecia naçi utahctla onarurec muanrepaC ih atE
. ceuç ze nece naoicidui edarid nenaçi cautatcart ogaiuqeme nodiS ate ryT ztocalaH
. neeuqetaric utadneme cirirrai niuqestuah ate niuqerucaç idlapsa , caetuhtrev nedarid naçi niuge nahtiab ceuç edarilab naçi niuge nenodiS ate neryT nidlab nece , adiashteB irih enoitcidelam , nizarohC irih enoitcidelaM
. aledarid nenaçi cautatcart ogaiuqeme oniab aruh irih natrah nuge caocamodoS nece teustoidab aniaB
. ámuser neraocniaI arateuç aled udlibruh nece , euçiuqai ruah ere-citagaicug : artnoc neuç ugud netsorrahi ere-astuahrre nuciaç uhtol citirih neuÇ
, euçarre , arateuqirrac ognah cirikli , nerutibecer etzutiaztiapze ate , eteraztiab neruhtras natirih ere-niec aniaB
. ámuser neraocniaI arateuç ad udlibruH , euçerre ate , caire netarid natrah euçaztiadnes atE
: cirateneuçiuqziaç netraçe areniztia euçaçe nai , etzutiaztiab nerutibecer ate , eteraztiab neruhtras natirih ere-niec era aniaB
. arehcte citehcte nagari aletzetiaztE . ad engid nerairas ereb aeliugnal nece : citeneuçiaç nename areniztia aleuçud netade ate netai , eteduaç naereb natrah ehcte atE
. ad neriluzti arateuç erepze : naeniag nerah aeuqab neuç ad nerutassuap , adab ertab ciremes oczeuqab nah nidlab atE
. natenuh ehcte aled aeuqaB , euçarre cinehel , eteraztiab neruhtras natehcte ere-nieC
. atulas aleuçaçetze naedib rohen ate : ciratapaç ze , ciratelam ze , ciraslum ze aleuçamartzE
. alaçeb aretra néosto castodlib ceuç tetzutiaç netrogi cin ánuh , etzaoÇ
. aratzv ereb caeliugnal naztid noiri , iraebaI atzv adab euçoiuge ztiohto : itug eliugnal aniab , ad idnah átzV , neuarec netiarre atE
. arateicug ukel ate irih nec ocetrohte areb , naeniztia etrahtiugeb ereb árib ceh naztic rogi ate , ere-ramah ate yeugorurih ecreb canuaI naztic anedro naodno neuah açuaG
. taztocamuser neraocniaI cined oiporp cineud neztaheb tarelebiug ate netraçe naedlog aucse ereb rohen cutzE , cesuseI nóçeic narre atE
. nadaçed rah tignoc cirateocehcte niheb cadaçei ittemrep aniab : irih ciaztan neriuqierraI , anuaI , ere-cetab ecreb naçec narre naudrO
. ámuser neraocniaI caçe aitnuned ate libah ih aniab : aretzroho nélih ereb calih , caztiztV , cesuseI nóçeic narre atE
. aretzroho neratia eruen nidan naoi niheb cadaçei ittemrep , anuaI , naçec narre crah atE . irin tierrA , itab ecreb nóçeic narre aniaB
. naçed assuap äurub ereb non citze caemeS neranoçiug aniab : caeztaho céirohc ocurec ate , éitic caohluç céirecA . noçeic narre cesuseI atE
. ziatiab nenaoi ere-taron ciaztan neriuqierrai , anuaI , cetiebron nóçeiztiab narre , aledaric netiaoi zaedib ceh , nidec ahtreug oreuG
. aratetab ugrub ecreb necetic naoi atE . areztaulas aniab , areztlag néiciv nénoçiug irrohte atze aemeS neranoçiug necE
. neteraç ocatutirips rec euçiuqatzE , aleoic , ceh naztic ahctahem cesuseI ciriluzti aniaB
? alaçeb neuç niuge ere-cesailE , naztid niugesed ate , citurec nidad stuai aus nugarred cud ihan , anuaI , netaçec narre cesennaoI ate ceseuqcaI ulupicsid nerah cirissuki iroh atE
. aneranec netioi taremelasureI néztiab aetrahtiugeb nerah nerec , ibecer netaçezte aniaB
: táçnetoçeil niappa utatso , natetab ugrub néonatiramaS necetic ras cinaoi ate , naeniztia ereb cairatadnam naztic rogi atE
. aretiaoi aremelasureI ciniuge ogog aetrahtiugeb ereb naçeztiab tnehcuhc naudro , naenedaric neztilpmoc canuge oceztahctla itiog nerah , nidec ahtreug atE
. ad edla erug anetze artnoc erug nece , atebed aleuçaçetzE , cesuseI nóçeic narre naudrO
. irih niuqerug cierratiapze nerec , aruh ugaid utatebed ate : cineutic netzioge aropmac caurbaed naeneci erih tiebron ugaid issuki , áurtsigaM , naçec narre cesennaoI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. idnah ad nenaçi aruh , naetra noicug neuç aneipihc atiab ron nece : ud neztibecer aneuan irrogi in , uaniab nerutibecer in ere-cron ate : uan neztibecer in , naeneci ene ruah ohctruoah utiab nerutibecer ere-croN , néceic narre atE
: naedla ereb naçec raçe cirutrah tabohctruoah , naeneuç issuki audnemasnep oceztohib néyah cesuseI atE
. aneidnah nec niec cirateh aye , nátupsid niuqerrakle necetic ras oreuG
. zaçenuh ztih areztagorretni nerah nedaric rudleb ate : neztidnes aruh nétuztiapze non alah , nec ailatse cirateh ate , neztida netuzte ruah ztih ceh aniaB
. arateucse nénoçiug atiab nerutaruil aemeS neranoçiug ad nenaçi nece : nateirraheb neuç cuah ztih ceuç euçazti raçE
, yeulupicsid ereb néceic narre , naeniag néicug açuag neutic netiuge , aleduec zulucarim caicug atE . naeniag neraidnah oczicug etuhtrev neraocniaI caicug necetic atnaps atE
. iratia ereb nóçeic adner ate , arruoah naçec adnes ate , austas utirips cesuseI naçec ahctahem ate : acihtaç ate caurbaed aruh naçec stuah alec neztlibruh oniaro atE
. aemes erue anuh carrakE ? tetzutiaç nerutatroppus ate zian nenaçi niuqeuç naenif onardzion , áothciag ate aludercni enoitan O , oid cesuseI aleud netsedrahi atE
. éid niuge nice aniab : aropmac aruh netaçel ztoge , yeulupicsid erih taeuarid niuge ztiohto atE
. aleud netsuah ruah , cud neztitrap zeuqen cinagenuh ate , aloirad anugah cid neztacihtaç ate , cud netrai zarogayeh natreb ate , cid neztrah cautirips , ánuh atE
. taitze neciab areb ruah nece : tánagaemes ene caçe-aheb tauard netiuge ztiohto , áurtsigaM , aleoic , nidec rai zuhio tabmoçiug ocainiapmoc , ánuh atE
. irah noiuqeztiab ikli arurtnocne tabidnah eztedneg , naenedaric istuai citidnem ceh , naenuge ocodno nidec ahtreug atE
. ciratecuag netzutic issuki narre sued irohen netoçeizte nateh nuge ate , necetic noge cilihci ceh ate : areb suseI nidec nedire , alec netiuge aruh zov atE
. etoiuqziuqaç aheb inuh , aetiam emeS ene ad ruaH , aleoic , citeyedoh nidec niuge tabzov naudrO
. naenedaric neztras naeyedoh necetic ici ate : ceh naztic latse ate , tabyedoh nidec niuge , aleutic netiarre cuah açuag crah atE
. nec oçnim rec alaiuqaztE : nesailE tab ate , nesesyoM tab ate , erih tab , elcanrebat rurih adab nugaztid niuge , nerag nemeh ug cud no , áurtsigaM , isuseI nóçeiztiab narre cesirreiP : cinagnerah naenedaric utitrap ceh , nidec ahtreug atE
. canoçiug ib neduec niuqerah ate , aetatseiam nerah netaçec suki , naenedaric utraztari ate : cautagrac zelagol nedaric , canedaric niuqerah ate , sirreiP atE
. anif neuç oceztilpmoc nemelasureI crah , nétuç netiarre , niuqerairolg cirutreuga cuaH
: sailE ate sesyoM nedariztiab niec , niuqerah nedaric oçnim noçiug ib , ánuh atE
. tiugra niaçeb atsim-tsihc ate tiruhc audnemalliba nerah ate , nidec ahtum ámrof ocetrahtiugeb nerah , aleogec netiuge ztiohto atE
. aretiuge ztiohto aratetab idnem nideztiab nagi ate , seuqcaI ate sennaoI ate sirreiP naztiztiab rah , näurub nenuge iztroç isauq citzoreug zaçuah ztih , nidec ahtreug atE
. oneteuqaçed suki ámuser neraocniaI cinetutze nerutatsad aoireh , uztab ciratonedarid tneserp nemeh edaridab , zaiuge teuçuard netiarre atE
. naeneudnias ureugniA ate naeneratiA ate , naetatseiam ereb naenerrohtad , aemeS neranoçiug ad nenaçi euqlaha zaçrah , zéztih ene ate zaçin atiab nenaçi euqlaha ere-ron necE
? nidad lag ate , naçed iurtsed äurub ereb ate , açedab zabari aicug udnum nidlab canoçiug ud uhcteborp rec necE
. aruh ud nerutaulas , zasuac ene aiciv ereb utiab nerudlag ere-cron aniab : aruh ud nerudlag : aiciv ereb utaulas utiab nenakv ihan ere-cron necE
. irin tiarreb ate , zoro nuge aezturc ereb açeb rah ate , zaurub ereb açeb aitnuner , adab ihan irrohte naodno ene roh rohen nidlaB . yeicug neuarec netiarre oreuG
. nidad aticsuser naenuge ocenereh ate , nidad lih ate , zebircS ate , zélapicnirp erodacifircaS ate zéonaicnA nidad aborper ate , naçed irffus ztihna caemeS neranoçiug ad raheB , aleoiC
: netorrelze ruah irohen naztic anam ciraleutic neztahctahem crah naudrO
. aneraocniaI tsirhC , naçec narre cesirreiP nomiS aleuç netsedrahI ? euçoid in alecian ron ceuç atE , néceic narre atE
. aled naçi utaticsuser cirateocoganehel atehporP tiebmec nece , cécreb ate : sailE , cécreb ate : atsitpaB sennaoI , netaçec narre aletuç netsedrahi ceh atE
? cedneg etioid alecian ron iN , aleoic , ceh naztiztiab agorretni ate nedariztiab niuqerah caulupicsid , aleogec netiuge ztiohto trappa aruh , nidec ahtreug atE
. aratiuqsas ibamah cirateihtaç netziaç naçi utarebos edarid naçi utitiog ate : necetic aisasser ate , céicug adab netaçec naI
. táçnetaztil raçe naeniztia neraulupop , yeulupicsid nézteic name ate , naztic stuah ate : ceh naztic acideneb aleogec aheb tarurec , caniarra ib ate caiugo zrob cirutrah naudrO
. caicug necetic rai ate , netaçec niuge alah atE
. ánramah ate yeugorreb zaradniaham euçazti icare raI , yeulupicsid ereb etsoid naudrO . onaratenoçiug allim zrob nedaricab necE
. ocetai ugaçedapze sore neraicug nenuh ulupop cinaoi cug nidlaB : ogaiheug aniab niarra ib ate iugo zrob ugaititzE , netaçec narre ceh atE . aretai ceuç euçeyE , néceic narre aniaB
. cutiag nautresed ukel nemeh nece , ocetai netaçed nedire ate , necetid ariter , arateoiporrap ate aratèugrub ocurugni cinaoi , yeztedneg tignoc céyE , netoçeic narre céibamah cirudlibruh ate : neztareheb nidec sah anuge atE
. neutic neztadnes , canetuç raheb utadnes ate : zámuser neraocniaI neyaç neztaçnim , naeneutic utibecer ate , nacziaç iuqierrai , ciniuqai iroh caeztedneg atE
. aratetab utresed ukel ocirih ned neztied adiashteB . trappa suseI nidec ariter cirutrah ceh naudrO . caicug açuag netzutic niuge , isuseI netozteic atnoc céulotsopA ciriluzti atE
. nalibaç zihan issuki aruh atE ? caçuag ocalenuh tiuqzuçnatiab cin zeniec , ruah adab ad ron : tacuard iuqede äurub cin isennaoI , cesedoreH oid naudrO
. alec utaticsuser ciratehporP ocoganehel tiebmec , cécreb ate : alec utreuga sailE cuztab atE
. alec utaticsuser ciratelih sennaoI nece , nétuztiab netiarre cuztab nerec , neuç neztadud ate : caicug açuag neutic netiuge crah , cahcrartet sedoreH naztic nuçne atE
. nateicug ukel aletuç neztadnes ate neztazilegnaue , ugrub zugrub nedaric netiaoi cirikli adab ceH
. artnoc néyah nategainomitset euçaçe sorrahi ere-astuahrre ocatenio neuç , ciratrah irih cirikli , etzutiaztiapze nerutibecer ere-cron atE
. etzedniztiabla ikli cidnah ate , eteduaç nah , eteraztiab neruhtras natehcte ere-niec atE
. aporra árib aleuçutze ate , cirurid ze , ciriugo ze , ciratelam ze , cirehv ze , táztocedib namare sued aleuçaçetzE , néceic narre atE
. areztadnes néire ate , areztaciderp neramuser neraocniaI ceh naztic rogi atE
. oceztadnes nénussatire ate , naeniag néicug urbaed etatirohtua ate erehtob néceic name , caulupicsid ibamah ereb niuqerrakle ciruhtied oreuG

. anec naçi niuge netorrelze irohen naztic anam crah aniab : cáma-atia nerah necetic atnaps atE
. aretai nóiuqel name naçec anam ate : natreb nidec iuqiai ate , autirips nerah nidec luzti atE
. ida iuqiai , áhctacseN , aleoic , naçec niuge uhio , cirutrah aucse nerah ate , ciriztiari aropmac caicug , crah atE
. zeniuqai alec lih , zaçrah nedaric neztaffurt atE
. aztad ol aniab , lih atze : cirragin aleuçiugatzE , naçec narre crah aniab : nétuç neztatnemal ate , caicug neduec zerragin atE
, neciab ama ate atia nerahctacsen ate sennaoI ate seuqcaI ate sirreiP iztv areztras rohen naçezte , ciruhtras arehcte atE
. atiab nerutadnes aruh ate , tnemalos caçe stehnis , rudleb aleciazE . irátia nerahctacsen nóçeic stedrahi cinuçne cesuseI aniaB
. aurtsigaM agitaf alaçetze : ábala erih cud naçi liH , alastoic irah , citeneralapicnirp ocagoganys tiebmec nidec rohte , alec oçnim aruh oniarO
. niuqereuqab aho : ua utadnes caedef erue no ztohib nua ábalA , nóçeic narre crah atE
. natreb nec naçi utadnes alon ate , neuç iuqnuh aruh zasuac rec naeniztia neraicug ulupop nóçeic aralced ciriztoge areniztia nerah äurub ereb ate : alalibaç araki nidec rohte , naçi ilatse aloyazte nece cirissuki adab aruh etzamE
. aled naçi ikli cinagene etuhtrev tud utugaçe nece uan iuqnuh cetiabroN , oid cesuseI aniaB
? aneuan iuqnuh in ad roN , coid ate , etua netiuqzirua ate nestreh céztedneg , áurtsigaM , cénedaric niuqerah ate , cesirreiP naçec narre , naeniag neranetuç neztakv céicug atE ? aneuan iuqnuh in ad roN , cesuseI oid naudrO
. aeztairai lodo nerah nidec idleug natreb ate aniapze aporra nerah naçec iuqnuh citelebiug cirudlibruH
, cetabetzame nec naçi utadnes nice ere-zetab ate , neuç utadnepsed aicug aitnatsus ereb nateucidem ate , noyazte neztarab alodo citzoreug zehtrv ibamah atE
. neuç nestreh caeztedneg naetiaoi atE . areztlih naihoç aruh ate , aocurugni nerehtrv ibamah neuç tabztiokab abala necE
: arehcte nerah nidel ras noçeic niuge ztiohto , aratenio nesuseI äurub ereb naeneuç iztoge ate : lapicnirp ocagoganys nec aruh ate , tabmoçiug nec neztied suriaI nidec rohte , ánuh naudrO
. neduec ariugeb nerah caicug nece : caeztedneg naçeztiab ibecer , suseI naenec iluzti nidec ahtreug atE
: caicug açuag naczuarec niuge cesuseI aleutic neztaciderp citicug irih adab nidec naoI . caocniaI náiuqzuard niuge caidnah açuag niec caçe atnoc ate , arehcte erue ida luztI
, aleoic , naçec rogi cesuseI aniab : nécil niuqerah , caurbaed nedariztiab naçi ikli cinaganiec , crah noçiug nóiugec ztiohto atE
. nidec luzti , ciruhtras aricnv aruh ate : neutic utrah cidnah arudici nece : cirateh nidel itrap , caicug eztedneg ocurugni iridla néoneradaG netoçeic niuge ztiohto naudrO
. anaçi utainomed nec naçi utadnes alon , ere-cenetuç nakv issuki yæh neceic atnoc atE
. necetic ici ate : aratenio nesuseI aleogec cirirrai , autaçnec ate , autitzev , nedariztiab naçi ikli caurbaed cirateniec anoçiug netaçec nedire ate , anagsuseI necetic rohte ate , aretsuki neranec naçi niuge necetic ikli caedneg naudrO
. nateopmac ate nairih netaçec atnoc cirutitrap ate : netaçec niuge sehi , nec naçi niuge rec naenetuç issuki céniadrv atE
. nidec ohti ate , are-cal areheb citeniag nidec radlo aedladrv ate : aratedrv necetic ras cinaganóçiug caurbaed adab ciriklI
. néceic ittemrep ate : areztras arateh néceil ittemrep netacuarec netiuge ztiohto ate : naidnem cinec ahla tabidnah edladrv nah nec atE
. aretiaoi aromsyba anam naztilze , netacuarec netiuge ztiohto atE
. nahtiab aruh nedaric uhtras urbaed ztihna necE . enoigeL , naçec narre crah atE ? neci cud aloN , aleoic , cesuseI aruh naçec agorretni naudrO
. arateutresed zaurbaed nec netiamare cirutihtaç caulliacetse aniab : nec neztariugeb zeopec ate zanedac cirutacetse ate : aruh neuç iuqude zecul arobmed nece : nidel ikli cinaganoçiug austas utirips neuç neztanam necE
. atnemrot , aláçenze , tauard netiuge ztiohto ? áemeS neraonaribus ocniaI suseI , naetra ene ate erih ad reC , naçec narre iugneco ate , areniztia nerah äurub ereb naçec ztoge , aleogec zarogayeh , suseI naeneuç issuki crah atE
. natebmuht aniab , netioge nezte natehcte ate , neztitzev nézte zudnemalliba ate : tab-neuç aurbaed zoreug zecul arobmed noçiug ocatrah irih nóiuqec tab , ate ikli arerrul irah adaB
. krua zakrua neraelilaG atiab niec , táracramoc neoneradaG netaçec arit oreuG
? etutiab neztidebo ate utitiab neztanam arv ate caeciah , ruah ad ron aniaB , naetra nerrakle aletioic , netaçec sterim aleduec cirutici ceH ? aedef neuç ad noN , néceic narre atE
. nidec niuge aidnah ugassos ate , necetic assec ate : átsepmet nerarv ate aeciah naztic ahctahem cirirraztari crah atE . caçaohiug udlag , áurtsigaM , áurtsigaM , aletioic , aruh netaçec raztari cirudlibruh naudrO
. nétuç lirep ate , nedaric neztahteb zerv ate : arecal tabatnemrot oczeciah nidec stuai ate : naçec rah caol , aledaric netiaoi ceh naicnv atE
. necetic itrap atE . aredla ecreb neracal necetiag nagarI , néceic narre ate : caulupicsid nerah ate naicnv nideztiab ras aruh , zetab nuge nidec ahtreug atE
. canetud netiuge ate netuçne aztih neraocniaI edarid eyana ene ate ama enE , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah aniaB
. zian issuki ih , ceduaid naerokel caeyana erih ate , ama eriH , aletacuarec netiarre , nóiuqec aralced atE
. noiuqzidiuqec sreh nice zasuac neraeztedneg ate , caeyana nerah ate ama nerah anagnerah necetic rohte naudrO
. irah oyaç neriuqede ere-aneud etsv aleud , utiapze ere-cron ate : oyaç nename irah utiab ere-cron nece : neuçud netuçne alon adab euça-sukI
. cinetze nerirrohte ariugra ate , nerutugaçe , cirilatse ze : cinetze nerutreuga , ciruterces atze necE
. táçnetaçed suki aiugra cénedarid neztras , ud netraçe naeniag relednac aniab : netraçe naipza eho ode , neztlatse zetab icnv aruh utze , naeneud utziv aiugra crohen atE
canetud netrake nataitneitap utcurf ate canetud netiuqude anuçne ztih naeno ate naetsenoh ztohib edarid cuah , aned irore areno rul aniaB
. netrake cirutcurf étutze ate , edarid neztohti zétatpulov ocatenuh ezticiv ate zénussatsarba ate zéisna , ate utitrap aniab : canetud nuçne edarid cuah , aned irore aretra irrohle atE
. edarid neztariter nárobmed ocenoitatnet ate , étud netsehnis ztocatarobmed cuah , etutze cirorre cuah aniab : aztih canetud neztibecer niuqeroiraczob naenetud nuçne , edarid caoceniag irrah atE
. táçnecetitze aulas ciristehnis , citeztohib néyah aztih ud necnek ate , aurbaed ad netrohte oreug : canetud netuçne , edarid caocerretzab edib atE
. aztih neraocniaI ad aicaH , aenoitarapmoc adab ad ruaH
. netaçetze ida ciraletuçnad ate , netaçetze suki ciraletassucad , zenoitarapmoc yecreb aniab : aeztugaçe néoiretsym ocamuser neraocniaI euçiaç name yeuÇ , néceic narre crah atE
. aruh enoitarapmoc nec cirec , aletuç netiarre céulupicsid ereb netuç neztagorretni atE
. açeb nuçne , caneud cirirraheb ocetuçnE , neogec zuhio naetiarre néuaH . tabmah natenuhe utcurf naçec niuge ciruhtros ate : areno rul nidec rore aecreb atE
. aruh netaçec ohti céirrohle ciruhtros naetab niuqerah ate : aretra irrohle nidec rore tabetrap ecreb atE
: cinussateceh neuztiapze nerec , nidec rahye ciruhtros ate , areniag irrah nidec rore tabetrap ecreb atE
. aruh netaçec steri céirohc ocurec ate , nec naçi iuqzirua ate : arerretzab edib nidec rore tabetrap naetiere ate : aretiere neraicah ereb tabelliere nidec iklI
, zenoitarapmoc naçec narre , netiaoi anagnerah ztihna cirateicug irih ate , neztiab neztlib aidnah eztedneg alon atE
. cinetuç neztatuia aruh cirateno ereb ztihna cirecreb ate , annasuS ate , aetzame neranec neztied zuhC . erodarucorp nesedoreH annaoI atE
, nedariztiab neçi ikli urbaed ipzaç cinaganiec , aneladgaM anec neztied airaM , cautadnes ciratenussatire ate , cirateothciag utirips zaçrah uztab etzame atE
: niuqerah nedaric caibamah ate ámuser neraocniaI aleuç neztazilegnaue ate neztaciderp , ugrub zugrub ate , irih zirih neztiab netiaoi aruh nidec ahtreug oreug atE
. niuqereuqab aho : ua utaulas caedef eruE , nóçeic narre iraetzame aniaB
? utitiab neztakrab ere-cautakeb ruah ad roN , netiarre naetra ereb , caneduec cirirrai naeniaham niuqerrakle necetic sah atE
. cautakeb erue niuqziaç utakraB , nóçeic narre iraetzame oreuG
. cid netsehno ogaitug canoyaç neztakrab ogaitug ate : cid istehno ztiugah nece , caztihna utakeb ereb alacziaç utakrab tauard netiarre ztocalaH
. canio ene citic utatcnv zutneugnv cenuh aniab : utatcnv cutze äurub ene zoilO
. utidleug citetiuge top yenio ene cutze , citzoreug zanecian uhtras , ruah aniab , name catuartze irin tabtoP
. utacuhci zastada ocurub ereb ate , citic utagerra zirv ragin canio ene cenuh aniab : name cutze aratenio ene cirv , cuan naçi uhtras naehcte erih ? ruah etzame cassucadaB , inomiS nóçeic narre ciriluzti tanagaetzame atE
. cud utaegui iuqzediB , noçeic narre crah atE . canoyaç naçi utattiuq ogaiheug nece taid etsV , naçec narre cenomiS aleuç netsedrahi atE
? ud nenakv ogaetiam aruh ceniec , carre , adab ciratuaH . yeib náeceic attiuq , agap cidnon zenakv ze ceh atE
. ramah ate yeugorreb caecreb ate , orenid nuhe-zrob roç náic catab , nudroç ib náitic cetab nudeztraH
. carre , áurtsigaM , oid crah atE . cirocetiarre irih tiabrec taidab , nomiS , nóçeic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. ad aocatothciag ezticiv nece : aetzame neud neztiuqnuh ruah ned aocalon ate ron ruges euqiuqalab zilab atehporP nidlab , cenuH , aleoic , nahtiab ereb naçec narre cauesirahP neuç utatimog aruh cirissuki iroh naudrO
. neutic neztatsneugnv zutneugnv ate , yenio nerah neuarec netiuge top ate , zastada ocurub ereb naczuarec neztacuhci ate : neztagerra zirv ragin nénio nerah aleogec zerragin nidec sah , aleogec aratenio nerah citelebiug atE
, utneugnv tabatieob naçec rake , alec airrai naeniaham naehcte nerauesirahP aruh nece , naeneuç niuqai cetab-nec ocatothciag ezticiv etzame nairih , ánuh atE
. naeniaham nidec rai , naehcte nerauesirahP ciruhtras ate , naçel nai niuqerah cetab uesirahP noçeic niuge ztiohto atE
. zéicug ruoah ereb áitneipas ad naçi utacifitsui aniaB
. aediuqsida neocatothciag ezticiv ate néonacilbup ate , aidroh ate atnamrog noçiug ánuH , euçoid ate : aleud netade ate netai aemeS neranoçiug ad irrohtE
. ud aurbaeD , euçoid ate , netade cironrastaham ze , aleutze netai ciriugo , atsitpaB sennaoI ad irrohte necE
. niuge cirragin euçutze ate ugeuçuard utatnac zissere : utaçnad eterazte ate , ugeuçuard niuge unios alurihC , etioitiab céniec edarid ocalaçeb caohctruoah naczogad zuhio iraecreb atab ate , neduad cirirrai nautakreM
? etud iduri rec ate ? canoçiug ocatenuh enoitareneg tutid nerutarapmoc adab niuqeroN , canuaI naçec narre naudrO
. artnoc néurub ereb netaçeç ayubra aulliesnoc neraocniaI cénedarizte utayehtab cinagnerah rotcod oceugeL ate uesirahP aniaB
. zaomsitpab nesennaoI cinaçi utayehtab , aocniaI netaçec acifitsui céonacilbup ate cinuçne iroh caicug ulupop naudrO
. ad ogaidnah oniab aruh aned néipihc námuser neraocniaI ere-ciradab : cirogaidnah oniab atsitpaB sennaoI ertab ciratehporP aletze naetra nénedarid óyai ciratetzame , teuçuard netiarre necE
. naeniztia erih utiab nerudniappa aedib erih ceniec , naeniztia etrahtiugeb erih airatadnam eruen taid netrogi cin , ánuH , atiab autabircs zeniec ad ruaH
. neraogaoniab atehporP ate teustoid yab ? netab atehporP ? eteraç naçi ikli aretsuki nerec aniaB
. edarid nateoicalap néuger , canedarid nateoiciled ate , nateosoicerp udnemalliba , ánuh ? netab utitzev zosoicerp udnemalliba noçiug ? eteraç naçi ikli aretsuki nerec aniaB
? netab ned netlibare zaeciah arebanac ? arutresed eteraç naçi ikli aretsuki nereC , netiarre iraulupop zesennaoI , nóiuqec sah , cairatadnam nesennaoI naenedaric utitrap atE
. natin anetze nerutaziladnacs ad ustahod atE
. neztaciderp aoilegnauE aleyaç yerbuap , neztaticsuser aledarid calih , netuçne aletud cérrog neztuhahc aledarid caóyahros , netlibe aledarid cäugniam , neztibecer aletud aetsuki céusti nece : cáçuag neuçutid nuçne ate issuki isennaoI euçoztei atnoc cinnaoI , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi oreuG
. néceic name aetsuki irusti ztihna ate cirateothciag utirips ate , cirateugalp ate , ciratenussatire naçec adnes ztihna naereb udro atE
? eduag ariugeb netab ecreb ala , anec ocetrohte zia iH , aleoid , anagerih citiaiug irrogi catsitpaB sennaoI , netaçec narre ceh noçiug anagnerah cirirrohte atE
? eduag ariugeb netab ecreb ala , aruh nec ocetrohte zia iH , aleoic , anagsuseI naztic rogi cesennaoI agib cirateulupicsid ereb ciruhtied atE
. caicug cuah açuag ceulupicsid ereb isennaoI netozteic atnoc atE
. aicug acramoc ocurugni ate aicug aeduI cenuh amaf oczaçrah naçec oi atE
. aulupop ereb ud utatisiv caocniaI ruges ate , naetra erug ad naçi iuqiai tabidnah atehporP rugeS , aletuc netiarre , aocniaI netuç neztacifirolg ate , cetab rudleb caicug naztic rah atE
. irama ereb aruh noçeic name atE . neztaçnim nidec sah ate , anaçi lih nidec rai atE
. ida iuqiai , tassoid irih , áetzag noçiuG , naçec narre ate ) necetic idleug canetamaraç aztuprog naudro ( , áhctuk naçec iuqnuh cirudlibruh atE
. cirragin alaniugatzE , noçeic narre ate , naeniag nerah naçec rah enoissapmoc , canuaI naeneuç issuki aruh nugrahla atE
. niuqerah nec aidnah ainapmoc citirih ate , aztiokab emes neranugrahla ama ereb , tablih netuç netiamare , ánuh , alaçeb noyaç udlibruh iraelatrop ocirih atE
. aidnah eztedneg ate , ocsiugnv cirateulupicsid nerah niuqerah nedaric netiaoi ate : aririh nec neztied miaN neztiab netiaoi suseI naenumarahib nidec ahtreug atE
. cirodnes anaçi ire iraztibrec netaçec nedire , naenedaric iluzti arehcte , cénedaric naçi irrogi atE
. nedire ciridnah edef niah aladutze ere-nelearsI , teuçuard netiarrE , irainapmoc nacierraç irareb noçeic narre ciriluzti ate : zaçrah naçec sterim cesuseI cinuçne cuah açuag atE
. cid netiuge ate , ruah ciugE irairaztibrec eruen ate : cud netrohte ate , rohtA , iraecreb ate : caohidab ate , aho , tacoraid netiarre inuh ate : casemradneg ocenem eruen ciraladutid , noçiug ocenem nerecreb cuan in necE
. allihtum ene atiab nerutadnes ate , aztih carre aniab : ocetrohte anagerih utamitse engid taitze ere-äurub eruen ztocalaH
. nida ras naep ebrahta ene engid cuanze nece : aken alidaze , anuaI , alastoic , anagnerah caediuqsida naztic rogi carenetneC , alezte idnah nurrv citehcte ai aniaB . niuqeh nidec naoi adab suseI
. cucuarid utacifide crah tabagoganys ate aenoitan erug , netioic , cid etiam necE
. nóçeil rohtia aruh crohen alec engid nece , aletioic , iuqutanoitceffa netoiugec ztiohto , anagsuseI naenedaric irrohte ceh atE
. airaztibrec nerah naçel adnes cirirrohte , aloyaç zetziohto , caonaicnA néuduI anagnerah naztic rogi , zesuseI naeneuç nuçne crah atE
. etiam zicug neuztiab niec , naihoç areztlih zenaçi ire airaztibrec netab renetneC atE
. nemuanrepaC nidec ras , aleuçnaç caulupop caicug ztih ereb naeneutic utabaca atE
. ad naçi idnah aetiugesed nerah ehcte ate , ad naçi irore natreb ate , caoiuuif acuartiab irraçere iniec : anoçiug neud utacifide naeniag rul aehcte ereb ebag tnemadnuf ud iduri , niuge ze ate , caneutid nakv nuçne aniaB
. nec autadnuf naeniag acorra nece : ud utiugih nice ate , irah ehcte acuard nakv irraçere caoiuulf , cirirrohte ánrebos ate : naeniag netab acorra atnemadnuf irraçe ate , utiab iuqeri anrab ate utruztia ceniec , anoçiug neud neztacifide tabehcte ud idurI
. ned iduri ron teuçuard neristucare : aneutid netiuge ceh ate netuçne caztih ene ate , aicug ned netrohte anagenE
? canadutid netiarre cin , netiuge ze ate : anuaI , anuaI euçuan neztied citagrec aniaB
. ad oçnim aoha nerah citaitnadnuba oceztohib nece : aothciag açuag ud netiuqodi citothciag ruaseht oceztohib ereb caothciag noçiug ate : ano açuag ud netiuqodi citeno ruaseht oceztohib ereb cano noçiuG
. cistaham neztamednem , ciraterrapas ateze , cirocif neztlib etutze cirateirrohle necE . ad neztugaçe citutcurf aicug erobra necE
. aneud netiuge ano utcurf , aothciag erobra ate ze : aneud netiuge aothciag utcurf , ano erobra atze rugeS
. astif ociugeb nereyana erue náçed iuqodi cud nerissuki naudro ate : citiugeb erue aoiripag cinehel cacodi , átircopyH ? naenautze netsuki aoiripag ned naiugeb erih cerrorrue , astif ned naiugeb erih nadaçed iuqodi caçen iztv , éyanA , ireyana erue coeuqarred laha alon odE
? neztraho oyazta ze iraoiripag , ociugeb erue ate , astif ociugeb nereyana erue cassucad citagrec , atE
. alaçeb urtsigam ad nenaçi , tcefrep ulupicsid atiab nenaçi ere-ron aniab : oceniag neraurtsigam ereb aulupicsid atzE
? nerirore ariboh caib aritze ? naçed laha adiug austi causti ad elbissoP , tabenoitarapmoc neuarec netiarre rebalaH
. zidla ere-yeuç euçiaç neruhtruen , zareb irruen neuçud neztruen nece : aroklog neuç euçiaç nename anaod urrucum ate , autiugih ate , autaklag ano irruen : euçiaç nename ate euçamE
. euçiaç nerutakrab ate , euçaçe akrab : nerutanmednoc eterazte ate anmednoc aleuçaçetze : nerutacidui eterazte ate , acidui aleuçaçetzE
. alaçeb ned osoidrociresim ere atiA neuç , osoidrociresim zareb neteraÇ
. arateothciag ate aratetargni ad ongineb aruh nece : emes neraonaribuS eteraç nenaçi ate , idnah ad nenaçi airas neuç ate : ebag açnareps cidnah sued , euçaçe atserp ate : euçeiuge iugnv ate , cayaste neuç eucazti stehno adaB
. taçnetaçed ibecer aniadro , euard neztatserp yeocatothciag ezticiv ere-ceocatothciag ezticiv nece ? euçeuqud reuqse rec , yeneuçud açnareps aleuçuard nerutadner euçeceidab atserp nidlab atE
. étud netiuge areb aruh ere-ceocatothciag ezticiv nece ? euçeuqud reuqse rec , yeliugiugnv neuç euçeiugadab iugnv nidlab atE
. étzutid netsehno caelsehno ereb ere-ceocatothciag ezticiv nece ? euçeuqud reuqse rec , canetzutiaç netsehno ceuç euçutidab netsehno nidlab necE
. rebalah yæh euçeiuge ere-ceuç , cénoçiug yeuç neuçaçeid niuge euçutiab ihan alon atE
. acse nerah aloiuqaze , iranauard netiuqede aerue ate , cóme iraicug náuaç neztacsE
. atebed alaoçeitze ere-accai , iranauard netiuqede aotnam erue ate : ere-aecreb cóçei arap , iranèua netioi naetab alehtam atE
. citagcaneuçiuqziaç neztradlo euçiuge ztiohto ate : canetzutiaç neztacidaram ceuç euçaztiacideneB
. yenetzutiaç netseztiag euçeiuge iugnv : cayaste neuç euçazti stehnO , yoneuçuçnad teustoid yeuç aniaB
. cétia néyah yeuslaf atehporp neceuarec netiuge naereb edlom nece : naenetzutiaç nenarrehno céicug noçiug , yeuç enoitcidelaM
, euçud neniuge ragin ate nehua nece : yoneteduaç zirri niaro yeuç enoitcidelaM . eteraç nenaçi essog nece : yoneteraç caehteb yeuç enoitcidelaM
. aenoitalosnoc neuç euçudab nece : yostarba yeuç enoitcidelam aniaB
. cetia néyah yetehporp neceuarec netiuge rebalah nece : natèurec ad idnah airas neuç , ánuh nece : zuai zoiraczob ate , natrah nuge etzietniztiebla areugelA
. zasuac neraemeS neranoçiug , naenetud neriztiari alaçeb othciag aneci neuç ate , naenetzutiaç nerutairuini ate neriztiari ate , naenetzutiaç neristeztiag cénoçiug , eteraç nenaçi ustahoD
. euçutiab neniuge irri nerec : coneteduaç zerragin niaro eteraç ustahoD . eteraztiab neressa nerec : coneteraç essog niaro eteraç ustahoD
. ámuser neraocniaI atiab neuç nerec : cáerbuap eteraç ustahoD , neuç netiarre , cirutahctla tarateulupicsid caiugeb ereb crah naudrO
. caicug neutic neztadnes ate : nec netikli cinagnerah etuhtrev nece : nalibaç zihan iuqnuh aruh aicug ulupop atE
. necetic adnes ate : canedaric neztatnemrot zéustas utirips atE
: taçnecetil adnes ciratenussatire ereb ate , taçnetaçel nuçne aruh nedariztiab irrohte niec , citerretzab sasti ognodiS ate ocryT ate , citemelasureI ate , citicug aeduI niuqeridnah oçlum ulupop ate , niuqerainapmoc oczulupicsid ereb , natetab onalp ukel nidc idleug , niuqeh ciristuai atE
) anec naçi ere-erodiart , toiracsI saduI ate : aeyana neseuqcaI saduI
, aned neztied setoleZ nomiS ate , aemes neroehplA seuqcaI : samohT ate uehttaM
: oemolohtraB ate eppilihP : sennaoI ate seuqcaI : aeyana nerah uirdnA ate , aneuç uhtied ere-sirreiP , nomiS (
, naztiztiab ied ere-ulotsopA niec , ibamah naztic atuah cirateh ate , caulupicsid ereb naztic ied naenec utiugra atE
. alacuarec netiuge ztiohto iraocniaI naçec nagari nah aicug uag ate , aretiuge ztiohto aridnem nideztiab naoi , nateh nuge nidec ahtreug atE
. isuseI netoidiel rec , nedaric oçnim niuqerrakle ate , zudnemicuare necetic ehteb atE
. niaçeb aecreb aucse nerah nidec adnes ate : alah naçec niuge crah ate : aucse erue caçedeH , iranoçiug astoid , cirutaheb urugni arateicug arateh atE
? aeztlag ala aeztarapme netab anosrep ? aetiuge iuqziag ala iros ad aetiuge iugnv nateohtabbaS , zetab açuag tetzutiaç nerutagorretnI , cesuseI adab néceic narrE
. cituç nidec noge ciriuqiai aruh atE . naetra cituç oga ate , ida iuqiaI , iraneuç arrahye ucse noçiug astoid ate , caudnemasnep néyah naiuqziuqaecab aniaB
. artnoc nerah taçnetaçel nedire enoitasucca , zeneeuqaçel adnes naohtabbaS aye céuesirahP ate cébircS aruh netuç neztaogog atE
. rahye nec anyucse ucse nerah ate tab-noçiug nah nec ate : neuztiab netsacari ate , aragoganys nideztiab ras aruh ere-zetab htabbaS ecreb nidec ahtreug atE
. ere-neraohtabbaS ad ebai aemeS neranoçiuG , neuarec netiarre oreuG
. ciraletze iros neciab nérodacifircaS aetai cirateh : ere-yenedaric niuqerah néceic name ate , neutic nai ate , neutic utrah caiugo ocenoitisoporp ate naehcte neraocniaI nec naçi uhtras aloN
? canedaric niuqerah ate areb naenec utessog ce-diuaD neuç niuge rec irrucari ere-ruah euçutzE , néceic narre cesuseI aeuç netsedrahi naudrO
? anetze iros niuge naohtabbaS euçud netiuge citagreC , néceic narre cuztab cirateuesirahP atE
. cirutihib zeucse netai ate , caulupicsid nerah nedariztiab ira netiuqodi acurub ate : idniag natecniere néztiab netiagari aruh , naenehel nerragib nuge htabbaS adab nidec ahtreuG
. ad eboh arrahaÇ , ud netiarre nece : cineud ihan citirreb natreb , cineud netade citerrahaç rohen atze atE
. edarid neztariugeb caib ate : ad ocetraçe nateirreb iugahaç airreb onrastaham aniaB
: edarid nerudlag caiugahaç ate , ad nerirussi areb ate caiugahaç utid nerutihtaç cairreb onrastaham erepze , naterraç iugahaç airreb onrastaham netraçe utze crohen atE
. auçadep ned citirreb neztadrocca atze niuqerarraç ate : ud necnehte cairreb erepze : itab raç udnemalliba auçadep netab irreb udnemalliba netiuqehctare acuartze croheN , necéic narre ere-tabenoitarapmoc oreuG
. nateh nuge étud neniuge rurab naudro , audnocze eyaztiab neriuqede canuge edarid nerirrohte aniaB
? oned niuqeh audnocze caedneg ocarebmag neraudnocze euçeuqaztid laha icare ruraB , néceic narre crah atE
? etud netade ate netai cérih aiab : ere-ceneuesirahP rebalah , netiuge ztiohto ate ziam etud netiuge rurab céulupicsid nesennaoI citagreC , netoçeic narre ceh atE
. aratudnemadneme , nérotakeb aniab , areztied néotsui irrohte zianzE
. céneduad iuqziag aniab : cirraheb nerucidem etutze cénedarid ossO , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
? euçud netade ate netai niuqeocatothciag ezticiv edneg ate niuqeonacilbup citagreC , aletioic , artnoc neulupicsid nerah netuç neztarumrum cénedaric uesirahP ate abircS cirateh atE
. tabidnah ainiapmoc oczeneduec cirirrai naeniaham niuqeh ecreb ate oczeonacilbup nec ate , naehcte ereb ciueL tabidnah teuqnab nóçeic niuge atE
. nóyaç naçi iuqierrai ate , nidec iuqiai ciriztv caicug açuag aruh atE
. irin tierrA , nóçeic narre ate , cirirrai naukel egaep , tabmec neztied iueL onacilbup naçec suki ate , nidec ikli näurub neyah açuag atE
. cáçuag neeuqutizte etsv crohen nuge ugutid issuki rugeS , aletuç netiarre , zenussatrudleb necetic ehteb ate : aocniaI nétuç neztacifirolg ate , caicug naztic rah cetab arudici atE
. aocniaI aleuç neztacifirolg , tárehcte ereb nidec naoi , aohcteho naztec areb naeneuç utahctla ate , naeniztia néyah ciriuqiai natreb atE
. tárehcte erue libah cirutrah aohcteho erue ate , ida iuqiai tauard netiarre iriH ) iraocitylarap astoid ( oceztakrab néutakeb naerrul etatirohtua aleudab caemeS neranoçiug nece adab taçneuçiuqaD
? ida libe ate ida iuqiaI , aetiarre ala : cautakeb erue ciuqziaç utakraB , aetiarre , ogahcarre ad nieC
? nateztohib neuç euçud neztasnep reC , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi , caudnemasnep néyah cirutugaçe cesuseI atE
? neciab careb caocniaI cautakeb euqaztid laha akrab croN ? ruah neutid netiarre caoimehpsalb ad roN , aletioic , cauesirahP ate cábircS neztasnep necetic sah naudrO
. cautakeb erue ciuqziaç utakrab , ánoçiuG , nóçeic narre , naeneuç issuki aedef néyah atE
: areniztia nesuseI , aretra niuqeraohcteho netaçec stuare cirateluet , areniag ehcte cinagi , zasuac neraeztedneg , netioril arenrab aruh cidnon naenetuzte netiedire atE
. zihan irraçe naeniztia nerah ate , ziahan irrake arenrab aruh naztlibaç ate : ocitylarap néztiab niec tab-noçiug naeho aletieuqracad , uztab ánuh naudrO
. oceztadnes néyah nec aetuhtrev neranuaI ate : cirateicug ugrub ocemelasureI ate ocaeduI ate ocaelilaG necetiztiab rohte niec , cirirrai nedueztiab carotcod oceugeL ate cauesirahp , alec ira netsacari aruh zetab nuge nidec ahtreug atE
. neuç netiuge ztiohto ate , nateutresed neogec autariter areb aniaB
. táçnecetil adnes zaçrah ciratenussatire ereb ate , aretuçne nedaric neztlib caidnah eztedneg ate , nec neztadeh oganiztia ogaoreug asoporp oczaçrah atE
. nategainomitset yæh alaçeb neud utanedro cesesyoM citagaeztuhahc erue caçe atneserp ate , iraerodacifircaS äurub erue coçei stucare , astoid , áho aniab : nórrelze irohen naçec anam crah atE
. cinagnerah nidec itrap anussatoyahros natreb atE . uhahc nécia , taid ihaN , aleoic , aruh naçec iuqnuh cirutadeh aucse cesuseI atE
. ceuqaçen laha uhahc , cudab ihan nidlab , anuaI , aleoic , aruh naçec ztiohto ciriztoge areniag etrahtiugeb äurub ereb , suseI naeneuç issuki ate : nideztiab rohte tabehteb zenussatoyahros noçiug , ánuh , alec natetab irih aruh nidec ahtreug atE
. nacziaç naçi iuqierrai irah , ciriztv aicug naenetzutic arerrohiel caicnv atE
. zia nenaçi eliamaztah noçiug cinadniaro , cirrudleb aláutzE , cesuseI inomiS nóçeic narre naudrO
. ere-canedaric nugal nenomiS emes neroedebeZ sennaoI ate seuqcaI rebalah , naeniag neraetiamaztah niarra netzutic utrah , caicug nedaric niuqerah ate aruh naçec rah cetab arudici necE
. in cuan aerotakeb noçiug nece , anuaI , cinagene ida itraP , aleoic , aratenuahleb nesuseI äurub ereb naçec ztoge cesirreiP nomiS cirissuki iroh atE
. onareztadnuh caicnv ib netaztic ehteb ate , necetic rohte ate : nétziuqel nugal cirirrohte , yenugal ocicnv ecreb néceic niuge uniek atE
. aeras néyah nec necnehte ate : tabidnah alom niarra netaçec arresne , naenetuç niuge iroh atE
. aeras taid nerutagral areztih erih aniab : utrah sued ugaitze cirutaken naicug uag , áurtsigaM , astoid canomiS aleud netsedrahi naudrO
. aretiamaztah caeras neuç euçaztiagral ate , oganrab camare , inomiS nóçeic narre , alaçeb nec udlihci citeztaçnim atE
. caeztedneg neutic netsacari citicnv cirirrai oreug : tabruppa naçel ariter titerrul nóiugec ztiohto , anenomiS néztiab niec , aratetab cirateh icnv ciruhtras atE
: netzutic neztuki caeras celaçnarra cirikli cirateh ate : aleduec naerretzab cal icnv ib naztic suki atE
: neogeztiab naerretzab cal ochteraseneG areb , citagaetuçne neraztih neraocniaI aleuç nestreh aruh caulupop , nidec ahtreug atE
. nateugoganys ocaelilaG neuç neztaciderp atE
. zian naçi irrogi taztocatrah nece : ámuser neraocniaI teuard raheb utazilegnaue ere-yeirih ecreB , néceic narre crah aniaB
. táçnidelze itrap cirateh aruh netacudaçab ate : onarahtiab aruh necetic rohte ate , naztibaç ahlib nerah caeztedneg ate , aratetab utresed ukel nidec naoi cirikli naenec utiugra atE
. tsirhC alec aruh aletiuqaecab nece , aretiarre netiztv neutizte , aleutic neztahctahem crah aniaB . aemeS neraocniaI tsirhC zia iH , aletioic ate , aleduec zuhio , cinagneztihna nedaric netikli ere-caurbaeD
. naztic adnes cirirraçe areniag iraredebtab cirateh caucse crah ate : anagnerah netaztic rake céicug netuç cirire zatom nussatire ztihna , naeztras iuqzugi atE
. naztic aztibrec ciriuqiai natreb crah ate : caztiagleh aruh naçec iztv ate : aztiagleh naçec ahctahem aleogec citiarag nerah atE
. citagnerah netoiugec ztiohto ate : zetab idnah ztiagleh nec netiuqude aberrahniug-ama nenomiS ate : naehcte nenomiS nidec ras , citagoganys suseI ciriuqiai atE
. caicug acramoc ocurugni nerairreh cámaf nerah naztic oi atE
? edaritiab netikli ate , caustas utirips utitiab neztanam niuqererehtob ate niuqeretatirohtua , ruah ad ztih reC , aletioic , naetra nerrakle nedaric oçnim ate , nateicug nidec rai udnematnaps atE
. niuge noçeizte ertab ciretlac ate , cinagnerah nidec ikli , ciriztoge aretra aruh , aurbaed atE . cinagnerroh ida ikli ate , ida lihcI , aleoic , cesuseI aruh naçec ahctahem atE
. audnias neraocniaI zia ih : necia ron taiuqaecab ? zia irrohte aretiugesed erug ? aonerazaN suseI , naetra erug ate erih ad rec , hA , aleoiC
, iugneco zuhio nidec rai ate , cineuç autirips neraustas urbaed tabmoçiug nágoganys nec atE
. aztih nerah nec niuqeretatirohtua nece : naeniag neranirtcod nerah neduec cautatnaps atE
. nateohtabbaS neutic netsacari nah ate , aririh ocaelilaG muanrepaC nidec stuai atE
. nidec naoi , cinagari citetra néyah aruh aniaB
. taçnetaçel ztoge areheb citeniag ) neztiab autacifide airih neyah naeniag neniec ( areniag idnem netaçec namare ate , aropmac citirih aruh netaçec ztoge ciriuqiai atE
. naenetzutic netuçne cuah açuag , nágoganys zenussaterressa caicug necetic ehteb naudrO
. neciab aocairyS namaaN naçi utuhahc nézte ertab cirateh aniab , nárobmed neratehporp oesilE nelearsI nec oyahros ztihna atE
. anagtab nugrahla etzame , neciab aririh ocainodiS atperaS , sailE naçi irrogi nézte ere-aratetab cirateh aniaB
. naeniag neraicug rul aidnah etessog nideztiab niuge non alah , ztocatehtebelih yes ate ehtrv rurih naenec naçi istre äurec , nelearsI natenuge nesailE nec nugrahla ame ztihna , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge aniaB
. nairreh ereb cirocaragog aletze ertab ciratehporP nece , teustoid zaiugE , etsoid atE
. nairih erue ere-nemeh cazti niuge , ne-muanrepaC aledarid naçi niuge ugutiab nuçne açuag ererec : äurub erue caçe adnes , áucideM , ruah enoitarapmoc euçatuard nenarre iuqognarF , néceic narre atE
? aemes nehpesoI ruah atzE , netuç netiarre ate , zéoczaitarg ztih nedaric netikli citoha nerah neduec zarim ate , netacuarec netiame egainomitset céicug atE
. nateirraheb neuç ruah arutpircS ad utilpmoc naenuge ognuge , netiarre néiuqec sah naudrO
. nedaric cautacnif areniag nerah caiugeb néicug ocagoganys ate : nidec rai , iraertsinim naenacuarec utadner äurubil cirutagelp atE
. areztaciderp neraocatoiraczob ehtrv neranuaI ate , aretraçe nataçnaruiled néuhtruaç ate , areztaciderp neraudnemarbucer neraetsuki yeusti ate , neraçnagral yeouitpaC
, areztadnes neistuah zeztohib , uan irrogi areztazilegnaue yerbuap : uaniab utatcnv nerec , naeniag ene ad autiripS neranuaI
, néztiab autabircs non , aukel naçec nedire , äurubil naeneuç utagelpsed ate : äurubil neratehporp saiasE nóiuqec name atE
. areztrucari nidec iuqiai ate : nágoganys naenuge htabbaS aruara neramutsoc ereb nidec ras ate : néztiab naçi icah non arehterazaN adab nidec rohtE
. aletuç neztaroho céicug , nateugoganys néyah netsacari nec ira aruh atE
. aratoro acramoc ocurugni nidec naoi ámaf nerah ate : araelilaG zetuhtrev nerautiripS suseI nidec luzti atE
. ztoconaratetab arobmed cinagnerah nidec itrap aurbaed , ate utabaca aicug enoitatnet oreuG
. anuaI ocniaI erue nerutatnet cutzE , cud anarrE , astoid cesuseI aleud netsedrahi aniaB
. táçnidaze apotzaheb nairrah zanio erue , aletua nenamare nateucse atE
: oceztariugeb erih , zaçih aleuard nename ugrac yeurèugniA ereb , cud autabircs necE
. arereheb cidnemeh äurub erue caztoge , ziahab aemeS neraocniaI nidlaB , nóçeic narre ate : naeniag elcanip ocelpmet naçec raçe ate , aremelasureI naçec namare naudrO
. cud nerutaztibrec areb aruh ate , anuaI ocniaI erue cud nerutarodA , cud autabircs nece : nátaS cinagene ida tarelebiuG , nóçeic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. caicug cutid nenaçi erih , caçenab aroda nidlab adab ciH
. tacoraid netiame iranadud ihan ate , cadatiaic naçi name irin nece : áirolg neiroh amuser ate , aicug iroh erehtob tauard nenamE , caurbaed astoid atE
. zetab tnemom arobmed caicug amuser ocudnum nozteic stucare , aratetab arog idnem caurbaed aruh cinamare naudrO
. zaicug ztih neraocniaI aniab , anoçiug ociciv zereb iugo aletze nece , cud autabircS , aleoic , cesuseI nóçeic stedrahi atE
. nidad ahlib iugo inuh irrah córre , ziahab aemeS neraocniaI nidlab , caurbaed nóçeic narre naudrO
. nidec essog oreug , ate nagari ceh aniab , onetuaric ceh nuge nai sued naçezte ate : zenuge yeugorreb zaurbaed nidec atnet nah atE
, arutresed zareb utiripS nidec namare ate , citenadroI nidec itrap aehteb zaudnias utiripS suseI atE
. neraocniaI , madA : nemadA , hteS : ne-hteS , soneH : nesoneH , naniaC
: nenaniaC , leelalahaM : ne-leelalahaM , deraI : ne-deraI , hconeH : ne-hconeH , alasuhtaM : neralasuhtaM , hcemaL
: ne-hcemaL , eoN : nereoN , meS : nemeS , daxahprA : ne-daxahprA , naniaC : nenaniaC , elaS
: nerelaS , rebeH : nerebeH , celahP : ne-celahP , uagaR : neruagaR , hcuraS : ne-hcuraS , rohcaN
: nerohcaN , arahT : nerarahT , maharbA : nemaharbA , caasI : ne-caasI , bocaI : ne-bocaI , aduI
: neraduI , serahP : neserahP , norsE : nenorsE , marA : nemarA , badanimA : ne-badanimA , nossaaN
: nenossaaN , nomlaS : nenomlaS , zooB : nezooB , debO : ne-debO , esseI : neresseI , diuaD
: ne-diuaD , nahtaN : nenahtaN , ahtattaM : nerahtattaM , naniaM : nenaniaM , aeleM : neraeleM , micailE
: nemicailE , manoI : nemanoI , hpesoI : nehpesoI , aduI : neraduI , noemiS : nenoemiS , iueL
. neriueL , tahttaM : netahttaM , maroI : nemaroI , rezeilE : nerezeilE , esoI : neresoI , rE
: nerE , madomlE : nemadomlE , masoC : nemasoC , iddA : neriddA , ihcleM : nerihcleM , ireN
: nerireN , leihtalaS : neleihtalaS , lebaboroZ : nelebaboroZ , asehR : nerasehR , annahoI : nerannahoI , aduI
: neraduI , hpesoI : nehpesoI , iemeS : neriemeS , aihtattaM : neraihtattaM , htaaM : nehtaaM , reggaN
: nereggaN , ilsE : nerilsE , muhaN : nemuhaN , somA : nesomA , aitahttaM : neraitahttaM , hpesoI
: nehpesoI , annaI : nerannaI , ihcleM : nerihcleM , iueL : neriueL , tahttaM : netahttaM ileH
: emes nerileH nec hpesoI , nehpesoI ) naetabmeceb netuç neztamitse ( emes , netaçi ocurugni nerehtrv ramah ate yeugoh nec nestah areb suseI atE
. ano niugesta eruen taid neztrah natih , aetiam emeS ene zia iH , aleoic , nideztiab niuge citurec tabzov ate , areniag nerah , nássiug netab abmuloc ossv natelbisiv amrof audnias utiripS nideztiab stuai atE
: aurec nideztiab iuqeri , aleogec zetziohto cirutayehtab suseI ate , alec neztayehtab aicug ulupop nidec ahtreug atE
. naiugednioserp sennaoI naçeztiab raçe , areniag néicug ecreb ere-ruah naçec iuqehctarE
, citagcaicug aireuqathciag neutic niuge careb ate , citagaetzame nereppilihP eyana ereb saidoreH , naenec neztidneherper zaçrah ahcrartet sedoreH aniaB
. iraulupop nacuarec neztazilegnaue aleuç neztatrohxe ere-zaçuag ecreb ztihna adaB
. naus netze neztlih erenihib ud nererre liohc aotsal aniab : arerenarg ereb aihib ud nerudlib ate : aniarral ereb uhahc ud nerutibrag ate , atiab nenaçi naucse nerah aehab nenieC
. zus ate zaudnias utiripS etzutiaç nerutayehtab crah : engid zianiapze oceztahcal neraedeh ocatetapaç neniec , aned ogaztihtrob oniab in ad udleh aniab : zerv tetzutiaç neztayehtab cin ad aiugE , yeicug aleuarec netiarre , cesennaoI naçec stedrahI
, tsirhC zenetaçil aruh aye , zesennaoI aletuç neztasnep nateztohib ereb céicug ate , aleogec aheb aulupop atE
. zégag neuç etzetiaç atnetnoc ate : airuini ze , atnemrot aleuçaçetze roheN , etsoid atE ? ugud neniuge rec cug atE , aletioic , ere-cesemradneg netaçec agorretnI
. rakere aleuçaçetze ogaiheug oniab neuçiaç utanedro sueD , néceic narre crah atE
? ugud neniuge rec , áurtsigaM , netoçeic narre ate : taçnecetil ayehtab ere-cirateonacilbup nidec rohtE
. açeb niuge rebalah , caneud cirocetai ate : iraneutze oçeib name caneutid aporra iB , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi atE
? zareb ugud neniuge reC , aletioic , céztedneg netaçec agorretni naudrO
. netzioge arus ate , ad neztaccip aicug neutze netiuge no utcurf erobra zareb : ad airraçe arorre nérobra ere-aroczia ai adaB
. aloeuqaçeid laha , aticsus ruoah imaharbA ere-ciratuah irrah caocniaI , teustoidab nece : atia ugud maharbA , nahtiab coruec netiarre sah aletzetiazte ate : caengid neraudnemadneme utcurf adab euçazti niugE
? netiuge sehi irarih ned ocetrohte etzutiaç utasiua cron , átsac arepiV , yeztedneg nedaric netrohte taçnecetil ayehtab cinagnerah adab neuarec netiarrE
. airragaulas neraocniaI caicug iugarah ud nerissuki atE
, nerutanalp cauçeki edib ate , edarid nerudnehcuhc cáçuag nedarid rukam ate , ad nerutareheb aicug acsidnem ate idnem ate , ad nerehteb aicug naraH
. cácsedib nerah euçazti analp , aedib neranuaI euçaçe niappA , ad azov neraneogad zuhio nautreseD , aleoid , näurubil néztih neratehporp saiasE autabircs atiab aloN
: natudnemakrab néutakeb aomsitpaB ocatudnemadneme aleuç neztaciderp , aricug acramoc ocurugni neranadroI nidec rohte atE
. nautresed iraemes nesairahcaZ sennaoI aztih neraocniaI nóiuqec name : naenedaric onaribus erodacifircaS sahpiaC ate sannA atE
, ahcrartet ocenilibA ainasiL ate , ahcrartet ocacramoc etinohcarT ate aerutI rebalah eppilihP eyana nérah ate , ahcrartet ocaelilaG sedoreH ate , naenec erodanrebog ocaeduI etaliP oitnoP , naehtrv nerragzrobamah neraogerodarepme neraseC oirebiT atE

. nahtiab canoçiug ate nahtiab aocniaI zaitarg ate , zeztidnah ate zaitneipas nec neztaçnaua suseI atE
. naeztohib ereb coicug cuah ztih neutic neztariugeb cama nerah ate : teius neyah nec ate : arehterazaN nidec rohte ate , niuqeh nidec stuai naudrO
. aztih neuarec narre ida netaçezte ceh aniaB
? naçi aladud raheb autapucco nateocetiuge neratiA eruen nece nétiuqanizte ? netaztlibaniztiab ahlib ene ad citagreC , etsoid naudrO
. náztlibainiug ahlib erih ciruhciek in ate atia erih , ánuh ? cucuard niuge alerroh citagrec , émeS , cáma ereb nóçeic narre ate : necetic atnaps cirissuki aruh atE
. naeniag néutsopser ate neraniuqai nerah , caicug nétuç netuçne aruh nedaric neztatnaps atE
. aleutic neztagorretni ceh ate aleyaç neztaheb yæh , naetra nerotcod aleogec cirirrai , naelpmet aruh netaçeztiab nedire näurub nenuge rurih , nidec ahtreug atE
. alaztlibaç ahlib nerah , aremelasureI necetic ruhib , naenetuzte netiedire atE
. naetra nénugaçe ate nédiaha naztlibaç ahlib nerah ate : naedib netab nuge necetic naoi , nec nainiapmoc aruh zetsv aniaB
: ama ereb ze , hpesoI traho nóiuqazte ate : nemelasureI arruoah suseI nidec neuqza , aledaric neztluzti ceh , naenedaric utilpmoc canuge ocatrah atE
: zeuara neramutsoc ocatseb aremelasureI ceh necetic nagi , naenec udleh aratehtrv ibamah atE
. nátseb oczaB aremelasureI zoro ehtrv cáma-atia nerah nedaric netiaoi atE
. naeniag nerah nec áitarg neraocniaI ate : zaitneipas nec neztahteb ate , neztacifitrof zutirips ate nec neztidnah aohctruoah atE
. aririh ocehterazaN ereb , araelilaG necetic luzti , aruara neraeugeL neranuaI aicug naenetuç utabaca atE
. yeicug neduec nemelasureI ariugeb neraenoitpmeder neyaç oçnim zaçrah ate , anuaI neuç neztadual , cirirrohte naereb udro adab ere-cenuH
. nuge ate uag aocniaI aleuç neztaztibrec zenoitaro ate zerurab , citelpmet neztitrap nezte , ciralec anugrahla ocurugni nerehtrv rual ate yeugorual atE
. citzoreug zaetatinigriv ereb zehtrv ipzaç niuqerarrahnes nec naçi iciv ate , aocatidnah nida ai néztiab niec , ocuniel ne-resA , abala ne-leunahP cinec neztied annA ere-tabassetehporp nécaB
. caudnemasnep ocateztohib ztihna táçnecetid reuga , cetab atapze nid nenagari ere-amira nerrorue erA
: oyaztiab nerutatsartnoc rohen iniec natongis ate , nelearsI natenoitcerruser neztihna ate , natenoitcurtsed neztihna ruah nud naçi irraçe , ánuH , irairaM ama nerah nóçeic narre ate , cenoemiS naztic acideneb atE
. zécuag nedaric netiarre zaçrah neduec zarim ama ate atia nerah atE
. áirolg neraulupop erih océlearsI ate , aoceztiugra yelitneG iugrA
. naeniztia etrahtiugeb néicug ulupop cutiab utaraperp nieC
, airragaulas erih céiugeb ene éid issuki necE
. zeuqab aruara neraztih erue , airaztibrec erue cud netiztv niaro , anuaI
, naçec narre ate , aocniaI naçec adual ate , arateosseb ereb aruh naçec rah naudro craH
: aruara neramutsoc oceugeL tácnetaçel niuge zasuac nerah , céma-atia ereb arruoah suseI aletuç neztras ate : arelpmet cirutiuom zautiripS nidec rohte adab aruH
. aneranuaI tsirhC naçelze suki nehel non , nerissuki ciroireh aleuzte , zaudnias utiripS iuqoniuid nóyaç naçi utaitnuned atE
. naeniag nerah nec audnias utiripS ate : aneogec ariugeb neraenoitalosnoc ocelearsI , rudleb neraocniaI ate otsui ruah noçiug nec ate : cinec neztied noemiS nemelasureI tabmoçiug nec , ánuh atE
. emv abmuloc ossv ib ode , tab-erap alerutrut , aruara neraned narre naeugeL neranuaI , aenoitalbo táçnetaçel name atE
) óyaç neruhtied iranuaI udnias , aicug neud netiuqeri aicnv-emv rA , naeugeL neranuaI autabircs atiab aloN (
. táçnetoçeil atneserp iranuaI , aremelasureI , aohctruoah netaçec namare , zeuara neraeugel nesesyoM canuge ocenoitacifirup nerairaM naenedaric naçi utilpmoc atE
. nehel oniab nidec ibecnoc naelebas , zäureugniA néztiab naçi uhtied alon , suseI aneci nerah ad naçi uhtied naudro , canuge iztroç oceztidicnocric neraohctruoah naenedaric naçi utilpmoc atE
. alaçeb neyac naçi narre , zéicug açuag netzutic nakv issuki ate nuçne , aocniaI aletuç neztadual ate neztacifirolg , caniaztra necetic luzti atE
. aleutic netiahe naeztohib ereb , caicug cuah açuag neutic neztariugeb cairaM atE
. naeniag nécuag netziaç naçi narre zéniaztra yæh netaçec sterim céicug netzutic nakv nuçne atE
. aneyaç naçi narre zaohctruoah netaçec acilbup , naenetuç nakv issuki atE
. airraçe náredegnam aohctruoah ate , hpesoI ate airaM netaztic nedire ate , iuqutaihel necetic rohte atE
. ucuartiab icare niuqai canuaI niec , ruah açuag ned naçi niuge nugassucad ate , onaremehelhteB adab necaoG , naetra nerrakle ceniaztra netaçeztiab narre , naenedaric naoi tarurec cäureugniA cirateh , nidec ahtreug atE
. ano etadnorov arahtiab canoçiug , euqab naerrul ate , iraocniaI naterog zicug urec airolG
, aletioic ate , aocniaI aletuç neztadual , taboztlum laitselec adamra nidec niuge niuqeräureugniA natreb atE
. airraçe náredegnam , autahcort zotadnab arruoah euçutiab nenedire , elangies euçud nenakv ruah atE
. anuaI tsirhC atiab niec , aerodaulaS aleuçiaç oyai naetatiuic ne-diuaD necE
: aned nenaçi neraicug ulupop idnah oiraczob teuçuard neztazilegnaue , ánuh nece : rudleb aleteraztE , cäureugniA néceic narre naudrO
. necetic ici zidnah arudici ate , näurugni néyah naçec iugra cáirolg neranuaI ate , néiuqec rohte cirebagetsv äureugniA neranuaI , ánuh atE
. canetzutic neztariugeb naeniag neraedlahtra ereb cálliev oczauag ate , canaçnuec nateopmac niaztra naereb acramoc nedaric atE
. náirelatso cirukel ocadneyah néztiapze nerec , náredegnam naçec raçe ate , aruh naçec ahcort zotadnab ate , zaoyai nehel emes ereb nidec idre atE
. canuge oceztre nerah necetiztiab ilpmoc , aledaric nah ceh nidec ahtreug atE
. arroçi néztiab niec , niuqeranoyaç naçi name natetzame airaM táçnidel rai natubircS
) citaçarra ate citehcte ne-diuaD néztiab nerec ( arened neztied mehelhteB etatiuic ne-diuaD , araeduI , citirih ocehterazaN , citaelilaG ere-hpesoI adab nidec nagI
. táririh ereb niec aredebtab , aretrai natubircs caicug nedaric netiaoi atE
) naenec erodanrebog ocairyS suineryC nidec niuge ruah enoitpircsed neheL (
. oro audnum nidel rai zubircs , zetrap nerotsuguA raseC tab-açnanedro nideztiab rohte nateh nuge nidec atreug atE

. onarenuge nóyaç naçi raheb utatsefinam ilearsI nateutresed nidec noge ate : nec neztacifitrof zutirips ate neztidnah aohctruoah atE
. citagaecnehcuhc aredib oczeuqab nenio erug , yeneduad cirirrai naelazti neraoireh ate naebmuhli taçneiugad iugrA
: citiarag catneirO , utiauqiab nakv utatisiv zeniec , zaosoidrociresim enoitceffa neraocniaI eruG
. zaudnemakrab néutakeb néyah , iraulupop nerah aeztugaçe ocudnemaulas taçnaoçeid name atE
, taçnaztid niappa caedib nerah , naeniztia etrahtiugeb neranuaI zia nenaoi nece : zia neruhtied atehporP neraonaribuS , áohctruoah ih atE
. nateicug nuge ociciv erug , naeniztia nerah nataititsui ate natenussatudniaS
, naçeniug aztibrec aruh , cirutaruiled cirateucse néyaste erug ebag rudleb , alucuarec nename necE
: zaudnemarui nacuarec niuge imaharbA atiA erug atE
: zaudnias açnailla ereb nécil tiohro ate , taçneiugel aidrociresim yetia eruG
. citucse néicug netucziraç ztiag irug ate cirateyaste erug aleniug nenaçi ublaS
. zoha nenedarid naçi cinadihteb udnias atehporP ereb atiab naçi utaçnim aloN
. naehcte nerairaztibrec ereb diuaD arrada ocatudnemaulas ucuartiab utahcla atE
. aulupop ereb utiab utimeder ate utatisiv nerec , anuaI ocniaI ocelearsI aled utaduaL
, aleoic , naçec azitehporp ate : zaudnias utiripS nidec ehteb sairahcaZ atia nerah naudrO
. niuqerah nec aucse neranuaI atE ? ad nenaçi ruah ohctruoah roN , aletuç netiarre , naeztohib ereb netaztic raçe , céicug netzutic nuçne atE
. caicug cuah ztih necetic acilbup natoro uçidnem irreh ocaduI ate , areniag néicug ocateh iridla nidec rohte arudici atE
. aocniaI aleuç neztadual nec oçnim ate : nidec ahcal aihim nerah ate , aoha nerah natreb nidec iuqeri atE
. céicug netaçec sterim atE . aneci nerroh ad sennaoI , aleoic , naçec abircs cirutacse neruztab atelbat crah atE
. nidel ied aruh neul ihan alon , iratia nerah netoçeic niuge uniek naudrO
. cined neztied zerroh neci natediaha erih rohen nutzE , netoçeic narre atE
. sennaoI ad neruhtied aniab , zE , naçec narre cama nerah aleuç netsedrahi aniaB
. sairahcaZ , zaneci neratia ereb aruh netuç neztied ate , areztidicnocric neraohctruoah necetiztiab rohte naenuge ocenerragiztroç , nidec ahtreug atE
. niuqerah nedaric neztareugela ate , anagnerah neuç utaralced aidrociresim ereb canuaI iuqognarf alon , cédiaha ate céoçua nerah netaçec nuçne atE
. zetab emes nidec idre ate : árobmed oceztre nehtebasilE nidec ilpmoc atE
. tárehcte ereb nidec luzti oreug : äurugni nerehtebelih rurih niuqerah airaM nidec noge atE
. ztocitiogai iraicah nerah ate imaharbA , alaçeb neyaç utaçnim yetia eruG
. zenaçi tiohro záidrociresim ereb , arruoah ereb learsI ud nakv utagnetsuS
cistuh utid irrogi castarba ate : zeno utid ehteb canedaric essoG
. caipihc utid utarog ate , cirateonorht causterehtob utid iztogE
. naudnemasnep oceztohib néreb caobrepus utid niugesed : zaosseb ereb ud nakv niuge iuqusterehtoB
. aratenetud arrudleb nerah aratenoitareneg ciratenoitareneg ad aidrociresim nerah atE
: ad udnias aneci nerah ate : caned usterehtob tiuqzuard niuge caidnah açuag necE
. céicug enoitareneg etuan nenarre ustahod tarah cidnemeh , ánuh nece : arenussatareheb neraotacsen ereb utiab nakv utaheb nereC
. nahtiab aerodaulaS ene ocniaI autirips ene ad utareugela atE
. anuaI cámira ene ud neztacifingaM , cairaM oid atE
cáçuag naniuqziaç narre zanuaI edaritiab nerutilpmoc nerec , nutiab istehnis zia ustahod atE
. naelebas ene arruoah zoiraczob nud naçi icuai , irras niaçeb ned naçi udleh arateirraheb ene azov neraenoitatulas erih , ánuh necE
? anagene ama neranuaI ene nidad rohte , irin ruah cidnon atE
. autcurf ocelebas erih nud autacideneb nece , naetra nétzame ih autacideneB , naçec narre ate , zidnah zov nidec rai zuhio atE
: htebasilE zaudnias utiripS nidec ehteb ate , naelebas nerah arruoah nideztiab zuai , aenoitatulas nerairaM cehtebasilE naenaçec nuçne , nidec ahtreug atE
. htebasilE naçec atulas ate , arehcte nesairahcaZ nidec ras atE
. aratetab irih ocaduI iuqutaihel arateidnem nidec naoi nateh nuge airaM ciriuqiai atE
. äureugniA cinagnerah nidec itrap atE . aruara neraztih erih tiuqeb niuge : aotacsen neranuaI ánuH , cairaM naçec narre atE
. nahtiab aocniaI nenaçi cirelbissopmi sued nutze necE
. canec neztied lirets anerragies nid ruah lih ate , naeztrahaç ereb tabemes nid utibecnoc ere-crah , aussug nehel erih htebasilE , árah atE
. nud neruhtied emeS neraocniaI , audnias ned neruhtros ciratih ztocalah ate nuard neniuge lazti caetuhtrev neraonaribuS ate nud nerirrohte areniag erih audnias utiripS , nóçeic narre cäureugniA aleuç netsedrahi atE
. zoreug zanadutze neztugaçe cinoçiug , iroh ad nenaçi aloN , iräureugniA cairaM naudro nóceic narrE
. nenaçi nutze cinif neramuser nerah ate , iuqlanrete naeniag neraehcte ne-bocaI nid nerutanger atE
. aonorht ne-diuaD atia ereb canuaI ocniaI nacuarid nename ate : émeS neraonaribuS nóyaic neriztire ate , idnah nud nenaçi aruH
. suseI aneci nerah nud neruhtied ate zetab emes zia neridre ate , naelebas erue nud nerutibecnoc , árroh atE
. nahtiab aocniaI aitarg nud nedire nece , cirrudleb alanutze , áiraM , cäureugniA astoid naudrO
. aruh enoitatulas nécil cirec neuç neztasnep ate , naeniag neranarre nerah nidec alburt cirissuki aureugniA , aruh atE
. naetra nétzame ih autacideneb , niuqerih nud anuaI : ánaniaç niuge aitarg tua neztatulaS , naçec narre , ciruhtras arahtiab aruh cäureugniA atE
. airaM nec aneci neranigriv ate : anagtab anigriv nec autadef niuqetab-noçiug nec neztied hpesoI ocitehcte ne-diuaD
: arened neztied hterazaN irih ocaelilaG zaocniaI äureugniA leirbaG nidec rogi naehtebelih nerragies atE
. taçnaçel nek citetra nénoçiug aodial ene , natenuge neuan utatisiv , canuaI tuard nakv niuge alenuh , rugeS
, aleoic , zehtebelih zrob nidec latse ate : naçec ibecnoc cehtebasilE etzame nerah naodno néyah nuge atE
. nideztiab luzti tárehcte ereb , naenedaric utabaca canuge ocoiciffo nerah , nidec ahtreug atE
. nec naci utidleug utum ate , neuarec netiame areztida zuniek nece : naelpmet aleuç issuki enoisiv tiebmec nece netaçec tugaçe ate , neidiuqec açnim nice naenec ikli atE
. naelpmet neuç necnareb tabmah crah alon neuç netserim ate , ariugeb nesairahcaZ neogec aulupop atE
. canedarid nerutilpmoc nárobmed ereb ztih ene istehnis cutitiapze nerec : onarenuge necetid niuge cuah açuag , zia nerutaçnim nice ate zia nenaçi utum , árroh atE
. areztaralced irih neuah no irreb ate , areztaçnim niuqerih cuan naçi irrogi ate , anecian neztitsissa naeniztia neraocniaI leirbaG cuan iN , noçeic narre cäureugniA aleuç netsedrahi atE
. autaraniztia natenuge ereb cud aetzame ene ate , rahaç cuan in nece ? tud nerutugaçe iroh nátaloN , iräureugniA cesairahcaZ noçeic narre naudrO
. taçnoçeid niappa tabutiurtsni iugnv ulupop iranuaI : arenussatruhuç néotsui catneidebosed ate aratemes caztohib nétia taçnaztid itreunoc , niuqeretuhtrev ate niuqerutirips nesailE naeniztia nerah cud nenaoi aruh atE
. anaganuaI ocniaI néreb cid nerutitreunoc ciraterruoah ocelearsI ztihna atE
. cinadnaelebas nerama ereb cetad nerehteb zaudnias utiripS ate : nenade citze cironra ecreb ze cironrastaham ate , naeniztia neranuaI cud nenaçi idnah necE
, cutid nerutareugela naeniag neraeztros nerah ztihna ate , cud nenakv açnargela ate oiraczob atE
sennaoI cacuard nename neci irah ate : zetab emes ciaç neridre aetzame erue htebasilE ate , áztiohto erih cud naçi nuçne nece : sairahcaZ cirrudleb alautzE , cäureugniA nóceic narre naudrO
. areniag nerah nidec rore tabarudici ate , cirissuki aruh nidec alburt sairahcaZ atE
. naeniucse neraeradla ocudnemasnecne aleogec , äureugniA neranuaI nóiuqec reuga atE
. naudro nec netiuge audnemasnecne neuç netiuge ztiohto naopmac caicug ulupop atE
. ocetiuge neraudnemasnecne ciruhtras naelpmet neranuaI nóiuqeztiab rore aehtroç , aruara neramutsoc ocoiciffo neraogerodacifircaS
, naeneuç nezticrexe aogerodacifircas naidla ereb naeniztia neraocniaI crah , adab nidec ahtreuG
. cautaraniztia zenida nedariztiab caib ate , neztiab lirets htebasilE nerec , nétuzte cirruoah atE
. canaztlibaç ebag ciruhcorper nateicug açnanedro ate udnemanam , neranuaI , naeniztia neraocniaI otsui nedaric caiB
. htebasilE aneci nerah ate , ciratebala nenoraA nec aetzame nerah ate : citedlara neraibA , taberodacifircaS nec neztied sairahcaZ nec natenuge nereuger ocaeduI SEDOREH
. áiuge nécuag náutid issaki taçnáçed tugaçe iuqeboH
: áetnellecxe oczicug elihpoehT o , areztabircs zaçeh utcnup zutcnup irih , cirutidneherpmoc iuqtnegilid onarenif citestah aicug cadatiaic naçi utiduri no ere-iriN
. cénedarid naçi ertsinim neraztih ate cénetzutid issuki citestah nehel alaçeb netucuard name areztugaçE
, zécuag nedarid naçi utacifitrec naetra erug iuqutilpmoc areztabircs netab enoitarran utiab irraçe ucse ceztihna NEREC



. zéongis nedaric netiuqierrai aleuç neztamrifnoc aztih ate , aleuç neztarbo niuqeh canuaI , nateicug ukel netaçec aciderp cirutitrap ere-ceH
. naeniucse neraocniaI nidec rai ate , nidec ahctla tárurec itiog , naeneyaç naçi utaçnim yæh zaçuah açuag anuaI atE
. edarid nerutadnes ate , étzutid nerirraçe caucse naeniag neire : neniuge ciretlac euartze , etaçedab nade cirocaratoireh tiabrec nidlab ate : étzutid nerudnek caeuguS
: edarid nerutaçnim zirreb egaognel , étzutid neriztoge aropmac caurbaed naeneci enE étziac neriuqierrai yenetieuqud istehnis cuah ongis atE
ad nerutanmednoc aneutze neristehnis aniab : ad nerutaulas aned nerutayehtab ate aneud neristehniS
iraicug arutaerc aoilegnauE euçoçei aciderp ate , aratoro udnum etzaoÇ , néceic narre atE
. istehnis netzutiztiapze canetuç nakv issuki cirutaticsuser aruh nerec : anussatrogog ztohib ate , aetatiludercni néyah neceic ahctorper ate , néiuqec reuga yeuqemah aleduec cirirrai niuqerrakle , cineuqzA
. stehnis ere-ceh netaztizte aniab : yécreb neceic atnoc naenedaric iluzti ceh atE
. aledaric neztitrap taropmac , natamrof ecreb néiuqec reuga inedaric netiaoi ib cirateh naodno néuah açuag oreuG
. stehnis netaçezte , aleuc issuki crah ate , alec iciv nece naenetaçec nuçne ceh atE
. netiuge ragin ate netuztiab netrake ulod céniec , yenedaric naçi niuqesuseI , néceic atnoc cinaoi craH
. neutiztiab iztoge aropmac urbaed ipzaç cirateniec , iraneladgaM airaM cinehel nóiuqec reuga , naeciog nuge nehel ocetsa , naenec utaticsuser suseI atE
. nedaric rudleb nece : netiarre netacuarezte sued irohen ate : naztic rah cenepaici ate caraki nece : citetnemunom netaçec niuge sehi cirutitrap natreb ceh atE
. alaçeb neuçuard narre , euçud nerissuki aruh nah : araelilaG aled netiaoi naeniztia neuç nece , isirreiP ate yeulupicsid nerah euçecei narre , etzaoç aniaB
. nétuç nakv irraçe non aukel ánuh , nemeh atze : ad utaticsuser , etaztlibaç ahlib neraned naçi utacificurc hterazaN suseI : ici aletzetiaztE , etsoid crah aniaB
necetic ici ate : autitzev zetab ecul iruhc udnemalliba , airrai naedla oceniucse tabetzag nugal netaçec suki , ciruhtras aretnemunom oreuG
. nec aidnah zicug nece : alec autaradla airrah netaçec suki , naenetuç utarim atE
? citahtrob tnemunom airrah ucuard nerutaradla croN , naetra nerrakle netuç netiarre atE
naenec ikli ai aiuqzugi , aretnemunom edarid netrohte naenuge nehel neraetsa ziog zicug atE
. taçnetaçel amuabme aruh cirirrohte , caocitamora utneugnv netaztic sore cemolaS ate cáma neseuqcaI airaM ate caneladgaM airaM , naenec nagari aohtabbaS atE
. nec netraçe non neduec aheb , ama nesesoI airaM ate aneladgaM airaM atE
. náhtrob tnemunom tabirrah naçec raçe ziluzti ate : naetnemunom nec aiuqabe natetab acorra naçec raçe ate : zaessihim naçec latse ciristuare aruh ate , cirissore tabessihim crah atE
. ihpesoI aztuprog nóçeic name , cinagarenetneC cirutugaçe áçuag atE
