. alec lih ciriugarueh zeneuçab aye , aruh naçec agorretni , ciruhtied arenetneC ate : zilab lih ai nidlab neuç netserim cetaliP atE
. neraztuprog nesuseI nóiuqec acse ate , areztras anagtaliP nidec trasua , aneogec ariugeb neramuser neraocniaI ere-aruh , autaroho rélliesnoc , aocaehtamirA hpesoI cirirrohtE
) néztiab anuge ocenoitaraperp ned citeniztia neraohtabbaS nerec ( naenec utsarra atE
. cinedaric naçi nagi aremelasureI naetab niuqerah etzame ecreb ztihna ate : netuç nakv utaztibrec ate nacziaç naçi iuqierrai citzoreug zanec naelilaG , ceh atE
. emolaS ate , áma nesesoI ate neraipihc seuqcaI airaM ate , aneladgaM airaM neztiab naetra néniec , aleduec aheb cinadnurrv ere-caetzame nedaricab atE
. nec aemeS neraocniaI ruah noçiug iuqzaiugE , naçec narre , aleuç utadner autirips ciniuge uhio alah nece , carenetneC neogec nakrua nerah naenaçec suki atE
. onarereheb citiarag aratihtaç ib nidec aridre álev ocelpmet atE
. naçec adner autirips , ciniuge tabidnah uhio cesuseI atE
. arecnek nerroh sailE zened nerirrohte aye nugassucad : euçaztV , aleoic , aretade nóçeic name , näurugni netab arebanac cirirraçe ate , zerganiv cirehteb tabaignops ate , cetab adab naçec niuge retsaL
. ud neztied sailE , ánuH , netioic , naenetuç nuçne cuztab ciratenedaric nah atE
? cuan utannodnaba nerec , aocniaI enE , aocniaI enE , atiab ihan narre ? inahthcabasammal , iolE , iolE , iugneco cesuseI naçec niuge uhio natenero iztardeb atE
onaratenero iztardeb naeniag neraicug rul nidec niuge ebmuhli , naenedaric canero yes aniaB
. nétuç neztairuini ere-cenedaric naçi utacificurc niuqeraH . taçnugaçed stehnis ate suki , citezturc niaro ideb stuai aeugeR ocelearsI tsirhC
. euqaçed arapme nice äurub ereb , utid utarapme caecreB , niuqebircS netacuarec netiarre irrakle zoinracse ere-celapicnirp erodacifircaS rebalaH
. citezturc ida istuai ate , äurub erue caçe arapmE
. ánaud neztacifide zenuge rurih ate netiugesed aelpmet , eH , aletioic ate , aletzutic neztiugih caurub ereb netuç neztairuini cénedaric netiagari atE
. ad naçi utamitse niuqeliugiuqziag atE , aneoid arutpircS nidec ilpmoc atE
. naerreuqze aecreb ate , naeniucse nerah atab : niugathciag ib netaztic acificurc niuqerah atE
. AEVGER NEVDVI , autabircs alenuh aenoitpircsni nerasuac nerah nec atE
. naenetuç utacificurc aruh canero rurih adab nedariC
. neeuqaçel naoi rec cron , naeniag néyah ciriztoge ehtroç , caudnemalliba nerah netaztic itrap , naenetuç utacificurc atE
rah naçezte crah aniab , acetsahan niuqerahrrym onrastaham aretade netoçeic name oreuG
. aukel ruçeh-ruB , atiab ihan narre niec , arukel ocahtogloG netaçec namare oreuG
. taçnaçel namare aezturc nerah ) atia nerofuR ate nererdnaxelA néztiab niec ( , alec udleh ciratednal , tabmec neztied onaineryC nomiS oczaedib netaçec ahctrob atE
. taçnetaçel acificurc netaçec namare taropmac ate : zéudnemalliba ereb netaçec itzev ate , aoczatalracse netoçeic znuare , naenedaric utaffurt zaçrah oreuG
. netacuarec netiuge aitnereuer cirutaciruahleb ate , artnoc nerah netuç netiuge uht ate , zetab arebanac iräurub nerah netasnuarecab atE
. áeugeR neuduI , alaiuqad leh iugnV , aletioic , neztatulas nerah necetic sah atE
. tabaoroc oczutagelp irrohle naurub netoçeic raçe urugni ate , zatalracse aruh netaçec itzev atE
. aicug adnab netaçec ied ate , aoiroterp atiab niec , arenrab alas aruh netaçec namare cesemradneg naudrO
. taçnidel acificurc néceic aruil cirutatoça suseI ate , sabbaraB neceic agral , zihan niuge aragog neraulupop adab cetaliP
. caçe acificurC , netaçec niuge ogaiheug uhio tabmah ceh atE ? ud niuge iuqziag rec aniaB , neuarec netiarre cetaliP atE
. caçe acificurC , netaçec niuge uhio zirreb ceh atE
? inuh neuçud neztied eugeR néuduI nadoiugad euçud ihan adab reC , néceic narre zirreb , aleuç netsedrahi cetaliP atE
. néceil agral sabbaraB nehel aulupop netaçec aticni célapicnirp erodacifircaS atE
) célapicnirp erodacifircaS nétuç utaruil zaidiuni aruh alon naiuqaecab necE (
? áeugeR néuduI nadeuçaçeid agral euçud ihaN , aleoic , neuarec istedrahi cetaliP atE
. alaçeb neuarec nakv niuge ereihteb néceil niuge neztacse nidec sah aulupop cirirrai zuhio atE
. cineuç niuge zenoitanitum eztoireh , niuqenugal ocenoitides rénoserp tabmec neztied sabbaraB nec atE
. zetiliab acse ere-neniec , tabrenoserp neuarec iho neztagral natseb atE
. cetaliP neuztiab netserim non alah : stedrahi cirogaiheug naçezte sued cesuseI aniaB
. nétud neztacifitset artnoc erih zaçuag tabmec , ánuh ? netsedrahi sued cutzE , aleoic , naçec agorretni zirreb cetaliP atE
. célapicnirp erodacifircaS aruh nétuç neztasucca zaçuag ztihna atE
. coid ciH , nóçeic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE ? aeugeR neuduI zia iH , cetaliP aruh , naçec agorretni naudrO
. italiP netoçeic aruil ate , netaçec namare suseI cirutacetse , niuqeraicug oirotsisnoc ate niuqebircS ate niuqeonaicnA célapicnirp erodacifircaS ciriuqude ulliesnoc naeciog natreb atE
. naçec niuge ragin cirikli taropmac atE . cuan nerutakv naterurih , nehel oniab naçed oi nateugib carralliO , zaztih nacuarec narre cesuseI sirreiP nidec tiohro ate : naçec oi carrallio zirreb atE
. iroh noçiug neuçoid ceuç neztugaçe tutzE , aleoic , neztagenra ate neztacidaram nidec sah aruh naudrO
. cid iduri caegaognel erih ate , zia onaelilaG nece , zia cirateh iuqzaiugE , isirreiP netoçeic narre cénedaric nah zirreb näurub netabruppa atE . naçec akv zirreb crah aniaB
. ad cirateh ruaH , netiarre yenedaric nah nidec sah , cirissuki aruh zirreb aotacsen atE
. naçec oi carrallio ate , tarelarroc nidec ikli atE . nánoid rec cih taniuqaezte ze , neztugaçe tánitzE , aleoic , naçec akv crah aniaB
. nécni niuqeronerazaN suseI ih atE , naçec narre cirirrai ariugeb irah , aleogec neztoreb sirreiP naeneuç issuki atE
: tab cirateotacsen neraonaribus erodacifircaS nidec rohte , aleogec nálas ocereheb sirreiP atE
. netacuarec netiame idlakv rohic céreiciffo atE . caçe azitehporP , netiarre irah ate : neztateffub nerah ate , neztlatse neraetrahtiugeb nerah ate : netiuge uht artnoc nerah uztab necetic sah atE
. aleuc icerem lih , netaçec aegui artnoc nerah céicug ceh atE ? euçiaç iduri rec : aoimehpsalb euçud nuçnE
? ugud raheb oinomitset ogaiheug reC , naçec narre cirutaridre cáporra ereb caonaribus erodacifircaS naudrO
. nateyedoh ocurec aled netrohte ate , naenucse neraerehtob neraocniaI aleogad cirirrai aemeS neranoçiug euçud nerissuki ate , cuan iN , nóçeic narre cesuseI atE
? aemeS nerautacideneB ocniaI tsirhC zia iH , nóçeic narre ate , aruh naçec agorretni caonaribus erodacifircaS zirreB . stedrahi sued naçezte ate , neogec cilihci aruh aniaB
? anetud neztacifitset artnoc erih cuah ad rec ? netsedrahi sued cutzE , aleoic , suseI naçec agorretni ciriuqiai aretra caonaribus erodacifircaS naudrO
. emrofnoc nézte aegainomitset néyah ere-alah aniaB
. tud nerutacifide tabmetze niuge zucse ecreb zenuge rurih ate , ruah niuge zucse elpmet tud neniugesed ciN , netiarre iroh ugud nuçne cuG
, aletioic , artnoc nerah netaçec acifitset iuquslaf ciriuqiai cuztab naudrO
. caegainomitset néyah emrofnoc nedarizte aniab : artnoc nerah nétuç neztacifitset iuquslaf ceztihna necE
. netiedire nétuzte ate : táçnetaçel icare lih aruh , naztlibaç ahlib egainomitset artnoc nesuseI aicug oirotsisnoc ate , calapicnirp erodacifircaS atE
. naerretzab us alec neztoreb , niuqeiraztibrec cirirrai neogec ate : onarenrab alas neraonaribus erodacifircaS nóiuqec iuqierrai cinadnurrv sirreiP atE
. cábircS ate , caonaicnA ate , caicug lapicnirp erodacifircaS . niuqerah necetic lib ate : anagaonaribus erodacifircaS suseI netaçec namare naudrO
. néiuqec ruzti cirirrogzullib , aessihim ciriztv , aruh aniaB
. cuztab etzag noçiug aruh netaçec namaztah ate , cirilatse zetab essihim urugni naeniag neraicullib ztuprog nóyaç naçi iuqierrai tabetzag nóçiug atE
. nétiugec sehi céicug ulupicsid nerah ciriztv aruh naudrO
. cárutpircS necetid ilpmoc ad raheb aniaB . utrah euçuan ze ate , alecnin ira netsacari naelpmet nécnin naetra neuç zoro nugE
? aretiamaztah ene niuqehv ate niuqetapze eteraç ikli alaçeb naodno netab niugathciaG , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. airraheb nóçeic iuqede ate , airaztibrec neralapicnirp erodacifircaS naçec oi ciriuqodi átapze , cetiebmec ciratenedaric nah atE
. netaçec namaztah ate , naeniag nerah caucse ereb netaztic raçe ceh naudrO
. nóçeic niuge top ate , áurtsigaM , áurtsigaM , ástoid cirudlibruh anagnerah natreb , naenec irrohte atE
. iuqruges euçamare ate , etaztehctaç irah , ad aruh , tacuartiab neniuge top ere-iroN , aleoic , elangies naetra nerrakle caneuç neztidart aruh , neuarec name atE
. zetrap néonaicnA ate , nébircS ate , nélapicnirp erodacifircaS , niuqehv ate niuqetapze aidnah eztedneg niuqerah ate , tab cirateibamah néztiab , saduI nidec rohte , alec oçnim oniaro aruh , natreb atE
. ad udlibruh aneuan neztidart in , ánuh : necaog , etzetiaç iuqiaI
. arateucse néothciag aemeS neranoçiug ad neztaruil , ánuh : anero ad irrohte , ad ocsa : etzetiaç asoper ate , oreugruag euçiuge oL , etsoid ate , naidla néreh nidec rohte atE
. netoeuqaçec stedrahi rec netiuqazte ate , nedaric cautagrac caiugeb néyah nece : alaçnuec ol zirreb naztic nedire ciriluzti oreuG
. naçec narre areb soporp ate , naçec niuge ztiohto cinaoi zirreb atE
. ucalf aiugarah aniab , ad otpmorp autirips : natenoitatnet netzetiazte ras , euçiuge ztiohto ate , euçaçe allieV
? cud utalliev nice tabmero ? azta ol nómiS , isirreiP astoid ate : alaçnuec ol naztic nedire ate , nidec rohte oreuG
. anaud ihan cih aniab , anadud ihan cin ze ere-ciradab : ruah apoc cinagene caçe atropsnart : erih cutid elbissop caiçug açuag , átiA , abbA , naçec narre atE
: aruh nero cinagnerah nidel nagari zilab elbissop nidlab , naçec niuge ztiohto ate , naçec ztoge arerrul äurub ereb , cinaoi ogaihcaniztia atE
. euçaçe alliev ate , nemeh eteduaç : onaroireh ámira ene ad etsirt cirateicug edlA , etsoid atE
. neztahciek zicug ate , neztici nidec sah ate , niuqereb sennaoI ate seuqcaI ate sirreiP utid neztrah atE
. onadidiad ztiohto , nemeh etzetiaç raI , yeulupicsid ereb etsoid ate : aratetab ukel ned neztied enameshteG edarid netrohte oreuG
. nétuç netiarre ere-ceicug rebalah atE . nerutakv tuaze , ere-unab raheb lih niuqerih nidlaB , neuç netiarre ogaztiugah ziugnv crah aniaB
. aláuan nerutakv naterurih , nehel oniab naçed oi carrallio nateugib natenuh uag , nuge nece tauard netiarre zaiugE , cesuseI astoid naudrO
. aedro ze in , ere-zetidab aziladnacs caicug nidlaB , nóçeic narre cesirreiP atE
. araelilaG euçiaztan nerudniztia naenidan aticsuser aniaB
. caidra edarid nerutayerrab ate , aniaztra tud neroI , ad autabircs nece : natenuh uag natin eteraç nerutaziladnacs caicuG , cesuseI etsoid naudrO
. táridnem ocateztauilO necetic naoi cinarre aocitnac atE
. onarenuge nadud nenade námuser neraocniaI cirirreb aruh , citutcurf neranehia tarah cidnemeh nenade aladutze nece , teustoid zaiugE
. aned netrussi citagneztihna , aocirreb utnematseT lodo ene ad ruaH , etsoid atE
. céicug ciratrah netaçec nade ate : néceic name , cirutadner cáitarg , naeneuç utrah ápoc atE
. aztuprog ene ad ruah : euçaçe nai , euçaçe raH , oid ate , néçeic name ate : naçec stuah cirutadner cáitarg ate aiugo cesuseI naçec rah , aledaric ahla ceh atE
. zilapze oyai nidlab crah noçiug neeuquç no : atiab nerutidart aemeS neranoçiug zeniec , naeniag nerah noçiug enoitcidelam aniab : alaçeb ned utabircs zaçrah , aodab aemeS neranoçiug rugeS
. uan nerutidart ceneud neztapmert naetalp niuqene , cetab cirateibamaH , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
? zian iN , caecreb ate ? zian iN , naodno neraecreb atab netiarre irah ate : neztetsirt necetic sah ceh atE
. niuqene utiab netai ceniec , uan nerutidart cetab cirateuç , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE , cesuseI oid , aledaric ahla ate , aleduec cirirrai naeniaham ceh atE
. niuqeibamah nidec rohte , naenec utsarra atE
. aoczaB netaçec niappa ate , alaçeb neuarec narre netaçec nedire ate : aririh necetic rohte ate , caulupicsid nerah adab necetic itraP
. euçugaçei niappa nah : audniappa ate autarap tabidnah arebmag euçuard neristucare crah atE
? autatso nadud nenai aoczaB niuqeulupicsid eruen ad noN , coic caurtsigaM : irailimafatia euçorre , atiab neruhtras ere-aron atE
. irah etazticrraç : alamarad rv tab-ragep , tabmoçiug euçiaztiab neruhtab non , aririh etzaoÇ , néceic narre ate , agib cirateulupicsid ereb naztic rogi naudrO
? aoczaB taçnáçed nai nugaçed niappa cinaoi cud ihan noN , céulupicsid ereb netoçeic narre , naenetuç raheb utacifircas aoczaB , naenuge nehel néiugo ocebag irragahctla atE
. neeuqaçel idart zoczedlom arobmed aruh nátalon nalibaç ahlib ate : aretiame urid netoçeic attemorp ate , necetic areugela cinuçne iroh ceh atE
. taçneceil aruil aruh , aratelapicnirp erodacifircaS nidec rohte tab cirateibamah toiracsI saduI naudrO
. natoiromem nenuh ad nerutatnoc ere-aneud niuge cenuh , naicug udnum ruah oilegnauE atiab nerutaciderp ere-non , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. taztocetzroho ene areztatcnv neraztuprog ene ad utaçnaua : ud niuge aneud laha cenuH
. nenakv ihteb euçuanze in aniab : euçeidiad laha iugnv yæh , euçutiab nenakv ihan ere-zion ate , niuqeuç euçutid nenakv ereihteb caerbuap necE
. ud niuge anagene tabmo arbo ? euçud neztahcsaf citagrec , iroh euçaztV , oid cesuseI aniaB
. artnoc nerah netassadaçab atE . yerbuap name ate , netaç laha udlas natogaiheug oniab orenid nuhe-rurih ruah necE
? ad naçi niuge ruah eztatsaog utneugnv ocatreC , cinetuç netiarre ate , cineyaç iztiag nahtiab careb uztab nedaric atE
. areniag urub nerah naçec stuh , átieob ciristuah ate : aleuç tabatieob ocatidnah oicerp utneugnv oczibrag cipsa tabetzame nidec rohte , aleogec cirirrai naeniaham ate alec naehcte neraoyahros nomiS nainahteB suseI atE
. táçnetze cirotlumut naulupop , nátseb zE , netioic atE
. neteuqaçel lih cinamaztah zaicenif aruh natalon ahlib naztlibaç cábircS ate calapicnirp erodacifircaS ate : näurub nenuge ib átseb neocebag irragahctla iugo ate neraoczaB adab neC
. euçaçe allieV , teuard netiarre yeicug , anadeuçuard netiarre yeuç atE
. netaztiazte nedire aletaçnuaç ol , naenerrohtad cirebagetsV
: naeciog ala , naetirallio ala , natidrehuag ala , naestarra , ned nerirrohte anuai ocehczte zion euçiuqatze nece : zareb euçaçe allieV
. acuarelab utanam naçel alliev iraniaç-lahtrob , anal ereb iniec ate : etatirohtua yeiraztibrec ereb ciname ate , ciriztv aehcte ereb , cetab noçiug nécil naoi taropmac alon ad alaH
. netad zion árobmed euçiuqatze nece , euçiuge ztiohto ate euçaçe alliev , euçuariugeB
. neciab careb catiA , ere-caemeS ate ze , ere-cèureugniA nedarid näurec ate ze , iuqatze crohen zanero ate zaçrah nuge aniaB
. nenagari edaritze caztih ene aniab , edarid nenagari arrul ate äureC
. onetid niuge caicug cuah açuag , ruah ednem nenagari aletze nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. náhtrob aletad libruh nece euçiuqai , aledarid netiuge cuah açuag naeneuçaçed suki ere-ceuç alaH
. aled libruh ádv nece euçiuqadab , naened neztatsoh ate neztretsv ai arrada neraH . aenoitarapmoc euçaçe saki citeztocif adaB
. onarerretzab urec citerretzab rul , cirateciah rual cautigele ereb utid nerudlib ate , cäureugniA ereb utid nerirrogi naudro atE
. niuqeridnah airolg ate erehtob nateyedoh aleuqrotad aemeS neranoçiug étud nerissuki naudro atE
. edarid nerutaraki caetuhtrev nedarid natèurec ate , edarid nerirore carraçi ocurec atE
. nename aiugra ereb utze caiugrahli ate : ad nerudnuhli aiuqzugi , naodno nerah enoitalubirt nateh nuge rebalaH
. caicug açuag teuçiuqzuard narre citeniztia , ánuH . euçuariugeb ceuç aniaB
. ere-neutigele , zilab elbissop nidlab , ocezticudes caulucarim ate caongis etzutid neniuge ate : causlaf atehporp ate , causlaf tsirhC edarid nerutahctla necE
. stehnis etaçeniztieblaze : nah áraH , ode , tsirhC nemeh ánuH , euçarradab crohen nidlab naudro atE
. ceh nuge utid utrubal , citagcautigele neutid utigele aniab : aulas etialze rohen , ceh nuge utilapze utrubal canuaI nidlab atE
. nenaçi atiapze ate , onardniaro citestah eztaerc nécuag neutid utaerc caocniaI naçi atiapze cirocalon , enoitalubirt ocalah ceh nuge edarid nenaçi necE
. näugen nétze aetiuge sehi neuç adab euçiuge ztiohtO
. nateh nuge nénetieuqud netiuqsodere ate nérroçi etzame ztiagniahod aniaB
. areztrah neraudnemalliba ereb , luzti tarelebiug idelieblaze anetad nádnal atE
. aretiamare citehcte ereb nesued ras idelieblaze ate , tárehcte stuai idelieblaze , anetad naeniag ehcte atE
: tárateidnem etiugeliebla sehi , cénetarid naeduI naudro ) açeb ida caneud neztrucari ( aleogad naukel nétze raheb , aned naçi narre zátehporP leinaD , aenoitanimoba neraenoitalosed adab naeneuçassucaD
. ad nerutaulas aruh , onarenif utiab nerutareuesrep ere-cron aniab : citaganeci ene , zéicug eteraç nenaçi caisteztiag atE
. étzutid nericare lih ate , artnoc néma-atia carruoah edarid nerutahctla ate : arruoah cátia ate , aratoireh aeyana caeyana ud nerutaruil naudrO
. audnias utiripS aniab , caneteraç oçnim ceuç eterazte nece : etarraniztiebla aruh , natrah udro euçiaztiab nename ere-rec aniab : atidem etaçeniztieblaze ate , neuçud nenarre rec nataisna citeniztia aleterazte naenetzutiaç nenamare cinamaztah atE
. aoilegnauE utaciderp cinehel ad raheb nateicug enoitan atE
. nategainomitset yæh , zasuac ene eteraç nenamare areniztia néuger ate nérodanrebog ate , eteraç nerutatoça : arateugoganys ate arateoirotsisnoc etzutiaç nerutaruil nece : yèurub noruec ceuç euçeie ariugeb aniaB
. cuah , caestah nérolod : caudnemacetsahan ate caetessog ate , arukel citukel caeztaraki rul edarid nenaçi ate : artnoc neramuser ámuser ate , artnoc neraenoitan aenoitan ad nerutahctla necE
. anif nenaçi oniaro atze aniab : edarid raheb niuge cuah açuag nece : alburt aletzetiazte , cámaf alreug ate cálreug naeneuçiuqzuçnad aniaB
. étud neruticudes ztihna ate : tsirhC zian iN , aletioid , naeneci ene edarid nerirrohte ztihna necE
: netaztiazte icudes crohen euçuariugeB , netiarre nidec sah , aleuarec netsedrahi , suseI atE
. naenedarid nerutilpmoc caicug cairoh açuag ned nenaçi ongis rec ate , nedarid nenaçi cairoh açuag zion cugarrE , aletioiC
, ceuirdnA ate cesennaoI , ceseuqcaI ate cesirreiP trappa netaçec agorretni , nákrua neraelpmet naidnem ocateztauilO aleogec cirirrai atE
. nidatze niugesed naeniag nerairrah airrah nerutidleug cutze ? cuah idnah oicifide ciuqsucadaB , nóçeic narre aleuç netsedrahi cesuseI naudrO
. cuah nedarid caoicifide rec ate cairrah rec ciuqsuki , áurtsigaM , cetab cirateulupicsid ereb nóçeic narre , citelpmet alec netikli atE
. aicug aitnatsus ereb , ateyab aicug neuç citaicerbuap ereb ud name cenuh aniab , étud nakv name citenetuç cirutarebos céicug necE
. céicug netud name arocnurt ze nece aleud name ogaiheug cenuh erbuap nugrahla nece , teustoid zaiugE , néceic narre ciruhtied anagereb caulupicsid ereb naudrO
. tabtnardauq nedariztiab , ipihc açep ib naztic name cetab erbuap nugrahla etzame cirirrohte atE
. ztihna nétuç netiame cestarba ztihna ate , arocnurt neuç netiame urid caulupop alon neuç neztaogog , aleogec cirirrai nákrua neraocnurt cesuseI atE
. aogaidnah enoitanmednoc étud nerutibecer cuah : ziduri niuge ztiohto iuqaçul era , caehcte nénugrahla ame aletzutid netserI
: nateteuqnab yecalp nehel ate , nateugoganys yeridac nehel atE
, ciratenetzirad no nateutakrem yenoitatulas ate , ciratenedarid ihan ilibe niuqecul aporra abircS euçuariugeB , nánirtcod ereb neuarec netiarre atE
. citogog aruh neuç netuçne ceztihna eztedneg atE ? emes nerah zareb ad cidnon : nuaI aruh ud neztied careb ce-diuaD zareB
. allebacs nénio erih cayaste erih onadeuqaztid raçe , naeniucse ene ida-raI , iranuaI ene canuaI acuard narrE , zenoitaripsni neraudnias utiripS ud narre careb ce-diuaD necE
? aled emes ne-diuaD tsirhC nece cébircS etioid aloN , alec ira netsacari naelpmet , neuç netiarre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. areztagorretni trasua nóyazte cirogaiheug rohen atE . citamuser neraocniaI nurrv ziazE , nóçeic narre , aleuç istedrahi iuqruhuç crah nece naeneuç issuki cesuseI atE
. caicug oicifircas ate atsuacoloh ze nece aled ogaiheug , alaçeb äurub ereb aetsehno neraocruh ate : zaicug radni ate , zaicug amira ate , zaicug udnemida ate , zaicug ztohib aetsehno nerah atE
: aletze cirecreb zaçrah ate aled tabocniaI nece , cud narre iuqzaiuge , áurtsigaM , iugnV , crah abircS nóçeic narre naudrO
. cutze cirogaidnah udnemanam ecreb oniab cuah : alaçeb äurub erue aocruh erue cud neristehnO , cid iduri aruh canerragib atE
. audnemanam nehel cud ruah : zaicug laha erue ate , zaicug udnemasnep erue ate , zaicug amira erue ate , zaicug ztohib erue , anuaI ocniaI erue adab cud neristehnO
. cud tabztiokab nuaI , anuaI ocniaI erug , learsI idaheB , cud anehel ocateicug udnemanaM . nóçeic stedrahi cesuseI atE
? anehel ocateicug udnemanam ad nieC , naçec agorretni crah , aleuarec istedrahi iugnv nece cirissuki ate , cinuçne neztatupsid ceh , tiebmec ciratebircS nidec rohte atE
. eteraç neztanagne ztiugah zareb ceuç : aocniaI néiciv aniab , aocniaI nélih atzE
? aocniaI ne-bocaI ate , aocniaI ne-caasI ate , aocniaI nemaharbA zian iN , aleoic , aocniaI nóyaç naçi utaçnim irah naorreb alon , naurubil nesesyoM irrucari euçutze , aledarid neztaticsuser nece , naetabmeceb ned zélih atE
. alaçeb cäureugniA ocatèurec edarid nenaçi aniab : zaçnocze nename ze , nerutrah ciretzame crohen utze , naenetarid utaticsuser ciratelih necE
? aetuhtrev neraocniaI ateze , cárutpircS euçiuqziuqatiapze nerec netiuge stuh ztocalah euçutzE , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi naudrO
. éid nakv etzame aruh céipzaç necE ? ad nenaçi etzame neniec cirateh naenetarid utaticsuser , adab naenoitcerruseR
. ere-aetzame náideic lih cineneuqza ocateicug : iztv náetaçeizte ciruniel ate , céipzaç aruh náetaçeic rah atE
. rebalah canerragrurih ate : iztv ciruniel náçeizte ere-crah ate , náideic lih ate , aruh náçeic rah canerragib atE
. iztv ciruniel náçeizte naeztlih ate , etzame náçeic rah canehel ate : eyana ipzaç adab náutiC
. ireyana ereb uniel nóçeid niuge ate , aetzame nerah cayana nerah naçed rah , udapze iztv cirruoah ate , aetzame udab iztv ate , adab lih aeyana netiebmec nidlab , cucuarid nakv utabircs cesesyoM , áurtsigaM
, aletioic , netaçec agorretni ate , cirenoitcerruser aletze etutiab netiarre céniec , cauecuddaS anagnerah necetic rohte naudrO
. naeniag nerah netaçec sterim atE . iraocniaI caneraocniaI ate : iraseC caneraseC euçoztei adneR , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. aneraseC , netoçeic narre ceh atE ? aubircs ate ruah anigami ad aneroN , etsoid naudro : netoçeic atneserp ceh atE
. taçnadaçed suki , taborenid euçadrake ? euçuan neztatnet citagreC , néceic narre , áisircopyh néyah cirutugaçe , crah atE
? nename ugutze ala , ugud nename ? ze ala , aetiame iraseC neratubirt ad oczediB : cud netsacari aedib neraocniaI iuqzaiuge aniab , aheb araitnerappa nénoçiug ogaze nece : aláutze ciraisna nerohen ate , alecia itaiuge nece ugaiuqecab , áurtsigaM , etastoid cirirrohte ceh atE
. naeztih táçnetaçel namaztah aruh , uztab cirateonaidoreH ate cirateuesirahP anagnerah netaztic rogi oreuG
. necetic naoi ciriztv aruh ate : aleuç narre ruah enoitarapmoc artnoc néyah netuç utugaçe nece : nedaric rudleb neraulupop aniab , aretiamaztah nerah adab nedaric rehyA
? naeniztia néiugeb erug airragarim açuag ad ate , ruah ad naçi niuge zanuaI
: ad naçi niuge urub niotnac , airrah netud utayubra célaçacifidE ? irrucari euçutze ere-ruah arutpircS atE
. irecreb aitsaham ud nename ate , cairarobal utid neniugesed ate , ad nerirrohtE ? caebai itsaham adab ud neniuge reC
. aropmac cititsaham netaçec ztiari ate , netaçec lih aruh cirutrah atE
. aegatereh ad nenaçi erug ate , ruah nugaçed lih etzotaç : aumirp ad ruaH , naetra ereb netaçec narre ceh irarobal aniaB
. neraemes ene edarid nenaçi euqlahA , aleoic , cineuqza arateh ud nakv irrogi ere-aruh , ate nakv tabetiam emes ereb adab oniarO
. aletzutic neztlih caecreb ate neztahec uztab , cirecreb ztihna ate : netaçec lih aruh ate , néceic rogi tabecreb zirreb atE
. cirutatcart iuqtsenosed netaçec rogi ate , äurub netoçeic stuah zidlakv irrah ate tabiraztibrec ecreb arateh naçec rogi zirreb atE
. cistuh netaçec rogi ate , netaçec truaç cirutrah aruh ceh aniaB
. citutcurf ocitsaham táçnaçel ibecer cirateirarobal , airaztibrec naeniosas arateirarobal naçec rogi atE
. nidec naoi taropmac ate , yeirarobal néceic acola ate , taberrod naçec acifide ate , ocatocal tabiboh naçec niuge ate , zisseh naçec arugni ate , cetab-noçiug naçec adnal tabitsahaM , netiarre zenoitarapmoc néiuqec sah oreuG


. nadutid netiuge cuah açuag zetatirohtua rec nenarre teuçuartze ere-ciN , etsoid aleud netsedrahi cesuseI atE . ugaiuqaeztE , isuseI netoçeic narre aletuç netsedrahi atE
. alec naçi atehporP oczaiuge sennaoI netacudaç céicug nece : arag rudleb neraulupop ciratenoçiuG , ugaçedab narre nidlab aniaB
? aruh istehnis euçutze zareb citagreC ud nenarre : citureC , ugaçedab narre nidlaB , aletioic , naetra nerrakle netacudrahicab atE
. euçatsedrahi ? ciratenoçiug ala , nec citurec aomsitpab nesennaoI
. nadutid netiuge cuah açuag zetatirohtua rec teuçuard nenarre ate , euçatsedrahi ate : zetab açuag ceuç ere-cin tetzutiaç nerutagorretnI , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi cesuseI atE
? náztid niuge cairoh açuag iroh etatirohtua cuard name cron ate ? cutid netiuge cairoh açuag zetatirohtua reC , netoçeic narre atE
caonaicnA ate , cábircs ate , calapicnirp erodacifircaS anagnerah necetic rohte , alalibaç naelpmet ate : aremelasureI zirreb edarid netrohte naudrO
. cátlaf neuç nerutakrab euçiuqzuartze ere-caned natèurec atiA neuç : euçaçedapze akrab ceuç nidlab necE
. cátlaf neuç neuçazteid akrab yeuç , ere-caocatèurec atiA neuç : artnoc nerohen euçudab sued nidlab euçaçe akrab , naenetzetiaç rai netiuge ztiohto aniaB
. euçiaç neniuge ate : aleuçud nerutibecer nece euçastehnis , eteraztiab nerutacse aleuçud netiuge ztiohto ere-nerec , teuçuard netiarre ztocalaH
. óyaç neniuge euqutiab nenarre ere-rec , aled neniuge aneud netiarre nece utiab neristehnis aniab , naeztohib ereb neniuge ciradud utiapze ate : arossasti ida ztiari ate , ida neK , inuh idnem acuartiab nenarre ére-cron , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. aedef neraocniaI euçuA , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. cud utrahye aeztocif náud utacidaram cih , ánuh , áurtsigaM , nóçeic narre cesirreiP cirutiohro naudrO
. autrahye onarateorre aeztocif netaçec suki aledaric netiagari citedla naeciog atE
. citirih suseI nidec ikli , naenec irrohte astarra atE
. zánirtcod nerah neogeztiab zulucarim aicug ulupop nerec , nacziaç rudleb nece : neteuqaçel lih aruh natalon naztlibaç ahlib ate , célapicnirp erodacifircaS ate cébircS netaçec nuçne ruah atE
. euçud niuge ecel niugathciag aruh ceuç aniab ? nateicug enoitan aled neruhtied ehcte ocatenoitaro aehcte enE nece , autabircs atzE . alétsoic , nec ira netsacari atE
. citelpmet naçel libare ciricnv crohen neztittemrep neuzte atE
. naztic luzti cáridac nelaztlas abmuloc ossv ate , caniaham nerodaibmac ate , netzioge aropmac nénedaric ira netsore ate neztlas nidec sah , ciruhtras naelpmet suseI ate : aremelasureI edarid netrohte atE
. céulupicsid nerah netaçec nuçne ruah atE . alaçetze nai crohen cirutcurf naluces cinagerih tárah cidnemeH , iraeztocif nóçeic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi naudrO
. árobmed ocif nézte nece : neciab cirotsoh nedire sued naçezte , cirirrohte aratrah ate : zeneuqaçec nedire natrah sued aye nidec rohte , tabnudotsoh eztocif cirissuki cinadnurrv atE
. nidec essog , citainahteB naenedaric naçi ikli naenumarahib atE
. niuqeibamah tárainahteB nidec ikli alec audnareb ai ate , cirutaheb urugni arateicug açuag ate : naelpmet ate , suseI nemelasureI nidec ras atE
. ánecia natenerog ukel annasoH : aned netrohte naeneci neranuaI amuser ne-diuaD atia erug aled utacideneB
. aned netrohte naeneci neranuaI aled utacideneb , annasoH , aletioic , netuç netiuge uhio , cénedaric netiuqierrai ate , cénecaoic naeniztia atE
. neztadeh naedib ate ciraterobra netzutic netiuqabe carrada cécreb ate : naedib netaztic adeh caudnemalliba néreb ceztihna atE
. naeniag nerah nidec rai ate , naeniag caudnemalliba néreb netozteic raçe ate , anagsuseI aemv-otsa netaçec rake atE
. netaztic iztv aretiaoi ate : alaçeb neutic utanam cesuseI , néceic narre ceh atE
? aemv-otsa euçutiab neztahcal , eteraç ira reC , néceic narre cuztab cirateneduec nah atE
. aruh netaçec ahcal ate : naetra neredib ib citopmac naedla ahtrob , cirutacetse aemv otsa netaçec nedire ate , adab necetic itraP
. anuh ud nerirrogi aruh natreb ate : arraheb nerah aleud canuaI nece euçarre ? euçud netiuge iroh citagreC , euçarradab crohen nidlab atE
. euçadrake aruh cirutahcal : cinoyazte naçi irrai naeniag oniaro rohen , autacetse tabemv otsa euçud nenedire , irras niaçeb neteraç neruhtras natrah ate : arugrub ned nákrua neuç etzaoÇ , néceic narre atE
, agib cirateulupicsid ereb naztic rogi , naenedaric neztlibruh arateocedla idnem ocateztauilO ainahteB ate egahphteB , aremelasureI atE

. naedib isuseI nóyaç netiuqierriai ate , aetsuki naçec ibecer natreb atE . ua utaulas caedef erue , ahO , nóçeic narre cesuseI atE
. nadaçed ibecer aetsuki , áurtsigaM , astoid causti atE ? nadaiugad cud ihan reC , cesuseI nóçeic narre aleuç netsedrahi atE
. anagsuseI nidec rohte ciriuqiai , naeneuç iztoge aotnam ereb , aruh atE
. ua neztied : ida iuqiai , ida açropS , aletastoic , austi netaçec ied atE . nidel ied , naçec anam , cirutidleug cesuseI naudrO
. zaçin etateip cua , áemes ne-diuaD , neuç netiuge ogaiheug uhio ziugnv crah aniab : nidel lihci ceztihna netuç neztahctahem atE
. zaçin etateip cua , áemes ne-diuaD suseI , netiarre ate netiuge uhio nidec sah , alec onerazaN suseI nece cinuçne atE
: zeuqse , naerretzab edib , cirirrai neogec austi emes neroemiT oemitraB , aidnah eztedneg ate caulupicsid nerah ate , alec netikli citocireI aruh ate : arocireI edarid netrohte naudrO
. aretiame natenioçnar citagneztihna neraiciv ereb ate , areztaztibrec aniab , aretaçi utaztibrec irrohte atze ere-aemeS neranoçiug necE
. iraztibrec néicug ad nenaçi , nehe naçi naetra neuç atiab nenaçi ihan ere-ron atE
. iraztibrec neuç ad nenaçi , naetra neuç naçi aneidnah atiab nenaçi ihan ere-ron citiztia : naetra neuç nenaçi alah atze aniaB
. naeniag neyah aletud neztasv zetatirohtua cénedarid idnah naetra néyah ate , aletud neztairongies naeniag néyah , céneyaç tekal aeztairongies naeniag nénoitan nece euçiuqadaB etsoid ciruhtied anagereb ceh cesuseI aniaB
. zesennaoI ate zeseuqcaI neztahcsaf necetic sah carramah cinuçne iroh atE
. yeneyaç naçi utaraperp eyaç nename aniab , ocetiame ene atze , aetrai naerreuqze ene ode naeniucse ene aniaB
: eteraçab nerutayehtab zaomsitpab necian neztayehtab in ate , euçudab nenade ápoc nadud netade ciN , néceic narre cesuseI atE . yaB , netoçeic narre ceh atE
? eteuqzetiaç laha ayehtab zaomsitpab necian neztayehtab in ate , ápoc nadud netade cin euçorid laha nade : neteduaç zeuqse nerec euçiuqatzE , néceic narre cesuseI atE
. náirolg erih necetiag rai naerreuqze erih aecreb ate , naeniucse erih atab , cugaçei namE , netoçeic narre ceh atE
? nadeuçiugad euçud ihan reC , néceic narre crah atE
. nugaçei niuge , araciab nerutacse ere-rec ceuqidneug ihan , áurtsigaM , aletioid , caemes neroedebeZ sennaoI ate seuqcaI anagerah edarid netrohte naudrO
. ad nerutaticsuser naenuge ocenereh aniab : étud nelih ate , etacuard neniuge uht ate , nerutatoça ate , aruh etud nerutainracse ceh atE
: étud ocarateucse nélitneG ate , étud nerutanmednoc areztlih ate , arateucse nébircS ate nélapicnirp erodacifircaS ad nerutaruil aemeS neranoçiug ate : aremelasureI arag netiagi , ánuh , aleoiC
: netiarre nécuag nacziaç raheb irrohte neiuqec sah , caibamah zirreb cirutrah atE . rudleb nedaric aloztierraç ate , nedaric neztatnaps ate , suseI nec netioi naeniztia néyah ate : aremelasureI aledaric netiagi naedib nedaric atE
. nehel caneuqza ate : neuqza edarid nenaçi , canedarid nehel ztihna aniaB
. alanrete ezticiv naocetrohte aluces ate , niuqenoitucesrep , adnal ate , ruoah ate , ama ate , aberra ate , eyana ate ehcte , tábmah natenuhe natenuh árobmed niaro naçetze ibeceR
. citaceroma neraoilegnauE ate ene , cádnal ode , carruoah ode , aetzame ode , ama ode , atia ode , cáberra ode , caeyana ode , aehcte cineud iztv atze rohen , teustoid zaiugE . oid cesuseI aleud netsedrahi atE
. irih ciuqziaztiag iuqierrai ate , caicug açuag ugaitic iztv cug , ánuH , netiarre irah nidec sah sirreiP naudrO
. nahtiab aocniaI edarid elbissop caicug açuag nece : nahtiab aocniaI ze aniab , ad elbissopmi nahtiab canoçiuG , oid cesuseI cirutaheb tarateh aniaB
? etiad laha aulas ron atE , aletioic naetra ereb , necetic ogatnaps era ceh aniaB
. nidad ras námuser neraocniaI astarba ze nece , nidad nagari citohluç neraztarro tabelbac ad ogahcarrE
. necetid ras námuser neraocniaI , canedarid adif natenussatsarba ned ztiag niec , cárruoaH , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi zirreb cesuseI aniaB . zaçuah ztih necetic atnaps caulupicsid atE
! nedarid neruhtras námuser neraocniaI , canudnussahno zeuqen niec O , yeulupicsid ereb etsoid cesuseI cirutaheb urugni naudrO
. neutic caidnah no nece : ciretsirt nidec naoi , zenuh ztih cirutahcsaf aruh atE
. cirutrah aezturc , irin tierra , rohta ate : näurec tabruaseht cud nenakv ate : yerbuap céztei name ate , cazti las canautid , libah , zia utiep netab açuaG , nóçeic narre ate , naçec stehno , cirutaheb tanagnerah cesuseI atE
. citenussatetzag eruen taitic utariugeb caicug cairoh , áurtsigaM , noçeic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
: ama ate atia erue caztiarohO , irohen alaoiugatze cirumaD , narre ciruslaf egainomitset alaçetzE , stabe alaçetzE , lih alaçetzE , aretluda alaçetzE , ciuqziuqadab caudnemanaM
. aocniaI , aruh ate , neciab tab cino rohen cutze ? no cuan neztied citagreC , noçeic narre cesuseI atE
? taçnadaçed atereh alanrete ezticiv tud neniuge rec , áno urtsigaM , naçec agorretni , cirutaciruahleb naeniztia nerah ate , ciniuge retsal anagnerah cetiebron , taçnoiuqel iraedib alec netikli aruh atE
. naztic acideneb , cirirraçe naeniag néyah caucse , cirutrah arateosseb ceh atE
. neruhtras natrah atze , oçna ohctruoah ámuser neraocniaI nerutibecer utiapze ere-cron , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. ámuser neraocniaI ad néocalroh nece : ahctapme aleuçaztitze ate , aretrohte anagene caohctruoah euçaztiztv , néceic narre ate nidec ahcsaf , cesuseI naenaçec suki iroh atE
. canetzutic neztatneserp ceh , netzutic neztahctahem céulupicsid aniab : taçnaztil iuqnuh ceh , uztab ohctruoah netozteic atneserp naudrO
. ud netiuquai oiretluda , idadab nocze niuqetab ecreb ate , arrahnes ereb açedab iztv caetzame nidlab atE
. artnoc nerah ud netiuquai oiretluda , nerutrah etzame tabecreb ate , aetzame ereb utiab neriztv ere-croN , neçeic narre crah atE
. netaçec agorretni zareb zaçrah áçuag céulupicsid zirreb naehcte atE
. arapes alaçetze canoçiug aneud utatcnui caocniaI adaB
. tabiugarah aniab , agib edaritze cirogaiheug zareB . tabiugarah edarid nenaçi caib atE
. iraetzame ereb óyaç nerutatcnui ate , ama ate atia ereb canoçiug utid neriztv , citagenuH
. caocniaI neutic niuge aeme ate arra , citestah enoitaerc aniaB
. iroh udnemanam euçuard utabircs citaganussatrogog oceztohib neuÇ , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netseidrahi atE
. aretiztv neraetzame ate , areztabircs nerartel ocenoitarapes cid utittemrep cesesyoM , netaçec narre ceh atE
? cesesyoM euçuard utanam reC , naçec narre aleuç netsedrahi crah aniaB
? naçed iztv aetzame ereb canoçiug ad iroS , aletuç neztatnet netaçec agorretni céuesirahP cirirrohte naudrO
. neutic netsacari zirreb alaçeb iho ate : anagnerah nidec lib eztedneg zirreb ate : zaedla ecreb neranadroI arateiridla ocaeduInidec rohte , cirutitrap cidnah oreuG

. naetra nerrakle euçua euqab ate , ztag nahtiab córuec euçuA ? euçud neruticag aruh zaçrec idadab taçeug aztag nidlab aniab , aztag ad ano açuaG
. ad neruticag zeztag aicug oicifircas ate : ad neruticag zus aredebtab necE
. netiugnuari ze aus ate , neztlih atiapze arrah néyah noN
: nida ztoge aranneheg ocus alautid caiugeb ib ze nece , nida ras námuser neraocniaI nudztiokab iugeb , erih cud eboh , aruh cacodi , uahab neticare acubert caiugeb erue nidlab atE
. netiugnuari ze aus ate , neztlih atiapze arrah neyah noN
. arus netze netiugnuari ere-niheb , nida ztoge aranneheg alautid canio ib ze nece , nida ras naezticiv cirugniam , erih cud eboh , aruh caçe acnert , uahab , neticare acubert canio erue nidlab atE
. netiugnuari ze aus ate , neztlih atiapze arrah néyah noN
. arus netze netiugnuari ere-niheb , nida naoi aranneheg : alautid caucse ib ze nece , nida ras naezticiv nudztiokab ucse , erih cud eboh : aruh caçe acnert , uahab neticare acubert caucse erue nidlab atE
. nidel ztoge arossasti ate , nidel raçe näurugni neraoppel nerah tabirrah atorre euqul eboh , tab ciratuah ipihc netud netsehnis nahtiab in utiab nerutaziladnacs ere-cron atE
. airas ereb nerudlag aleutze , teustoid zaiuge , neteraç canetsirhC nerec , naeneci ene rv taberieb euçuartiab nename aretade ere-cron necE
. ad edla erug , anetze artnoc erug necE
. cinetiad laha açnim iuqziag zaçin natreb ate , cineud netiuge ciretuhtrev naeneci ene rohen atze nece : atebed aruh aleuçaçetzE , oid cesuseI atE
. irug ucierratepze nerec , aruh ugaid utatebed ate : irug ucierratiepze niec , cineutic netzioge aropmac caurbaed naeneci erih tiebmec ugaid issuki , áurtsigaM , aleoic , cesennaoI nóçeic stedrahi atE
. aneuan irrogi in aniab , neztibecer in uanze , uaniab neztibecer in ere-cron ate : uan neztibecer in , naeneci ene utiab nerutibecer tab cirateohctruoah ocalenuh ere-croN
, néceic narre , cirutrah arateosseb aruh ate , naetra neyah naçec raçe cirutrah tabohctruoah atE
. iraztibrec neicug ate , ad nenaçi néneuqza ocateicug , adab ihan naçi nehel rohen nidlaB , néceic narre ate , caibamah naztic ied , naenec irrai atE
. aogaidnah oniab caecreb nec niec , naedib nétuç iuqudrahi artnoc nerrakle nece : necetic lihci ceh atE
? naetra nerrakle netudnec netiuqudrahi naedib reC , naztic agorretni , naenec arehcte ate : aremuanrepaC nidec rohte atE
. areztagorretni nerah nedaric rudleb ate , neztida netuzte ruah narre ceh aniaB
. ad nerutaticsuser naenuge ocenereh , cilih aniab : étud nelih ate , arateucse nénoçiug ad nerutaruil aemeS neranoçiuG , netsoic ate , caulupicsid ereb neutic netsacari necE
. naçel niuqai crohen ihan neuzte ate : idniag naelilaG naztlibaç niuqerrakle , cirikli cidnah atE
. neciab zerurab ate zenoitaro etiad ikli nice alecreb aruh atom urbaeD , néceic narre atE
? ugud iztoge aropmac nice aruh cug citagreC , trappa netaçec agorretni céulupicsid ereb , naenec uhtras naehcte atE
. nidec iuqiai ate , aruh naçec tnehcuhc , cirutrah aucse nérah cesuseI aniaB
. alec lih nece netuztiab netiarre ceztihna non alah , nidec acalaçeb alih arruoah ate : nidec ikli , cirutacihtaç iuqziag aruh ate ciniuge uhio autirips atE
. nahtiab iroh ras alida ze cirogaiheug ate , cinagnerroh ida iklI , neztanam tua cin , árrog ate áutum utiripS , alastoic , austas utirips naçec ahctahem , alec neztanagrakle acretsal aulupop nece cesuseI cirissuki atE
. iraetatiludercni ene oiuqa leh , anuaI , taid netsehniS , naçec narre niuqerragin aleogec zuhio cátia ruoah natreb atE
. neraneud netsehnis elbissop cutid caicug açuag , caçedab laha stehnis iroh nidlaB , nóçeic narre cesuseI atE
. cirutrah enoissapmoc zaçug , ugiuqa leh , ciugadab laha sued aniab : taçnaçel niugesed , arerv ate cid iztoge arus nateztihna atE
. cinad-arruoaH , astoid crah atE ? aloyaç udleh ruah ud arobmed tabmeC , atia nerah cesuseI naçec agorretni naudrO
. aloiral anugah nec neztaczluari cirirore arerrul ate , aruh naçec acihtaç cautirips natreb , naeneuç issuki ate : anagnerah netaçec rake naudrO
. anagene aruh euçrake ? tetzutiaç nerutatroppus naenif onardzion ? zian nenaçi niuqeuç naenif onardzion , aebag etsehnis enoitan O , naçec narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
. éid niuge nice ate , aropmac netaçel ztoge yeulupicsid erih taeuarid narre ate : caohid uhtraye ate , cid netiuge zeztroh ereb stocsarrag ate , coiraid anugah naudro ate : cid neztacihtaç , açetiab rah ere-non atE
. tabutum utirips utiab ceniec , anagerih aemes eruen taid irrake , áurtsigaM , naçec narre , cetab cirateoceztedneg aleuç netsedrahi atE
? naetra neuç euçacudrahid reC , ceh abircS naztic agorretni naudrO
. netaçec atulas zeniuge retsal anagnerah ate : nidec atnaps , cirissuki aruh , aicug eztedneg natreb atE
. aletacudrahic niuqeh cébircS ate , näurugni néyah tabidnah eztedneg naçec suki , cirirrohte arateulupicsid atE
. alaçeb ned autabircs zaçrah , aletacuard niuge , aicug netacuarec ihan niuge irah ate , aled naçi irrohte sailE nece teuçuard netiarre aniaB
. nidad iuqude natesuedze ate , naçed irffus ztihna ad raheb , zaemeS neranoçiug alaçeb ned autabircs ate : caicug açuag utid ocarutats ereb cirirrohte nehel cesailE rugeS , neceic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
? aled raheb irrohte nehel sailE nece cébircS etioid citagreC , aletoic , netaçec agorretni oreuG
. crah eztaticsuser ciratelih , neuç ihan narre rec , aletacuarec netiuge edlag irrakle , nahtiab careb netaçec iuqude ruah narre ceh atE
. neciab naenecil utaticsuser ciratelih aemeS neranoçiug , cáçuag netzutic issuki narre netozteilze irohen , naztic anam , aledaric netsuai citidnem ceh atE
niuqereb neciab areb suseI , cirogaiheug rohen suki netaçezte , cirutaheb urugni natreb atE
. etoiuqziuqaç aheb inuh : aetiam emeS ene ad ruaH , aleoic , citeyedoh tabzov nidec rohte ate : cineutic ilatse ceh tabyedoh nidec niuge atE
. nedaric cautici nece : naiuqazte nec oçnim rec atE
. nesailE tab ate , nesesyoM tab ate , erih tab , elcanrebat rurih adab nugaztid niuge : nérag nemeh ug cud no , áurtsigaM , isuseI astoid cirutrah aztih cesirreiP naudrO
. niuqesuseI nedaric oçnim ate , niuqesesyoM seilE néiuqec reuga oreuG
. euqaçeliab niuge iruhc niah nice naeniag nerarrul celaçalob non acalah , alaçeb arruhle tiruhc ztiugah ate , necetic iugra caudnemalliba nerah atE
. naeniztia néyah nidec arugifsnart ate , careb ceh trappa aratetab arog idnem naztic namare ate , sennaoI ate seuqcaI ate , sirreiP naztic rah näurub nenuge yes atE
. onetieuqsucad cirirrohte niuqererehtob ámuser neraocniaI , cinetutze nerutatsad aoireh , uztab ciratonedarid tneserp nemeh aledaridab nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE , rebalah neuarec netiarrE












. niuqeudnias ureugniA náirolg neratiA ereb naenerrohtad , zaçrah ad nenaçi euqlaha ere-aemeS neranoçiug , natenuh erotakeb ate aretluda enoitareneg zéztih ene ate zaçin atiab nenaçi euqlaha ere-cron necE
? natudnemasnepmocer neramira ereb canoçiug ud nename rec odE
? açedab lag ámira ereb ate , açedab zabari aicug udnum nidlab , canoçiug ud uhcteborp rec necE
. aruh ud nerutaulas , citagoilegnauE ate citagene aiciv ereb utiab nerudlag ere-cron aniab : aruh ud nerudlag , utaulas aiciv ereb utiab nenakv ihan ere-cron necE
. irin tiarreb ate , aezturc ereb açeb rah ate , zäurub ereb açeb aitnuner , irrohte naodno ene utiab ihan ere-croN , néceic narre , niuqeulupicsid ereb ciruhtied anagereb aulupop oreuG
. canedarid nénoçiug aniab , cáçuag nedarid neraocniaI neztida cutitze nece : nataS cinagene ida tarelebiuG , aleoic , sirreiP naçec ahctorper cirutaheb tarateulupicsid ereb ate , ciriluzti crah atE
. neztahctorper nóiuqec sah ate , cesirreiP naçec atrappa naudrO . nec neztaçnim zenuh soporp iuqoralc atE
. nidel aticsuser naenuge ocenereh ate , nidel lih ate , zébircS ate , zélapicnirp erodacifircaS ate , zéonaicnA nidel aborper ate , naçel irffus ztihna caemeS neranoçiug alec raheb nece , netsacari néyah nidec sah atE
. zaçrah netorrelze aruh irohen niuqeruhctahem naztic atebed naudrO
. tsirhC zia iH , astoid cesirreiP aleud netsedrahi atE ? euçoid alecian ron in ceuç atE , etsoid crah naudrO
. tab ciratetehporP cécreb ate , sailE cécreb ate , atsitpaB sennaoI , netaçec stedrahi ceh atE
? cénoçiug etioid in alecian roN , aletsoic , caulupicsid ereb naztic agorretni naedib ate : aratèugrub ocened neztied aeraseC nereppilihP necetic rohte cirikli cidnah caulupicsid nerah ate suseI atE
. näugrub alaorretze irohen ate , ras arugrub alidazE , aleoic , tárehcte ereb aruh naçec rogi cesuseI naudrO
. caicug iuqoralc ere-cinadnurrv neutic netsuki ate , nidec adnes ate : nóçeic icare aheb itiog zirreb ate , naeniag néiugeb nerah caucse naztic raçe zirreb oreuG
. alaztlibad aletidurid caerobra ceyaiztin neztraho nece , canoçiug taiuqsucaidaB , naçec narre cirutahctla caiugeb crah atE
. zenassucalab sued , naçec agorretni , cirirraçe naeniag nerah caucse ate , ciniuge uht arateiugeb nerah ate : aropmac citugrub naçec namare , cirutrah aucse nerausti naudrO
. naçel iuqnuh aruh , netoiugec ztiohto ate , tabusti netoçeic atneserp ate : aradiashteB nidec rohte atE
? neztida euçutze aloN , néceic narre atE
. ipzaÇ , netoçeic narre ceh atE ? netzutnec utahctla cirehteb zihtaç iuqsas tabmec naenetzuaren istuah yenoçiug allim rual caipzaç atE
. ibamaH , etastoiD ? netzutnec utahctla cireteb zihtaç iuqsas tabmec yenoçiug allim zrob naenetzuaren istuah caiugo zroB
? tiohro eterazte ate ? euçuçnatze , ciraleuçutid cairraheb ate ? euçassucatze , ciraleuçutid caiugeB
. aztohib neuç euçud autrogog oniaro ? neztida ze neztaredisnoc euçutze oniaro ? neuçutze ciriugo nerec , euçacudrahid reC , neceic narre , cesuseI naeneuç utugaçe iroh atE
. iroh ad nugutze ciriugo nereC , aletioic , artnoc nerrakle netacudrahicab atE
. citirragahctla nesedoreH ate , citirragahctla néuesirahP etzetiaç ariugeb ate euçuaogoG , aleoic , naztic anam atE
. naicnv niuqereb nétuzte neciab tabiugo ate : néiuqec znaha yeulupicsid areztrah iugo atE
. aredla ecreb nidec nagari ciruhtras zirreb naicnv , ciriztv ceh atE
. nename aloyazte cirongis inuh enoitareneg teustoid zaiuge ? ogad zedlag ongis ruah enoitareneg citagreC , naçec narre , ciniuge oiripsus nautirips ereb cinadanrab naudrO
. aletuç neztatnet aruh , alacziac zedlag citurec nerongis tiebmec irah , netiuqudrahi niuqerah necetic sah ate , cauesirahP necetic rohte atE
. araterretzab ahtunamlaD nidec rohte , niuqeulupicsid ereb ciruhtras aricnu natreb atE
. tignoc néceic name oreug , äurugni nerallim rual nedaric canetuç nai atE
. aratiuqsas ipzaç cirateutarebos ihtaç netaztic ahctla ate : necetic aisasser ate , adab netaçec naI
. netaztil atneserp ere-ceh naçec narre , cirutadner cáitarg ate , uztab itug niarra rebalah netzuticaB
. naeniztia neraulupop netzutic utatneserp ate : taçnetaztil atneserp , yeulupicsid ereb nezteic name ate , naztic stuah , ate utadner cáitarg , caiugo ipzaç cirutrah ate : naerrul nidel rai aulupop naçec anam naudrO
. ipzaÇ , netaçec narre ceh atE ? euçutid iugo tabmeC , naztic agorretni atE
? nautresed ziugo euqaztil laha aisasser crohen nemeh cuah cidnoN , céulupicsid ereb netoçeic stedrahi atE
. edarid naçi irrohte cinadnurrv uztab cirateiroh nece : naedib edarid nerutacalf , tarehcte ereb niec cirurab taztidab rogi nidlab atE
. netaçed nai rec étutze ate , aleduad niuqene ud nuge rurih ai nece : zaulupop tud enoissapmoC
, neceic narre ate , caulupicsid ereb cesuseI anagereb naztic ied , netaçel nai rec netuztiapze ate , alaceb nec aidnah eztedneg oczicug , nateh nugE
. utid neticare açnim cautum ate , euard neticare nuçne yerrog : utid niuge caicug açuag iugnV , aletioic , nétuç netse ulucarim zicug atE
. nétuç neztacilbup ogaiheug ziugnv , néceiztiab adnefed crah ere-tabmec aniab : netorrelze irohen naztic anam atE
. iuqoralc nec oçnim ate , árudiuqehcte ocihim nerah nidec ahcal ate , cairraheb nerah necetic iuqeri natreb atE
. ida iuqerI , atiab ihan narre , atahphpE nóçeic narre ate , naçec niuge oiripsus cirutahctla caiugeb tarurec oreuG
. aihim nerah naçec iuqnuh , ciniuge uht ate : nateirraheb nerah caihre ereb naztic raçe , cirutrah trappa citeztedneg aruh atE
. nóçeil raçe naeniag aucse netiuge ztiohto ate , tabmec oçnim zeuqen rog etacuard neztatneserp naudrO
. zaetra néuqramoc ocsilopaceD , arossasti ocaelilaG nidec rohte , cirateretraouq ognodiS ate oceryT cirutitrap oreuG
. alaztec naeniag eho ábala ate , alec ikli aurbaed naçec nedire , arehcte ereb naenec naçi naoi atE
. cinagabala erih aurbaed nud ikli , áho citagnerroh ztiH , nóçeic narre naudrO
. ciraterruppa nérruoah naipza niaham éid netai cérrukahc ere-ciradab : anuaI cud alaH , nóçeic narre ate , naçec stedrahi crah atE
. aetzioge yerrukahc ate , aeztrah neraiugo nérruoah aoczedib açuag nutze nece : necetid aisasser carruoah niheb naztV , nóçeic narre cesuseI atE
. cinagabala nerah aurbaed naçel ztoge aropmac nacuarec netiuge ztiohto ate ) anaissinehporyS zenoitan , cerG nec aetzame atE (
, aratenio nerah äurub ereb naçec ztoge cirirrohte , austas utirips neuztiab caohctabala neniec , cetabetzame cinuçne zaçrah necE
. ad naçi ilatse nice aniab : naçel niuqai crohen ihan neuzte , ciruhtras natetab ehcte ate : tárateuqramoc ognodiS ate oceryT nidec naoi ciriuqiai cidnah atE
. anoçiug etud neztustas ate , edarid netikli citenrab caicug cuah aireuqathciaG
: anussatohre , áibrepus , aetiarreztiag , airetziakeb , aitnelosni , aoinagne , cáireuqathciag , cáitiraua , cáireuqniohO
, cáceztlih , cáçidralliap , caoiretluda , caothciag udnemasnep edarid netikli citeztohib nénoçiug , citenrab necE
. aneud neztustas anoçiug , ad aned netikli cinaganoçiuG , adab netsoiC
. caicug adnaiv aleutid neztuhahc , aretierter aropmac ad netikli ate , arelebas aniab , areztohib nerah neztras atze necE
? aleuqaçed ustas aruh nice , cesued ciratenedarid neztras nahtiab anoçiug citopmac nece , neztida euçutzE ? eteraç ebag udnemida ere-ceuç alerroH , etsoid atE
. zaenoitarapmoc céulupicsid ereb netaçec agorretni cirutariter citulupop naenec uhtras naehcte oreuG
. açeb nuçne udab cirirraheb ocetuçne croheN
. canetud neztustas anoçiug , edarid cáçuag nedarid netikli cinagnerah aniab : cineuqaçed laha ustas aruh , cined neztras nahtiab aruh , citopmac neranoçiug sued atzE
. euçaçe ida ate , caicug etadiuqziuqaç aheB , néceic narre , anagereb aicug ulupop ciruhtied oreuG
. euçud netiuge ztihna ciraçuag ecreb ocalenuh ate : záçnanedro neuçud utanedro coruec aztih neraocniaI aleuçud netsuedzE
: irama ereb ode iratia ereb nóçeid niuge cirogaiheug sued crah neztittemrep euçutze atE
. aruh etad ebag neugoh , ciaç nerutahcteborp ) aonod atiab ihan narre ( anabroc ned nenaçi cinagenE , órredab irama ode iratia cetiebron nidlaB , euçoid ceuç aniaB
. ideb lih zoireh , aneud nerutacidaram ama ode atiA , ate : ama erue ate atia erue caztiarohO , ud narre cesesyoM necE
. táçneucaçed ariugeb áçnanedro neuç , audnemanam neraocniaI euçud netziari tiabmon iugnV , rebalah neuarec netiarrE
. euçud netiuge ztihna ciraçuag ecreb ocalenuh ate : caeztuki nérropog ate nébuc , alon alah , euçud netiuqude áçnanedro nenoçiug , ciriztv audnemanam neraocniaI necE
. caudnemanam nénoçiug taztanirtcod aletzutid netsacari , etuan neztaztibrec naterrefla aniaB
. cinagene ad nurrv aztohib néyah aniab , uan neztaroho zeniapze cenuh ulupoP , alaçeb ned autabircs , zotircopyh zaçeuç cesaiasE ud nakv utazitehporp iugnv iuqrugeS , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah aniaB
? aiugo etud netai ebag icuki caucse aniab , aruara nécnanedro neoceniztia aztlibatze caulupicsid erih citagreC , cébircS ate céuesirahP etud neztagorretni oreuG
. caneho ate , caneicnv oczerboc ate , canebuc ate , caeztuki nérropog edaritiab alon , cinetud utrah oceztariugeb adab ere-ciraçuag ecreb ztihnA . netai étutze , edaridapze caicuki , naenedarid , neztluzti citutakrem atE
. aletzutid netiuqude cáçnanedro neoceniztia , netai etutze , neciab ciricuki caucse ziam , céicug uduI ate céuesirahP necE
. necetic arugnarra , aiugo aletuç netai ) zébag icuki , atiab ihan narre ( zenummoc ucse cuztab cirateulupicsid nerah naenetuç issuki ceh atE
. uztab abircS nedaric naçi irrohte citemelasureI ate , cauesirahP anagnerah necetic lib naudrO
. nedaric neztadnes caicug nétuç neztiuqnuh ate : netaçel iuqnuh erereb aniapze aporra nerah netacuarec netiuge ztiohto ate , caire netzutic netraçe natecalp , arateoiporrap ode , arateirih ode , aratèugrub nideztiab ras ere-aron atE
. arah , netuztiab netuçne aruh alec non , netrake néire nateho necetic sah , aicug aruh acramoc ocurugni naenetuç niuge retsal atE
. aruh netaçec tugaçe natreb , naenedaric ikli citicnv atE
. netaçec rah utrop ate , arerrul ochteraseneG necetic rohte , naenedaric nagari aredla ecreb atE
. néztiab autrogog aztohib néyah nerec : anec naçi niuge zéiugo utida nétuzte necE
. netaçec sterim ate , nahtiab careb necetiztiab ogatnaps zteuqnit era non : aeciah nidec agessos ate : aricnv arateh nidec nagi naudrO
. rudleb aleterazte , zian in , etzetiaç açropS , néceic narre ate , néiuqec açnim natreb aniab : necetic alburt ate , aruh netuç netsuki céicug necE
, netaçec niuge uhio ate : alec tabamsotnaf netuç etsv , alalibaç zeniag sasti cirissuki aruh ceh aniaB
. nagari ceh neutic ihan ate : alalibaç zeniag sasti , arateh nidec rohte nairi alliev nerragrual neräuag ate ) nétuç artnoc-eciah nece ( : netiuqihtrua , aletuç anep naçec suki atE
. naerrohiel areb aruh ate , naidre neraossasti nec aicnv , naenec utsarra atE
. aretiuge ztiohto nidec naoi aridnem , naeneutic irrogi ceh atE
. naetratiuqzib nomel tignoc iraulupop careb , táredla adiashteB aredla ecreb neraossasti icare naoi naeniztia ate , aricnv naztic icare ras caulupicsid ereb natreb oreuG
. äurugni nenoçiug allim zrob nedaric canetuç nai atE
. tiabrec cirateniarra ate , aratiuqsas ibamah cirateihtaç netaçec itiog atE
. necetic aisasser ate , céicug netaçec nai atE
. yeicug nézteic itrap caniarra ib ate : taçnezteil raçe areniztia yæh , yeulupicsid ereb nézteic name ate : caiugo naztic stuah ate , naztic adner cáitarg , cirutahctla tárurec caiugeb , naeneutic utrah caniarra ib ate caiugo zrob atE
. ánramah ate yeugorreb ate , ánuhe , zacnera necetic rai atE
. naeniag edrehp rahleb zaratniaham caicug netaztil icare rai , naztic anam naudrO
. niarra ib ate , zroB , etioid naenetud niuqai atE . euçaçe raki ate etzaoç ? euçutid iugo tabmeC , etsoid crah atE
? aretai ugeuard nename ate , aiugo nerorenid nuhe-reb ugud nerissore cinaoi alA , etastoid naudrO . aretai ceuç euçeyE , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
. éitze netaçed nai rec nece : táçnetaçed sore iugo néreb , cinaoi tarateügrub ate tárateirreh ocurugni , tignoc ceyE
: cud audnareb ai ate , ruah ukel cud utreseD , aletuç netiarre , caulupicsid ereb nacziaç naçi irrohte , néztiab audnareb ai alon atE
. netsacari neraçuag ztihna néiuqec sah ate : nedaric alaçeb caebag niaztra idra nece : zaçeh naçec rah enoissapmoc ate , cesuseI aidnah eztedneg naçec suki cirikli naudrO
. anagnerah necetic lib ate , yæh netziuqec niztia ate , arah netaçec niuge retsal cirateicug irih zenio ate : ceztihna aruh netaçec tugaçe ate , netiaoi caulupop naztic suki aniaB
: trappa naicnv aratetab utresed ukel adab necetic naoI
. nétuzte ere-ciranicia ocetai ate : canedaric netiaoi ate netrohte nedaric ztihna nece : tabitug etzetiaç asoper ate , aratetab utresed ukel trappa córuec etzotaÇ , néceic narre atE
. aicug netuç istacari ate niuge netoçeic atnoc ate , anagsuseI caulotsopA necetic lib atE
. nábmuht netaçec raçe ate , aztuprog nerah netaçec namare ate , necetic rohte caulupicsid nerah cinuçne iroh atE
. irama ereb nóçeic name cáhcacsen ate , irahctacsen aruh nóçeic name ate , naetalp äurub nerah naçec rake atE
. naiugednioserp äurub nóçeic iuqede cinaoi adab crah : äurub nerah nidel rake naçec anam , aorerrob cirirrogi , ceugeR natreb atE
. nakv ihan iztiari utze , citagcaneduec cirirrai naeniaham niuqerah ate citaganic , cirutetsirt ztiugah ceugeR atE
. äurub neratsitpaB sennaoI naetalp nádaçeid name natreb niaro taid ihaN , aleoic , nóiuqec acse , anageugeR iuqutanoitceffa ciruhtras natreb atE
. neräurub neratsitpaB sennaoI , naçec narre crah atE ? zian nerutacse reC , irama ereb nóçeic narre cirikli crah atE
. onaridre neramuser eruen , tanuard nename aicug nadatiaztia nerutacsE : nóçeic niuge nic atE
. tanuard nename ate , nutiab ihan ere-rec tiuqa acsE , irahctacsen astoid ceugeR , naeneuarec niuge niugesta yeneduec cirirrai naeniaham niuqerah ate isedoreH ate , naenec utaçnad ábala nesaidoreH ciruhtras atE
: yelapicnirp ocaelilaG ate yeniatipac ate yeicnirp naeneuarec netiuge ateuqnab ocenuge ros ereb cesedoreH , naenec irrohte aoczarac nuge adaB
. neuç netuçne aruh citogog ate , neuç netiuge açuag ztihna cinuçne aruh ate : nacuarec netrake eroho ate , audnias ate aotsui noçiug alec aruh nece cirutugaçe , isennaoI nóyaç rudleb sedoreH necE
. neeuqaçec nice aniab , neuç ihan icare lih ate , nóyaç rehya saidoreH ztocalaH
. náud aetzame nereyana irue iros cutzE , isedoreH cesennaoI nacuarec netiarre necE
. neuztiab utrah etzame aruh nerec , zasuac neraetzame nereppilihP eyana ereb saidoreH , naiugednioserp naçec acetse ate , sennaoI naçec rah cirirrogi edneg cenuh sedoreH necE
. ciratelih ad utaticsuser aruh , anadacuard iuqede äurub cin sennaoI ad ruaH , oid cesedoreH cinuçne iroh adaB
. ocalaçeb tab ciratetehporP ode , adatehporP , netioic cécreb atE : ad sailE , netioic cécreB
. natrah étud neztarbo cétuhtrev ztocalah ate , ciratelih ad naçi utaticsuser , anec ira neztayehtab sennaoI , naçec narre ate ) autamaf nec aneci nerah nece ( neztaçnim cesedoreH euger naçec nuçne atE
. netzutic neztadnes ate , ire ztihna zoilo nétuç neztatcnv ate : nétuç netzioge aropmac ztihna urbaed atE
. nidel adneme aredebtab netuç neztaciderp cirutitrap ceh atE
. aruh irih ze nece , naenuge ocoicidui caocahrromoG ate caocamodoS aledarid nenaçi cautatcart ogaiuqeme , teustoid zaiugE . artnoc néyah nategainomitset , astuahrre ocipza nénio neuç euçaçe sorrahi , naeztitrap cidnah , nenuçne ze ceuç ate , etzutiaztiapze nerutibecer ere-cron atE
. onaretra ikli cidnah nah eteduaç , arratetab ehcte eteraztiab neruhtras ere-noN , neuarec netiarre atE
. itzev necetilze zaporra árib ate netzutil caicnuai caeladnas aniaB
. naocirreug cirurid ze , ciriugo ze , ciratelam ze : neciab astuh alikam , taztocedib rah sued netaçelze naztic anam atE
. naeniag néustas utirips erehtob néceic name ate : árib netrogi néyah nidec sah ate , caibamah naztic ied naudrO
. alec ira netsacari , urugni cäugrub neutic neztarugni ate , citagaetatiludercni céyah néogec zarim atE
. neciab naztiztiab adnes , cirirraçe naeniag néyah caucse , ztiokab ire tiebmec , ertab ciretuhtrev nah neuç niuge nice atE
. neciab naehcte ereb ate , naetra nédiaha ate , nairreh ereb neztarohosed tabatehporP atzE , cesuseI neuarec netiarre atE
. natrah nedaric neztaziladnacs atE ? nahtiab ug nemeh ere-caberra nenuh edaritze ? eyana nenomiS ate neraduI ate nesesoI ate neseuqcaI , emes nerairaM ? retnaprahc ruah atzE
? edaritiab netiuge zucse nenuh caetuhtrev ocalenuh era ate , ruah aitneipas noyaç naçi name inuh ad cirec ate ? cuah açuag inuh cidnoN , aletioic , netuç netserim ceztihna ciratenetuç netuçne ate , netsacari nágoganys nidec sah , aohtabbaS naenec irrohte atE
. caulupicsid ereb naztierraçab ate , arirreh ereb nidec rohte ate , cidnah nidec itrap oreuG
. nóiuqel name irahctacsen aretai naçec narre ate : naiuqalze ruah crohen , utid nakv utanam ztiugah atE
. necetic atnaps zidnah udnematnaps ate : nec aocatehtrv ibamah nece : nalibaçab ate , áhctacsen nidec iuqiai natreb atE
. ida iuqiai ) tansoid irih ( áhctacseN , atiab ihan narre : imuc-ahtilaT , astoid , aucse nerahctacsen cirutrah atE
. arukel naztec áhctacsen ad neztras ate , canedaric niuqerah ate , áma ate átia nerahctacsen naztic rah , aropmac ciriuqodi caicug crah aniab : zaçrah neduec zirri atE
. aztad ol aniab , lih atze áhctacsen ? eteduaç zerragin ate , eteraç neztatnemrot citagreC , etsoid ciruhtras atE
. canetuç netrake idnah ulod ate , caneduec zerragin ate , aotlumut naztic suki ate , arehcte neralapicnirp ocagoganys nidec rohte oreuG
. neciab aeyana neseuqcaI sennaoI ate , seuqcaI ate , sirreiP nóiuqel iuqierrai rohen ittemrep naçezte atE
. tnemalos castehnis , cirrudleb aláutzE , iralapicnirp ocagoganys astoid , irras niaçeb neuç nuçne ruah ztih nec netiarre cesuseI atE
? aurtsigaM cud neztagitaf citagrec , cud lih ábala eriH , aletioic , citeneralapicnirp ocagoganys uztab necetic rohte alec oçnim aruh oniarO
. citagalp erue odnes nécia ate , niuqereuqab libah , ua utaulas caedef erue , ábalA , nóçeic narre crah atE
. aicug aiuge nóçeic narre ate , areniztia nerah äurub ereb naçec ztoge ate , nidec rohte , anec naçi niuge nahtiab aruh naiuqaztiab alon , ciraraki ate cirrudleb aetzame atE
. taçnaçel suki aneuç niuge ruah , neuç neztaheb urugni atE
? uan iuqnuh croN , coid ate , aleua nestreh caeztedneg cassucadaB , ceulupicsid ereb netoçeic narre atE
? caudnemalliba ene utid iuqnuh croN , naçec narre , naeztedneg ciriluzti , aetuhtrev nec naçi ikli cinagnerah cirutugaçe nahtiab ereb cesuseI natreb atE
. ciratrah agalp alec utadnes naeztuprog ereb naçec idnes ate : airruhti lodo nerah nidec roga natreb atE
zian nerutadnes , reb taztidab iuqnuh caudnemalliba nerah nidlaB , neuç netiarre necE
. áporra nerah naçec iuqnuh ate , citelebiug naeztedneg nidec rohte , cinuçne neztaçnim zesuseI aruH
. nec naçi ogautaocziag aniab , utahcteborp sued nézte ate , neuç utadnepsed aicug aereb ate , ciratucidem ztihna neuç nakv utirffus ztihna atE
: cineuç nateh ehtrv ibamah aeztairai lodo nec tabetzame atE
. netuç nestreh ate , nóyerraç idnah ulupop ate , niuqerah suseI nidec naoi atE
. ned iciv ate táçnidad adnes , naeniag nerah caucse náztid raçe ate , nida rohte , tauard netiuge ztiohto : cud naenerruh aohctabala enE , aleoic , nacuarec netiuge idnah ztiohto atE
. aratenio nerah aurub ereb naçec ztoge , aruh naeneuç issuki ate , tabmec neztied suriaI lapicnirp ocagoganys nidec rohte , ánuh atE
. naerretzab sasti nec ate , anagnerah nidec lib idnah ulupop , aredla ecreb zirreb naicnv suseI naenec nagari atE
. netuç netserim céicug ate : cesuseI naztuarec niuge caidnah açuag niec nesilopaceD neztaciderp nidec sah ate , adab nidec naoI
. neud nakv etateip zaçih alon ate , náiuqzuard niuge canuaI caidnah açuag niec cecei atnoc ate , araterue tárehcte erue libaH , nóçeic narre citiztia , ittemrep nóçeizte cesuseI aniaB
. nécil niuqerah anec naçi utainomed noyaç zetziohto , aricnv naenec uhtras aruh atE
. cirateuqramoc néyah nidel itrap netiuge ztiohto nóiuqziuqec sah ceh naudrO
. zédrv ate , noyaç naçi udleh irautainomed alon , yæh néceic narre cénetuç issuki ruah atE
. necetic ici ate : toid aneuç nakv aenoigel , cirutaçnec ate cirutitzev ate cirirrai anec naçi utainomed etud netsuki ate , anagsuseI edarid netrohte atE
. nec naçi niuge rec aretsuki necetic ikli naudrO : arateocopmac ate aririh cairreb netaztic rake ate , netaçec niuge sehi cénetzutic neztaczab caedrv atE
. naossasti necetic ohti ate ) äurugni nerallim ib nedaricab ate ( arossasti areheb citeniag aedladrv nidec radlo ate , aratedrv necetic ral caustas utirips cirikli atE . cesuseI natreb néceic ittemrep atE
. taçnecetiag ras arateh , aratedrv caztiag rogI , aletioic , céicug ceh urbaed netoçeic niuge ztiohto atE
. cinec ahla tabidnah edladrv naedla idnem nah nec atE
. aropmac ciratrah acramoc rogi naztilze , nacuareç netiuge idnah ztiohto atE
. cutiag ztihna nece : neci taid oigeL , aleoic , naçec stedrahi atE ? aneci erih ad aloN , aruh naçec agorretni naudrO
) cinagnerroh noçiug , áustas utirips ida iklI , nacuarec netiarre necE (
. atnemrot naçenze zetrap neraocniaI tua neztaruida ? aemeS neraonaribus ocniaI suseI , naetra ene ate erih ad reC , naçec narre zarog zov zuhio atE
: nóiuqec rug ate naçec niuge retsal , cinadnurrv suseI naeneuç issuki atE
. alasnuarec zirrah iräurub ereb ate , aleogec zuhio nec natebmuht ate nateidnem uag ate nuge ereihteb atE
. neeuqaçec abec nice crohen ate : caopec acihtaç ate , cánedac naztiztiab stuah naenec naçi utacetse zanedac ate zopec nateztihna nereC
. neoric acetse nice crohen ere-zanedac ate , natebmuht neuztiab aetioge ereb cenieC
: tabmoçiug neuç austas utirips ciratebmuht nóiuqec rohte areniztia natreb , citicnv naenec ikli atE
. aracramoc néoneradaG , aredla ecreb neraossasti necetic rohte atE
? etutiab neztidebo ere , caossasti ate caeciah , ruah ad ron aniaB , naetra nerrakle netuç netiarre ate : zidnah arudici necetic ici atE
? ciredef euçutze alon ? roici alerroh eteraç citagreC néceic narre atE
. nidec niuge idnah etatiliuqnart ate , aeciah nidec assec naudrO . ida idleug ate , ida lihcI , iraossasti nóçeic narre ate , aeciah naçec ahctahem naenec irraztari atE
? necaog caudlag nerec ciraisna cutze , áurtsigaM , etastoid ate , etud neztraztari naudro : naeniag netab idrurub ol naztec naedla ocelebiug neraicnv aruh atE
. néztiab neztahteb ai non alah , aricnv nedaric neztras cágab ate , tabidnah abmuhub eciah nidec ahctla naudrO
. niuqerah nedaricab ere-caohcticnv ecreb aniab : alaçeb nec naicnv aruh netaçec rah ciriztv aulupop atE
. aredla ecreb nerarv necetiág nagarI , naenec utsarra , natrah nuge néceic narre atE
. caicug açuag netzuarec neztaralced yeulupicsid ereb naetrappa aniab : neztaçnim neyazte ebag enoitarapmoc atE
. aruara neranetioric laha nuçne , aztih neuarec neztatcart zenoitarapmoc ocalenuh ztihna atE
. naelazti nerah etzieuqaztitiab laha niuge caeztaho ceirohc ocurec non alah utid netiuge caidnah rada ate : ad netiuge aneidnah ocateicug rahleb ecreb ate , ad neztarog , naodno ned niere aniaB
: aneipihc ocateicug icah nedarid naerrul atiab , naened netiere naerrul niec , alaçeb tabihib icah adratsum ad aruH
? aruh ugud nerutarapmoc zenoitarapmoc rec ode ? cámuser neraocniaI ugud nenarre aleud iduri reC , neoic oreuG
. átzv atiab tserp nerec : áyetiugi netraçe ud canoçiug natreb , autcurf naened utreuga atE
. näurub aehteb ihib iugo oreug , urub oreug , rahleb niheb , ud netrake utcurf carrul zurub ereb necE
, alon alaiuqalze crah , nécil neztah ate netikli aicah atE
. aroçna netab netaçil netiuqiai ate netazte ol nuge ate uag ciriztoge arerrul aicah nóçiug , ad ámuser neraocniaI , neuç netiarre ogaiheuG
. óyaç neriuqede ere-aneud , iraneutze cisued ate : óyaç nename , iraneud necE
. yoneuçud netuçne yeuç , euçiaç nerutadneme ate , euçiaç nerutruen , euçutiab nerutruen zirruen rec : neuçud netuçne rec euçuaogoG , néceic narre ogaiheuG
. açeb nuçne , udab cirirraheb ocetuçne crohen nidlaB
. ad raheb irrohte aropmac aniab : cinetiad laha latse ode , cinetze nerutreuga ciruterces sued atze necE
? taçnidad raçe naerelednac aze ? taçnidad raçe naepaho ode , naepuruztiag ad netrake alednac alA , rebalah néceic narrE
. nuhe caecreb ate , yeugorurih caecreb ate , ramah ate yeugoh catab , netrake utcurf ate , neztibecer ate , etutiab netuçne aztih céniec , canetud utibecer aicah areno rul edarid cuah atE
. ad neztebag utcurf ate , aztih etud neztohti cirarenrab céicihtug ocatecuag ecreb ate , caoinagne oczenussatsarba ate , céisna ocatenuh udnum aniaB
: canetud netuçne aicah , toid , edarid cuah , canetud neztibecer aicah aretra irrohle edarid cuah atE
. edarid neztaziladnacs natreb , citagaztih cirenoitucesrep ode cirenoitalubirt naened neztleh oreug : edarid ocatitug etuari aniab , nahtiab careb cirorre etutze atE
. aruh etud neztibecer niuqeroiraczob natreb , aztih naenetud nuçne ate : canetud neztibecer aicah arateuçirrah ukel rebalah edarid cuah atE
. aztih nec niere nateztohib neyah ud necnek ate , nataS ad netrohte natreb , naenetud nuçne aniab : aztih atiab netiere naténiec , canetud neztibecer aicah arerretzab edib edarid cuah adaB
. ud netiere aztih caellierE
? euçutid neritugaçe caicug enoitarapmoc natalon atE ? ruah enoitarapmoc euçiuqatzE , neceic narre atE
. néiuqziuqatze akrab cautakeb ate necetitze itreunoc : netaçetze ida ate , netaçed nuçne aletuçnad ate : traho nóiuqziuqatze ate , taçnetaçed suki aletassucaD
: etziaç neztatcart caicug açuag zenoitarapmoc yenedarid naerokel aniab : aeztugaçe nerauterces ocamuser neraocniaI euçiaç name yeuÇ , néceic narre atE
. zaenoitarapmoc , cénedaric niuqeibamah näurugni nerah netaçec agorretni , alec areb atE
. açeb nuçne , caneud cirirraheb ocetuçnE , néceic narre naudrO
. nuhe caecreb ate , yeugorurih caecreb ate , ramah ate yeugoh catab ihib naçec rake ate , cinec neztidnah ate neztarog utcurf naçec name ate , areno-rul nidec rore aecreb atE
. name cirutcurf naçezte ate , aruh netaçec ohti ate , necetic idnah cairrohle ate , aretra irrohle nidec rore tabetrap ecreb atE
. nidec rahye , neuztiapze cirorre nerec ate : nidec erre , naenec utarog aiuqzugi aniaB
. cinussatenrab rul neuztiapze nerec , nidec ikli natreb ate : ciztihna rul neuztiapze non , arateuçirrah ukel nidec rore tabetrap ecreb atE
. aruh netaçec steri ate , cairohc ocurec necetic rohte ate , arerretzab edib nideztiab rore tabetrap , naetiere nidec ahtreug atE
. aratiere nidec ikli tabelliere , ánuH , euçaçe nuçnE
, nánirtcod ereb neuarec netiarre ate , açuag ztihna zenoitarapmoc neuarec netsacari atE
. nec naerrohiel natsoc sasti aicug ulupop ate : naossasti neogeztiab cirirrai , ciruhtras aricnv areb non alah , idnah eztedneg anagnerah nidec lib ate : naerretzab sasti netsacari nidec sah zirreb oreuG
ama ate , aberra ene ate eyana ene ad aruh , aetadnorov eraocniaI utiab eniuge ere-cron necE
. caeyana ene ate , ama ene ánuH , oid , arateulupicsid neduec cirirrai näurugni nerah naeneuç utaheb urugni atE
? caeyana ene ode , ama ene ad roN , aleoic , néceic stedrahi naudrO
. etua netiugedlag naerokel céyana erih ate cama erih , ánuH , netoçeic narre ceh ate , aeztedneg näurugni nerah neogec cirirrai atE
. areztied nerah , anagnerah uztab netaztic rogi aleduec naerokel ate : ama nerah ate caeyana nerah adab edarid netrohtE
. ud austas utiripS , netuç netiarre necE
. nudneugoh neralanrete enoitanmednoc ad nenaçi aniab , naluces nenakv cirudnemakrab utze artnoc neraudnias utiripS utiab nerutamehpsalb ere-cron aniaB
: caicug oimehpsalb netzieuqutid utamehpsalb ate , aletziaç nerutakrab yémes nénoçiug caicug utakeb nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. ud nerutallip aehcte nerah naudro ate : açedapze acetse aztihtrob nehel nidlab , euqaztid laha allip , ciruhtras arehcte nerah , caudnemallitso netab ztihtrob crohen nicE
. ud nif aniab , euquad nice , artnoc ereb adab autitrap ate idadab ahctla ere-nataS nidlab alaH
. aruh ehcte euquad nice , adab autitrap artnoc ereb tabehcte nidlab atE
. aruh amuser euquad nice , adab autitrap artnoc ereb tabamuser nidlab necE
. euqaçed laha ztoge aropmac nataS cenataS nataloN , zenoitarapmoc néceic narre , ciruhtied anagereb ceh atE
. aleutic netzioge aropmac caurbaed zetrap neraecnirp néurbaed ate , aleuç bubezleeB nece , nétuç netiarre cébircS nedaric naçi istuai citemelasureI atE
. alec utaroç , netuç netiarre nece : taçnetaçel namaztah necetic ikli caediaha nerah naenetuç nuçne ruah atE
. netioriztiab rah nice ere-aetra ocetai neraiugo non alah , nidec lib tabidnah eztedneg zirreb ate : arehcte necetic rohte atE
. neuztiab ere-utidart areb ceniec , toiracsI saduI atE
, aoenanaC nomiS ate , oeddahT ate , aemes neroehplA seuqcaI ate , samohT ate , uehttaM ate , oemolohtraB ate , eppilihP ate uirdnA atE
) caemes iricrogi , atiab ihan narre , segrenaoB néceic name neci yæh ate ( , aeyana neseuqcaI sennaoI ate , aemes neroedebeZ seuqcaI atE
) : sirreiP noçeiztiab name neci iniec ( , nomyS cineheL
. ocetzioge aropmac néurbaed ate , oceztadnes nénussatire erehtob nétul atE
: ocetrogi areztaciderp ate , ocetaçi niuqerah ibamah naztic anedro atE
. anagnerah necetic rohte ate : caneutic ihan anagereb naztic ied ate , aratetab idnem nidec nagi oreuG
. taçnetaçel ze atsefinam , neutic neztahctahem ztiugah crah aniaB
niaB 21 meS neraocniaI zia iH , aletioic , netuç netiuge uhio ate , nétzutic netzioge cäurub ereb areniztia nerah , naenetuç netsuki aruh céustas utirips atE
. taçnetacel iuqnuh anagnerah nedariztiab neztradlo caicug nedaric natenoitcilffa non alah , neuç nakv utadnes ztihna necE
. táçnetaçelze sreh , zasuac neraeztedneg , nóiuqel iuqude tserp ihteb tabohcicnv yeulupicsid ereb néceic narre atE
. anagnerah necetic rohte , neutic netiuge caidnah açuag niec cinuçne , idnah eztedneg ciratenedaric neztatibah natèurugni ocenodyS ate oceryT ate : citedla ecreb zanadroI ate , citaemudI ate , citemelasureI atE
. citaeduI ate citaelilaG aidnah eztedneg nóiuqec iuqerrai ate : táredla sasti nidec ariter niuqeulupicsid ereb suseI aniaB
. taçnetacel lih aruh , artnoc nerah netaçec iuqude ulliesnoc niuqeonaidoreH natreb , céuesirahP cirikli naudrO
. nidec adnes niaçeb aecreb , aucse nerah ate , naçeç adeh atE : aucse erue caçe adeH , iranoçiug astoid , cirutatsirtnoc zaenoitanitsbo oceztohib néyah ate , niuqererressa cirutaheb urugni tárateh atE
. neduec cilihci ceh aniab : aeztlih ala , aeztarapme netab anosrep ? aetiuge iuqziag ala , iros ad aetiuge iugnv naohtabbaS , etsoid oreuG
. aretra ida iuqiaI , iraneuç autrahye ucse noçiug astoid atE
. taçnetaçel asucca zeneuç nerutadnes naohtabbaS aye nétuç neztaogog atE
. cineuç autrahye aucse tabmoçiug nah nec ate , nágogánys zirreb nidec ras oreuG
. ad ebai ere-neraohtabbaS aemeS neranoçiug adaB
. citagaohtabbaS anoçiug ze , ad naçi niuge citaganoçiug aohtabbaS : néceic narre oreuG
? neuarec name ere-yenedaric niuqerah alon ate , canedarizte iros ocetai neciab nérodacifircaS , neutic nakv nai caiugo ocenoitisoporp ate : nárobmed neralapicnirp erodacifircaS rahtaibA naehcte neranuaI nec naçi uhtras aloN
? canedaric niuqerah ate areb naenec utessog ate , naeneuç etatissecen ce-diuaD neuç niuge rec , nakv irrucari onadnuge euçutzE , néceic narre crah atE
? anetze iros niuge naohtabbaS étud netiuge citagrec , árroH , netoçeic narre céuesirahP atE
. netiuqodi acurub alecaoic naedib caulupicsid nerah necetic sah ate , idniag natecniere zetab-nuge htabbaS neztiab netiagari aruh nidec ahtreug atE
. ad raheb irraçe nateirreb iugahaç airreb onrastaham aniab edarid neztlag caiugahaç ate , ad netrussi aonrastaham ate caiugahaç utid neztrehel cairreb onrastaham erepze : naterraç iugahaç airreb onrastaham netraçe utze crohen rebalaH
. árudnehte ad oganeztaocziag ate , irarraç acuard netiuqede crah irreb irragilpmoc nerah erepze , natetab raç udnemalliba netsoi utze tab-ztal uçadep lahio crohen atE
. nateh nuge étud neniuge rurab naudro ate , audnocze eyaztiab neriuqede canuge edarid nerirrohte aniaB
. etidiad nice cirurab onetud niuqereb audnocze ? oned niuqeh audnocze etidiad laha cirurab cédneg ocateyetzE : cesuseI euard netiarre atE
? netiuge cirurab etutiápze céulupicsid erih ate , etud netiuge rurab céulupicsid neuesirahP ate nesennaoI citagreC , etastoid ate edarid netrohte ceh ate : nétuç netiuge rurab céulupicsid néuesirahP ate nesennaoI atE
. aratudnemadneme , nerotakeb aniab : areztied néotsui irrohte zian ze nece : cénedarid ire aniab : cirraheb nerucidem etutze cénedarid ossO , etsoid cesuseI cinuçne ruah atE
? netade ate ud netai niuqeocatothciag ezticiv ate niuqeonacilbup citagreC , yeulupicsid nerah néceic narre , aleuç netai niuqeocatothciag ezticiv edneg ate niuqeonacilbup cirissuki céuesirahP ate cébircS atE
. nacziaç naçi iuqierrai ate nedaric ztihna néce , niuqeulupicsid nerah ate niuqesuseI nideztiab rai ocatothciag ezticiv edneg ate onacilbup ztihna , aleogec cirirrai naeniaham naehcte nerah suseI , nidec ahtreug atE
. nóiuqec iuqierrai ciriuqiai atE . irin tierrA , nóçeic narre ate , cirirrai naukel egaep aemes neroehplA iueL , naçec suki , alec netiagari iturrv atE
. ceh neutic netsacari ate , anagnerah nec netrohte aicug ulupop ate : taredla sasti zirreb nidec ikli atE
. issuki ugutze ciraçuag ocalenuh onadnugE , aletuç netiarre , aocniaI netuztiab neztacifirolg ate , nedueztiab cautatnaps caicug non alah : naitneserp néicug nidec ikli , cirutrah aeho ate , nidec iuqiai natreb atE
. tárehcte erue libah ate , aeho erue caçe rah ate , ida iuqiaI , tassoid iriH
) iraocitylarap astoid ( naerrul oceztakrab néutakeb erehtob aleudab caemeS neranoçiug nece adab taçneuçiuqaD
? ida libe ate , aeho erue caçe rah ate , ida iuqiaI , aetiarre ala , cautakeb ciuqziaç utakraB , iraocitylarap aetiarre , ogahctarre ad nieC
. nateztohib neuç euçacudrahid zecuag ocalerroh citagreC , neceic narre , nahtiab careb aletacudrahic alah nece , zautirips ereb cesuseI cirutugaçe natreb atE
? neciab careb caocniaI euqaztid laha akrab cautakeb croN ? ad ira netiarre oimehpsalb alenuh ruah citagreC
, alenuh , nateztohib ereb netuç netiuqudrahi ate , cairrai nah nedaric uztab ciratebircS atE
. cautakeb erue ciuqziaç utakrab , émeS , iraocitylarap nóçeic narre , cirissuki aedef néyah cesuseI naudrO
. aeho naztec aocitylarap netaçec stuare , cirutahluç aruh ate , aniag ehcte nec suseI netaçec reuga , zasuac neraeztedneg noiuqzidiuqaztiab libruh nice nerec atE
. tabocitylarap nec netiamare zerual aletuç netrake , anagnereh uztab necetic rohte naudrO
. aztih neuarec neztaralced ate : netzieuqaztiztiab iuqude nice ere-céiridla ahtrob non tabmah edarid naçi udlib ztihna natreb atE
. alec naehcte nece ad naçi nuçne ate , naurub nenuge tiebmec nemuanrepaC nidec ras zirreb aTE
. cirateicug edla anagnerah nedaric netrohte ate , nec nateutresed ukel naerokel aniab , aririh netiaztiab ras nice suseI zirreuga cirogaiheug non alah , neztatsefinam neraiuqraheb ate , neztacilbup neraçuag ztihna nidec sah cirikli aruh aniaB
. nategainomitset yæh cáçuag neutid utanam cesesyoM citagaeztibrag erue cazti atneserp ate , iraerodacifircaS oiuqa stucare ate , áho aniab : naorretze sued irohen cuariugeB , nóçeic narre atE
: táropmac naçec rogi natreb cirutahctahem aruh atE
. nidec uhahc ate , anussatoyahros cinagnerah nidec naoi natreb , naeneuç narre iroh atE
, uhahc nécia , taid ihaN , nóçeic narre ate , aruh naçec iuqnuh , cirutadeh aucse ate cirutrah enoissapmoc cesuseI naudrO
. ceuqaçen laha uhahc cudab ihan nidlaB , alastoic cirutaciruahleb irah ate , alacuarec netiuge ztiohto , taboyahros anagnerah nidec rohte atE
. neutic netzioge aropmac caurbaed ate : naicug aelilaG , nateugoganys néyah neuç neztaciderp atE
. zian naçi ikli taztocatrah nece : taçnadaçed aciderp ere-nah : aratèugrub ognelibruh necaoG etsoid naudrO
. caztlibaid ahlib erih caicuG , netoçeic narre , naenetuç nedire atE
. canedaric niuqerah ate nomiS nacziaç naçi iuqierrai atE
. neuç netiuge ztiohto nah ate , aratetab utresed ukel nidec naoi ate , nidec ikli ciriuqiai alec aidnah nuhli oniaro naeciog oreuG
. nétul nakv utugaçe aruh alon netiztv areztaçnim caurbaed neutizte ate , naçec ztoge aropmac urbaed ztihna ate : caicug nedaric ire zesreuid nuçrahre naztic adnes atE
. nec audlib arahtrob aicug irih atE
. cautainomed ate caicug neduec iuqzieug netaztuarec netrake , naeztras iuqzugi , naestarra atE
. naztic aztibrec crah ate : caztiagleh naçec iztv natreb ate , cirutrah citucse aruh naçec itiog cirudlibruh naudrO
. zaçrah nacziaç naçi utaçnim natreb ate : niuqeraztiagleh naztec aberrahniug-ama nenomiS atE
. niuqesennaoI ate niuqeseuqcaI arehcte neuirdnA ate nenomiS necetic rohte , cirikli citagoganys natreb atE
. aicug acramoc ocurugni aelilaG natreb cámaf nerah naçec oi atE
? etutiab neztidebo ate utitiab neztanam ere-caustas utirips zetatirohtua ? ruah ad irreb anirtcod rec ? ruah ad reC , aletioic , nedueztiab zedlag naetra ereb non alah , caicug necetic atnaps atE
. cinagnerah nidec ikli , cirirrai zuhio iugneco ate , cirutihtaç aruh austas utirips atE
. cinagnerroh ida ikli ate , ida lihcI , aleoic , cesuseI aruh naçec ahctahem atE
. audnias neraocniaI zia ih , necia ron taiuqaec ab ? zia irrohte aretiugesed erug ? aonerazaN suseI naetra erug ate erih ad reC , hA , aleoiC
, nidec rai zuhio ate , cineuç austas utirips tabmoçiug nágoganys néyah nec atE
. alaçeb cébircS ze ate , alaçeb caneuç etatirohtua neutic netsacari nece , zánirtcod nerah neduec cirutatnaps atE
. nec ira netsacari , nágoganys ciruhtras naenuge htabbaS natreb ate , ne-muanrepaC edarid neztras oreuG
. nacziaç naçi iuqierrai , niuqeliugnal ciriztv naicnv oedebeZ atia ereb ate : ceh naztic ied natreb atE
. aletzutic neztaboda caeras ereb naicnv ere-ceh , aeyana nerah sennaoI ate aemes neroedebeZ seuqcaI naztic suki , cinaoi ogaihcaniztia cidnah atE
. nacziaç naçi iuqierrai caeras ereb ciriztv natreb atE
. erodacsep açiug tetzutiaç neniuge ate naodno ene etzotaÇ , cesuseI neceic narre atE
) nedaric erodacsep nece ( aletzutic netzioge arossasti caeras , aeyana nerah uirdnA ate nomiS naztic suki alalibaç naerretzab sasti ocaelilaG atE
. aoilegnauE euçaçe stehnis ate , etzetiaç adneme : ámuser neraocniaI ad libruh ate , árobmed ad utilpmoC , aleoic atE
