: aoilegnauE neramuser neraocniaI aleuç neztaciderp , araelilaG suseI nidec rohte , naenec naci namaztah sennaoI atE
. netuç neztaztibrec cèureugniA ate , niuqeitseb assab nec ate : zenataS alec neztatnet , nuge yeugorreb nautresed nah nidec noge atE
. arutresed aruh naçec noiri cautiripS natreb atE
. ano niugesta eruen tutiab neztrah nateniec aetiam emeS ene zia iH , aleoic , ciratèurec nidec niuge tab-zov atE
. netsuai areniag nerah alaçeb tababmuloc ossv audnias utiripS ate , neztaridre cäurec naztic suki , citerv alec netikli natreb atE
. naenadroI cinagsennaoI nideztiab ayehtab ate , citocaelilaG hterazaN nideztiab rohte suseI , nateh nuge nidec ahtreug atE
. zaudnias utiripS etzutiaç nerutayehtab crah aniab , zerv tetzutiaç neztayehtab cin , ad aiugE
. engid oceztahcal zianiapze cirutitieheb neraedeh ocatetapaç neniec , naodno ene aned ogaztihtrob oniab in ad netrohtE , aleoic , neuç neztaciderp atE
. neuç netai itzessab ate ihto ate , urugni naecnurreug ereb zetab ocirreug oczurral ate , zolib ulemac autitzev sennaoI nec atE
. aletzutic neztassefnoc cautakeb ereb , naoiuulf ocenadroI cinagnerah caicug nedaric neztayehtab ate : caocemelasureI ate aicug irreh ocaeduI anagnerah nec netiaoi atE
. natudnemakrab néutakeb aomsitpab ocatudnemadneme neuç neztaciderp ate , nautresed sennaoI nec ira neztayehtaB
. cácsedib nerah euçazti analp , aedib neranuaI euçaçe niappA , ad azov neraneogad zuhio nautreseD
naeniztia erih aedib erih utiab nerudniappa ceniec , naeniztia etrahtiugeb erih airatadnam eruen taid netrogi cin , ánuH , natetehporP alaçeb ned autabircS
: aestah oilegnauE neraemeS neraocniaI TSIRHC SVSEI

. nemA . onarenif neraudnum ereihteb zian niuqeuç in , ánuh ate : neztariugeb neraicug nadeuçuard utanam cin aleuçutid netsacarI
: naeneci neraudnias utiripS ate neraemeS ate neratiA aleuçutid neztayehtab : caicug edneg euçazti stacari ate adab etzaoÇ
. naerrul ate näurec aicug erehtob irin tiaç naçi namE , aleoic , néiuqec açnim suseI cirudlibruh atE
. netaçec adud cuztab ate : netaçec aroda cirissuki aruh atE
. cesuseI neuaraztiab utanedro non , aridnem , táraelilaG necetic naoi caulupicsid acemah aniaB
. onarenuge ognuge naetra néuduI ruah soporp ad naçi utacilbup ate : alaçeb nedaric naçi istacari netaçec niuge cirutrah äurid ceh atE
. ugetzutiaç neriuqodi ciratocetiuge ate , ugacuard nericare stehnis cug , açedab nuçne caerodanrebog iroh nidlab atE
. alaçnuag ol ug étud nakv istabe aruh , cirirrohte zauag céulupicsid neraH , euçarrE , aletioiC
: yesemradneg néceic name ano ammos urid , cirutrah ulliesnoc ate , niuqeonaicnA cirudlib naudrO
. caicug açuag nedaric naçi niuge yelapicnirp erodacifircaS nézteic aralced ate , aririh necetic rohte uztab ciratedraog , ánuh , ate utitrap ceH
. étuan nerissuki nah ate : araelilaG necaod , yeyana ene euçecei aralced , etzaoç : cirrudleb aleuçutzE , cesuseI etsoid naudrO
. aruh netaçec aroda ate , yenio nerah nétziuqec tol cirudlibruh ceh atE . aleuçiuqad leh iugnV , aleoic , neiuqec rohte areniztia suseI , ánuh , alecaoic areztaralced yeulupicsid nerah ceh aniaB
. areztaralced yeulupicsid nerah netaçec niuge retsal , niuqeridnah oiraczob ate nepaici citetnemunom cirutitrap natreb atE
. teuçuard narre , ánuH . euçud nerissuki aruh nah : araelilaG aod naeniztia neuç , ánuh ate : aled utaticsuser nece , yeulupicsid nerah euçerre cinaoi natreb atE
. aukel nec naçi irraçe anuaI euçassuki etzotaç : alaçeb neuç narre , ad naçi utaticsuser nece : nemeh atzE
: aletaztlibaç ahlib neraned naçi utacificurc suseI tiuqadab nece : cirrudleb aleuçutze ceuÇ , yetzame néceic narre cäureugniA aleuç netsedrahi aniaB
. necetic acalaçeb calih ate , cádraog necetic ici , zerrudleb nerah atE
. alaçeb arruhle iruhc audnemalliba nerah ate , alaçeb atsimtsihc aeztraki nerah nec atE
. naeniag nerah neogec cirirrai ate , citahtrob airrah naçec aradla cirirrohte ate , citurec nidec stuai äureugniA neranuaI nece : nidec niuge tabidnah eztaraki rul , ánuh atE
. aretsuki neraerhclupes necetic rohte aecreb airaM ate aneladgaM airaM , naenuge nec raheb utiugra nehel ocetsa naecneuqza htabbaS atE
. niuqedraog , cirutaliugic airrah , aerhclupes netaçec aruges cinaoi adab ceH
. alaçeb neuçiuqad etzetiaç aruges , etzaoç : cadraog euçutidaB , cetaliP néceic narre atE
. ogaothciag oniab anehel aerorre neuqza etatiab zalah ate : ciratelih ad utaticsuseR , netorred iraulupop ate , netaçetze stabe aruh , cirirrohte zäuag céulupicsid nerah , onarenuge nereh aerhclupes nidad ariugeb adab caçe anaM
. zian nerutaticsuser naenuge nereh ocodnO , naçec narre alec iciv crah irasuba alon cutiag utiohro , anuaI , aletuç netiarrE
. anagtaliP cauesirahP ate , calapicnirp erodacifircaS necetic lib , naodno enoitaraperp neraohtabbaS atiab niec , naenumarahib atE
. nákrua erhclupes cairrai nah nedaric aecreb airaM ate aneladgaM airaM atE
. nidec naoi , ciriluzti arahtrob tnemunom tabidnah irrah ate : naeneuç aiuqabe natetab acorra irreb tnemunom ereb naçec raçe atE
. naçec raçe anrab natetab iruhc essihim cehpesoI cirutrah aztuprog atE
. aztuprog nidel adner cetaliP naçec anam naudro : neraztuprog nesuseI nóiuqec acse ate , anagtaliP nidec rohte ruaH
. nec naçi ulupicsid nesuseI ere-aruh , cinec neztied hpesoI , citaihtamirA tabstarba noçiug nidec rohte , naenec utsarra atE
. áma nemes neroedebeZ ate , ama nesesoI ate neseuqcaI airaM ate , aneladgaM airaM , nec cirateH
. aletuç neztaztibrec aruh , citaelilaG isuseI nacziaztiab naçi iuqierrai niec , aleduec aheb cinadnurrv etzame ztihna rebalah nedaric naH
. ruah nec aemeS neraocniaI iuqzaiugE , aletuç netiarre , ztiugah necetic ici , cirissuki cáçuag nedaric naçi niuge ate aeztaraki rul , caneduec elariugeb nesuseI niuqerah ate , arenetneC atE
. iztihna neiuqziuqec reuga ate , arudnias etatiuic necetic ras , naodno enoitcerruser nerah cirikli ciratetnemunom atE
. necetic iuqiai caztuprog nénaçnuec ol udniaS ztihna ate , necetic iuqeri catnemunom atE
. necetic aridre , cairrah ate , nidec araki arrul ate , onarereheb citiarag , aratihtaç ib nidec aridre álev ocelpmet , ánuh atE
. naçec adner autirips , ciniuge uhio iugneco zirreb cesuseI naudro atE
. areztarapme nerroh sailE zened nerirrohte aye , nugassucad , caztV , netuç netiarre cécreb atE
. nóçeic name aretade , näurugni netab arebanac cirirraçe ate , cirehteb zerganiv cirutrah tabaignops ate , cetab cirateh ciniuge retsal natreb atE
. cenuh ud neztied sailE , netioic , cinuçne iroh cuztab ciratenedaric tneserp nah atE
? cuan utannodnaba nerec , aocniaI enE , aocniaI enE , atiab ihan narre ? inahthcabas amal , ilE , ilE , aleoic , iugneco suseI nidec rai zuhio näurugni nénero iztardeb atE
. nidec niuge ebmuhli naeniag neraicug rul onaratenero iztardeb ciratenero yes aniaB
. netacuarec neztahctorper ere-ceniugathciag nedaric utacificurc niuqerah , areb aruH
. zian aemeS neraocniaI , ud narre nece : adab ocaragog nerah nidlab , niaro açeb arapme , nahtiab aocniaI ad adiF
. iroh ugud neristehnis ate , citezturc niaro ideb stuai , adab eugeR ocelearsI nidlab : orid arapme nice äurub ereb , utid utarapme caecreB
. nétuç netiarre , niuqeonaicnA ate niuqebircS aledaric neztaffurt ere-célapicnirp erodacifircaS rebalaH
. citezturc ida stuai , ziahab aemeS neraocniaI nidlab : äurub erue caçe arapme , neztacifide zenuge rurih ate , cerronaud netiugesed aelpmet ciH , aletioic atE
, aletzutic neztiugih cäurub ereb , aruh netuç neztairuini cénedaric netiagari atE
. citerreuqze aecreb ate citeniucse atab niugathciag ib niuqerah edarid naçi utacificurc naudrO
. AEVGER NEVDVI SVSEI AD RVAH , cirutabircs ásuac nerah nayarag urub nerah netaçec raçe atE
. nah áruh nétuç neztariugeb aleduec cirirrai atE
. étud nakv iztoge ehtroç naeniag neraporra ene ate , caudnemalliba ene etzutid nakv utitraP , anec narre zátehporP táçnidel ilpmoc : ciriztoge ehtroç , caudnemalliba nerah netaztic itrap naenetuç utacificurc atE
. nakv ihan nade neuzte naeneuç utatsad ate : cirutacetsahan niuqeranuçaheb aretade erganiv netoçeic namE
) aukel ruçeh-rub alon tabmah atiab ihan narre niec ( arukel ned neztied ahtogloG naenedaric irrohte atE
. aretiamare neraezturc nerah netaçec ahctrob ruah : tabmec neztied nomiS onaineryC noçiug netaçec nedire naenedaric ikli atE
. areztacificurc netaçec namare ate : zeudnemalliba ereb netaçec itzev ate , aotnam netoçeic znuare , naenedaric utaffurt zaçrah oreuG
. netasnuarec iräurub nerah ate , aruh arebanac netaçec rah , artnoc nerah ciniuge uht atE
. áeugeR neuduI , alaiuqad leh iugnV , aletuç netiarre zaçrah nedaric neztaffurt zutaciruahleb naeniztia nerah ate : naeniucse nerah tabarebanac ate , naeniag urub nerah netaçec raçe cirutagelp tabaoroc oczirrohle atE
. tabotnam oczatalracse arenios netoçeic name naenetuç icullib atE
. aicug adnab areniztia nerah netaçec lib , aroiroterp suseI cinamare césemradneg neraerodanrebog naudrO
. táçnidel acificurc néceic aruil cirutatoça suseI ate : sabbaraB néceic agral naudrO
. naeniag nerruoah erug ate naeniag erug aled alodo nerroH , naçec narre caicug ulupop aleuç netsedrahi atE
. euçassuki ceuç : citelodo nenuh otsui in zian tneconnI , aleoic , naeniztia neraulupop caucse naztic zuki cirutrah rv , alec oganeztidnah aotlumut aniab , neztahcteborp sued aleuzte nece cetaliP cirissuki atE
. ideb acificurC , aletuç netiarre , nétuç netiuge ogaiheug uiho ceh naudrO ? ud niuge iuqziag rec aniaB , etsoid caerodanreboG atE
. ideb acificurC , céicug etastoiD ? zaned neztied tsirhC zesuseI zareb tud neniuge reC , cetaliP néceic narrE
. sabbaraB , netoçeic narre ceh atE ? nadeuçaçeid agral euçud ihan niec ciratoiB , néceic narre caerodanreboG aleuç netsedrahi atE
. netaçel icare lih suseI ate , necetil acse nesabbaraB iraulupop netoçeic name naturub céonaicnA ate célapicnirp erodacifircaS naudrO
. citagnerroh ciratestema nuge taid nagari ztihna nece , niuqerroh otsui sued cih aláutzE , aleoic , caetzame ereb nóçeic rogi , aleogec cirirrai naelaicidui ikla aruh atE
. aletuç utaruil aruh zaidiuni naiuqaecab necE
? tsirhC aned neztied , suseI ala , sabbaraB ? nadeuçaçeid agral euçud ihan nieC , cetaliP néceic narre , ceh adab naenedaric udliB
. cinec neztied sabbaraB , tabelbaton renoserp nétuçab naudro atE
. areztagral netab renoserp nétuç ihan céreb iraulupop caerodanreboG neuç utamutsoc nátseb adaB
. ztiugah caerodanreboG neuztiab netserim non alah : ere-aratetab ztih stedrahi nóçeizte atE
? netud neztacifitset artnoc erih açuag tabmec cuçnatzE , cetaliP astoid naudrO
. stedrahi naçezte sued , zéonaicnA ate zélapicnirp erodacifircaS cinaçi utasucca atE
. coid ciH , nóçeic narre cesuseI ? aeugeR néuduI zia iH , aleoic , caerodanreboG naçec agorretni ate , areniztia neraerodanreboG nidec namare suseI atE
. alaçeb natuarec utanedro irin canuaI , ocetsore neradnal netab eliuganiput ceh etzutid name atE
: zérruoah ocelearsI atiab naçi utamitse niec , aoicerp neraned naçi utamitse , cäurid ramah ate yeugoh étzutid nakv utrah atE , aleoic , anec naçi narre zátehporp saimereiH nidec ilpmoc naudrO
. onarenuge ognuge , adnal-lodo , aruh adnal ad naçi uhtied ztocalaH
. ukel ztroho neregnartse ádnal netab eliuganipot zaçeh netaçec sore , cirutrah ulliesnoc atE
. ad aoicerp lodo nece , necetid raçe naeruaseht cuah iros atzE , netaçec narre cirutrah cäurid celapicnirp erodacifircaS naudrO
. äurub ereb naçec akrv , cinaoi ate , nidec ariter , naelpmet ciriztiari cäurid atE
. alássucad cih ? irug ucahod reC , netaçec narre ceh aniaB . zaeztidart neratneconni lodo , tud niuge utakeB , aleoiC
. yeonaicnA ate yelapicnirp erodacifircaS cäurid ramah ate yeugoh nézteic luzti , cirutiuqirrv alec utanmednoc aruh naenassucaç , caneuç utidart aruh , cesaduI naudrO
. iraerodanrebog etaliP oitnoP netoçeic aruil ate , netaçec namare cirutacetse atE
. taçnetaçel name aratoireh aruh , artnoc nesuseI céicug onaicnA oculupop ate lapicnirp erodacifircaS netaçec iuqude ulliesnoc , naenec irrohte açiog oreuG
. iugnim naçec niuge ragin cirikli taropmac atE . cuan nerutakv naterurih , nehel oniab naçed oi carralliO , nacuareztiab narre ceniec , zaztih nacuarec narre cesuseI sirreiP nidec tiohro naudrO
. naçec oi carrallio natreb atE . anoçiug tugaçetzE , aleoic , neztagenra ate neztacidaram nidec sah naudrO
. ua neztaralced ere-caeztaçnim erue nece : zia cirateh ere-ih iuqzaiugE , isirreiP netoçeic narre ate , canedaric naçi tneserp necetic rohte näurub netab-ruppa atE
. anoçiug tugaçetzE , aleoic , niuqerudnemarui naçec akv zirreb atE
. nec niuqeronerazaN suseI ere-ruaH , yenedaric nah néceic narre ate : cetab otacsen ecreb naçec suki alec netikli tarelarroc aruh atE
. nánoid rec taniuqaeztE , aleoic , naeniztia néicug naçec akv crah aniaB
. nécni niuqeraonaelilaG suseI ere-iH , aleoic , tabotacsen nóiuqec rohte ate : nálas naerokel néogec cirirrai sirreiP atE
. aneua oi ned ron , cugaçei azitehporp , tsirhC , aletioiC
, netoçeic name idlakv zérrohic cécreb ate , netaçec ateffub ate , aretrahtiugeb netoçeic niuge uht naudrO
. ud icerem liH . netaçec narre , aletuç netsedrahi ceh atE ? euçiaç iduri reC
. aoimehpsalb nenuh euçud nakv nuçne niaro , ánuh ? ugud raheb oinomitset ogaiheug rec , ud utamehpsalB , aleuç netiarre , caudnemalliba ereb naztic aridre caonaribus erodacifircaS naudrO
. aled netrohte nateyedoh ocurec ate , naeniucse neraerehtob neraocniaI aleogad cirirrai aemeS neranoçiug euçud nerissuki tarah cidnemeH , teustoid era aniab : cud narre ciH , cesuseI astoiD
. aemeS neraocniaI tsirhC zenecia ih aye , náugaçeid narre , zetrap neraiciv ocniaI tua neztaruidA , astoid caonaribus erodacifircaS aleud netsedrahi naudrO . neogec cilihci suseI atE
? anetud neztacifitset artnoc erih cuah ad rec ? netsedrahi sued cutzE , nóçeic narre caonaribus erodacifircaS ciriuqiai naudrO
. acifideer aruh zenuge rurih ate , aelpmet neraocniaI torid laha niugeseD , ud narre cenuH
, netaçec narre cuslaf oinomitset ib cirirrohte naenif aniaB . ciroczedlom nedire netaçezte ere-necab irrohte uslaf oinomitset ztihna ate : nedire netaçezte atE
: táçnetaçel icare lih , artnoc nesuseI naztlibaç ahlib uslaf egainomitset aicug ulliesnoc ate caonaicnA ate calapicnirp erodacifircaS atE
. táçnaçel suki anif , niuqeiraztibrec nidec rai , ciruhtras arenrab ate , onaralas neraonaribus erodacifircaS cinadnurrv nóyaç netiuqierrai sirreiP atE
. nedariztiab caudlib caonaicnA ate cábircS non , anagaonaribus erodacifircaS sahpiaC netaçec namare , cénetuç namaztah , suseI aniaB
. netaçec niuge sehi , cirutannodnaba aruh , céicug ulupicsid naudrO . cárutpircS nétehporP taçnecetil ilpmoc , ad naçi niuge aicug ruah aniaB
. namaztah euçuanze ate , naelpmet alecnin ira netsacari , nécnin netrai naetra neuç zoro nuge : aretiamaztah ene , niuqehv ate niuqetapze eteraç naçi ikli alaçeb naodno netab niugathciaG , yeztedneg cesuseI néceic narre naereb natrah udrO
? niuge aled raheb alenuh nece , naenetoid , cárutpircS euqzetil ilpmoc zareb nataloN
? ureugniA ogaiheug oniab enoigel ibamah natreb teuqzugnitiab ate , iratiA eruen niaro aladoidiad ztiohto nice cud etsV
. cutid nelih zatapze , caicug netud nerutrah atapze nece : arukel ereb átapze erue caçe luztI , cesuseI astoid naudrO
. airraheb nóçeic iuqede , airaztibrec neralapicnirp erodacifircaS ciroi ate , átapze ereb naçec iuqodi , aucse cirutaçnaua , cetab ciratenedaric niuqesuseI , ánuh atE
. nóiuqziuqec tol ate , naeniag nesuseI caucse netaztic raçe cirudlibruh naudrO ? nemeh zia natrec , áediuqsidA nóçeic narre cesuseI naudrO
. nóçeic niuge top atE . alaiuqad leh iugnV , áurtsigaM , naçec narre , anagsuseI cirudlibruh natreb atE
. irah etaztehctaç : ad aruh , tacuartiab neniuge top ere-iroN , aleoic , elangies neuarec name , caneuç neztidart aruh atE
. zetrap néonaicnA oculupop ate nélapicnirp erodacifircaS , niuqehv ate niuqetapze aidnah eztedneg niuqerah ate , nidec rohte , tab cirateibamah saduI , ánuh , alec oçnim oniaro aruh atE
. aneuan neztidart in ad udlibruh , ánuh : necaog , etzetiaç iuqiaI
. arateucse néothciag ad neztaruil aemeS neranoçiug ate , anero ad udlibruh , ánuh : etzetiaç asoper ate , oreugruag euçiuge oL , etsoid ate , arateulupicsid ereb ad netrohte naudrO
. aleutic netiarre careb ztih , naidla nereh naçec niuge ztiohto ate , nidec naoi zirreb , ceh ciriztv atE
. nedaric cautahtros caiugeb neyah nece : alaçnuad ol zirreb utid netiedire ciriluzti oreuG
. aetadnorov erih ideb niuge : neciab aladud netade aruh , cinagene nidad nagari ruah apoc adapze elbissop nidlab , átiA enE , aleuç netiarre , naçec niuge ztiohto ate , nidec naoi naidla nerragib zirreB
. ucalf aiugarah aniab , ad otpmorp autirips nece : natenoitatnet netzetiazte ras , euçiuge ztiohto ate euçaçe allieV
? niuqene euçud utalliev nice tabmero alerroH , isirreiP astoid ate : alaçnuad ol utid netiedire ate , arateulupicsid ad netrohte oreuG
. cih alon aniab , tutiab ihan cin alon ze ere-citagaicug : ruah apoc cinagene ideb nagari , adab elbissop nidlab , átiA enE , aleoic ate , aleuç netiuge ztiohto , nidec rai zepzoha , cinaoi ogaihcaniztia atE
. niuqene euçaçe alliev ate , nemeh eteduaç : onaroireh amira ene ad etsirt cirateicug edlA , cesuseI etsoid naudrO
. neztahciek zicug ate neztetsirt nidec sah , caemes ib neroedebeZ ate sirreiP cirutrah atE
. onadidiad ztiohto cinaoi ehcarah , nemeh etzetiaç raI , yeulupicsid etsoid ate : aratetab ukel ned neztied enameshteG niuqeh suseI nidec rohte naudrO
. netaçec narre ere-ceicug ulupicsid rebalaH . nerutakv tua ze , ere-tiuqadab raheb areztlih niuqerih nidlab erA , cesirreiP astoiD
. aläuan nerutakv naterurih nehel oniab naçed oi carrallio natenuh uag nece , tauard netiarre zaiugE , cesuseI astoiD
. aziladnacs cetiainze citiogai in , ere-zetidab aziladnacs natih caicuG , astoid cesirreiP aleud netsedrahi atE
. araelilaG zian nenaoi naeniztia neuç , naodno nidan aticsuser aniaB
. caidra ocedlahtra edarid nerutayerrab ate , aniaztra tud neroI , ad autabircs nece : natin eteraç nerutaziladnacs natenuh uag cóicug ceuÇ , cesuseI etsoid naudrO
. táridnem ocateztauilO necetic naoi cinarre aocitnac atE
. onarenuge nadud nenade aruh námuser neratiA eruen cirirreb niuqeuç , ciratenuh utcurf nehia tárah cidnemeh nenade aladutze nece , teustoidab atE
. natudnemakrab néutakeb aned netrussi citagneztihna aocirreb utnematseT lodo ene ad ruah necE
. cóicug ciratenuh euçaçe nadE , aleuç netiarre , néceic name , cirutadner caitarg ate , ápoc cirutrah atE
. aztuprog ene ad ruah , euçaçe nai , euçaçe raH , narre ate , yeulupicsid ereb néceic name ate , naçec stuah , cirutadner cáitarg ate , aiugo cesuseI naçec rah aledaric ahla ceh atE
. cud narre ciH , astoiD ? zian in , áurtsigaM , naçec narre , neuztiab neztidart aruh ceniec , cesaduI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. zilapze naçi uhtros nidlab crah noçiug neeuquç no : atiab neztidart aemeS neranoçiug zeniec naeniag nerah noçiug enoitcidelam aniab : alaçeb ned autabircs zaçrah aodab aemeS neranoçiug , rugeS
. uan nerutidart crah , naetalp oceztapmert aucse niuqene utiab netraçe croN , naçec narre aleuç netsedrahi crah aniaB
? anuaI , zian in alA , netiarre aredebtab cirateh nóiuqec sah ate , ztiugah necetic etsirt naudrO
. aleuan nerutidart cetab cirateuç nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE , naçec narre , aledaric ahla ceh atE
. niuqeibamah naeniaham nidec rai , naenec utsarra adaB
. aoczaB netaçec niappa ate , alaçeb neuarec utanedro cesuseI netaçec niuge céulupicsid atE
, niuqeulupicsid eruen aoczaB taid neniuge nahtiab ih , cud libruh árobmed enE , coic caurtsigaM , euçorre ate , anagniecode aririh etzaoÇ , neceic narre crah atE
? aoczaB aretai nugáçaid niappa cud ihan noN , aletastoic , anagsuseI caulupicsid necetic rohte naenuge nehel ocatseb néiugo ocirebag irragahctla atE
. taçnaçel idart aruh , nalibaç ahlib anicia citzoreug atE
. açep urid ramah ate yeugoh netózteic angissa ceh atE ? teuçuartiab nerutaruil yeuç aruh cin ate , euçatuard ihan name reC , etsoid atE
. aratelapicnirp erodacifircaS , anec neztied toiracsI saduI tab cirateibamah ad naçi naoi naudrO
. natoiromem nenuh ad nerutatnoc ere-aneud niuge cenuh , naicug udnum ruah oilegnauE atiab nerutaciderp ere-non , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. ud niuge táztocetzroho ene aetsuh areniag ztuproc ene nenuh utneugnv cenuh necE
. nenakv ihteb euçuanze in aniab : niuqeuç euçutid nenakv caerbuap ereihteb necE
. ud utarbo anagene tabmo arbo nece ? ruah etzame euçud neztagitaf citagreC , etsoid cesuseI cirutugaçe iroh atE
. yerbuap name ate , neeuqetaç laha udlas natidnah oicerp ruah utneugnv necE
? ruah utsaog ad ocatreC , aletioic néiuqec iztiag yeulupicsid nerah , cirissuki iroh atE
. areniag urub nerah , ate noge cirirrai aruh , naçec stuh ate , aleuç cirocatidnah oicerp utneugnv tabatyeob , tabetzame anagnerah nidec rohtE
, alec naehcte neraoyahros nomiS nainahteB suseI atE
. naetra neraulupop táçnetze cirotlumut , nátseb zE , netuç netiarre aniaB
. oceztlih ate ocetiamaztah nesuseI zaicenif netaçec iuqude ulliesnoc atE
. aralas neraned neztied sahpiaC lapicnirp erodacifircaS caonaicnA oculupop ate cábircS ate calapicnirp erodacifircaS edarid naçi udlib naudrO
. taçnidad acificurc aled nerutidart aemeS neranoçiug ate , aled netiuge oczaB näurub nenuge ib nece euçiuqadaB
. yeulupicsid ereb néceiztiab narre , caicug cuah soporp cesuseI naeneutic utabaca nidec ahtreug atE





























. arelanrete ezticiv caotsui aniab : arelanrete atnemrot cuah edarid nenaoi atE
. niuge euçatuartze ere-irin , naetabmeceb neuçacuartze niuge itab ciratuah neipihc teustoid zaiugE , aleud netiarre , euard neristedrahi naudrO
? utaztibrec uguaze ate , naiugednioserp ode , ire ode , icullib ode , ztorra ode , irrage ode essog ugua issuki zion , anuaI , aletud netiarre , etacuard neristedrahi ere-ceh naudrO
. utatisiv euçuanze ate , naiugednioserp ate ire : utitzev euçuanze ate , icullib : utibecer euçuanze ate , nécnin ztorrA
. aretade name euçatuartze ate , zian naçi irrage : aretai name euçatuartze ate , zian naçi essog necE
. areneuad cirutaraperp yèureugnia nerah ate iraurbaed , arus ocaluces cinagene etzetiaç itrap , cáutacidaraM , ere-yocerreuqze euard nenarre naudrO
: euçatuard niuge irin naetabmeceb neuçacuard niuge itab ciratuah néipihc eyana ene , teustoid zaiugE , euard nenarre ceugeR aleud netsedrahi atE
? anagerih arag irrohte ate naiugednioserp ode , ire ugua issuki zion odE
? ugua utitzev ate , icullib ode ? ugua utibecer ate , ztorra ugua issuki zion atE
? ugauard name aretade ate cirirrage ode : ugua utaczab ate , ciressog ugua issuki zion , anuaI , aletioid , céotsui etacuard neristedrahi naudrO
. eteraç naçi irrohte anagene ate , nécnin naiugednioserp : euçuan utatisiv ate , ire : euçuan utitzev ate , iculliB
, euçuan utibecer ate , necnin ztorra : aretade euçatuard name ate , zian naçi irrage : aretai euçatuard name ate zian naçi essog necE
. ámuser neuçiaç utaraperp citenoitadnuf neraudnum euçaçe atereh , cáutacideneb neratiA ene etzotaÇ yeoceniucse ereb ceugeR euard nenarre naudrO
. naerreuqze ereb carreka ate , naeniucse ereb caidra utid nerirraçe atE
. alaçeb neutid neztereb ciraterreka caidra caniaztra , ciratecreb catab utid nericereb ate , caicug enoitan areniztia nerah edarid nerudlib atE
. naonorht nerairolg ereb ad nerirrai naudro , niuqerah caicug udnias ureugniA ate , náirolg ereb naenerrohtad aemeS neranoçiug adaB
. stocsarrag ztroh ate ragin ad nenaçi nah : arebnuhli ocerokel euçaztoge arrefla iraztibrec atE
. óyaç neriuqede ere-aneud , iraneutze sued aniab : ud nenakv ogaiheug tabmah ate , óyaç nename iraicug neud necE
. iraneutid catnelat ramah euçome ate , atnelat inuh adab euçoçe iuqedE
. niuqerurucul aeruen neeuquniab utibecer cin cirirrohte ate , yerodaibmac äurid ene name nèuare raheb zareB
. naukel nadutze utayerrab aladud neztanagrakle ate : naukel nadutze niere aladud neztlib nece naiuqahab , áohcal ate áothciag iraztibreC , nóçeic narre caissuban ereb aleuç netsedrahi atE
. aerue cudab , ánuh : naerrul atnelat erih táid edrog cinaoi zerrudleb citagenuH
. alaud neztanagrakle naukel náutze utayerrab ate , alaud neztlib naukel náutze niere , alecni arrogog noçiug nece náin neztugaçe , áissubaN , astoid ere-caneuç utibecer tabtnelat cirirrohte aniaB
. náçnargela neraissuban erue ida ras : tua nerirraçe oceniag neraztihna , layel zia naçi naeniag neraitug , álayel ate áno iraztibrec , iugnV , caissuban ereb nóçeic narrE
. zaçeh taitic icabari agib ecreb , ánuh , cadiuqzuard name tnelat ib , áissubaN , astoid ere-caneutic utibecer catnelat ib cirirrohte oreuG
. naçnargela neraissuban erue ida ras : tua nerirraçe oceniag neraztihna , layel zia naçi naitug açuag : álayel ate áno iraztibrec , iugnV , caissuban ereb nóçeic narrE
. zaçeh taitic icabari tnelat zrob ecreb , ánuh , cadiuqzuard name tnelat zrob , áissubaN , aleoic , tnelat zrob ecreb nózteic atneserp caneutic utibecer catnelat zrob cirirrohte naudrO
. niuqeh ud netiuge utnoc ate , aissuban néyah iraztibrec ad netrohte näurub neraidnah arobmed atE
. äurid neraissuban ereb naçec edrog ate , naerrul naçec ruztia cinaoi caneuç utibecer tab aniaB
. agib ecreb naztic zabari , ere-caneutic utibecer agib rebalaH
. tnelat zrob ecreb naztic niuge ate , zaçeh naçec aciffart ate , aneutic utibecer catnelat zrob nidec naoi atE
. natreb tarerrokel nidec naoi ate : aruara neraicna ereb iraredebtab : tab iraecreb ate , agib iraecreb ate , tnelat zrob nózteic name iratab atE
. nézteiztiab name cano ereb ate , cairaztibrec ereb naztiztiab ied naetiaoi tarerokel ceniec , ad alaçeb tabmoçiug ruah açuag necE
. anero ze anuge ned nerirrohte aemeS neranoçiug euçiuqatze nece : adab euçaçe allieV
. neztugaçe tetzutiazte , teustoid zaiugE , oid , aleud netsedrahi crah aniaB
. cugaçei iuqeri , anuai , anuaI , aletioid ere-canigriv ecreb edarid netrohte adab oreuG
. áhtrob nidec stre ate , arateyetze niuqerah necetic ras canedaric tserp ate : aosops nidec rohte , aledaric netiaoi aretsore ceh atE
. ocadnoruec euçassore ate , aratenetud neztlas etzaoç citiztia aniab : neuç ate erug nugutze ocsa zerrudleb , zE , aletioic , cerruhuç netaçec stedrahi aniaB
. edarid netiugnuari cápmal erug nece : citoilo neuç euçugI , néceic narre yerruhuç céohre atE
. cápmal ereb netaztic niappa ate , caicug ceh anigriv necetic iuqiai naudrO
. areniztia nerah etzetiaç ikli , ad udleh aosops , ánuH , nidec niuge uhio natidreh-uag atE
. naztic rah caol ate , necetic elagol caicug , neuztiab necnareb aretrohte caosops alon atE
. niuqepmal ereb nateicnv ereb oilo netaçec rah cérruhuç aniaB
. niuqereb ciroilo rah netaçezte , naeztrah népmal ereb , céohrE
. ohre caçrob ate , ruhuç nedaric caçrob cirateh atE
: niuqenedarid ikli areniztia neraosops cirutrah cápmal ereb anigriv ramah ámuser ocatèurec ad nerutarapmoc naudrO

. stocsarrag ztroh ate ragin ad nenaçi nah : nerirraçe nautnoc netircopyh ate , aruh ud nericereb atE
: naenero naiuqatze ate , naenuge neutze etsv crah ad nerirrohte aissuban nerah iraztibreC
: niuqeidroh netade ate netai ate , neztahec nénugal iraztibrec idadab sah atE
: aretrohte caissuban ene ud neztaçuL , naeztohib ereb crah othciag iraztibrec açedab narre nidlab adaB
. aleud nerirraçe aruh oceniag néicug no ereb nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. aneud nenedire netiuge alah , naenerrohtad caissuban ereb aruh iraztibrec ad ustahoD
? taçneyed açnativ nárobmed yæh , aneud irraçe oceniag nerainiapmoc néllihtum caissuban , arruhuç ate alayel iraztibrec ad niec atE
. ad nerirrohte aemeS neranoçiug naudro neuçutze etsv nece : tserp eteduaç ere-ceuç ztocalaH
. iztv areztahluç aehcte ereb aleorilze ate , aleoril alliev , netiel rohte anioho zidla tiaog niec cáilimafatia iuqaelab nidlab nece , euçiuqai aruh atE
. ned ocetrohte anuaI neuç zudro rec euçiuqatze nece , adab euçaçe allieV
. neriztv aecreb ate , ad nerutibecer atab : nátorre etud nerohe ceugiB
. neriztv aecreb ate , ad nerutibecer atab : nádnal edarid nenaçi agib naudrO
. ere-aetrohte neraemeS neranoçiug ad nenaçi alah : oneeuqaztic namare caicug ate , onidec rohte aoibulid tugaçe netaçeztiapze atE
. onarenuge nidec ras nákra eoN , netiame zaçnocze ate nedariztiab necnocze , netade ate netuztiab netai natenuge oceniztia neraoibulid alon alah necE
. ere-aetrohte neraemeS neranoçiug ad nenaçi alah , canuge nereoN nedariztiab alon aniaB
. neciab careb catiA ene , ere-cèureugniA ocatèurec ze , iuqatze crohen , naetabmeceb ned zanero ate zaçrah nuge aniaB
. nenagari edaritze caztih ene aniab , edarid nenagari arrul ate äureC
. oneuqzetiad niuge coicug cuah açuag , ruah ednem nenagari aletze , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. aletad libruh nahtrob necé etiuqeniztiebla , caicug cuah açuag naeneuçiuqsucad ere-ceuç alaH
. aled libruh ádv euçiuqadab , neztatsoh ate naened neztacinin arrada nerah ai , aenoitarapmoc euçaçe saki citéztocif adaB
. onarererretzab ecreb néyah citetab retzab nèurec , cirateciah rual cautigele nerah etzutid nerudlib ate , niuqeridnah unios attepmort cäureugniA ereb utid nerirrogi atE
. niuqeridnah airolg ate erehtob nateyedoh ocurec aleuqrotad aemeS neranoçiug etud nerissuki ate , caicug uniel ocerrul edarid nerutingialp naudro ate : näurec aongis neraemeS neranoçiug ad nerutreuga naudro atE
. edarid nerutaraki caetuhtrev ocatèurec ate , citurec edarid nerirore carraçi ate , aiugre ereb caiugrahli nename utze ate , ad nerudnuhli aiuqzugi , naodno neraenoitalubirt ocateh nuge natreb atE
. ere-caonarra edarid nerudlib arah , aiuqsarras atiab nenaçi ere-non necE
. ere-aetrohte neraemeS neranoçiug ad nenaçi alah : onaretnediccO netsucare ate , citetneirO atiab netikli atsimtsihc alon alah necE
. stehnis aleuçaçetze : ad nateohctarbmag , áraH , ikli aletzetiazte , ad nautresed , áraH , euçaçeidab narre crohen nidlab zareB
. teuçuard narre citeniztia , ánuH
. irragicudes ere-neutiugele , zilab elbissop yab : ulucarim ate idnah ongis étud neniuge ate , causlaf atehporp ate , causlaf tsirhc edarid nerutahctla necE
. stehnis etaçeniztieblaze : nah ode , tsirhC nemeh ánuH , euçarradab crohen nidlab naudrO
. edarid nerutrubal ceh nuge , citagcautigele aniab , etialze aulas rohen ceh nuge edarilapze naçi utrubal nidlab atE
. nenaçi ze , onardniaro citestah néraudnum naçi atiapze cirocalon , ad nenaçi naudro aidnah enoitalubirt necE
. naenuge htabbaS ateze , näugen nétze aetiuge sehi neuç adab euçiuge ztiohtO
. nateh nuge nénetieuqud netiuqsodere ate nérroçi etzame ztiag-niahoD
. areztrah néudnemalliba ereb luzti tarelebiug idelieblaze , anetad nádnal atE
: aretiamare citehcte ereb nesued stuai idelieblaze , anetad naeniag ehcte atE
: tárateidnem etiugeliebla sehi , cénetarid naeduI naudrO
) açeb ida caneud neztucari ( aleogad naudnias ukel , aned naçi narre zátehporp leinaD , aenoitanimoba neraenoitalosed adab naeneuçassucaD
. anif ad ocirrohte naudro ate : nategainomitset yeicug enoitan , naosreuinv udnum ad nerutaciderp ruah oilegnauE ocamuser atE
. ad nerutaulas aruh , onarenif utiab nerutareuesrep cron aniaB
. aetatirahc neztihna ad nerutzoh , aetatiuqini atiab nerutacilpitlum nerec atE
. ztihna etud neruticudes ate edarid nerutahctla uslaf atehporp ztihna atE
. ud neristeztiag aecreb catab ate , ud nerutidart aecreb catab ate , ztihna edarid nerutaziladnacs naudro atE
. citaganeci ene eteraç nenaçi caiste ztiag zéicug edneg ate , etzutiaç nelih ate , aratenoitcilffa etzutiaç nerutaruil naudrO
. edarid caestah erolod caicug cuah aniaB
. arukel citukel caeztaraki rul ate , caetessog ate , caetirruçi edarid nenaçi ate : artnoc neramuser ámuser ate , artnoc neraenoitan aenoitan ad nerutahctla necE
. anif nenaçi oniaro atze aniab , edarid raheb niuge caicug cuah açuag nece : netzetiazte alburt euçuariugeb : castoh alreug ate cálreug euçutid nenuçne atE
. étud neruticudes ztihna ate : tsirhC zian iN , aletud netiarre , naeneci ene edarid nerirrohte ztihna necE
. netaztiazte icudes crohen euçuariugeB , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
? ad nenaçi cineranif neraudnum ate cineraetrohte erih ongis rec ate ? edarid nenaçi cuah açuag zion , cugarrE , aletioic , trappa caulupicsid nóiuqziuqec rohte , naeniag idnem ocateztauilO aleogec cirirrai aruh atE
. nidatze niugesed , naeniag nerairrah airrah nemeh nerutidleug atze , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge ? caicug cuah açuag euçiuqsucatzE , néceic narre cesuseI atE
. aretsucare irah néoicifide ocelpmet caulupicsid ereb nacziaç naçi udlibruh ate : nec neztariter suseI cirikli citelpmet atE












. aned netrohte naeneci neranuaI aled utacideneB , oneuçeuqarred tárah cidnemeh nerissuki euçuanze , teustoidab necE
. tresed aehcte neuç euçiaç neztidleug , árroH
? nakv ihan cutiapze ate , alaçeb neutid neztlib aripza nelageh caotihc ereb caollio , carruoah erih tutid nakv ihan udlib natetabmec , ánautid neztadipal cairrogi anagerih ate neztlih cátehporP , melasureI , melasureI
. areniag nenuh enoitan caicug cuah açuag edarid ocirrohte , teustoid zaiugE
. naetra neraeradla ate neraelpmet euçutiab nakv lih niec , aoconarelodo neraemes neraihcaraB airahcaZ , citelodo neraotsui lebA , aiçug otsui lodo ned naçi irussi naeniag nerarrul areniag néuç táçnerrohtaD
: aririh citirih nerutatucesrep ate , nateugoganys neuç euçutid nerutatoça uztab cirateh ate : nerutacificurc ate euçutid nelih uztab cirateh ate cábircS ate carruhuÇ ate cátehporP arateuç tutid netrogi cin , ánuh ztocalaH
? iraudnemegui ocanneheg etoiuqziaç neriruzti alon , cátsac arepiv , cáeuguS
. airruen nétia neuç euçaçe ahteb ere-ceuÇ
. aleteraç emes nénetzutid lih cátehporP nece , artnoc néurub nóruec euçud neztacifitset natalaH
. naelodo nétehporP nenaçi nugal néyah néniuqze , aniugab naçi natenuge nétia erug nidlaB , euçoid atE
. neztanro catnemunom néotsui ate , euçutid neztacifide caerhclupes nétehporP nece : cátircopyh uesirahP ate abircS naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. eteraç caehteb zetatiuqini ate zaisircopyh naenrab aniab , otsui eteraç netsucare yenoçiug citopmac ere-ceuç rebalaH
. edarid caehteb zoro nussatustas ate zerruçeh nélih citenrab aniab : edarid netsucare rede citopmac ceh , euçud iduri cautiruhc erhclupes nece : cátircopyh uesirahP ate abircS naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. táçnidad uhahc ere-aocopmac néyah , aocenrab neratalp ate nerapoc cinehel caçe uhahc , áusti uesirahP
. caehteb zessecce ate , zairebuarra edarid citenrab aniab : euçud neztuhahc aedla ocopmac neratalp ate nerapoc nece : cátircopyh uesirahP ate abircS naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. netseri aulemac ate : euçud netzari aoztle , cáusti iradiuG
. iztv ze ceh ate , nedaric raheb niuge cuah açuag : aetatlayel ate aidrociresim ate audnemegui , alon alah , caogauçip açuag oceugeL euçutid netiztv ate , aonimuc ate asina ate atnem euçutid neztamehcted nece : cátircopyh uesirahP ate abircS naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. zaneogad cirirrai naeniag nerah ate zaonorht neraocniaI ud neztarui , zäurec caneud neztarui atE
. zaned neztatibah natrah ate , zaçrah ud neztarui , zaelpmet utiab neztarui ere-cron atE
. zéicug açuag nedarid naeniag nerah ate , zaçrah ud neztarui , caneud neztarui zaeradla zareB
? aeradla neud neztacifitcnas aenoitalbo ala , aenoitalbo ogaidnah ad niec , cáusti ate cáohrE
. ad nudroç , zaenoitalbo ned naeniag nerah utiab nerutarui ere-cron aniab : sued atze , zaeradla utiab nerutarui ere-cron , euçud netiarre atE
? aelpmet neud neztacifitcnas aehrrv ala , aehrrv ogaidnah ad niec , cáusti ate cáohrE
. ad nudroç , zaehrrv ocelpmet utiab nerutarui ere-cron aniab : sued atze , zaelpmet utiab nerutarui ere-croN , euçoitiab céniec , cáusti iradiug naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. ogaera oniab coruec zálbod euçud netiuge emes ocanneheg , naened niuge ate , táçneuçiugad tabotylesorp , euçutid neztarugni arrohiel ate aossasti nece , cátircopyh uesirahP ate abircS naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. nerutibecer aogaidnah enoitanmednoc euçud ztocalah : ziduri niuge ztiohto iuqaçul era , caehcte nénugrahla ame euçutid netseri nece , cátircopyh uesirahP ate abircS naeniag neuç enoitcidelaM
. areztras netiztv euçutitze canedarid neztras ate , neztras eterazte ceuç nece : naeniztia nénoçiug ámuser ocatèurec euçutiab netsre nerec : cátircopyh uesirahP ate abircS naeniag neuç enoitcidelam aniaB
. ad nerutarog , aneud nerutareheb äurub ereb ate : ad nerutareheb , aneud nerutarog äurub ereb necE
. iraztibrec neuç zib , aned néidnah naetra neuç aniaB
. tsirhC , arotcod neuç ad tab nece : rotcod ied aletzetiazte atE
. aned natèurec , atiA neuç ad tab nece : naerrul ied rohen aleuçaçetze atia neuç atE
. eteraç eyana , coicug ceuç ate : tsirhC , arotcod neuç ad tab nece : urtsigaM ied aletzetiazte ceuç aniaB
. áurtsigaM , áurtsigaM iraetaçi uhtied zénoçiug ate , nateutakrem yenoitatulas atE
, nateugoganys yeridac nehel ate , nateteuqnab yecalp nehel étzirad no atE
. carretzab ocatednemitzev ereb étzutid neztaçul ate , caoiretcalihp ereb étzutid neztlabaç nece : táçnecetid suki zénoçiug étzutid netiuge caicug arbo ereb atE
. étzutitze ihan iuqnuh zaihre ereb aniab : aratenios nénoçiug netraçe ate , étzutid neztlib caneuqzetiad nice nassai ate cauçip agrac necE
. netiuge ze ate , étud netiarre nece : aleuçiugatze aruara nérbo néyah aniab : euçiuge ate euçaçe ariugeb , neuçaçed ariugeb euçuartiab nenarre adab erereC
: cauesirahP ate cábircS edarid netrai náridac nesesyoM , aleoiC
. yeulupicsid ereb ate yeztedneg neiuqec açnim suseI naudrO
. areztagorretni tarah zaçrah nuge cirogaiheug arutnev nóiuqezte rohen ze : ciztih noyoçeic stedrahi nice crohen atE
? emes nerah ad alon , nuaI aruh udab neztied ce-diuaD nidlab zareB
. allebacs nénio erih cayaste erih onadeuqaztid raçe , naeniucse ene ida raI , iranuaI ene canuaI , acuard narrE
, aleoid ? nuaI aruh ud neztied zutiripS ce-diuaD zareb aloN , etsoid atE
. ne-diuaD , etastoiD ? ad emes neron ? zetsirhC euçiaç iduri reC , aleoiC
, cesuseI naztic agorretni , cauesirahP naenedaric udlib atE
. cutid neztidneped cátehporP ate aicug eugeL ciratuah udnemanam iB
. alaçeb äurub erue aocruh erue cud neristehnO , cid iduri aruh canerragib atE
. aidnah ate anehel udnemanam cud ruaH
. zaicug udnemasnep erue ate , zaicug amira erue ate , zaicug ztohib erue anuaI ocniaI erue cud neristehnO , nóçeic narre cesuseI atE
? naeugeL aidnah udnemanam ad niec , áurtsigaM
, aleoic ate , aruh aleuç neztatnet , carotcod oceugeL , cetab cirateh naçec agorretni atE
. anagrakle necetic lib , aleutic udlihci cauecuddaS nece cinuçne , adab cauesirahP
. zánirtcod nerah necetic atnaps caeztedneg cinuçne iroh atE
. aneiciv aniab , aocniaI nélih atze , aocniaI ? aocniaI ne-bocaI ate , aocniaI ne-caasI ate , aocniaI nemaharbA zian iN
, aleoid , neuçiaç naçi narre zaocniaI rec irrucari euçutze , naetabmeceb ned zaenoitcerruser nélih atE
. alaçeb näurec cäureugniA neraocniaI edarid aniab : zaçnocze netiame ze neztrah ciretzame crohen utze naenoitcerruser necE
. zebag niuqai aetuhtrev neraocniaI ate cárutpircS euçud netiuge stuH , etsoid cesuseI aleud netsedrahi atE
. aruh éid nakv céicug nece ? ad nenaçi etzame neniec cirateipzaç , adab naenoitcerruseR
. ere-aetzame náideic lih naodno néicug atE
. onarenerragipzaç , canerragrurih ate canerragib rebalah atE
. ireyana ereb aetzame ereb naoçeic iztv , naeniag neraneuzte ciruniel ate : náideic lih cirudnocze anehel ate : eyana ipzaç naetra erug náutic atE
. ireyana ereb acuard neniuge uniel ate , aetzame nerah ud nerutrah citagaçnaila caeyana nerah , ebag nakv cirruoah adab lih tiebron nidlaB , cid narre cesesyoM , áurtsigaM , aletioiC
, netaçec agorretni ate , canetioid aletze cirenoitcerruser , cauecuddaS anagnerah necetic rohte natrah nugE
. necetic naoi ciriztv aruh ate : netaçec sterim , cinuçne iroh atE
. iraocniaI , canedarid neraocniaI ate : iraseC , canedarid neraseC zareb euçoztei adneR , euard netarre naudrO . aneraseC , etastoiD
? aubircs ate ruah anigami ad aneroN , euard netiarre atE
. taborenid netoçeic atneserp ceh atE . ádenom ocetubirt euçatsucarE
? catircopyh euçuan neztatnet citagreC , oid , áitilam neyah cesuseI cirutugaçe atE
? ze ala , aetiame neratubirt iraseC ad oczedib ? ciaç iduri rec , adab cugarrE
: áheb araitnerappa nénoçiug ogaze nece : aláutze ciraisna nerohen ate , aláud netsacari iuqzaiuge aedib neraocniaI ate , alecia itaiuge ugaiuqaecab , áurtsigaM , aletioid , niuqeonaidoreH caulupicsid ereb anagnerah etzutid netrogi atE
. naeztih netioril namaztah aruh alon netaçec rah ulliesnoc céuesirahP cirutatrappa naudrO
. cautigele itug ate , cauhtied edarid ztihna necE
. stocsarrag ztroh ate ragin ad nenaçi nah : arebmuhli ocopmac euçaztoge ate , euçaçe nek , cirutacetse nateucse ate nateniO , yeiraztibrec ceuger néceic narre naudrO
. nóiuqec açob aoha atE ? alautze áporra yetze zia uhtras anuh alon , áediuqsidA , astoid naudrO
. cinezte autitzev zaporra yetze tabmoçiug nah naçec suki , aretsuki néneduec cirirrai naeniaham euger naenec uhtras atE
. zéneduec cirirrai naeniaham , aukel néyetze nidec ehteb ate : cano alon caothciag tabmah , caicug netzutic nedire netaztic lib , aratedib cirikli ceh iraztibrec atE
. arateyetze euçazti ied caicug neuçutid nenedire ate , arateniotnac edib adab etzaoÇ
. naçi engid edaritze , canedaric utatimog aniab , edaridab tserp cayetzE , yeiraztibrec ereb etsoid naudrO
. naçec arre airih neyah ate , ceh eliahreciug naztic niugesed , casemradneg ereb cirirrogi ate : nidec érressa iroh cinuçne euger atE
. netaztic lih ate airuini cairaztibrec nerah cinamaztah cécreb atE
. táraoglatakrem ereb aecreb ate , taradrob ereb atab : necetic naoi ebag niuge cirutnoc ceh aniaB
. arateyetze etzotaç : ad tserp aicug ate , edarid utatieuqarah caudneciug yeuqarah ate canecec ene , airaczarab eruen tud utatserppa , ánuH , yeutatimog euçerrE , aleoic , ciriraztibrec ecreb naçec rogi zirreB
. naçi ihan irrohte nedarizte aniab : areztied néutatimog arateyetze cairaztibrec ereb naztic rogi atE
. niuqetab euger neutic niuge cayetze neraemes ereb , ámuser ocatèurec ad utarapmoC
. aleoic , zenoitarapmoc néiuqec açnim zirreb , aleuç netsedrahi suseI naudrO
. netacudaztiab aruh alaçeb atehporP nerec , nedaric naçi rudleb neraulupop , ciraletuç ihan namaztah atE
. alec oçnim zaçeh nece netaçec tugaçe , caenoitarapmoc nerah céuesirahP ate , célapicnirp erodacifircaS naenetaztic nuçne atE
. nerutahehc ud aruh , atiab nerirore areniag neron ate : ad nerutacihtaç , aned nerirore areniag nerah irrah atE
. iraulupop neutid neniuge cautcurf ocatrah , aloyaç nename ate , ámuser neraocniaI aleuçiaç neriuqede nece teustoid ztocalaH
? naeniztia néiugeb erug airragarim açuag ad ate , ad naçi niuge zanuaI ruaH : ad naçi niuge urub niotnac airrah netud utayubra célaçacifidE , naterutpircS irrucari euçutze onadnugE , cesuseI etsoiD
. nerutacola aitsaham ereb irirarobal ecreb netoyozteid adner cautcurf naeniosas ereb ate : neniugesed iuqziag ceh othciaG , etastoiD
? yæh irarobal èuard neniuge rec caebai itsaham adab naenerrohtaD
. netaçec lih ate , aropmac cititsaham netaçec ztiari aruh cirutrah atE
. iraegatereh nenuh naztehctag ate , ruah nugaçed lih , etzotaç , aumirp ad ruaH , naetra ereb netaçec narre aemes cirissuki céirarobal aniaB
. aemes ene etud nerutardnO , aleuç netiarre , aemes ereb arateh naçec rogi naeneuqzA
. néceic niuge rebalah iæh ate , ogaiheug oniab canehel ciriraztibrec ecreb naçec rogi zirreB
. adipal aecreb ate , lih aecreb ate , netaçec truaç atab , cairaztibrec nerah cirutrah céirarobal atE
. areztibecer néutcurf , arateirarobal cairaztibrec ereb naztic rogi , naenec udlibruh aniosas néutcurf adaB
. nidec naoi taropmac ate : yeirarobal néceic acola ate , taberrod naçec acifide ate , táztocal naçec niuge tabiboh natrah ate , naçeztiab arugni zisseh aruh ate , tabitsaham naçeztiab adnal ceniec , tabailimafatia neC . euçuçne tabenoitarapmoc ecreB
. aretsehnis nerah , oreug utadneme eterazte , cirissuki iroh ceuç ate : etud nakv istehnis cédralliap ate céonacilbup aniab : istehnis aruh euçutze ate , zaedib oczaititsui arateuç sennaoI ad irrohte necE
. aramuser neraocniaI aleuçiuqziaç necniztia cádralliap ate caonacilbup nece teuçuard netiarre zaiugE , cesuseI etsoiD . caneheL , etastoiD ? aetadnorov neratia ereb neuç niuge ceniec ciratuah iB
. naoi nidezte atE , anuai caohin iN , naçec narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE . rebalah nóçeic narre , anagaecreb cirudlibruh oreuG
. nidec naoi , cirutiuqirrv oreug aniab : ihan taitzE , naçec narre aleuç netsedrahi craH
: naitsaham ene ida alliabart nuge , libah émeS , naçec narre , anaganehel cirudlibruh ate : emes ib neutic cetab noçiuG , euçiaç iduri rec aniaB
. nadutid netiuge cuah açuag zetatirohtua rec netiarre ere-cin teuçuartzE , ere-crah néceic narrE . ugaiuqaeztE , netaçec narre , isuseI aletocuarec netsedrahi atE
. natatehporP sennaoI etacudad céicug nece : neranummoc arag rudleb : ciratenoçiuG , ugarradab nidlab atE
? istehnis eucutze aruh adab citagreC , ucuard nenarre : citureC , ugaçedab narre nidlaB , aletioic , nahtiab careb netacudrahicab ceh atE ? ciratenoçiug ala citurec ? nec cidnon aomsitpaB nesennaoI
. nadutid netiuge cuah açuag zetatirohtua rec , teuçuard nenarre ere-cin euçadarradab niec , zetab açuag ceuç ere-cin tetzutiaç nerutagorretnI , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahI
? iroh etatirohtua cuard name irih cron ate ? cutid netiuge cairoh açuag zetatirohtua reC , aletioic , anagnerah necetic rohte , alec ira netsacari aruh , caonaicnA oculupop ate calapicnirp erodacifircaS , arelpmet naenec irrohte atE
. euçud nerutibecer , aleuçud netsehnis naenoitaro euçutiab neniuge edlag ererec atE
. ad neniuge arossasti ida ztiari ate , ida nehK , euçorradab inuh idnem nidlab era aniab , euçud neniuge anoyaç naçi niuge iraeztocif tnemalos ze , euçaçedapze adud ate , euçudab edef nidlab , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
? aeztocif ad naçi utrahye natreb nataloN , aletioic , netaçec sterim céulupicsid cirissuki iroh atE
. aeztocif natreb nidec rahye atE . naluces alidatze ros cinagerih cirutcurf ogaiheuG , astoid ate : neciab cirotsoh nedire natrah sued naçezte ate , aratrah nidec rohte , naeniag neraedib tabeztocif cirissuki atE
. nidec essog , alec neztluzti táririh naeciog atE
. nah naçec rah utatso ate : tarainahteB aropmac citirih nidec ikli , ciriztv ceh atE
. aoirodual cud nakv utilpmoc citoha nénetud netiuqsode ate nérruoaH , irrucari onadnuge euçutze : yaB , néceic narre cesuseI atE ? nétioid rec cuah cuçnadaB , netoçeic narre atE
. néiuqec iztiag : áemes ne-diuaD annasoH , aletuç netiarre ate , naelpmet aleduec zuhio ocarruoah ate , caulucarim neutic niuge crah cébircS ate célapicnirp erodacifircaS cirissuki aniaB
. ceh naztic adnes ate : naelpmet cäugniam ate causti anagnerah necetic rohte naudrO
. euçud niuge ecel niugathciag aruh ceuç aniab : ad neruhtied ehcte ocatenoitaro , aehcte enE , ad autabircS , etsoid atE
. cáridac nenetzutic neztlas cábmoloc ossv ate , naztic luzti caniaham nérodaibmac ate : caicug nedaric ira netsore ate neztlas naelpmet aropmac naztic ztoge ate , naelpmet neraocniaI suseI nidec ras atE
. oceterazaN ned naelilaG átehporP suseI ad ruaH , neuç netiarre caulupop atE
? ruah ad roN , aleoic , nidec iuom aicug etatiuic , nemelasureI aruh naenec uhtras atE
. ánecia natenerog ukel annasoH , aned netrohte naeneci neranuaI aled utacideneb : áemes ne-diuaD annasoH , aleoic , neogec zuhio aulupop nec netiuqierrai ate netiaoi naeniztia atE
. neztadeh naedib ate , ciraterobra netzutic neztaccip carrada cécreb ate , naedib caudnemalliba ereb netaztic adeh cidnah eztedneg atE
. naeniag néyah netaçec icare rai ate , caudnemalliba ereb naeniag néyah netaztic raçe ate , aemv ate aotsa netaztic rake atE
. alaçeb nèuarec utanedro cesuseI netaçec niuge ate , necetic naoi adab caulupicsiD
. airrai naeniag nerarra emv neraocirratzv ate , neraeme otsa ate , cirosnam niaç netrohte aeuger erue , ánuH , irabala ognoiS euçorrE
, aleoic , táçnidel ilpmoc anec narre zátehporP ad naçi niuge aicug ruah adaB
. ceh utid nerirrogi natreb nece : aleutid raheb canuaI nece euçarre , euçarradab sued crohen nidlab atE
. euçadaztei rake cirutahcal : niuqerah tabemv ate , autacetse tabeme otsa euçud nenedire natreb ate , arugrub ocakrua neuç etzaoÇ , aleuarec netiarrE
, ulupicsid ib naztic rogi cesuseI naudro , aredla idnem ocateztauilO , aregahphteB naenecetic rohte ate , naenedaric aredla emelasureI atE












. nóiuqziuqec iuqierrai irah ate , céiugeb néyah netaçec ibecer aetsuki natreb ate : caiugeb néyah naztic iuqnuh cesuseI cirutrah enoissapmoc atE
. necetid iuqeri caiugeb erug , anuaI , etostoiD
? nadeuçiugad euçud ihan reC , naçec narre ate , naztic ied cesuseI cirutidleug atE
. ánuaI emes ne-diuaD zaçug etateip cuA , aletioic , netuç netiuge ogaiheug uhio ceh aniab , táçnecetil lihci ceh neutic neztahctahem caeztedneg atE
. ánuaI emes ne-diuaD zaçug etateip cuA , aletioic , netaçec niuge uhio , alec netiagari suseI nece cinuçne , ceneduec naerretzab edib usti ib , ánuh atE
. nóiuqec iuqierrai idnah eztedneg , aledaric neztitrap citocireI ceh atE
. aretiame citagneztihna natenioçnar neraiciv ereb ate , areztaztibrec aniab , aretaçi utaztibrec irrohte atiapze aemeS neranoçiug alon alaH
. iraztibrec neuç zib , naçi nehel naetra neuç atiab nenaçi ihan ere-ron atE
: lihtum neuç zib , naetra neuç atiab nenaçi ihan idnah ere-ron aniab : naetra neuç nenaçi alah atze aedrO
. naenyag néyah aletud neztasv zetatirohtua céidnah ate : naeniag neyah aletud neztairongies céicnirp ocatenoitan nece euçiuqadaB , oid , ciruhtied anagereb ceh adab cesuseI
. zéyana ib necetic ztiakeb carramah ecreb cinuçne aruh atE
. yenèuad cirudniappa zatiA ene eyaç nename aniab , ocetiame ene atze , aetrai naerreuqze ode naeniucse ene aniab : eteraçab nerutayehtab zaomsitpab nécian nerutayehtab in ate , euçudab nenade ápoc enE , etsoid naudrO
. yaB , etostoiD ? zaomsitpab necian nerutayehtab in eteuqzetiaç laha ayehtab atE ? apoc nadud ocetade cin euçorid laha nade : neteduaç zeuqse nerec euçiuqatzE , naçec narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. námuser erih , naerreuqze aecreb ate , naeniucse erih atab , cuah emes ib ene necetid rai caçe anedrO , óstoiD ? nud ihan reC , nóçeic narre crah atE
. aloyaç neztacse tiabrec ate , neztrug , niuqemes ereb áma nemes neroedebeZ anagnerah nidec rohte naudrO
. ad nerutaticsuser naenuge ocenereh aniab : taçnetaçed acificurc ate , atoça ate , ainracse , yelitneG nerutaruil etud aruh atE
: areztlih etud nerutanmednoc aruh ate , yebircS ate yelapicnirp erodacifircaS eyaç nerutaruil aemeS neranoçiug ate , aremelasureI arag netiagi , ánuH
, néceic narre ate , naedib trappa caulupicsid ibamah naztic rah , naetiagi aremelasureI cesuseI atE
. cautigele itug aniab , cauhtied edarid ztihna nece : neuqza , canehel ate : nehel , caneuqza edarid nenaçi alaH
? zianiab no in nerec , ad othciag aiugeb erih ala ? zéno eruen aretiuge neranadud ihan uçiah zianze alA
. tabmeceb yab irih , name inuh neuqza tacoraid ihan aniab : libah ate , aned erih caçe raH
? utadrocca niuqene natetab orenid zia ze : netiuge cirebagedib irih täuartze , áediuqsidA , nóçeic narre itab cirateh aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
. aoreb ate , ágrac neranuge ugutiab irrake , cutid niuge nidrab erug ate , naenal éid niuge tabmero cuah neuqzA , aletioiC
, artnoc nerailimafatia netuç neztarumrum , naenetuç utibecer atE
. ánab orenid ere-ceh netaçec ibecer aniab : aletuç nerutibecer ogaiheug etud nakv etsv , ere-cénehel cirirrohte atE
. anab orenid netaçec ibecer cautacola näurugni nenero acemah naenedaric irrohte atE
. onaratenehel cirateneuqza cirissah , äuriacola cécei agap ate , caeliugnal cazti ieD . iraerodibecer ereb caebai itsaham nóçeic narre , naenec utsarra atE
. euçud nerutibecer anetad edib ate , aritsaham ene ere-ceuç etzaoÇ , etsoiD . utacola utiauqiapze crohen nereC , etastoiD
? refla naicug nuge eteduaç nemeh citagreC , etsoid ate , uztab neduec refla ecreb naztic nedire , cirikli näurugni nenero acemah atE
. naereb edlom naçec niuge , näurugni nénero iztardeb ate yes cirikli zirreB . necetic naoi ceh atE
. teuçuard nename anetad edib ate , aritsaham ene ere-ceuç etzaoÇ , néceic narre atE
. náçalp uztab neduec refla ecreb naztic suki , näurugni nénero rurih cirikli atE
. aritsaham ereb naztic rogi , ocenuge natetab orenid cirutadrocca niuqeliugnal atE
. taztocitsaham ereb areztacola eliugnal naiugeb neraiugra atiab naçi ikli niec , niuqetab ailimafatia ámuser ocatèurec ad utarapmoc , necE





. nehel , caneuqza ate : neuqza edarid nenaçi , canedarid nehel ztihna aniaB
. nerutatereh alanrete ezticiv ate , aleud nerutibecer tabmah natenuhe , zasuac neraneci ene ciradnal ode , cirruoah ode , aetzame ode , ama ode , atia ode , ciraberra ode , cireyana ode , cirehcte euqutiab iztv ere-cron atE
. caunniel ibamah ocelearsI aleuçutid neztaegui , naeniag néonorht ibamah ere-ceuç aleteraç nerirrai , naonorht neraetatseiam ereb aemeS neranoçiug naened nerirrai naenoitareneger , cónetadiuqziaç iuqierrai irin ceuç nece , teustoid zaiugE , néceic narre cesuseI atE
? erug zareb ad nenaçi rec : irih ciuqziaztiag iuqierrai ate , caicug açuag ugaitic iztv cug , ánuH , nóçeic narre cesirreiP aleuç netsedrahi naudrO
. edarid elbissop caicug açuag nahtiab aocniaI aniab : ad elbissopmi iroh nahtiab canoçiuG , néceic narre , cirutaheb tarateh cesuseI atE
? cinetiad laha aulas zareb ad roN , aletioic , ztiugah necetic atnaps caulupicsid nerah cinuçne cuah açuaG
. nidad ras námuser neraocniaI astarba ze nece , nidad nagari citohluhc neraztarro tabelbac aled ogahcarre , teustoid zirreb atE
. námuser ocatèurec aled neruhtras zeuqen astarba nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE , yeulupicsid ereb néceic narre cesuseI naudrO
. neutic caidnah no nece : ciretsirt nidec naoi , iroh ztih cerroetzag noçiug naeneuç nuçne atE
. irin tierra , rohta ate : näurec tabruaseht cud nenakv ate : yerbuap cécei name ate , anaud caçe las , aho , ziahab ihan naçi tcefrep nidlaB , cesuseI óstoiD
? tiaç atlaf oniaro rec : citenussatetzag eruen taitic utariugeb caicug cairoH , cerroetzag noçiug óstoiD
. alaçeb äurub erue aocruh erue cud neristehnO , atE . ama ate atia caztiarohO
. nenarre ciruslaf egainomitset cutzE , neristabe cutzE , nerutaretluda cutzE , nelih cutzE naçec narre cesuseI atE ? nieC , óstoiD
. caudnemanam caztiariugeb , ziahab ihan uhtras naezticiv nidlab : aocniaI , aruh ate , neciab tab cino rohen cutze ? no cuan neztied citagreC , nóçeic narre crah atE
? taçnadud alanrete ézticiv tud neniuge iugnv rec , áno urtsigaM , nóçeic narre cirudlibruh cetiebmec , ánuh atE
. cidnah nidec itrap , naenetzuarec irraçe naeniag caucse atE
. ámuser ocatèurec ad néocalenuh nece : ahctapme aleuçaztitze citetrohte anagene ate , caohctruoah euçaztiztV , etsoid cesuseI aniaB
. netaztic ahctahem ceulupicsid ate : taçnaiugel ztiohto ate taçnezteil raçe naeniag caucse nacziaç naçi utatneserp caohctruoah naudrO
. açeb rah , canaçed laha raH . canetzutid nakv utarikihc cäurub ereb citagamuser ocatéurec cautarikihc edaridab ate : canedarid naçi utariklihc zénoçiug , cautarikihc edaridab ate : canedarid naçi oyai alah citelebas nerama cautarikihc edaridab necE
. céneyaç naçi name aniab , ruah ztih netseidra céicug etutzE , néceic narre crah aniaB
. aecnocze no cutze , aiuqraheb ocaliuqeraetzame neranoçiug adab ocalroh nidlaB , céulupicsid ereb etastoiD
. aleeuqud netiuquai oiretluda canetad nerudnocze niuqeraned iztv ate : aleud netiuquai oiretluda , atiab nerudnocze niuqetab ecreb ate , neciab citagaçidralliap , aetzame ereb utiab neriztv ere-cron nece teuçuard netiarre atE
. alah nézte citestah aniab : aretiztv nétzame neuç euçuard utittemrep citaganussatrogog oceztohib neuç cesesyoM , etsoiD
? aretiztv nerah ate , aretiame nerartel ocenoitarapes ud nakv utanam cesesyoM zareb citagreC , etastoiD
. arapes alaçetze canoçiug , aneud utatcnui caocniaI zareB . tabiugarah aniab , agib edaritze cirogaiheug adaB
. tabiugarah caib edarid nenaçi ate , iraetzame ereb óyaç nerutatcnui ate , ama ate atia canoçiug utid neriztv ztocalaH , aleuç narre atE
? aeme ate arra aleutic niuge citestah caelaçaerC nece irrucari euçutzE , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah aniaB
? citagasuac ereniece aetzame ereb canoçiug orid laha iztV , aletastoic ate , aletuç neztatnet cauesirahP anagnerah necetic rohte naudrO
. nah naztic adnes ate , idnah eztedneg nóiuqec iuqierrai atE
. zaedla ecreb neranadroI , araterretzab ocaeduI nideztiab rohte ate , citaelilaG nideztiab itrap cirutabaca cuah soporp suseI , nidec ahtreug atE
. euçozteidapze akrab cátlaf citogog ireyana ereb caredebtab nidlab , yeuç euçuard neniuge ere-caned natèurec atiA ene alaH
. onoeuqaçeil agap aicug nacuarec roç irah , néceic name aruh yetnaegras canuai ereb ciruterressa naudrO
? alaçeb nadud nakv etateip zaçih ere-cin , raheb nakv etateip zaediuq-iraztibrec erue ere-cih aneua-zE
: catuartiab niuge ztiohto nerec , tauard utattiuq aicug aruh roç , áothciag iraztibreC , astoid canuai ereb ciruhtied aruh naudrO
. aicug nec naçi niuge iranuai ereb netoçeic aralced cirirrohte ate : ztiugah necetic etsirt , nec naçi niuge rec cédiuq-iraztibrec nerah cirissuki adaB
. oneoril agap arroç , naenioserp aruh naçec raçe cinaoi citiztia , nakv ihan niuge neuzte crah aniaB
. tauard nerutagap aicug ate , anagene aitneitap cuA , aleoic , nacuarec netiuge ztiohto ciriztoge äurub ereb aratenio nerah caediuq-iraztibrec ereb atE
. zanaud roç caçen agaP , aleoic , neuç neztohti cinamaztah aruh ate : cinacuarec roç orenid nuhe , tab ciratediuq iraztibrec ereb naçec nedire cenuh iraztibrec cirikli aniaB
. noçeic attiuq arroç ate , naçec iztv , canuai nerah iraztibrec cirutrah enoissapmoc naudrO
. táuard nerutagap aicug ate , anagene aitneitap cua , anuaI , aleoic , aruh neuç neztacilppus ciriztoge arerrul äurub ereb cenuh iraztibrec ztocalaH
. nidel agap arroç ate : caicug açuag neutic ate , carruoah ate , aetzame nerah ate , aruh nidel las canuai nerah naçec anam , agap cidnon neuztiapze crah nerec atE
. cinacuarec roç irah tnelat allim-ramah , tab nóiuqec atneserp , naenec issah netiuge utnoc atE
. niuqetab euger neud nakv ihan niuge utnoc niuqeiraztibrec éreb ámuser ocatèurec utarapmoc ad ztocalaH
. onaraterramah ate yeugorurih natipzaç aniab , onaratipzaç tássoitzE , CESVSEI óstoiD
? onaratipzaç ala ? tacuard nerutakrab ate , ceyana ene artnoc ene ud neniuge utakeb onaratetabmec , anuaI , naçec narre cesirreiP cirudlibruh anagnerah naudrO
. naetra néyah zian nah , naeneci ene cirudlib rurih ode agib edaritiab non necE
. zaned nateurec atiA ene aleyaç neniuge aicug açuag necetid acse , naeniag nerarrul etaçedab itnesnoc ceugib cirateuç nidlab nece teustoid zirreB
. näurec ad nenaçi autahcal , naerrul euçutiab nerutahcal ere-rec ate : näurec ad nenaçi auhtol , naerrul euçutiab neruhtol ere-rec , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. alaçeb onacilbup ate onagap acudehiebla , óyaçapze neztaheb iraçilE nidlab ate : iraçilE córre , eyaçapze neztaheb yæh nidlab atE
. taçned umref aicug ztih naoha neroinomitset rurih ode agib : agib ode tab oniaro niuqerue cazti rah , ciaçapze neztaheb nidlab aniaB
. aeyana erue cud icabari , ciaçab neztaheb nidlab : naetra nerareb nerah ate erih , aruh caçe idneherper ate aho , udab utatlaf artnoc erih ceyana erih nidlab atE
. nidad lag tab ciratuah ipihc aetadnorov neraned natèurec atiA neuç atze rebalaH
. zenedarizte utaleberre izteremeh ate yeugorual ze nece , zaçrah aleud ogaiheug oiraczob nece teuçuard netiarre zaiuge , aruh naçed nedire idadab ahtreug nidlab atE
? neztahlib anec utaleberre utze cinaoi arateidnem ate , netiztv caizteremeh ate yeugorual utitze , idadab aleberre tab cirateh ate , utidab idra nuhe cetab noçiug nidlab ? euçiaç iduri reC
. areztaulas neranec udlag aemeS neranoçiug ad naçi irrohte necE
. aetrahtiugeb neraned nateurec atiA ene aletassucad ereihteb cèureugniA neuah teuçuard netiarre nece : tab ciratuah ipihc neuçaçetze aicerpsonem euçuariugeB
. nida ztiari aranneheg ocus alautid caiugeb ib ze nece , nida ras naezticiv niuqeratab iugeb , erih cud eboh : cinagerue caztiari ate , aruh cacodi , uahab neticare acubert caiugeb erue nidlab atE
. nida ztiari aranneheg ocus aláutid canio ib ode caucse ib ze nece , nida ras naezticiv nudztiokabucse ode cirugniam , erih cud eboh , cinagerue caztiari ate aruh caçe acnert uahab neticare acubert canio erue ode caucse erue atenidlaB
. atiab netrohte oladnacs zeniec , irah noçiug enoitcidelam ere-ciradab , necotad caoladnacs ad oirassecen nece : zasuac néoladnacs iraudnum enoitcidelaM
. naerradnuh sasti nidel adnuh ate , tabirrah atorre-otsa naoppel ereb nóiuqel akrv euqul eboh crah , tab ciratuah ipihc netud netsehnis nahtiab in utiab nerutaziladnacs ere-cron aniaB
. uan neztibecer in , naeneci ene tabohctruoah ocalenuh utiab nerutibecer ere-cron atE
? námuser ocatèurec aneidnah ad aruh , alaçeb ned ruah ohctruoah utiab nerutailimuh äurub ereb adab ere-croN
. námuser ocatèurec neruhtras eterazte , etzetiaçapze acalaçeb caohctruoah ate , etzetiaçapze itreunoc nidlab , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE , naçec narre atE
. naetra néyah aruh naçec raçe , cesuseI anagereb tabohctruoah ciruhtied atE
? namuser ocatèurec aneidnah ad roN , aletioic , caulupicsid anagsuseI necetic rohte naereb natrah udrO








. citagerih ate citagene cécei name aruh cirutrah : tabaretats cutiab nenedire ciriuqeri aoha nerah ate , caçe rah aniarra ned nenagi nehel ate : äuma caztoge , cinaoi arossasti , táçnugaztitze aziladnacs aniaB
. carruoah cutid erbil zareB , cesuseI astoiD . cirateocatecreB , cesirreiP astoiD
? cirateocatecreb ala , ciraterruoah éreb ? calliat ate catubirt étzutid neztrah cinagneron céuger ocerruL ? ciaç iduri rec , nomiS , aleoic , SVSEI nóiuqec niztia , naenec naçi uhtras naehcte atE . yaB , oiD
? neztagap utitze cámhcardid caurtsigam neuÇ , netoçeic narre ate , canetzutic neztibecer cámhcardid anagsirreiP necetic rohte , aremuanrepaC naenedaric naçi irrohte atE
. ztiugah necetic etsirt ate : ad nerutaticsuser naenuge ocenereh aniab : aruh etud nelih atE
: arateucse nenoçiug atiab nerutaruil aemeS neranoçiug , ad nenaçI , cesuseI néceic narre , aletuç neztasv naelilaG ceh atE
. neciab zerurab ate zenoitaro netikli atze ruah atom urbaed aniaB
. nenaçi cirelbissopmi sued euçiazte ate , ad nenagari ate : arah cidnemeh ida nagerI , inuh idnem euçacuard nenarre , euçudab edef tabmeceb ned tabihib adratsum nidlab , teustoid zaiuge nece : citagaebag etsehnis neuÇ , neceic narre cesuseI atE
? aruh ugud nakv iztoge aropmac nice cug citagreC , netoçeic narre céulupicsid trappa anagsuseI cirirrohte naudrO
. cinadnaudro allihtum nidec adnes ate : cinagnerah nidec ikli ate , cesuseI aurbaed naçec ahctahem atE
. anuh aruh euçadrake ? tetzutiaç nerutatropus naenif onardzion ? zian nenaçi niuqeuç naenif onardzion , áirruhib ate aebag etsehnis enoitan O , naçec narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. éid utadnes nice ate , yeulupicsid erih aruh taeuarid utatneserp atE
. arerv ziam ate , arus cud netrore ziam nece : neztatnemrot iuqziag ate cud ocitanul nece , zaemes ene etateip cua , anuaI , aleoic atE
, alec neztaciruahleb naeniztia nerah , tabmoçiug anagnerah nidec rohte , anagaulupop naenedaric irrohte atE
. aleuarec narre zátsitpaB sennaoI nece céulupicsid netaçec ida naudrO
. cirateh ud nerutirffus ere-caemeS neranoçiug alah : aicug netud nakv ihan zaçrah etud niuge aniab , nakv utugaçe etutze aruh ate , aled irrohte ai sailE nece teuçuard netiarre aniaB
: caicug açuag utid ocarutats ereb ate , nehel adab nerirrohte sailE , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
? irrohte nehel aled raheb sailE nece etud netiarre cébircS zareb citagreC , aletioic , céulupicsid ereb netaçec agorretni atE
. onetiad aticsuser ciratelih aemeS neranoçiug , aenoisiv aleuçorretze iroheN , aleoic , cesuseI naztic anam , aledaric netsuai citidnem atE
. neciab areb suseI suki netaçezte rohen caiugeb ereb cirutitiog atE
. rudleb aleterazte ate , etzetiaç iuqiaI , néceic narre ate , ceh naztic iuqnuh cesuseI cirirrohte naudrO
. ztiugah necetic tici ate , areniag nétrahtiugeb ereb , neçetic rore caulupicsid cinuçne iroh atE
: etoiuqziuqaç aheb inuh : tutiab neztrah ano niugesta eruen nateniec , aetiam emeS ene ad ruaH , aleoic , citeyedoh tabzov ánuh ate : ceh naztic latse cetab iugra yedoh , ánuh , alec oçnim aruh oniarO
. nesailE tab ate , nesesyoM tab ate , erih tab , elcanrebat rurih nemeh nugaztid niuge , cudab ihan : nérag nemeh ug cud no , anuaI , isuseI nóçeic narre cesirreiP aleuç netsedrahi atE
. aledaric oçnim niuqerah sailE ate sesyoM netaztic suki , ánuh atE
. alaçeb aiugra necetic iruhc caudnemalliba nerah ate , alaçeb aiuqzugi aetrahtiugeb nerah nidec iugra ate , naeniztia néyah nidec arugifsnart atE
. aratetab arog idnem trappa naztic namare ate , aeyana nerah sennaoI ate seuqcaI ate sirreiP cesuseI naztic rah , näurub nenuge yes atE
. onetiorid suki netrohte aramuser ereb aemeS neranoçiug , cinetutze nerutatsad aoireh , uztab ciratenedarid tneserp nemeh edaridab , teustoid zaiugE
. aruara nérbo ereb iraredebtab acuard nerutadner naudro ate : niuqèureugniA ereb náirolg neratiA ereb ad nerirrohte aemeS neranoçiug necE
? natudnemasnepmocer neramira ereb canoçiug ud nename rec ode ? açedab lag amira ereb ate , açedab zabari aicug udnum nidlab canoçiug ud uhcteborp rec necE
. aruh ud nenedire , zasuac ene aiciv ereb utiab nerudlag ere-cron ate : aruh ud nerudlag , aiciv ereb utaulas utiab nenakv ihan ere-cron necE
. irin tiarreb ate , aezturc ereb açeb rah ate , zäurub ereb açeb aitnuner , adab ihan irrohte naodno ene rohen nidlaB , yeulupicsid ereb néceic narre cesuseI naudrO
. canedarid nénoçiug aniab , cáçuag nedarid neraocniaI neztida cutitze nece : tiazta uhctapme , nataS cinagene ida tarelebiuG , isirreiP nóçeic narre ciriluzti crah atE
. nerudleh iroh irih ciazte : anuaI , etateip cua zaçroruE , aleoic , neztahctorper sirreiP nóiuqec sah cirutatrappa aruh atE
. utaticsuser , naenuge ocenereh ate , alec raheb name aratoireh ate , ciratebircS ate , ciratelapicnirp erodacifircaS ate cirateonaicnA utirffus ztihna ate , aremelasureI naoi aleuç raheb nece , neztaralced yeulupicsid ereb suseI nidec sah cinadnaudrO
. TSIRHC SVSEI alec aruh , netorrelze irohen caulupicsid ereb iuqusserpxe naztic anam naudrO
. natèurec cud nenaçi autahcal , naerrul cutiab nerutahcal ere-rec ate : natèurec cud nenaçi auhtol , naerrul cutiab neruhtol ere-rec ate , caokag neramuser ocatèurec taiuqzuard nename irih atE
. neruhtiarag irah alacziazte cáhtrob ocunreffi ate : áçilE eruen aladud nerutacifide naeniag nenuh irraH ate , sirreiP alecia ih nece , tauard netiarre cin era aniaB
. caned natèurec atiA ene aniab , utaleuer iroh cuartze calodo ze caiugarah nece : áemes neranoI nomiS zia ustahoD , irah nóçeic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
. aemeS neraiciv ocniaI tsirhC zia iH , naçec narre cesirreiP nomiS aleuç netsedrahI
? euçoid alecian ron ceuç atE , etsoiD
. tab ciratetehporP ode , saimereiH , cécreb ate : sailE , cécreb ate : atsitpaB sennaoI , cuztaB , netaçec narre ceh atE
? aemeS neranoçiug , cénoçiug etioid alecian ron iN , aleuç netiarre , caulupicsid ereb naztic agorretni , aratenereppilihP retzab ocaeraseC suseI naenec irrohte atE
. citanirtcod néuecuddaS ate néuesirahP aniab , citirragahctla iugo necetil ariugeb , narre aleuzte nece netaçec ida naudrO
? citirragahctla néuecuddaS ate néuesirahP netziednic ariugeb , narre ziugo aladeuçuartze nece neztida euçutze aloN
? netzutnic utitiog iuqsas tabmec ate , zéiugo ipzaç nénoçiug allim rual atezE
? netzutnic utitiog iuqsas tabmec ate , zéiugo zrob nénoçiug allim zrob tiohro cirógaiheug eterazte ate , neztida euçutze oniarO
? neuçutze utrah ciriugo nerec , cáocatipihc edef , naetra nóruec euçacudrahid reC , néceic narre cirutugaçe cesuseI atE
. nugutze utrah ciriugo nerec , oid iroH , aletioic , naetra ereb nétuç netiuqudrahi ceh atE
. citirragahctla néuecuddaS ate néuesirahP etzetiaç ariugeb ate euçuaogoG , neceic narre cesuseI atE
. areztrah iugo néiuqec znaha , aredla ecreb caulupicsid nerah naenedaric irrohte atE
. nidec naoi ciriztv ceh atE . neciab aongis neratehporp sanoI nename irah oyazte cirongis ate , ogad zeuqse ongis aoretluda ode aothciag enoitareneG
? euçorid nice zéongis ocaterobmed ate , euçiuqad neztaegui , zaiduri neräurec , cátircopyH . ad ztiag irrogzro äurec nece : ud neniuge etatsepmet nugE , euçoid naeciog atE
. äurec ad irrog nece : ud neniuge rede arobmeD , euçud nettiarre , naestarrA , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah aniaB
. néceil stucare citurec ongis tiebmec netaçec iriuqer aletuç neztatnet , céuecuddaS ate céuesirahP cirirrohte atE
. araterretzab oceladgaM nidec rohte ate : aratetab icnv nidec nagi , iraeztedneg ciname tignoc naudrO
. ebag carruoah ate caetzame , noçiug allim rual , nedaric canetuç nai atE
. cirehteb iuqsas ipzaç cirateutarebos ihtaç netaztic itiog ate : necetic aisasser ate , céicug netaçec nai atE
. iraulupop céulupicsid ate : yeulupicsid ereb nézteic name ate , naztic stuah cirutadner caitarg , caniarra ate caiugo ipzaç cirutrah atE
. aretrai naerrul aulupop naçec anam naudrO
. uztab ohctniarra ate , ipzaÇ , netoçeic narre ceh atE ? euçutid iugo tabmeC , cesuseI etsoid atE
? oceztaisasser neredneg tabmanuh nautresed iugo tabmah irug cidnoN , etostoid céulupicsid ereb atE
. taçnecetitze acalf naedib , ihan irrogi cirurab tutitze ate : netaçed nai rec etutze ate , aleogad niuqene ud nuge rurih ai nece : zaçenuh ulupop tud enoissapmoC , naçec narre caulupicsid ereb ciruhtied anagereb cesuseI naudrO
. aocniaI ocelearsI netaçec acifirolg ate : aletuç netsuki céusti , alaztlibaç cäugniam , cirutadnes caniabeh , neztaçnim cautum naenaiuqsucaç naçeztiab sterim caulupop non alaH
. naztic adnes ate , aratenio nesuseI netaztic raçe ate : cirecreb ztihna ate ciniabeh , cirutum , cirusti , cirugniam niuqereb aletuç , eztedneg ztihna anagnerah nidec rohte naudrO
. nah nidec rai , aridnem cinagi ate : aredla sasti ocaelilaG . nidec rohte suseI cidnah cirutitrap atE
. cinadnaudro ábala nerah nidec adnes atE . alaçeb nánud ihan niuqeb niuge : aedef erih nud idnah , aetzame O , nóçeic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi naudrO
. éid netai ciraterruppa nedarid netrore citeniaham néissuban ereb ere-cerrukahc aniab , anuaI , cud alaH , naçec narre crah aniaB
. aetzioge yerrukahc ate , aeztrah neraiugo nérruoah aoczedib açuag nutzE , naçec narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
. caçen atuia , anuaI , aleoic , aruh naçec aroda cirirrohte crah atE
. neciab arateudlag idra ocehcte ocelearsI irrogi zianzE , naçec narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
. naodno erug coaid zuhio nece : tignoc cómE , aletioic , netoiugec ztiohto céulupicsid ereb cirudlibruh naudrO . ciztih stedrahi noçeizte crah aniaB
. autatnemrot iuqziag zaurbaed cud abala ene , ánuaI emes ne-diuaD zaçin etateip cuA , alostoic , nidec rai zuhio , cirikli cirateh iridla tabaenanahC etzame , ánuh atE
. tarateuqramoc ognodiS ate oceryT nidec naoi suseI cidnah cirikli atE
. neztustas anoçiug utze , caetai ocirebag icuki caucse aniab : canetud neztustas anoçiug edarid cuaH
. cácetiarreztiag , causlaf egainomitset , cáireuqnioho , cáçidralliap , caoiretluda , cáceztlih , caothciag udnemasnep edarid neztitrap citeztohib necE
. anoçiug etud neztustas ceh ate , edarid neztitrap citeztohib , canedarid netikli citoha aniaB
? aled netzioge aretierter ate , aled netiaoi arelebas , aicug ned neztras naoha nece neztida euçutze oniarO
? eteraç ebag udnemida ere-ceuç oniarO , naçec narre cesuseI atE
. iroh enoitarapmoc cugaçei aralceD , noçeic narre cesirreiP aleuç netsedrahi naudrO
. edarid nerirore ariboh caib , açedab adiug austi causti nidlab : edarid iradiug néusti cirusti , euçaztiztV
. ad neriuqodi cirateorre aicug eradnal neutze utadnal caocatèurec atiA enE , naçec narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
? nedarid naçi utaziladnacs cinuçne iroh soporp cauesirahP alon cud utugaçE , netoçeic narre céulupicsid ereb cirudlibruh naudrO
. anoçiug ud neztustas caned netikli citoha aniab : anoçiug neztustas caned neztras naoha utzE
. euçaçe ida ate euçaçe nuçnE , néceic narre ciruhtied anagereb aulupop atE
. caudnemanam nénoçiug táztanirtcod aletzutid netsacari , etuan neztaroho naterrefla aniaB
. cinagene ad nurrv aztohib néuah aniab : uan neztaroho zéniapze ate , tiaç neztlibruh zoha ruah ulupoP
, aleoid , cesaiasE zaçeuç ud nakv utazitehporp iugnv , cátircopyH
. záçnanedro neuç audnemanam neraocniaI euçud nakv utsuedze atE
. etad ebag neugoh ama ereb ode atia ereb ere-açedapze aroho : ciaç nerutahcteborp aicug onod ned cinagenE , irama ode iratia acuartiab nenarre ere-croN , euçoid ceuç aniaB
. ideb lih zoireh , aneud nerutacidaram ama ode atiA , atE . ama ate atia erue caztiarohO , aleoid , ud nakv utanam caocniaI necE
? zaçnanedro neuç audnemanam neraocniaI euçud netiagari citagrec ceuç atE , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
. naenetud netai aiugo caucse ereb neztuki eititze nece ? açnanedro neoceniztia etud netiagari céulupicsid erih citagreC
, aletioid , uztab uesirahP ate abircS ratemelasureI anagsuseI edarid netrohte naudrO



. necetic adnes , caicug netuç nakv iuqnuh ate , aniapze udnemalliba nerah netaçel iuqnuh tnemalos netacuarec netiuge ztiohto atE
. caicug nedaric ire netozteic atneserp ate , arateicug iridla ocurugni netaçec rogi , cénoçiug ocatrah ukel naenetuç nakv utugaçe aruh atE
. arerrul octeraseneG necetic rohte cinagari aredla ecreb atE
. zia emeS neraocniaI iuqzaiugE , aletioic , aruh netaçec aroda cirirrohte cénedaric naicnv naudrO
. aeciah nidec agessos , aricnv naenedaric uhtras atE
? cud utadud citagrec , áocatipihc edef O , óstoid ate , nóiuqec tol cirutadeh aucse suseI natreb atE
. caçen aulas , anuaI , aleoic , naçec niuge uhio naenec issah neztadnuh ate : nidec tici , cirissuki odnes aeciah aniaB
. táçnidel rohte anagsuseI , zeniag rv nidec naoi sirreiP citicnv ciristuai atE . rohtA , naçec narre crah adaB
. zeniag rv aretrohte anagerih caçen anam , ziahab ih nidlab , anuaI , naçec narre cesirreiP alacuarec netsedrahi atE
. rudleb aleterazte zian in : etzetiaç açropS , aleoic , suseI néiuqec açnim natreb aniaB
. netaçec niuge uhio zitrudleb ate , ad tabamsotnaF , aletuç netiarre , necetic alburt caulupicsid , alalibaç zeniag sasti cirissuki aruh atE
. alalibaç zeniag sasti , suseI arateh nidec naoi nálliev nerragrual neräuag atE
. nec artnoc eciah nece : autatnemrot zéugab , nec naetra neraossasti ai aicnv atE
. nah nec areb-reb naenec utsarra atE . táçnaçel niuge ztiohto , iuqicereb aridnem nidec nagi , iraulupop ciname tignoc atE
. naetratiuqzib nomel tignoc iraulupop : aretiagari aredla ecreb naeniztia nerah ate , areztras naicnv caulupicsid ereb naztic ahctrob cesuseI natreb atE
. ebag carruoah ate caetzame , äurugni nenoçiug allim zrob nedaric canetuç nai atE
. cirehteb iuqsas ibamah cirateutarebos ihtaç netaztic itiog ate : necetic aisasser ate , céicug netaçec nai atE
. yeztedneg céulupicsid ate , caiugo yeulupicsid nezteic name ciristuah ate , naztic adner cáitarg , cirutitiog tarurec caiugeb , cirutrah caniarra ib ate caiugo zrob ate , cirutanam aretrai naeniag rahleb aulupop atE
. anuh euçatzakE , neceic narre crah atE
. neciab niarra ib ate iugo zrob nemeh ugaitzE , etostoid ceh atE
. aretai coruec euçeye , ciraognem ocetiaoi etutzE , néceic narre cesuseI aniaB
. taçnetaçed sore ocetai cinaoi táratèugrub , yeztedneg tignoc ceye , nagari ai audro ate , ruah cud autresed ukeL , aletioic , caulupicsid ereb nacziaç naçi irrohte naedla starra atE
. naztic adnes caire ocetra néyah ate , zaçeh naçec rah enoissapmoc ate tabidnah eztedneg naçec suki cesuseI cirikli atE
. cirateirih nacziaç naçi iuqierrai zenio caeztedneg cinuçne ate : trappa aratetab utresed ukel natetab icnv cidnah nidec itrap suseI cinuçne iroh atE
. isuseI netoçeic atnoc cinaoi ate : netaçec ztroho ate , aztuprog nerah netaçec namare ate , caulupicsid nerah necetic rohte oreuG
. irama ereb nóçeic atneserp crah ate , irahctacsen nóiuqec name ate , naetalp äurub nerah ad naçi irrake atE
. areticare iuqede neräurub naiugednioserp isennaoI naçec rogi atE
. nóiuqel name naçec anam , zasuac néneduec cirirrai naeniaham niuqerah ate , neranic aniab : euger nidec etsirt atE
. äurub neratsitpaB sennaoI naetalp nemeh ) oid ( cadnI , cinaçi utiurtsni záma citeniztia adab craH
. ideliab acse ere-rec alacuarec nename , noçeiztiab attemorp niuqerudnemarui cidnoN
. naçec niuge aragog nesedoreH ate : naetra ábala nesaidoreH nidec açnad , naenec netiuge átseb ocenuge ros nesedoreH adaB
. aruh netacudaztiab alaçeb atehporP nerec , nec rudleb neraulupop ciraleuç ihan lih aruh atE
. náud iroh iros cutzE , cesennaoI irah nacuarec netiarre necE
. zasuac neraetzame nereppilihP eyana nerah saidoreH , raçe naiugednioserp ate , naçec acetse sennaoI cinamaztah cesedoreH necE
. natenuh étud neztarbo cétuhtrev ztocalah ate , ciratelih ad naçi utaticsuser aruh , ad átsitpaB sennaoI ruaH , yeiraztibrec ereb neceic narre atE
: ámaf nesuseI cahcrarteT sedoreH naçec nuçne natrah arobmeD
. zasuac neraetatiludercni néyah , ciztihna etuhtrev nah niuge naçezte atE
. neciab naehcte ereb ate nairreh ereb ebag eroho ciratehporP atzE , néceic narre cesuseI atE . natrah nedaric neztaziladnacs atE
? coicug cuah açuag inuh adab cidnon ? nahtiab ug caicug edaritze cáberra nerroh atE
? aduI ate nomiS ate sesoI ate seuqcaI caeyana nerroh ate , neztied airaM ama nerroh atze ? emes-retnaprahc ruah atzE
? caetuhtrev ate ruah aitneipas inuh cidnoN , netuztiab netiarre ate , nedueztiab cautatnaps non tabmáh : nateugoganys néreb ceh neutic netsacari , arirreh ereb naenec irrohte atE
. cidnah nideztiab nagari suseI , naeneutic utabaca cuah enoitarapmoc nidec ahtreug atE
. niuqetab neud netiuqodi cirrahaç ate cirirreb açuag citeruaseht ereb ailimafatia tiebmec ad utarapmoc , aicug ned aistacari námuser ocatèurec abircS ztocalaH , néceic narre crah atE
. anuaI yaB , etastoiD ? caicug cuah açuag euçutid utidA , cesuseI euard netiarrE
. stocsarrag ztroh ate ragin ad nenaçi nah : arenacehciad ebal etzieuqutid neriztoge atE
. citetra néotsui caothciag etzieuqutid nerutarapes ate , cäureugniA edarid nerirrohte : naenif neraudnum ad nenaçi alaH
. netaztic ztiari táropmac caothciag ate , arateicnv cano netaztic lib cirirrai ate : aradnopze rv netaçeztiab iuqodi naenec naçi ehteb nieC
: niuqeraneud neztlib cirateicug atom açuag ate , niuqetab iztoge arossasti eras ámuser ocatèurec ad utarapmoc zirreB
. aruh naçeztiab sore ate , aicug neuç naçeztiab las cinaoi , naeneuç nedire tabalrep ocatidnah oicerp cenieC
niuqeranalibad ahlib nérrede alrep tnahcram noçiug ámuser ocatèurec ad utarapmoc zirreB
. netsore aruh adnal ate , ud neztlas aicug neud ate , ad netiaoi zóiraczob oczaçrah ate : ud nakv ilatse cetab noçiug cinedire aruh , niuqeraneogad ciredrog natetab adnal ruaseht ámuser ocatèurec ad utarapmoc zirreB
. açeb nuçne caneud cirirraheb ocetuçnE . námuser neratiA ereb , alaçeb caiuqzugi etieuqud nerutiugra céotsui naudrO
. stocsarrag ztroh ate ragin ad nenaçi nah : arenacehciad ebal etzutid neriztoge atE
. canetud netiuge etatiuqini ate , caicug oladnacs citamuser nerah etzutid nerudlib ate , cäureugniA ereb caemeS neranoçiug utid nerirrogI
. naenif nenuh udnum ad nenaçi alah , neztarre naus ate , ácarih etutiab neztlib alon alah adaB
. edarid cäureugniA , caelaztlib atzv ate : ad anif neraudnum , átzv ate : aurbaed ad , ayaste neud niere aruh atE
: edarid carruoah neraothciaG , ácarih ate : edarid carruoah ocamuser , ano icah ate : audnum ad ádnal atE
. aemeS neranoçiug ad aneud netiere ano icaH , néceic narré aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
. aenoitarapmoc neracarih ocadnal cugaçei aralceD , aletioic , caulupicsid ereb nacziaç naçi irrohte ate : suseI arehcte nidec rohte aulupop ciriztv naudrO
. cáçuag nedarid naçi noge ciredrog citeztadnuf neraudnum tutid nerutaralced : aoha eruen zenoitarapmoc tud neriuqerI , aleoic , aned naçi narre zátehporP táçnidel ilpmoC
. neztaçnim neyazte ebag enoitarapmoc ate , yeztedneg zenoitarapmoc cesuseI nézteic narre caicug cuah açuaG
. onaretra nidad ahctla aicug , utiab nakv edrog naenrab neniri irruen rurih cirutrah cetab etzame niec , niuqerairragahctla ámuser ocatèurec ad utarapmoC , aleoic , néceic narre tabenoitarapmoc ecreB
. naterrada nerah etzutitiab netiuge caeztaho ate , cairohc ocurec edaritiab netrohte non tabmah , ad neztahlib erobra ate : ad ogaidnah oniab carrahleb ecreb , naened utidnah aniab , aneipihc ocateicug icah atiab nieC
. niuqeraneud niere nádnal ereb cirutrah cetab noçiug ihib adratsum , ámuser ocatèurec ad utarapmoC , aleoic , néceic asoporp tabenoitarapmoc ecreB
. arerenarg ene euçaçe lib aiugo aniab : taztoceztarre zotuaça euçaçe sreh ate , ácarih cinehel euçaçe liB , yelaztlib teuard nenarre , nárobmed atzv ate : onaretra-atzv areztidnah niuqerrakle caib euçaztiztV
