. naetab niuqerah neuçaçetze iuqodi ere-aiugo naeztlib neracarih : zE , néceic narre crah atE
? aruh nugaçed lib ate necaog adab cud ihaN , netoçeic narre céiraztibrec atE . ud niuge iroh cayaste noçiuG , néceic narre crah atE
? acarih zareb ud cidnon ? nadnal erue niere ano icah cutze , anuaI , netoçeic narre céiraztibrec nerailimafatia cirirrohte naudrO
. ere-acarih nidec reuga naudro , naeneuç niuge utcurf ate , arrahleb naenec utidnah atE
. nidec naoi ate : naetra iugo , acarih naçec niere ate , ayaste nerah nidec rohte , alaçnuec ol canoçiug aniaB
. niuqeranoçiug neud niere nádnal ereb ano icah ámuser ocatèurec ad utarapmoC , aleoic , néceic asoporp tabenoitarapmoc ecreB
. ramah ate yeugoh caecreb ate , yeugorurih caecreb ate , nuhe catab , netiuge ate utiab netrake utcurf ceniec , aneud neztida ate netuçne aztih ad ruah , aneud utibecer aicah areno rul aniaB
. netiuge utze cirutcurf ate , aztih étud neztohti caoinagne oczenussatsarba ate , cáhtra ocatenuh udnum aniab , aneud netuçne aztih ad ruah , aneud utibecer aicah aretra irrohle atE
. ad neztaziladnacs natreb , naened neztleh citagaztih cirenoitucesrep ode cirenoitalubirt ate : ocatitug etuari ad ztocalah , nahtiab ereb cirorre utze aniaB
: aneud neztibecer niuqeroiraczob natreb aruh ate , netuçne aztih , ad ruah , aneud utibecer aicah arateuçirrah ukel atE
. aneud utibecer aicah naerretzab edib ad ruah : anec niere naeztohib nerah ud neztaparrah ate , aruh othciaG ad netrohte , neztida ze ate , aztih ocatrah amuser utiab netuçne crohen ere-zioN
. aenoitarapmoc neraelliere euçuçne adab ceuÇ
. nuçne etzutitiapze ate , nécuag neuçutid netuçne , aretuçne ate : issuki etzutitiapze ate , nécuag neuçutid netsuki ceuç aretsuki aletud nakv utarised cotsui ate catehporP ztihna , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge necE
. étud netuçne nece , cairraheb neuç ate : étud netsuki nece , caiugeb neuç edarid ustahod adaB
. nadaztitze adnes ate , necetitze itreunoc ate , netaçetze ida zaztohib ate , nuçne zéirraheb ate , suki zeiugeb : étzutid nakv istre caiugeb ate , étud nakv nuçne iuqrogog zéirraheb ate , aztohib nenuh ulupop ad audneciug necE
. nerutraho etoiuqziazte ate euçud nerissuki aleuçassucad ate : nerutida ze ate , euçud nenuçne zetuçnE , oitiab ceniec , áitehporp nesaiasE nateh ad neztilpmoc alaH
. neztida ze , netuçne etutiapze ciraletud netuçne ate , netsuki etutiapze ciraletassucad nerec : eyaztan oçnim zenoitarapmoc ztocalaH
. óyaç neriuqede ere-aneud irah , utiapze ere-cron aniab : ud nenakv ogaiheug zetabmah ate , óyaç nename irah , utiab ere-cron necE
. name eyazte yæh aniab , aeztugaçe néuterces ocamuser ocatèurec euçiaztiab name yeuç nereC , néceic narre , aleuç netsedrahi crah atE
? eyazta oçnim zenoitarapmoc citagreC , netoçeic narre céulupicsid cirudlibruh naudrO
. açeb nuçne , caneud cirirraheb ocetuçnE
. ramah ate yeugoh caecreb ate , yeugorurih caecreb , nuhe catab , netaçec adner utcurf ate : areno rul edarid naçi irore uztab atE
. ceh etzutid nakv ohti ate , cairrohle edarid naçi utidnah ate : aretra irrohle edarid naçi irore uztab atE
. edarid naçi uhtraye , cirorre netuztiapze nerec ate , edarid naçi erre , ate utarog aiuqzugi oreuG
. cirenrab rul netuztiapze nerec , necetic ikli natreb ate : cirrul iugarueh netuztiapze non , arateuçirrah ukel edarid naçi irore uztab atE
. ceh etzutid nakv isteri ate , edarid naçi irrohte cairohc ate : arerretzab edib necetic rore uztab citicah naetiere atE
. aretiere nidec ikli tabelliere , ánuH , aleoic , zenoitarapmoc açuag ztihna néçeic narre atE
. neogec nátsoc sasti aicug eztedneg ate : nideztiab rai ciruhtras aratetab icnv non tabmah , ztihna eztedneg anagnerah nidec lib atE
. nátsoc sasti nidec rai , cirikli citehcte suseI naereb natrah nugE








. ama ate , aberra ate , eyana ene ad aruh , aetadnorov neraned natèurec atiA ene utiab neniuge ere-cron necE
. caeyana ene ate ama ene ánuH , naçec narre , areniag néulupicsid ereb aucse ereb cirutadeh atE
? caeyana ene edarid ron ate , ama ene ad roN , iranoic narre aruh nóçeic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah aniaB
. zihan utaçnim niuqerih , ceduaid naerokel caeyana erih ate ama erih , áraH , nóçeic narre cetiebmec atE
. zihan utaçnim niuqerah , naerokel neduec caeyana ate ama nerah , ánuh , aloyaç oçnim iraulupop oniaro aruh atE
. óyaç nerudleh ere-inuh othciag enoitan alah : ad ogaothciag oniab aestah anif nerah noçiug ate , nah edarid neztatibah ciruhtras ate , caogaothciag oniab areb utirips ipzaç cirecreb niuqereb utid neztrah ate , ad netiaoi naudrO
. cirudniappa ate cirutabocse , astuh ud netiedire , naened irrohte atE . arehcte necian ikli eruen zian neriluztI , ud netiarre naudrO
. netiedire utze ate , ahlib ussuap , alibad zérrohiel ukel , cinaganoçiug naened ikli austas utirips adaB
. nemeh aogaoniab nomolaS , ánuh ate , aretuçne neraitneipas nenomolaS citerretzab nerarrul nideztiab rohte nerec : ruah ud nerutanmednoc crah ate , niuqenuh enoitan naoicidui ad neriuqiai ániuger ocidre-ugE
. nemeh aogaoniab sanoI , anuh ate , arenoitaciderp nesanoI nedariztiab utadneme ceh nerec : ruah etud nerutanmednoc ate , niuqenuh enoitan naoicidui edarid neriuqiai canoçiug ocauiniN
. uag rurih ate nuge rurih , naeztohib nerarrul aemeS neranoçiug ad nenaçi alah : néztiab naçi uag rurih ate nuge rurih naelebas neranelab sanoI alon alah necE
. neciab aongis neratehporp sanoI , nename oyazte cirongis aniab : ogad zeuqse ongis aoretluda ate aothciag enoitaN , néceic narre aleuç netsedrahi crah aniaB
. issuki ongis tiebmec cinagerih ceuqidneug ihan , áurtsigaM , aletioic , cuztab cirateuesirahP ate ciratebircS netaçec stedrahi naudrO
. zia nerutanmednoc cirateztih erue ate , zia nerutacifitsui cirateztih erue necE
. naenuge ocoicidui aletud nerutadner utnoc , zaicug refla ztih netieuqud narre cénoçiug neçe , teustoidab aniaB
. caothciag açuag utid netiuqodi citothciag ruaseht caothciag noçiug ate : cano açuag utid netiuqodi citeno ruaseht oceztohib cano noçiuG
. ad oçnim aoha citaitnadnuba oceztohib nece ? ciraleteraç othciag eteuqzetiaç laha açnim iugnv natalon , átsac nérepiV
. ad neztugaçe aerobra citutcurf nece : letsv autcurf nerah ate , aletsv erobra euçiuge ode : no autcurf nerah ate , ano erobra euçiuge odE
: naened ocetrohte ze , natenuh aluces ze irah nerutakrab oyazte , artnoc neraudnias utiripS atiab nerutaçnim ere-ron aniab : irah oyaç nerutakrab , artnoc neraemeS neranoçiug atiab nerutaçnim ere-ron atE
. yenoçiug eyazte nerutakrab aoimehpsalb ocatertnoc nerautiripS aniab : yenoçiug eyaç nerutakrab aicug oimehpsalb ate utakeb , teuçuard netiarre ztocalaH
. ad ira neztayerrab anetze ira neztlib niuqene ate , ad artnoc ene anetze niuqenE
. euqud nerutallip aehcte nerah naudro ate ? aztihtrob açedapze acetse nehel nidlab , allip audnemallitso nerah ate , arehcte netab ztihtrob etiad laha ras rohen natalon apzE
. ámuser neraocniaI arateuç ad irrohte zareb , caurbaed tutidab netzioge aropmac zautiripS neraocniaI cin nidlab aniaB
. edarid nenaçi egui neuç ceh ztocalaH ? etzutid netzioge aropmac zetrap neron cémes neuç , caurbaed tutidab netzioge aropmac zetrap ne-bubezleeB cin nidlab atE
? cámuser nerah ud nenuari zareb natalon : ad autitrap artnoc ereb , udab netzioge aropmac nataS cenataS nidlab atE
. nenuari utze , cehcte ode cirih ned autitrap artnoc ereb ate : ad neniugesed , aicug amuser ned autitrap artnoc ereB , néceic narre , caudnemasnep néyah cirutugaçe cesuseI aniaB
. neciab zetrap neraecnirp néurbaed bubezleeB netzioge aropmac caurbaed utitze cenuH : netuç netiarre , cinuçne iroh céuesirahP aniaB
? aemes ne-diuaD ruah atzE , neuç netiarre ate , aicug ulupop nidec atnaps atE
. neuztiab netsuki ate neztiab oçnim anec utum ate usti non zarenam ocalah , aruh naçec adnes ate : tabutum ate usti utainomed óyaç naçi utatneserp naudrO
. etud nenakv açnareps célitneG naeneci nerah atE
. oneorid icare ikli natairotciv audnemegui : neriugnuari utze aohil nóirad aek ate , nerutahehc utze autahtraç arebanaC
. nenuçne azov nerah nateuqirrac utze crohen ate , neniuge ciruhio ateze , neriuqudrahi utzE
. euard nerutaciderp yelitneG udnemegui ate , naeniag nerah autiripS eruen tud nerirraçe : cámira ene ano niugesta ereb utiab neztrah nateniec , aetiam ene , anadud utigele iraztibrec ene , ánuH
, aleoic , anec naçi narre zátehporp saiasE táçnidel ilpmoC
. atsefinam netaçelze naztic atebed niuqeruhctahem atE
. naztic adnes caicug ceh ate , aidnah edladneg nóiuqec iuqierrai ate : cidnah naçec niuge ukel cirutugaçe iroh cesuseI aniaB
. neteuqaçel lih aruh natalon , artnoc nerah , ulliesnoc netaçec rah cirikli céuesirahP atE
. nidec adnes niaçeb aecreb ate , naçec adeh atE . aucse erue caçe adeH , irah noçiug óstoid naudrO
. aetiuge iugnv nateohtabbaS ad iros zareB ? ogaiheug oniab aidra anoçiug ad zetabmec atE
? aneutze nerutahctla ate nerutrah , idadab rore arecel naohtabbaS aruh nidlab , ate : cineud tabidra , anoçiug cirateuç ad nenaçi roN , néceic narre crah atE
. taçnetaçel asucca aruh , netioic ruah ? aeztadnes naenuge htabbaS ad iroS , aletoic , netaçec agorretni ate : cineuç rahye aucse tabmoçiug nah nec , ánuh atE
. nidec rohte aragoganys néyah cirutitrap cidnah atE
. aemeS neranoçiug ad nuaI ere-neraohtabbaS necE
. caebag-neugoh utanmednoc netzeuqutnizte , oicifircas ze ate tud ihan aidrociresiM , ned rec etiuqanicab nidlab atE
. aled nemeh tabogaidnah oniab aelpmet nece , teuçuard netiarre adaB
? nedarid ebag-neugoh ate , nétud netsuah anuge htabbaS naelpmet cérodacifircaS natenuge htabbaS alon , naeugeL irrucari euçutze odE
? ciralezte iros neciab nérodacifircaS , nénedaric niuqerah ze , nerah ze aetai cirateh : neutic nai caiugo oczenoitisoporp ate , naehcte neraocniaI nec naçi uhtras aloN
? cenedaric niuqerah ate aneuç niuge zessog ce-diuaD irrucari euçutzE , néceic narre crah aniaB
. anetze iros niuge naohtabbaS éid netiuge céulupicsid erih , árroH , netoçeic narre cirissuki ceuesirahP atE
. netai ate , netiuqodi acurub necetic sah ate , essog nedaric caulupicsid nerah ate : zetab nuge htabbaS idniag natecniere suseI nec netiaoi natrah arobmeD




















. nira ágrac ene ate , ad tisia airratzv ene necE
. euçud nenedire ussuap táçnemira neuç ate : limuh zeztohib ate alecian eme nece cinagene euçaçe saki ate , areniag neuç airratzv ene euçaçe raH
. yeuç teuçuard nename ussuap cin ate , cáicug neteraç cautagrac ate cautagitaf anagene etzotaÇ
. acuartiab nenakv ihan utatsefinam caemeS ere-iron ate , neciab caemeS neztugaçe utze crohen atiA ateze : neciab cátiA aemeS neztugaçe utze crohen ate : tiuqziaç name zatiA eruen irin caicug açuaG
. ano recalp erih atiab naçi alah nerec , átiA yaB
. yeipihc ruoah cetzuartiab utatsefinam ate , yeutida ate yérruhuç cuah açuag cetzuartiab ilatse nerec , táiuqzuard neztadner carreuqse , ánuaI ocerrul ate ocurec , átiA , naçec narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi natrah arobmeD
. naenuge ocoicidui aledarid nenaçi cautatcart ogaiuqeme oniab ih caocamodoS nece , teustoidab eratE
. náetaç noge onarenuge ognuge , caetuhtrev nedarid naçi niuge nahtiab ih edarilab naçi niuge namodoS nidlab nece : zia nerutareheb onarunreffi anecia naçi utahctla onarurec muanrepaC ih atE
. aledarid nenaçi cautatcart ogaiuqeme oniab ceuç naenuge ocoicidui nodiS ate ryT , teustoid eratE
. neeuqetaric utadneme niuqestuah ate niuqerucaç idlapsa , caetuhtrev nedarid naçi niuge nahtiab ceuç edarilab naçi niuge nenodiS ate neryT nidlab nece : adiashteB irih enoitcidelam , nizaroC irih enoitcidelaM
: nedarizte utadneme nerec , yeirih nec naçi niuge ztihna ciretuhtrev nerah neztahcorper alenuh néiuqec sah naudrO
. zérruoah ereb áitneipas ad naçi utacifitsui aniaB . aediuqsida néocatothciag ezticiv ate néonacilbup , aidroh ate atnamrog noçiug , arroH , etioid ate , aleud netade ate netai aemeS neranoçiug ad irrohtE
. ud aurbaeD , étud netiarre ate , aleutze netade ze netai sennaoI ad irrohte necE
. niuge cirerohtied euçutze ate , ugeuçuard utatnac zissere : utaçnad eterazte ate , ugeuçuard niuge unios alurihC , etioitiab cénieC
, ad ocalaçeb caohctruoah netzogad zuhio yenugal ereb ate , neduad cirirrai nautakreM ? ruah enoitareneg tud nerutarapmoc niuqeron aniaB
. açeb nuçne , caneud cirirraheb ocetuçnE
. anec ocetrohte sailE ad ruah , utibecer euçudab ihan nidlab , atE
. étud nakv utazitehporp onanagsennaoI caeugeL ate céicug atehporP necE
. aruh etud neztaparrah céuhciek ate , oyaç netiuge ahtrob iramuser ocatèurec , onardniaro ciratenuge neratsitpaB sennaoI atE
. ad ogaidnah oniab aruh aneipihc ocamuser ocatèurec ere-citagaicug : cirogaidnah oniab atsitpaB sennaoI , rohen naetra nénedarid oyai ciratetzame ikli atze , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. naeniztia erih utiab nerudniappa aedib erih ceniec , naeniztia etrahtiugeb erih airatadnam eruen taid netrogi cin , ánuH , atiab autabircs zeniec ad ruah necE
. neraogaoniab atehporP ate teustoid yab ? netab atehporP ? eteraç naçi ikli aretsuki nerec aniaB
. edarid natehcte néuger , canetzutid netrake caosoicerp udnemalliba , ánuh ? netab utitzev zosoicerp udnemalliba noçiug ? eteraç naçi ikli aretsuki nerec aniaB
? netab arebanac ned netlibare zaeciah ? arutresed eteraç naçi ikli aretsuki nereC , zesennaoI iraulupop netiarre suseI nidec sah , alaçeb nedaric netiaoi ceh atE
. natin anetze nerutaziladnacs ad ustahod atE
. eyaç neztaitnuned yerbuap aoilegnauE ate , edarid neztaticsuser calih , étud netuçne cérrog ate , edarid neztuhahc caoyahros , aztlibadab cäugniam ate , étud neztaburcer aetsuki céustI
: cáçuag neuçutid netsuki ate netuçne , isennaoI euçoztei atnoc ate etzaoÇ , néceic narre cesuseI aleuç netsedrahi atE
? eduag ariugeb netab ecreb ala , aruh nec ocetrohte zia iH , noçeic narrE
, agib cirateulupicsid ereb cirirrogi , cárbo netsirhC cinuçne naiugednioserp cesennaoI atE
. nateirih néyah taçnaçel aciderp ate stacari cidnah nideztiab itrap , naeneuç utabaca aetiame udnemanam yeulupicsid ibamah ereb cesuseI nidec ahtreug oreuG

. nerudlag airas ereb aleutze , teustoid zaiuge : naeneci nerulupicsid itab ciratuah ipihc stuh ztoh rv taberieb acuartiab nename aretade ere-cron atE
. ud nerutibecer airas nerotsui , caneud neztibecer tabotsui naeneci neraotsui ate : ud nerutibecer airas neratehporP , caneud neztibecer tabatehporP naeneci neratehporP
. ud neztibecer aneuan irrogi in , caneuan neztibecer in ate : uan neztibecer in , canetzutiaç neztibecer ceuÇ
. aruh ud nerutariugeb , zasuac ene caneud nerudlag aiciv ereb ate : aruh ud nerudlag , caneud nerutariugeb aiciv ereB
. engid ene atze , anatierratze citodno irin ate , aneutze neztrah aezturc ereb atE
. engid ene atze , aneud ogaetiam oniab in ábala ode aemes ate : engid ene atze , aneud ogaetiam oniab in ama ode atiA
. edarid nenaçi caocitsemod nerareb yaste neranoçiug atE
. artnoc neraberrahniug-ama ereb neranerre ate , artnoc nerama ereb nerábala ate , aretraçe natudug artnoc neratia ereb neranoçiug zian irrohte necE
. neratapze aniab , aretraçe neraeuqab irrohte zianze : arerrul alecian irrohte , aretraçe neraeuqab nece etsv aleuçutzE
. naeniztia neraned natèurec atiA ene aruh ere-cin tud nerutakv , naeniztia nénoçiug uaniab nerutakv ere-cron aniaB
. naeniztia neraned natèurec atiA ene aruh ere-cin tud nerutaoba , naeniztia nénoçiug uaniab nerutaoba ere-cron adaB
. euçud oilav ogaiheug ceuç oniab céirohc-arrap : rudleb zareb aleteraztE
. edarid cautatnoc caicug olib ocurub neuç eratE
. ebag atiA neuç , nerirore arerrul atze tab cirateh ate ? neztlas natetab ohcturid edaritze irohc-arrap iB
. neraneuqaztid laha lag nánneheg aztuprog ate ámira rudleb neteraç citiztianiab : neneteuqaçed lih nice ámira ate , nénetud neztlih aztuprog rudleb aleterazte atE
. nateniag ehcte euçaçe aciderp , aneuçud netuçne arirraheb ate : naiugra euçarre , anadeuçuard netiarre naebmuhlI
. cinetze neniuqai ciruterces sued ateze , cinetze nerutreuga cirilatse sued atze nece : rudleb néyah zareb aleteraztE
? caocitsemod nerah ogaiheug zetabmec , étudab uhtied bubezleeB areb áilimafatiA nidlab : alaçeb anuai ereb , cairaztibrec ate : ned alaçeb aurtsigam ereb caulupicsid ud ocsA
. oceniag neranuai ereb airaztibrec ateze , oceniag neraurtsigam aulupicsid atzE
. aemeS neranoçiug nidatze rohte non , caicug irih ocelearsI nerutarugni euçutitze , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge nece : aratetab ecreb euçiuge sehi , natrah irih naenetzutiaç nerutatucesrep atE
. ad nerutaulas aruh onarenif utiab nerutareuesrep ere-cron aniab : citaganeci ene , eteraç nenaçi caisteztiag zéicug atE
. étzutid nericare lih ate , artnoc néma-atia carruoah edarid nerutahctla ate : arruoah cátia ate , aratoireh aeyana caeyana ud nerutaruil atE
. aned oçnim nateuç utiripS neratiA neuç aniab , caneteraç oçnim ceuç eterazte necE
. neteuqzetiaç açnim rec euçiaç nename naereb natrah udro nece : neteraç nerutaçnim rec ode alon cirahtra aleuçutze , naenetzetiaç aruil aniaB
. taçnetud ruah egainomitset célitneG ate ceh , zasuac ene eteraç nenamare arateuger ate araterodanrebog atE
. etzutiaç nerutatoça nateugoganys ereb ate , arateoirotsisnoc etzutiaç nerutaruil nece : ciratenoçiug etzetiaç ariugeb atE
. alaçeb cábmuloc ossv elpmis ate , alaçeb caeugus ruhuç adab neteraç : alaçeb aretra néosto caidra , ceuç tetzutiaç netrogi cin , ánuH
. aruh irih ze nece , naenuge ocoicidui caocerrul ocahrromoG ate ocamodoS aledarid nerutatcart ogaiuqeme , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE
. astuahrre ocatenio neuç etaçeniztiebla sorrahi naetikli ciratrah irih ode ehcte , nerutaheb yeztih neuç ze ate , etzutiaztiapze nerutibecer ere-cron atE
. ideb luzti arateuç aeuqab neuç , adapze engid nidlab aniab : areniag nerah aeuqab neuç ideb rohte , adab engid aehcte nidlab atE
. aruh euçaçe atulas , naeneteraç neruhtras natehcte tiebmec atE
. onetzetiaç itrap nah eteduaç ate , cirengid natrah ned ron etzetiaç amrofni , eteraztiab neruhtras natugrub ode natirih ere-niec atE
. ad engid neraiciv ereb aeliugnal nece , zehv ze , zatapaç ze , zaporra árib ze , táztocedib zatelam atezE
: nateocirreug neuç zerboc ze , zerrahlic ze , zehrrv cirenoisiuorp aleuçiugatzE
. euçame ciniahod ate , euçud utibecer ciniahod : euçazti ztoge aropmac caurbaed , euçazti aticsuser calih , euçazti uhahc caoyahros , euçazti adnes cairE
. ad libruh ámuser ocatèureC , aleuçud netiarre , euçaçe aciderp , ate utitrap adaB
. arateudlag idra ocehcte ocelearsI etzaoç citiztianiaB
: ras aletzetiazte natirih néonatiramaS ate , aletzaozte táratelitneG , aleoic , udnemanam néceic name ate , cesuseI naztic rogi cuah ibamaH
. aneuç ere-utidart aruh , toiracsI saduI ate , aoenanaC nomiS
. oeddahT zocitiog neci , oebeL ate aemes neroehplA seuqcaI : aonacilbup uehttaM ate samohT : oemolohtraB ate eppilihP
. aeyana nerah sennaoI ate , aemes neroedebeZ seuqcaI : aeyana nerah uirdnA ate , sirreiP aned netiarre nomiS , anehel : cuah edarid caneci néulotsopA ibamah adaB
. oceztadnes neraicug atom erognal ate neraicug atom nussatire ate , ocetzioge aropmac néyah , artnoc néustas utirips erehtob neceic name , ciruhtied anagereb caulupicsid ibamah ereb naudrO
. aratzv ereb caeliugnal naztid noiri , iraebaI atzv adab euçoiuge ztiohtO
. itug eliugnal aniab , ad idnah átzv rugeS , yeulupicsid ereb etsoid naudrO
. alaçeb canetutze ciniaztra idra cautayerrab ate cautaleberre nedariztiab nerec , zaçeh naçec rah enoissapmoc , caeztedneg cesuseI cirissuki atE
. naulupop aicug atom erognal ate aicug atom nussatire aleuç neztadnes ate aoilegnauE ocamuser aleuç neztaciderp ate , nateugoganys néyah alec ira netsacari , caicug ugrub ate irih cesuseI neutic neztarugni atE
. caurbaed utid netzioge aropmac zetrap neraecnirp néurbaeD , netuç netiarre céuesirahP aniaB
. nelearsI ciraçuag ocalenuh utreuga atze onadnugE , aletioic , céztedneg netaçec sterim ate : autum nidec açnim , naenec naçi iztoge aropmac aurbaed atE
. tabutainomed utum noçiug netoçeic atneserp , ánuh , aledaric netikli ceh atE
. naicug natrah irreh ámaf nerah netaçec ayerrab cirikli ceh aniaB
. naiuqatze crohen euçuariugeB , aleoic , cesuseI niuqeruhctahem naztic atebed ate , caiugeb néyah necetic iuqeri atE
. euçiuqeb niuge aruara neraedef neuÇ , aleoic , caiugeb néyah naztic iuqnuh naudrO
. anuaI yab , etostoiD ? aladidiad laha iroh euçud netsehniS , cesuseI etsoid ate , cousti anagnerah necetic rohte , arehcte naenec irrohte atE
. áemes ne-diuaD , zaçug etateip cuA , aletioic ate , aleduec zuhio usti ib nacziaç naçi iuqierrai , alec netiagari cidnah suseI atE
. naicug natrah rul cenuh amaf naiugec retsal atE
. áhctacsen nidec iuqiai ate : aucse nerah naçec rah , ciruhtras , aeztedneg naenec naçi iuqodi atE
. zaçrah nedaric neztaffurt atE . aztad ol aniab : áhctacsen lih atze nece , etzetiaç ariteR , etsoiD
, alec ira utlumut aeztedneg ate , cairalunios cirissuki ate arehcte nerah nuai cirirrohte cesuseI atE
. ) naereb udro aetzame nidec adnes atE . ua utaulas caedef erue , ábala , no ztohib nuA , naçec narre cirissuki aruh ate ciriluzti cesuseI naudrO
. zian nerutadnes , audnemalliba nerah taçedab iuqnuh tnemalos nidlaB , nahtiab ereb neuç netiarre necE
. aniapze udnemalliba nerah naçec iuqnuh cirirrohte citelebiug cetab etzame nec ire zeztairai lodo zehtrv ibamah , ánuh atE (
. caulupicsid nerah ate , nóiuqec iuqierrai suseI ciriuqiai atE
. atiab ociciv ate , naeniag nerah aucse erue carraçe cirirrohte aniab : cud naçi lih niaro abala enE , aleoic , aruh naçec aroda cirirrohte cetab nuai , ánuh , aletzuarec netiarre yæh cuah açuaG
. edarid neztariugeb caib ate , étud netraçe nateirreb iugahaç airreb onrastaham aniab : neztlag caiugahaç ate , netrussi aonrastaham ate , caiugahaç edarid neztrehel erepze : naterraç iugahaç airreb onrastaham netraçe etutze atE
. árudnehte ad oganeztiuqziag ate , citudnemalliba ud netiuqede caiuqehctare irragilpmoc nece : itab raç udnemalliba tabztal uçadep lahio netiuqehctare acuartze crohen rebalaH
. etieuqutiab neniuge rurab naudro ate audnocze eyaztiab neriuqede canuge edarid nerirrohte aniaB ? oned niuqeh audnocze , etorid laha rake cirulod cédneg ocarebmag neraudnoczE , cesuseI neceic narre atE
? netiuge cirurab etutiapze céulupicsid erih ate , ziam ugud netiuge rurab céuesirahP ate cug citagreC , aletioic , caulupicsid nesennaoI anagnerah necetic rohte naudrO
. aratudnemadneme , nérotakeb aniab , areztied néotsui irrohte zianze necE . oicifircas ze ate tud ihan aidrociresiM , ned rec euçaçe saki ate , etzaoç aniaB
. cénedarid ire aniab , cirraheb nerucidem etutze cénedarid ossO , néceic narre cinuçne iroh cesuseI naudrO
? caurtsigam neuç ud netai niuqeocatothciag ezticiv ate niuqeonacilbup citagreC , yeulupicsid nerah néçeic narre céuesirahP cirissuki iroh atE
. niuqeulupicsid nerah ate niuqesuseI naeniaham necetiztiab rai , cirirrohte cirocatothciag ezticiv ate onacilbup ztihna , ánuh , aleogec cirirrai naeniaham naehcte nerah suseI nidec ahtreug atE
: nóiuqec iuqierrai ciriuqiai atE . irin tierrA , óstoid ate , cinec neztied uehttaM airrai naukel egaep tabmoçiug naçec suki cesuseI alec netiagari cidnah atE
. yenoçiug aetatirohtua ocalah euartiab nakv name ceniec , aocniaI netaçec acifirolg ate , netaçec sterim cirissuki iroh céztedneg atE
. tárehcte ereb nidec naoi ciriuqiai naudrO
. tárehcte erue libah ate , aeho erue caçe rah , ida iuqiaI ) iraocitylarap óstoid naudro ( oceztakrab néutakeb naerrul etatirohtua aleudab caemeS neranoçiug nece adab taçneuçiuqaD
? ida libe ate ida iuqiaI , aetiarre ala : cautakeb erue ciuqziaç utakraB , aetiarre , ogahctarre ad niec necE
? nateztohib neuç euçud neztasnep iuqothciag citagreC , naçec narre , caudnemasnep néyah cesuseI cirissuki atE
. ud neztamehpsalb cenuH , nahtiab ereb netuç netiarre cuztab ciratebircS , ánuh atE
. cautakeb erue ciuqziaç utakrab , émes , no ztohib cuA , iraocitylarap nóçeic narre , aedef néyah cesuseI cirissuki ate : cinaztec naeho tabocitylarap netoçeic atneserp , ánuh atE
. aririh ereb nidec rohte ate , aredla ecreb nidec nagari aricnv ciruhtras naudrO
. cirateuqramoc neyah nidel ariter netoçeic niuge ztiohto , aruh naenetuç issuki ate : areniztia isuseI nóiuqec ikli aicug irih , ánuh atE
. neyaç naçi udleh yeutainomed rec ate , caicug açuag netaztic atnoc , aririh cirirrohte ate : netaçec niuge sehi céniadrv naudrO
. naterv necetic lih ate , arossasti areheb citiarag nidec radlo aicug aruh edladrv , ánuh ate : aredladrv necetic naoi cirikli adab ceH . etzaoÇ , etsoid atE
. aretiaoi aratrah edladrv cugaçei ittemrep , cutiagab netzioge aropmac nidlaB , aletioic , nacziaç zetziohto cäurbaed atE
: cinec ahla tabidnah edladrv nurrv cirateh nec atE
? areztatnemrot erug nehel oniab udro anuh zia irrohte ? aemeS neraocniaI suseI , naetra erih ate erug ad reC , aletioic , netaçec niuge arogayeh , ánuh atE
. círatrah edib netiaztiab nagari nice rohen non tabmah , caelbirret oczicug , cirikli ciratebmuht utainomed ib nacziaç naçi irrohte areniztia , arenoiger nénesegreG , aredla ecreb naenec nagari atE
? etutiab neztidebo caossasti ate ere-ceciah non , ruah ad cireC , aletoic , netaçec sterim cédneg naudrO
. nidec niuge aidnah ugassos ate : aossasti ate caeciah naztic ahctahem ciriuqiai naudrO ? caocatipihc edef ici eteraç citagreC , etsoid atE
. caçaohiug udlag , caztiag ariugeb , anuaI , aletoic , netaçec raztari céulupicsid ereb cirudlibruh atE
. naztec ol areb aniab : neztiab neztlatse zagab aicnv non tabmah , naossasti nidec ahctla tabidnah atnemrot , ánuh atE
. caulupicsid ereb nacziaç naçi iuqierrai naenec uhtras naicnv atE
. aretzroho nélih ereb calih ciuqzv ate , irin tierrA , noçeic narre cesuseI atE
. aretzroho neratia eruen nidan naoi niheb cadaçei ittemrep , anuaI , noçeic narre cetab ecreb , cirateulupicsid ereb oreuG
. naçed asoper äurub ereb non citze caemeS neranoçiug aniab , caeztaho céirohc ocurec ate éitic caohluç ceirecA , cesuseI óstoid atE
. ziatiab nenaoi ere-taron , irih ciaztan neriuqierrai , áurtsigaM , noçeic narre cetab abircS cirudlibruh atE
. aredla ecreb necetil naoi caulupicsid naztic anam , näurugni ereb idnah eztedneg cesuseI cirissuki atE
. utid nakv irrake canussatire erug ate , utid nakv utrah caerognal erug craH , aleoic , anec naçi narre zátehporp saiasE táçnidel ilpmoC
: naztic adnes caicug neduec iuqziag ate , zaztih cautirips aropmac nezteic ztoge ate : utainomed ztihna netoçeic atneserp , naenec irrohte astarra atE
. naztic aztibrec ate , nidec iuqiai ate , caztiagleh naçec iztv ate , aucse nerah naçec iuqnuh atE
. alacudaç caztiagleh ate , alaztec naeho aberrahniug-ama nerah naçec suki , cirirrohte arehcte nesirreiP cesuseI atE
. naereb natrah udro allihtum nerah nidec adnes atE . ciuqeb niuge alaçeb náud istehnis ate áhO , irarenetneC cesuseI nóçeic narre atE
. stocsarrag ztroh ate ragin ad nenaçi nah : arebmuhli ocopmac aledarid neriztoge caemes ocamuser atE
: námuser ocatèurec niuqe-bocaI ate niuqe-caasI niuqemaharbA aledarid nerirrai ate , aledarid nerirrohte citetnediccO ate citetneirO ztihna nece teustoidab aniaB
. nedire ciridnah edef niah ere-nelearsI aladutze , teuçuard netiarre zaiugE , yenoczierraç etsoid ate : naçec sterim cesuseI cinuçne ruah atE
. cid netiuge ate , ruah ciugE , irairaztibrec eruen ate : cud netrohte ate , rohtA , iraecreb ate : cud netiaoi ate , ahO , inuh tacoraid netiarre ate , casemradneg ocipza eruen ciraladutid , ocenem nerecreb cuan noçiug ere-in necE
. allihtum ene atiab nerutadnes ate , aztih tnemalos carre aniab : nida ras naebrahta ene engid cuanze , anuaI , naçec narre carenetneC aleuç netsedrahi atE
. aruh taid nerutadnes cirirrohte ciN , cesuseI óstoid atE
. autatnemrot iuqziag , ocitylarap naehcte caztaid allihtum ene , anuaI , aleoic atE
, alacuarec netiuge ztiohto tabrenetneC anagnerah nidec rohte , nemuanrepaC suseI naenec uhtras atE
. táçned nategainomitset yæh , aenoitalbo neud utanedro cesesyoM caçe atneserp ate , iraerodacifircaS äurub erue coçei stucare ate , libah aniab : náorretze irohen cuariugeB , cesuseI óstoid naudrO
. anussatoyahros nerah nidec uhahc natreb atE . uhahc nécia , taid ihaN , aleoic , cesuseI aruh naçec iuqnuh cirutadeh aucse atE
. corin laha uhahc , cudab ihan nidlab , anuaI , aleoic , aruh naçec aroda cirirrohte cetab oyahros , ánuh atE
. nóiuqec iuqierrai idnah eztedneg naenec istuai citidnem atE
. alaçeb cébircS ze ate , alaçeb caneuç etatirohtua neutic netsacari necE
. zánirtcod nerah neogeztiab zarim aulupop , cesuseI naeneutic utabaca cuah soporp nidec atreug atE
. ad naçi idnah aetiugesed nerah ate , ad naçi irore ate , artnoc nerah ehcte étud nakv oi ate , étud nakv isnuare céciah ate , cánrebos rv edarid naçi irrohte ate , airv ad naçi irore atE
. niuqeraneud utacifide naeniag elbas aehcte ereb ohre noçiug ad nerutarapmoc , netiuge utitiapze ate , cuah ztih ene utitiab netuçne ere-cron atE
. nec autadnuf naeniag acorra nece : naçi irore atze ate : artnoc neraehcte étud nakv oi ate , céciah étud nakv isnuare ate , cánrebos rv edarid naçi irrohte ate , airv ad naçi irore atE
: niuqeraneud utacifide natetab niag acorra aehcte ereb ruhuç noçiug nerutarapmoc tud aruh , netiuge ceh ate , cuah ztih ene utitiab netuçne adab ere-croN
. cóneuçud netiuge etatiuqini cinagene etzetiaç itrap : utugaçe tetzutiazte onadnugE , iuqoralc teuard nenarre naudro atE
? niuge ztihna etuhtrev naeneci erih ugutze ate , aropmac iztoge caurbaed naeneci erih ugutitze ate , utazitehporp naeneci erih ugutze , anuaI , anuaI , natrah nuge tuard nenarre ceztihnA
. aneud netiuge aetadnorov neraned natèurec atiA ene aniab , námuser ocatèurec neruhtras atze aicug natuard netiarre , anuaI , anuaI iriN
. ceh euçutid nerutugaçe zareb cirateutcurf ereB
. netzioge arus ate ad neztaccip aicug erobra neutze netiuge cino utcurF
. idiad nice cino utcurf caothciag erobra ate , idiad nice cirothciag utcurf cano erobrA
. utid netiuge caothciag utcurf caothciag erobra ate , utid netiuge cano utcurf caicug no erobra alaH
? cirocif cirateudrak ode , cistaham cirateirrohle étud neztlib alA . ceh euçutid nerutugaçe cirateutcurf ereB
. edarid iraparrah osto naenrab aniab : niuqerutiba idra arateuç edaritiab netrohte niec , cirateuslaf atehporp adab euçuariugeB
. canetud netiedire aruh edarid itug ate : aneud netiamare arezticiv aissreh edib ate ad aissreh ahtrob necE
. canedarid neztras ciratrah edarid ztihna ate , aneud netioiri aratenoitidrep ad alabaç edib ate aogral ahtrob nece : citissreh ahtrob etzetiaç raS
. cátehporP ate aeugeL ad ruah nece : rebalah yæh ere-ceuç euçeztei niuge , caicug açuag neuçutid ihan neuçazteid niuge yeuç cénoçiug adaB
? yenoiuqziaç neztacse cano açuag etzuard nename caned natèurec atiA neuç ogaera zetabmec : netiame yerruoah neuç néno açuag euçiuqadab nidlab ciraleteraç othciag ceuç zareB
? acuard nename tabeugus ala , óiuqadab acse niarra nidlab , atE
? anacuard nename irrah , óiuqadab acse iugo aemes ereb nidlab , anoçiug cirateuç ad ron necE
. óyaç neriuqeri , iraneud neztaklub ate : ud netiedire , caneud neztahlib ate : ud neztibecer , caicug ned neztacse necE
. euçiaç neriuqeri ate , euçaçe aklub : euçud nenedire ate , euçaçe ahlib : euçiaç nename ate etzetiaç acsE
. ceuç netaztiazte acihtaç ciriluzti ate , netaztitze acidnoho zénio ereb : areniztia nédrv cálrep neuç , ztoge aleuçaztitze ate , yero audnias açuag aleuçeyetzE
. citiugeb nereyana erue astif náçed iuqodi , cud nerutaheb naudro ate , citiugeb erue aoiripag cinehel cacodi , átircopyH
? naiugeb erih aoiripag , árroh ate , citiugeb erih astif nadaçed iuqodi catzV , ireyana erue cóstoid alon , odE
? neztraho oyaztaze iraoiripag ociugeb erue ate , arestif ociugeb nereyana erue cud neztaheb citagrec atE
. euçiaç neruhtruen zidla , euçutiab neruhtruen zirruen rec ate : eteraç nerutacidui , euçutiab nerutacidui zudnemegui rec necE
. táçnetzetiazte acidui , acidui aleuçaçetzE
. zaenoitcilffa ereb ud ocsa canuge : ud nenakv ahtra ocatereb canumarahib nece : zanumarahib ustahtra adab aleteraztE
. ocareniag euçiuqziaç nename caicug cuah açuag ate , áititsui nerah ate ámuser neraocniaI cinehel euçaçe ahlib aniaB
. aleuçudab arraheb nóicug neuah açuag nece , caocurec atiA neuç iuqadab nece ) étzutid neztahlib céonagaP caicug cuah açuag necE (
? arag nerutitzev zaçrec ode , ugud nenade rec ode , ugud nenai reC , aleuçud netiarre cirahtra zareb aleuçutzE
? caocatipihc edef , ogaera zeztihna ceuç aze : udab neztitzev urugni alah caocniaI , aned netraçe naebal rahib ate , aned rahleb nuge ocadnal nidlab adaB
. alaçeb tab cirateh naçi utitzev aletze niuqeraicug airolg ereb ere-nomolaS era teuçuard netiarre aniaB
. étud neturi ze , edarid neztaken ze : nedarid neztidnah caerolf ocadnal alon euçaçe saki ? ustahtra eteraç citagrec záruditzev atE
? iranussatidnah ereb tabosseb oeuqaçeid laha , iuqehctare zenakv ahtra cirateuç cron atE
? ogatnellecxe oniab ceh zeztihna ceuç eterazte : ceh utid neztah caocurec atiA neuç ate , neztlib araterenarg ateze , neztatieuqerre ze , netiere etutze nece , cairohc ocurec euçaztiaredifnoC
? aztuprog oniab audnemalliba ate , ogaiheug oniab ádnaiv aiciv atze : neteraç nerutitzev zaçrec , zaztuprog neuç ateze : nenade rec ate neuçud nenai rec , zaezticiv neuç cirahtra neuçutze , teuçuard netiarre ztocalaH
. canussatsarba ate aoçniaI euçeuqaztid aztibrec nicE . nerutaicerpsonem aecreb ate ud neriuqude niuqeratab ode : no iraecreb ate , acuard neriztire ztiag iratab ode nece : euqaztid aztibrec nice issuban ib croheN
? etad idnah niec aruh ebmuhli , adab ebmuhli aiugra ned natih nidlab zareb : cetad nuhli aicug ztuprog erih adab othciag aiugeb erih nidlab aniaB
: cetad iugra aicug ztuprog erih , adab elpmis aiugeb erih nidlab zareb , aiugeb ad aiugra neraztuproG
. ere-aztohib neuç ad nenaçi nah , aruaseht neuç atiab non necE
. netsiabe ze neztahluç etutiapze cénioho non ate , neztatsaog utiapze calliodreh ze cenerrec ze non , näurec caruaseht neuç euçazti niuge aniaB
. étzutitiab netsiabe ate neztahluç cénioho non ate , utitiab neztatsaog cálliodreh ate canerrec non , naerrul caruaseht neuç niuge aleuçaztitzE
. nairreuga cuard nerutadner canassucad nauterces atiA erue ate : iraned nauterces atiA erue aniab , táçneiuqaze ireuga alecia rurab yenoçiuG
: aetrahtiugeb erue caçe zuki ate , äurub erue caçe atcnv naenaud netiuge rurab cih aniaB
. airas ereb aletud neztibecer nece , teuçuard netiarre zaiuge : taçnedarid ireuga yenoçiug aledarid rurab , caetrahtiugeb ereb étzutid neztasiugsed nece : alaçeb cátircopyh ocatetsirt aruhcti aleterazte , naeneuçiugad rurab , ogaiheuG
. cátlaf neuç nerutakrab euçiuqzuartze ere-catiA neuç , cátlaf ereb yenoçiug euçezteidapze akrab nidlab aniaB
. caocurec atiA neuç ere-yeuç euçuard nerutakrab , cátlaf ereb yenoçiug euçezteidab akrab nidlab necE
. nemA . ztocaluces áirolg ate , ácnassiup ate , ámuser cud aerih necE . citothciag caztiag aruiled aniab , natenoitatnet icare ras aláztiagze atE
. ugeuartiab neztattiuq yénudroç erug ere-cug alon , carroç erug cugaztei attiuq atE
. nuge cugi aiugo ocenuge eruG
. ere-naerrul alaçeb näurec aetadnorov erih ideb niugE . ámuser erih ideb rohtE
: aneci erih ideb acifitcnas , anecia natèurec atiA eruG , euçiuge ztiohto ceuç zareb alenuH
. nehel oniab netoiuqziuqaç acse , neteraç raheb nerec catiA neuç iuqadab nece : iduri tárateh zareb aleteraztE
. aledarid nenuçne zaetsade ztihna ereb etud etsv nece : alaçeb céonagaP sade ztihna aleuçaçetze , naeneuçud netiuge ztiohto adaB
. nairreuga cuard nerutadner canassucad nauterces atiA erue ate : iraned nauterces atiA erue cóiuge ztiohto , ciristre áhtrob erue ate , naohctarebmag erue ida ras , naenaud netiuge ztiohto aniaB
. airas ereb aletud neztibecer nece teuçuard netiarre zaiuge : taçnecetid suki zénoçiug , aetiuge ztiohto aleduad cituç nateniotnac acirrac ate natenoitagergnoc ceyaic tekal yæh : alaçeb cátircopyh aleciaze , naenaud netiuge ztiohto atE
. nairreuga cuard nerutadner , canassucad nauterces atiA erue ate : taçned nauterces ánysomele eriH
. caniucse erih neud netiuge rec , carreuqze erih iuqelieblaze , naenaud netiuge anysomele cih aniaB
. airas ereb aletud neztibecer teustoid zaiuge : táçnecetid amitse zénoçiug , nateuqirrac ate nateugoganys alaçeb netud netiuge cétircopyh , naeniztia erue icare oi áttepmort aláçetze , naenaud netiuge anysomele adaB
. nahtiab aned natèurec atiA neuç nenakv euçutze ciriras erepze : táçnetzetiaç suki zaçeh naeniztia nénoçiug neuçiugatze ánysomele neuç euçuariugeB
. alaçeb ned tcefrep aned natèurec atiA neuç , tcefrep ceuç adab neteraÇ
? netiuge alerroh ere-ceonacilbup etutze ? euçud netiuge ogaiheug rec , euçeuardab netiuge etrahtiugeb tnemalos yeyana neuç nidlab atE
? netiuge areb iroh ere-céonacilbup etutze ? euçud nenakv iras rec , euçetziradab no yeneuztirad no yeuç nidlab necE
. areniag néotsuini ate néotsui airv ud netrogi ate , areniag néno ate néothciag aiuqzugi ereb ud neticare ikli crah nece : taçneteraç ruoah neraned natèurec atiA neuÇ
. citagcanetzutiaç neztatucesrep ate , citagcaneuçiuqziaç neztradlo euçiuge ztiohto ate : yenèuztirad ztiag euçeiuge iugnv , canetzutiaç neztacidaram euçaztiacideneb , cayaste neuç euçazti stehnO , teuçuard netiarre cin aniaB
. irayaste erue cacuard neriztire ztiag ate , iraocruh erue cacuard neriztire nO , aled naçi narre nece euçud nakv nuçnE
. ztiari aláçetze aneud ihan utabelliam cinagerih ate : cóme iranayaç neztacsE
. agib niuqerah aodnitiebla , aretiuge netab aocel utahctrob uahiab nenakv ihan ere-cron atE
. ere-aotnam coçei iztv , iuqede áccai erue ate , iranauard ihan niuge icua irih atE
. ere-aecreb cóçei luzti , nálehtam oceniucse erue açehab oi cetiebron nidlab aniab : iraiuqziag itsiser aleuçoçeitzE , teuçuard netiarre cin aniaB
. citagaztroh aztroh ate , citagaiugeb aiugeB , aled naçi narre nece , euçud nakv nuçnE
. ad citothciag , aocitiog zaçuah ate : ze , ze : yab , yab aztih neuç zib aniaB
. cidiad nice ztleb apze iruhc tabolib nece , nerutarui cutze zäurub erue rebalaH
. ad aetatiuic neraidnah euger nece , zemelasureI ateze : ad aikla ocatenio nerah nece , zarruL atezE
. ad aonorht neraocniaI nece , zäurec ze , ertab arui neuçaçetze teustoid cin aniaB
. cautattemorp udnemarui erue iranuaI caztuard nerutadner aniab , nerutaruirepsed ziazE , aleyaç naçi narre yeocoganehel nece , euçud nakv nuçne zirreB
. aleud netiuquai oiretluda crah , atiab nerudnocze niuqeraiztv ere-ron ate : alacuard neticare niuge oiretluda , zasuac neraçidralliap ublas , aetzame ereb utiab neriztv ere-cron nece , teustoid cin aniaB
: ártel ocenoitarapes ómeb , aetzame ereb utiab neriztv ere-croN , ad naçi narre rebalaH
. aranneheg ztoge aicug ztuprog erih nidatze ate , tab cirateorbmem erih nidad lag , ocaterih cud eboh nece : cinagerue caztiari ate , aruh caçe acnert , uahab neticare acubert caniucse ucse erue nidlab atE
. aranneheg ztoge aicug ztuprog erih nidatze ate , tab cirateorbmem erih nidad lag , ocaterih cud eboh nece : cinagerue caztiari ate , aruh caçe iuqodi , uahab neticare acubert caniucse iugeb erue nidlab adaB
. naeztohib ereb niuqerah aleeuqud utaretluda zetabmah , taçnaçed aicihtug aruh , ciretzame utiab netseiugeb ere-croN , teuçuard netiarre cin aniaB
. neriuquai ciroiretluda cutzE , aleyaç naçi narre yéocoganehel nece euçud nakv nuçnE
. atalep neuqza onaorid adner , cidnah nerikli ziaze , tauard netiarre zaiugE
. nidaze raçe naenioserp ate , iratnaegras nómeze caegui ate , iraegui catsartnoc aditrap erue nómeze , onecia naedib niuqerah , ztetif niuqeratsartnoc aditrap erue ediuqsida néciA
. aenoitalbo erue caçe atneserp cirirrohte naudro ate , niuqereyana erue idatnioppa nehel : libah ate , naeniztia eradla aenoitalbo erue nah caçe iztV
, artnoc erih tiabrec aleudab caeyana erih nece idahab tiohro nah ate , areradla cudab netiamare aenoitalbo erue nidlab zareB
. aletad engid ocetaçi utinup zanneheg oczus , áohrE , acuartiab nenarre ere-cron ate : aletad engid ocetaçi utinup zulliesnoc aruh , ákaR , ireyana ereb acuartiab nenarre ere-cron ate : aletad engid ocetaçi utinup zoicidui , ebag asuac ireyana ereb oyaztiab nezterressa ere-ron nece , teuçuard netiarre cin aniaB
. etad engid ocetaçi utinup zoicidui aruh , utiab nelih ere-cron ate : nelih cutzE , yeocoganehel neyaç naçi naçinarre alon euçud nakv nuçnE
. námuser ocatèurec neruhtras aleterazte ceuç , oniab aneuesirahP ate anebircS áititsui neuç adapze ogasodnuba nidlab , teuçuard netiarre necE
. námuser ocatèurec ad neruhtied idnah aruh , neristacari ate utitiab neniuge ere-cron aniab : námuser ocatèurec aruh ad neruhtied néipihc , canoçiug alenuh utitiab neristacari ate , tab ciratuah néipihc udnemanam utiab neristuah zareb ere-croN
. onetid niuge caicug açuag , nenagari citeugeL atze tabstuh utcnup ode tabatoi , arrul ate äurec onetiad nagari , teustoid zaiuge necE
. areztilpmoc aniab , areztiloba irrohte zianze : alecian irrohte areztiloba nétehporP ode neraeugeL nece etsv aleuçutzE
